1b1(rgyud): rgyu gar spyad du/ u badz+ra rjes kyi ga
1b2(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa leg na rdo rje dbang bsru ba'i rgyu
1b3(rgyud): bam po dang // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
2a1(rgyud): #cad lnga phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//
2a2(rgyud): coMm+bu ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po rnam par smin pa bsnam
2a3(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa lus mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod
2a4(rgyud): pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rin po che'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu rnam par spras pa'i khang bzang
2b1(rgyud): chen po rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i khang pa na/ pad+mo'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po nor du
2b2(rgyud): rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos ngos gnyis rnam par spras pa la bzhugs nasi lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/
2b3(rgyud): dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni num thang ba'i nam mkha' la lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan
2b4(rgyud): 'das kyang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po de la lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
2b5(rgyud): tshogs chen pos kun nas bskor te/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/ sku dang /
3a1(rgyud): #gsung dang / thugs ni mnyam par byin gyis brlabs/ g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang ni bral zhing lhun gyis
3a2(rgyud): grub par sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa la 'jug cing / 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
3a3(rgyud): dang ngag mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos
3a4(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ lus dang / ngag dang /
3a5(rgyud): yid mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de thob pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
3a6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
3b1(rgyud): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos
3b2(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston pa dag mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag me tog gis gzhi'i snying po'i rgyun bkod pa dang ldan po/ 'jig
3b3(rgyud): rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa 'di na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang / sa sgrub pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab dang /
3b4(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis so// mdor na sems can
3b5(rgyud): gang la la dag dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po/ 'di
3b6(rgyud): lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par sla ba dang / dor spyad pa dang / don thun pas bsdus pa sha stag ste/ de dag ni rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de nyid kyis dge ba mngon par 'du byed do// de ltar
3b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes chen po shin tu rgyas pa de dag thams cad mthong zhing 'jug ste/ rnam par lta zhing nye bar sems te dge ba ji tsam
4a1(rgyud): mngon par 'du byed pa'ang rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de nyid kyis so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar rmad du byung zhing ya mtshan gyis 'dun pa'i snying du gyur//
4a2(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam ste cang mi smra bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par lta zhing nye bar sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
4a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi snying 'dun pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od stong phrag du ma mgur nas phyung ngo //
4a4(rgyud): de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad snang bar byas te nam mkha'i khams rab 'byams dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dang dbang dang
4a5(rgyud): ldan par gyur pa 'khod pa de dag la/ thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan rims nad bral ba de// dbang sgyur rgyal po'i khang pa ni// skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na// snying
4a6(rgyud): 'thad chen po seng ge'i khri// dpag tshad sum brgya yod pa la// pad+mo'i snying por de bzhugs nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor// gnas der thub pa chen po yis// bkod pa chen po gang/
4a7(rgyud): sprul pa// de dag gi ni grangs tshad dang // dbyibs dang kha dog gang yin pa// de ni bskal pa grangs med du// bstan par nus pa ma yin no// de ru de la dpa' bo che// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang //
4b1(rgyud): gnyis mchog/ yid gnyis somanyi spangs pa yi// dgongs pa gcod pa lta bar gyis// zhes bskul lo// de nas 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bskul nas slar/
4b2(rgyud): log ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sngang mdzad kyi mgur du rang gi gnas su zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mdzod spunas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i
4b3(rgyud): 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba/ 'khor 'od zer brgya stong dang ldan pa phyung ste/ de'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ 'dren
4b4(rgyud): pa bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la// blta ba dang ni mchod pa bgyi ba dang // sems can phan par bzhed pas chos brjod phyir// khyed cag thams cad ma shol de ring gshegs// zhes yang dag par
4b5(rgyud): ston to// de nas 'od zer de dag yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'od zer des bskul ma thag tu rang rang
4b6(rgyud): gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
4b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba'i slad du rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen por mchi na/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig na mchis/ gang /
5a1(rgyud): du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni tsi zhes bgyi/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags zhes zhus/
5a2(rgyud): so/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
5a3(rgyud): bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams re re
5a4(rgyud): nges par ston pa re re la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kyis mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod pa rab 'byams du ma yod par khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag de la mtshams sbyor ba bkod pa rnams kyi
5a5(rgyud): tshad ni grong bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dag gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes
5a6(rgyud): su zhugs pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khams su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i
5a7(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byams kyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par gcig go// me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byams kyi/
5b1(rgyud): mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa rab 'byams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rgyud gcig go// me tog gi gzhi'i
5b2(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya rnams gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bar ma gcig go// 'jig
5b3(rgyud): rten gyi khams rab 'byams bar ma bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pa kod pa gci
5b4(rgyud): ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yongs su sbyangs so// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
5b5(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig pu de nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de nyid yin te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor
5b6(rgyud): lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis las ni shin tu 'das shing nam mkha' nyid byang chub kyi snying por byin gyis brlabs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma de na rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na
5b7(rgyud): bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de ni de 'dra ste/ de'i yon tan nam/ spyod pa 'am/ smon lam mam/ ye shes kyi mtha' ni nged kyis bskal pa grangs med
6a1(rgyud): par yang rtogs par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
6a2(rgyud): btsud de/ nged ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa gzo ba/ byas pa shes pa dag go// rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sngon gyi spyod pa/
6a3(rgyud): dang smon lam dang / ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gcod pa nas brtsams te bstan pa gnas par mdzad pa dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang //
6a4(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang / ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las brtsams te/ ngag sna tshogs kyi 'khor
6a5(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rab 'byams go bar mdzad par bzhed nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po 'di phyung ngo // de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
6a6(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen tog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros la rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di 'byin no// na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga
6a7(rgyud): te b+h+yaHsarba thA a dza na/ rigs kyi bu khyod rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te/
6b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi sdang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul
6b2(rgyud): pachen po dang / rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen po sngon ma mthong ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang
6b3(rgyud): sbyar gyi khang pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po'ang rin po che dang rdo rje me tog gi sprin chen pos mngon par bkas
6b4(rgyud): bau/ de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje'i sprin
6b5(rgyud): chen po dag gis bkab bo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der yang song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong
6b6(rgyud): du ma bskor ba byas nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar phyogs nyid du gnas te/ rin po che dang rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po chen po dang / rdo rje'i dbyug gu dang / badz+ra/
6b7(rgyud): snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che rdo rje chen po'i yi ge'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug go// lho phyogs
7a1(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la /
7a2(rgyud): rje chen po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang /
7a3(rgyud): blta ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir song zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos rdo rje chen po'i
7a4(rgyud): snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ma hA badz+ra gra ba raM hUM/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdo rje mchog snying po 'di thob cing / bcom ldan 'das
7a5(rgyud): des gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
7a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
7a7(rgyud): nas 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad ni rin po che rdo rje mchog gi snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so// rdo rje chen po'i mchog gi me tog dang / bdugs pa dang /
7b1(rgyud): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / rdo rje chen po'i mchog dang / rin po che mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bas/
7b2(rgyud): rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po snang bar byas so// mchog sbyin pa chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi sgras phyogs bcur go bar byas so// go bar byas nas kyang ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lho phyogs
7b3(rgyud): su gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rdo rje chen po mchog las byung ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rnams la 'dug go// nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
7b4(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
7b5(rgyud): kyi thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i mchog gi snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma mchog gi dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ka ru Na ba la badz+ra
7b7(rgyud): pad+ma gra sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis snying po 'di gsungs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
8a1(rgyud): phyug la rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
8a2(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
8a3(rgyud): dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
8a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
8a5(rgyud): brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma chen po rdo rje'i rgyal por 'dug ste/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi
8a6(rgyud): khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa thams cad thugs rje chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyis rang gi lus rnam par rig byed kyi sprin rnams kyis kun tu bkang nas snang bar byas so// byang
8a7(rgyud): phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rdo rje chen pos rnam par gnon pa/
8b1(rgyud): rdo rje chen pos rnam par rol pa/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
8b2(rgyud): rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub kyi snying po chen po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// namaHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ba ra da man ra a gri gri/ 'di gsungs nas bya
8b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad
8b4(rgyud): de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong /
8b5(rgyud): phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal
8b6(rgyud): po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang phyogs nyid du gnas
8b7(rgyud): nas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i rgyan bkod par byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog gi lus kyi sprin rnams kyis phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na
9a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che cod pan la dkon mcho/
9a2(rgyud): gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis dkon mchog
9a3(rgyud): gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM oM dza saM/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i
9a4(rgyud): rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i cod pan
9a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems
9a6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam
9a7(rgyud): par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyi pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug ste/ dkon mchog
9b1(rgyud): gsum pa'i sku'i sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po la sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
9b3(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyis dpal gyis sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i snying po'i snying po 'di gsungs so// namaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
9b4(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA ma hA badz+ra me g+ha bi krI Di ta bi shra saM b+ha ba ha/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom
9b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sem
9b6(rgyud): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song nas/ bcom
9b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas sprin chen po rdo rje mchog gi lus kyi rnam par rig pa'i sprin rnams kyis
10a1(rgyud): #/ pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po'i sprin byin gyis brlabs nas/ mchod pa chen po'i mchog gi sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug go// lho nub kyi
10a2(rgyud): phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje chen po'i tog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dpa'
10a3(rgyud): bo la rdo rje las byung ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje tog gis rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i
10a4(rgyud): snying po 'di gsungs so// namaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rod b+ha bai swAhA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dpa' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nas
10a5(rgyud): ma snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bder te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig
10a6(rgyud): rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan
10a7(rgyud): 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i rgyan rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi kham
10b1(rgyud): thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing rdo rje'i gzugs kyis brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
10b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga dbyangs snyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la rdo rje'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
10b3(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pas rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra rak+Sha nir+g+ho Sha bi
10b4(rgyud): krAn+ta swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brug sgra'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/
10b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying
10b6(rgyud): po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams nyid
10b7(rgyud): du gnas te dbyangs kyi rig byed mtha' yas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad go bar byed cing rang gi smon lam las nges par byung ba'i rin po che chen po'i pad+ma la 'dug go// 'og gi phyogs na
11a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par dag pa'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i yan/
11a2(rgyud): lag la spyod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs so// namaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA haM he swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i/
11a3(rgyud): yan lag la bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su skor cing mdun du bdar te/
11a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang
11a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/
11a6(rgyud): ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing pad+ma'i
11a7(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'dug go// steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas
11b1(rgyud): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i la byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying/
11b2(rgyud): po 'di gsungs so// namaHsar+b+ba mu le b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bo d+h+ya~M gar d+harma swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das
11b3(rgyud): des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa'/
11b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
11b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gal der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs
11b6(rgyud): pa bzhin du steng gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mtha' yas pa go bar byed pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing chos nyid las byung /
11b7(rgyud): ba'i pad+ma chen po la 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus shing 'khod pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing 'di dag tu/
12a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog
12a2(rgyud): pa thams cad dang bral zhing nam mkha' ltar gzod ma nas zhi ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'ang mthong nas ngo mtshar du
12a3(rgyud): gyur te/ sgra skad gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o// gdod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa// mgon po rmad byung dam pa 'di// ji ltar sa la snang zhig gu
12a4(rgyud): sku yis 'phrin las mi mdzad la// gsung dang thugs kyis mi mdzad cing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra// sku yis sems can thams cad la/
12a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnams mdzad kyang // sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste// thub pa de ni 'gyur med mnga'// gsung ni brag cha 'dra ba ste// bstan du med cing gzugs med kyang // lha yi rnga chen ji
12a6(rgyud): bzhin du// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par mdzad// thugs ni rlom sems bral ba ste// de la yul ni mnga' ma lags// yul rnams dang ni de bral yang // sems can rnams kyi yul du gyur//
12a7(rgyud): gsung ci de bzhin sems can te// de bzhin sku dang de bzhin thugs// mtshan nyid gcig dang rab ldan zhing // smra ba'i nang nas mchog tu snang // skye ba med las grol ba yi// de bzhin gshegs/
12b1(rgyud): ba yod min pas// gang dag skye ba med shes pa// de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes// mgon po rtag tu mnyam gzhag cing // lus dang ngag dang yid bral yang // rtag par lus ngag spyod yul du// thug
12b2(rgyud): brgyun du rab tu snang // byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid// shin tu dka' ba byed pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes che 'bar ba// 'di 'dra yongs su tshol bar byed// de la mig ni mi snang zhing // rna ba
12b3(rgyud): dang ni sna yang min// lce dang lus dang yid kyang ni// de phyir de yi yul ma yin// gzugs min sgra yang ma yin te// dri dang ro dang reg ma yin// dbang po ma yin rnam shes min// thams cad du
12b4(rgyud): ni rtag tu ni// yul can dang ni yul de dag/ rnam par brtags pas yod ma yin// yul can yod pa ma yin pas// yul rnams srid pa ma yin no// byis pas ji ltar brtags pa bzhin// de
12b5(rgyud): ltar gang tshe yod ma yin// de tshe mgon po yod gyur te// rnam par ma brtags tshul du'o// de ni kun tu thams cad la// bsam pa ji bzhin rdzogs mdzad pa// ston pa yid bzhin nor bu ltar/
12b6(rgyud): kun gyi mdun na bzhugs pa yin// gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i tshul gyis su// ting 'dzin dbang bskur rnams la ni// blta smra 'bel gtam thams cad kyis// kun tu longs spyod
12b7(rgyud): 'os su 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad mgon mthong nas// de tshe kun gyis ting 'dzin dang // gzungs dang rig dang rnam par thar// bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad 'thob// gzug
13a1(rgyud): #/ la dbang ni thob gyur cing // sangs rgyas ye shes tshol byed pa// bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang // phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa yin// yang dag rdzogs pa'i/
13a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs// de ni gzugs kyi mchog yin te// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dag par// de ni bdag cag thob par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa
13a3(rgyud): de dag smras nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i med pa dang / de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pasabacom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
13a4(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sa gang yin pa la 'jug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so// de bzhin du ngo bo/
13a5(rgyud): nyid yongs su shes pas ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
13a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
13a7(rgyud): khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa dag kyang mkhyen nas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gi mthus de bzhin gshegs
13b1(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/
13b2(rgyud): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyun gyi snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan/
13b3(rgyud): 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / 'jig
13b4(rgyud): rten gyi khams mtshams sbyor ba'i bkod pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / stong thams cad dang /
13b5(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gtan la phab pa thams cad dang / me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten
13b6(rgyud): gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna tshogs dang / re ba sna tshogs dang / 'dod pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa sna tshogs kyi tshul rnam par gnas pa dang
13b7(rgyud): 'gro ba sna tshogs dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / ljongs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dag la sgra dang tshig brjod pa rnam par
14a1(rgyud): gzhag pa sna tshogs rnams kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag par
14a2(rgyud): ston cing / rang gi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
14a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa dang / bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig
14a4(rgyud): nas cig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyis gzung bar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje chen po'i snying po dang / rdo rje chen
14a5(rgyud): po'i 'od 'phro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa dang / gsang sngags rnam par dag pa'i sgos rdo rje'i khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur
14a6(rgyud): ba mdzad pa mthong ngo // de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spros pa thams cad dang / bral ba'i phyir thams cad du spros pa me pa'o// rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi/
14a7(rgyud): rtog pa'o// ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o// gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o// skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o// bsam pa'i sa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir
14b1(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o// tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad du sems can thams cad
14b2(rgyud): yang dag par 'du ba'i sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad rjes su 'thun
14b3(rgyud): pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi mdun na 'dug pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa gos dri ma can gyis dkris pa lta bu
14b4(rgyud): ni 'di su'i yin/ 'di ci zhig ces sems can rnams kyis mi shes te ya mtshan ci zhig tu gyur to// gang dag blo gros rnam par dag pa yid gnyis dang the tsom dang bral ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba
14b5(rgyud): la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags dang spyod pa'i tshul la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
14b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pas/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la zhugs pa dag ste/
14b7(rgyud): de dag ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'di mnyan pa dang / bslabs pa dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po dro ba dang / dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i skal ba yod do// de nas 'jig rten gyi
15a1(rgyud): khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan gyis gling bzhi pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du bdud pham par mdzad nas/ byang
15a2(rgyud): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste mthar gyis spyad pa spyod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du byin gyin brlabs nas/
15a3(rgyud): chos bstan to// bcom ldan 'das de'ang bstan pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang
15a4(rgyud): phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song thams cad spong ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
15a5(rgyud): rnams bsdus nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs te thams cad kyi mdun du rdo
15a6(rgyud): rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas/ lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad do// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur
15a7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub pa'i gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // bam po gnyis pa//
15b1(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dpal yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas na/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po de bzhin
15b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu 'thun pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i nagatsha' chen po mchog na/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
15b3(rgyud): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
15b4(rgyud): 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa dbang chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa nyin gung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang /
15b5(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi la chen
15b6(rgyud): po dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa steng rgyas 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa tshem can dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /
15b7(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu'i nor dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang / tshe dang ldan pa srung spyod dbang po
16a1(rgyud): bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sbyor dang / tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / de dag la sogs pa
16a2(rgyud): dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs cig go// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dra ba can gyi gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub
16a3(rgyud): sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag ni rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /
16a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa chos la gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ldan dang /
16a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas phan byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
16a6(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying
16a7(rgyud): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sang sang po'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
16b1(rgyud): dri ma med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla ma'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems
16b2(rgyud): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sem
16b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snying dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang thabs cig ste/ de dag thams cad kyang sa dang / pha rol
16b4(rgyud): tu phyin pa dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / dbang thob pa dang / sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa
16b5(rgyud): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sngon gyi smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du nges par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la
16b6(rgyud): mkhas pa/ dag pa rgyun mi 'chad par dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/
16b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang ngo'o// gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams
17a1(rgyud): kyang de nyid du 'dus te 'khod do// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'ang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bus kun nas bskor cing de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// lha'i dbang
17a2(rgyud): po brgya byin yang lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim dang / thags bzangs ris
17a3(rgyud): dang / zhi mchog dang / baTi dang / rnga chen dang / dus kyi 'khor lo can dang / dri ma med dang / rtog dang / zla gdong dang / rnam par 'joms dang / zab mo dang / stobs can dang / sgra
17a4(rgyud): gcan dang / rtog dregs dang / rnam par snang ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sna tshogs 'phreng ba can dang / de dag la sogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan stong dang / lha ma yin
17a5(rgyud): gyi dbang po de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi mthu chen po dang / lha ma yin gyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang /
17a6(rgyud): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob rnams mngon par sprul nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal
17a7(rgyud): mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga~M la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ji
17b1(rgyud): sbyar sprul pa'i me tog dang / bdugs pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang rgyan dang
17b2(rgyud): sil snyan dang / pheg rdob rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po madros dang klu'i rgyal po 'od
17b3(rgyud): zer rgyas pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i cod pan can dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dzeg po dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang klu'i rgyal po no n+ya dang klu'i rgyal pa stobs kyi rgyu dang klu'i rgyal po/
17b4(rgyud): rna rdum dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dus can dang / klu'i rgyal po rigs can dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gcig pa dang /
17b5(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po brdzun po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs ldan dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ klu'i mthu chen po dang /
17b6(rgyud): klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos tsan dan gor shing Sha'i chu'i sprin mngon par sprul nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug pog la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
17b7(rgyud): sing ste lhags nas/ ji ltar sprul pa'i spos chu'i sprin rnams kyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug por char mngon par bab bo// phab nas kyang bcom ldan
18a1(rgyud): 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas dang / gnod sbyin/
18a2(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phags skyes po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang pa bzang po dang /
18a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nar bu bzang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rmongs byed 'dzin pa chu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag brgyad pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde
18a4(rgyud): dpon chen po lnga rtsen dang / de dag la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khri rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
18a5(rgyud): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnams thogs nas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba
18a6(rgyud): dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
18a7(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
18b1(rgyud): pa 'khor mi 'am ci du ma dang ldan pa'ang mi 'am ci'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'breng ba dang / zug pa dang / bye ma dang / na 'aza' dang / gdugs pa dang / rgyal mtshan
18b2(rgyud): dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob du ma thogs pa brgya stong du ma dag rang gi gnas nas byung ste shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom
18b3(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste byin nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
18b4(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
18b5(rgyud): nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnam par 'dud kyi bu dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'jigs 'gro dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'dab brgya dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gtsug pud
18b6(rgyud): can 'khor nam mkha' lding brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'ang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin po'i/
18b7(rgyud): bdag po khros bzhin dang / srin po'i bdag po mche ba bzang dang / srin po'i bdag po drag po dang / rab tu gtum pa dang / 'jigs 'jigs lta dang / skrag byed dang / 'jigs byed chen
19a1(rgyud): po dang / gdong bcu dang / gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i dril bu dang / rnam par 'jigs 'jigs lta dang / zla ba'i sde 'khor srin po du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA
19a2(rgyud): la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
19a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'khod do// drang srong chen po me 'khor drang srong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/
19a4(rgyud): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rlung sprin gyi 'phreng ba can dang / rlung 'jig byed dang / rlung 'chags byed dang / rlung kun tu/
19a5(rgyud): 'jog byed dang / rlung rnam par 'thor dang / rlung dus ldan dang / rlung rnam par 'thor rlung dang / rlung drung dmar dang / rlung 'jig rten 'dzin kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de dong ste
19a6(rgyud): lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// skar ma'i rgyal po zla ba 'khor skar ma brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod
19a7(rgyud): pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go nyi ma'i 'od
19b1(rgyud): zing 'phreng ba can dang / tsha bar byed pa dang / skems byed dang / du ba 'byin dang / rab 'bar dang / nyi ma sreg byed 'khor lha'i bu gzi brjid 'phags pa brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang /
19b2(rgyud): shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
19b3(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// klu'i rgyal po chu lha 'khor klu'i rgyal po du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la
19b4(rgyud): ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan
19b5(rgyud): bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// drag
19b6(rgyud): po yi dgas kyi 'khor dang ldan pa'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor
19b7(rgyud): 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
20a1(rgyud): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'jug go/ gza'i rgyal po chen po smin drug gi bu 'khor bza' brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs rgya
20a2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//
20a3(rgyud): sprin lha'i bu skya bo zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu glog 'phreng zhes bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu'i sprin gyi dra ba stug po 'jig byed ces bya ba dang / sprin lha'i bu char 'bebs zhes bya ba 'khor lho'i bu
20a4(rgyud): brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
20a5(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// glog dpag tu med ces bya ba dang / glog gzi brjid can zhes bya ba dang / glog stug 'od ces bya ba dang / glog mdzes 'phreng can zhes bya ba
20a6(rgyud): 'khor brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
20a7(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs ri dang / ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang /
20b1(rgyud): ri'i rgyal ngo ma la ya dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang / ri'i rgyal ngo mo mjed can dang / ri'i rgyal po rtse mo brgya pa dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang / ri'i rgyal po dag sngags
20b2(rgyud): 'chang dang / ro'i rgyal po dbang gzhan dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
20b3(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// gshin rje dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / be con nag po can dang / skyes bu nag po dang / 'chi bdag dang / dpal
20b4(rgyud): min dang / rna nag ma'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
20b5(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dka' thub bzlog ma dang / tsA muN+Da dang / drag po'i chung ma dang / tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / gzhon
20b6(rgyud): ru'i chung ma dang / lus ngan gyi chung ma dang / phag gi chung ma dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i chung ma'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom
20b7(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// chu klung chen po gang+gA dang / chu klung chen po si ta dang /
21a1(rgyud): chu gung chen po dbyangs can dang cu bung rkyen pa ba sna dang / chu klung chen po zla ba'i chacan dang / chu gu chen po ma sun dang / chu thung chen po kun gyi sa
21a2(rgyud): dang / chu klung chen po mgyogs ldan dang / chu klung chen po mtsho sngon dang / chu klung chen po ba la sbyin mchog ldan dang / chu klung chen po brtse ba sbyin yang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dung
21a3(rgyud): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dri za'i rgyal po sna tshogs 'phreng ba can dang / dri za'i rgyal po 'brog po dang / dri za'i
21a4(rgyud): rgyal po shugs chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po rnam par gnon pa dang / dri za'i rgyal po chu skyes dang / dri za'i rgyal po ut+pal lta bu'i mig dang / dri za'i rgyal po tsan dan brtsegs kyang shing sA la sna
21a5(rgyud): tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs tu gcig
21a6(rgyud): tu 'khod do// rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po nye ba'i thog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rab tu gtum pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal
21a7(rgyud): bo bsnyems ldan dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po shugs 'chang dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po de dag dang / gzhan yang 'khor/
21b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po bcu stong dum dang ldan pa ga kyang shing sAl sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug brog la ba dung / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong sde lpags nas
21b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// srin mo so can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo g.yengs byed ces bya ba dang / srin mo mtshan mo chu zhes bya ba dang /
21b3(rgyud): srin mo so 'cha'am zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rmongs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo dgod ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rdo rje lta bu'i lto zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bum ltom zhes bya ba dang / srin
21b4(rgyud): mo zangs 'dab can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo glog lcem zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bu tsa li zhes bya ba dang / srin mo bong mo zhes bya ba dang / srin mo 'jigs su rung ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo
21b5(rgyud): zhi bam lta bu'i sen mo can zhes bya ba dang / srin ma chen mo de dag dang / gzhan 'khor srin mo du pa dang ldan pa dag kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba
21b6(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'byung po'i rgyal po mdung can dang /
21b7(rgyud): thung ba'i rgyal nges shos can dang / 'byung ba'i rgyal po gtan shing can dang / 'byung ba rgyal pas sha 'i 'dzin dang / 'byung ba rgyal ba 'jugs kyi dang / 'byung ba'i rgyal pa langs
22a1(rgyud): 'gugs byed dang / 'byung ba'i rgyal po gnya' drag 'khor 'byung po brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'ang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal sug pogs/
22a2(rgyud): ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sha za thams cad dang / mdangs 'brog pa
22a3(rgyud): thams cad dang / gnon po thams cad dang / grib gnon thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / stobs po che'i tshogs kyi
22a4(rgyud): bdag po dang / de dag thams cad kyang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
22a5(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sring mo bzhi gang yin pa de dag kyang phyogs bzhi nas lhag te gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas
22a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po shin tu yangs shing thag zu che la ka tsa'in
22a7(rgyud): di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur cing / sa gzhi rdo rje dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / spug gi kha khyer gyis rnam par phye ba ngos gnyis sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gis brgyan te mdzes par
22b1(rgyud): byas pa ked du na pa mchen pa 'tshal bu gamed ka'i rlabs zos pa/ mu tog gi sha la mang po ltungs pa dar gyi la nga mang ba bris pa sal stan dang nga gdong bsta cing sing du 'ong ba'i snga
22b2(rgyud): 'byin pa/ rgya'os tog yu la dang / kA pud dang / badz+ra dkar po dang / drim chog gisas phyogs de bkram par gyur te/ 'di sa ng+yas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdu dru
22b3(rgyud): gyis shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad rdo rje chen po'i 'khor yug gi ris bskor ba/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams su gyur pa/ chu zheng dpag tshod 'bum
22b4(rgyud): phrag bcu pa/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog gis legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas phyogs cha yongs su grang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyis byung ba ste
22b5(rgyud): dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rgyal po'i gnas dag pa'i las byung ba lham me lhang nge 'dug pa de bzhin/ shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po'ang ba
22b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi mthus lhan ner rnam par mdzes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya
22b7(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par banag ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'o gsung phyung ste rdo rje 'byung gnas
23a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// rdo rje 'byung gnas stobs po che// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
23a2(rgyud): 'di la ni// rdo rje stobs chen srung bar gyis// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHswA hA/ rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
23a3(rgyud): cad dang // 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po'i sgra gcig nas/ gcig tu 'ur ces grags par gyur te/ rdo rje 'byung gnas dbang po che// sems can
23a4(rgyud): kun la phan mdzad pa// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni// thub pa chen pos byin gyis rlobs// rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyang // snying po 'di ni 'dzin gyur cig/ des ni 'dir ni de dag kun
23a5(rgyud): tshul chen dngos grub thob par shog/ ces bsgrags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang
23a6(rgyud): 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang rnam par dag pa'i sgo la
23a7(rgyud): 'jug pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags la 'jug pa dang / gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen/
23b1(rgyud): pa'i gnas rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bsrung snying po zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ston pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu 'bras bu mang ba
23b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen byang chub sems dpas legs par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'phrul/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu ma'i rnam par rol pa/ de bzhin gshegs
23b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi shes na/ sems can gzhan dag gis shes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ gzhan du na byang chub
23b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag
23b5(rgyud): ni ma gtogs te/ rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba zhes bya ba gsang ba'i mchog yod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun
23b6(rgyud): bzang po la sogs pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dus lags so// bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni chod lags so//
23b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sngon gyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo rdo rje chen po'i 'byung gnas
24a1(rgyud): gas sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so// nam sarba su dz+nyAHsar+b+ba twa thAgA d+ha/ sarbA\u0f88\u0f90/ kus zugs kyi rgyas po gsusas rgyu
24a2(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dngo mtshar du gyur ba'i snying gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa kyi mi mi shes skyid pa tsho// bus ma gtan bde bu mtshig thob pas/ kun kyang nga mid dru glur
24a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar rtse gcig tu gyur par mkhyen nas/ dpal be'u las byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
24a4(rgyud): phyung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas te/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal gyi be'u nyid du zhugs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24a5(rgyud): chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa bstan par smon lam
24a6(rgyud): btab nas/ gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ dbus kyi 'dzam bu gling mi mjed 'dir lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyi gnas na gnas pa de 'od
24a7(rgyud): zer gyi snang ba des snang por gyur pas mig dang bzhin rgyas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'i 'du de/ de bzhin ga shegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yid la byed cing cang mi zer bar 'jug par
24b1(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i brda mdzad de tshogs su bcad pa'ang gsungs so// sems can dag pa zla bzhin tshur/
24b2(rgyud): shogacig/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin brlabs byang chub gzhol// bsam pas mnyam nyid legs rtogs khong chung byed// rtag tu sangs rgyas byas gzo tshur shog cig/ dus
24b3(rgyud): gsum mnyam pa nyid la rtag gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje mchog tshur shog/ phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig/ sems can don mdzad bsam yas gzugs mnga' ga
24b4(rgyud): de dag ma lus don gyi mdun 'gro khyed// gsang ba'i bdag po sems can mchog tshur shog/ gsang ba'i dam pa sems can snying po tshur// gdul dka' rtag 'dul dbang thob tshur shog
24b5(rgyud): cig brten te byung las skyes pa po// dus dang tshod shes tshur shog cig/ dam pa thob pa tshur shog cig/ dam pa sbyin byed tshur shog cig/ dpal byed dpal sdud dpal ldan pa
24b6(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i sras tshur shog/ sems can bzang po stobs po che// rdo rje lta bu tshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras po 'jigs med pa// stobs can rnams kyi mchog cur/
24b7(rgyud): shog/ rtag tu srid pa gsum po yi// snying dga' byed pa tshur shog cig/ yang dag lam ni ston byed pa// stobs bcur gnas pa tshur shog cig/ sems can dag pa rdzu 'phrul che//
25a1(rgyud): kun tu bzang po tshur shog cig/ kun tu mdzes patshur shog cig/ srid gsum dbang phyug chur shog cig/ khyed ni gzugs bzang shin tu brgyan/ glang po rna ga/
25a2(rgyud): khyed tshur shog/ sna tshogs gzugs can 'khrul med khyed// mthong na dga' ba tshur shog cig/ 'gro lding ba yi gzugs can tshur// tshur shog na dku ber// rtag tu sna tshogs gas/
25a3(rgyud): 'phreng 'chang // cod pan mgul pa tshur shog cig/ mi 'jigs thob pa tshur shog cig/ 'jigs pa 'jigs pa tshur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che// phye ba shol ma
25a4(rgyud): byed tshur shog cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 'ong ba la 'jigs pa med pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba mu
25a5(rgyud): khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a bi sma ye be sha rar+ya mu khe b+ha ga ba ti badz+ra a ma li ni mA bi laM ba swA h+ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'jigs pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di
25a6(rgyud): bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gnod sbyin
25a7(rgyud): gyi tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag chur shog/ bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyis/
25b1(rgyud): na bsoracan thos brgya stong du mas ni bskod/ lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / l+h+wam yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsha dang / sngo bye chen po dang
25b2(rgyud): mi dang / mi ma yin pa du mas ni yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdang te/ shing snrel sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
25b3(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa der dong ngo // de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin gzhon nu rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu
25b4(rgyud): tshig smras pa/ sems can chen po bka' stsal pa bzhin/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
25b5(rgyud): 'khor de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der bzhud do// de nas byang chub sems
25b6(rgyud): dpa' kun tu bzang pos de'i tshe rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa ston pa la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos te
25b7(rgyud): nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du yangs/
26a1(rgyud): shing rgya che ba/ nor bu chen pa'i kab bye ba zag khrig brgya stong du zug pa// b+h+yo khang dang / babs dang / stegs dra du mas brtan pa/ 'jam du
26a2(rgyud): gser las shing sA la gcig pa lta bur byas pas rnam par spras pa/ mtha' mthar phug ron lta bu 'breng gis mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig sna gnyis kyi dra ba bris pa/ rin po che'i dring
26a3(rgyud): bu g.yer ka'i drabs steng gi bar sdang yongs su bskor ba/ lha'i ras bcos ma dang dar gyi lnga lding mang po bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i sil snyan dang beg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i
26a4(rgyud): sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu len gar byed rol mo byed cing snyan par sprul/ gdu bu dang rna cha gdub kor gyis brgyan cing lha'i lus dang ldan pa rnams kyis gang ba rin po che
26a5(rgyud): chen po'i bla re kun tu bres pa phyogs bai DUR+Ya chen pos legs par spras pa/ ka tsa lin di ke ltar reg na bde ba/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i
26a6(rgyud): rin po che'i themaskas kyi 'phreng gis rnam par smras pa/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'u dang / ne tse dang / ri skegs dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang
26a7(rgyud): bya'i tshogs du ma sgra 'byin pa dang / lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / pad+ma dang / ka lha ra ka dang / yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i/
26b1(rgyud): rdzing byang chub sems dpas yongs su spyad par bya ba/ lha'i tsan dang snam gyi snying po'i rngub kyi rnyog ma can dag gis kun nas mdzes par byas pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'ang ba brjen pa
26b2(rgyud): pa der lnga'i ma tog man dang ba dang / bo ru sha ko dang / b.ru sha ka chen po dang / sa brtol dang / sa brtol chen po'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab pa/ A ka ru dag po'i bdug pa'i spror
26b3(rgyud): mang po khebs pas rnam par mdzes pa byung bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad so so'i gnas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi bskyed pa dag
26b4(rgyud): mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re la'ang rin po che dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcu drug rin po che'i rgyal po la sogs pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du
26b5(rgyud): yongs su spyad pa bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dag bkod do// rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegra/
26b6(rgyud): pa thams cad gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas mdzes par byas so// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu'ang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rnams sprul to// khang pa
26b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyang bai DUR+Ya chen po gsal ba'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shin tu phyis pa'i me long ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs
27a1(rgyud): pa'ang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba ste/ bai DUR+Ya gsal ba'i phyir der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzugs brnyan
27a2(rgyud): gyi tshul du snang ngo // dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po rin po che chen po'i rgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprul to// sems can thams
27a3(rgyud): cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i yod byed kyi sprin dag khang pa brtsegs pa der kun nasam tu babs par mngon par sprul te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rnam
27a4(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho spyad pa'i phyir ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang
27a5(rgyud): bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin gzhon nu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas byang chub
27a6(rgyud): sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen pos khang brtsegs pa de lag pa gnyis kas blangs te/ steng gi bar snang las babs te shing se lasna tshogs kyi rgyal
27a7(rgyud): ma nga kod pa na nas tsham sug pags dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkyi thub pa gal par ri sang gi /
27b1(rgyud): brtsegs pa dam 'dakyis shing sAl sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkang ba'i nags tshal stug po'ang thams cad snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur nas/ gang dag 'khor derang 'dus shing 'khong ba'i/
27b2(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag snang ba des snang bar byas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas pa
27b3(rgyud): dang / steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ya mtshan
27b4(rgyud): du gyur pa'i snying gis phan tshun rnam par ltas nas cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thob pa dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / stongs
27b5(rgyud): thob pa de dag gis kyang rnam par bltas na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes pa mthong nas/ de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis bcom ldan
27b6(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi steng gi bar/
27b7(rgyud): snang la lham me lhan ne lhang nger gda' zhing / bcom ldan 'das rtogs par dka' la mi mdzes par dka' ba 'di ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
28a1(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa
28a2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba de ngal blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos
28a3(rgyud): mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs te/ nga la mchod pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyun bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa
28a4(rgyud): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sngon gyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ste/ 'di ni chos gang gis yon tan bskal pa brgyar yang mthar rtogs par mi nus pa de'i 'od lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug
28a5(rgyud): go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de'ang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun tu 'dri'o//
28a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug nasashing /
28a7(rgyud): sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / gos dang /
28b1(rgyud): 'dugs dang / rgyal macan dang / bdan dang / babardob par ldan mdzad par sprul te chang du ba'anas/ snang gnam mda' yas rabs te bang pa brdegs pa bcom lda 'das sa sum
28b2(rgyud): yul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sku dang gsu dang thugs mkhyen pas// rnam dag brtul zhugs bzang pa la// gtsog kun gyis rngam dge pa na
28b3(rgyud): 'tshal sems can dag khyod la// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // sde dang de bzhin lce dang ni// lus dang de bzhin yid kyang ni// smra ba'i mchog la phyag mi 'tshal// gzugs dang sgra
28b4(rgyud): dang dri dang ro// reg bya yul can btsal ba yi// dngos po kun las rnam grol ba// rgyal ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes la// sku gsung thugs la sogs pa
28b5(rgyud): yis// gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten du// mnga' bdag khyod ni rtag tu gda'// khyod ni sems can srog ma lags// gang zag kun gzhi khyod ma lags// dus dang rang bzhin las
28b6(rgyud): ma byung // ji ltar ma lags ci ma lags// khyod ni brten nas byung ba tsam// sgyu ma lta bur dngos po spangs// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur ni// thugs su khyod chud rkang gnyis mchog
28b7(rgyud): khyod ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong // stong pa nyid kyang cis ma lags// stong dang mi stong rnam par grol// nam mkha' 'dral phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29a1(rgyud): chen po kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas gsog 'khor dang ldan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya spyong du mar bskor bzlas te/
29a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lha zhing phyogs gcig tu 'jug go// de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dang / bkod pa de dag dung / silasan
29a3(rgyud): dang pheg rdo ba de dag las theg pa chen po'i theg pa'i spyod pa'i sgra gci ga nas gcig tu 'ang ces rdug// gzod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med/ chos nyid gcig pu dag pa ste// khyed cag the tshom dogs
29a4(rgyud): spongs la/ kye ma 'di la brtson par gyis// theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni// sngon gyi spyad pa bla na med// spyod pa'i rgyal po skyed che ba// kun gyis shin tu thob par gyis// sngon gyi spyad
29a5(rgyud): pa rgya mtsho rnams// yongs su dag pa'i rgyu yis ni// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ni// rtag tu 'di la mdzes la ltos// ston pa gang du'ang mi gnas la// gang du'ang spyad par mi gnas kyang //
29a6(rgyud): gang dag spyod pa rnam sbyangs pa// de dag kun la gnas par gyur// 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang ni// rna ba de bzhin sna dang ni// lce dang de bzhin lus dang yang // yid du snang ba ma lagra
29a7(rgyud): so// dang po 'byung ba'i spyod pa ni// gang gi tshe na sbyangs gyur pa// de tshe bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad// rab 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong // ring ba ma lags nyi ma lags// nang
29b1(rgyud): dang byan pa lags te// phyag turnams pa 'drang banas par/ nas 'byung ngan can spyang // dasngar byang chubasams dpa' sems dpa' nan pa kun tu babang byos tshogs su dang/
29b2(rgyud): dag brje sa thag tus rna las spangasate/ zlags rlag pa tsug tugapa nas// bram mi gams pa'i khyong sa la dazugs hA/ ma ldan 'das grol ba dang sogs su tham na chu
29b3(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dis ces gsal to// gas te nus nas su b.rung bstan pa'i slang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la sabs phyem ga 'acom ldan 'das de 'don /
29b4(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig nu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun/
29b5(rgyud): tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig/ ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal/
29b6(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la 'jug
29b7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa de'i spyod pa ni ji lta zhig lags/ spyod pa de rtogs par khong du chud pa ni su zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa/
30a1(rgyud): sa su / su sa shA nasas / smra
30a2(rgyud): can chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la da pa chi ba'ang legs sa// dang ra legs par rab tu ni la ming la rung zhig / ngas thug patsho bu la 'jug pa dang / zag du chen po la 'jug pa'i ldanas ga
30a3(rgyud): par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// de'i 'jug pa ni byang chub bo// rigs kyi bu gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhi'o//
30a4(rgyud): de'ang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas yul dang dus kyi dbang gis de'i rnam pa ston pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang theg pa chen po ni rnam
30a5(rgyud): pa gnyis te/ 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba dang / 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o// de la 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'o// 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i theg pa chen po
30a6(rgyud): nyid ni theg pa chen po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dus byas ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'dus ma byas ni mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang
30a7(rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi rang rang gi ngo bo'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
30b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis yul dang dus kyi dbang gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ bya ba dang las kyis kun tu bsrungs pa'i tshul gyis 'dogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'dir spyong
30b2(rgyud): pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po'o// rigs kyi bu de la 'dus ma byas kyi theg pa chen po nyid theg pa chen po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu
30b3(rgyud): ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas gang
30b4(rgyud): yin pa de ni mtha' gnyis la mi ltos pa ste/ de la gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo'ang med do// gang la gdags pa'i ngo bo med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo med la spyod pa
30b5(rgyud): med do// gang la spyod pa med pa de brjod par bya ba ma yin no// gang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o// gang dngos po thams cad dang bral ba de mi 'khrugs pa'o//
30b6(rgyud): gang mi 'khrugs pa de chos so// chos gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bden
30b7(rgyud): ba'o// rigs kyi bu bden pa gang yin pa de yod pa'o// yod pa gang yin pade brdzun ma yin pa'o// gang brdzun ma yin pa de yang dag pa'o// yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do// chos
31a1(rgyud): ci gang yin pa den ma thog rnam par martag pa/ gang mi tog rnam par ma chog pa des shes so// ye shes gang yin pa rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa/
31a2(rgyud): yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni btags pa'o// btags pa gang yin pa de ni ldog pa'o// rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzob ces bstan te/ kun rdzob yod pas spyod pam/
