31a3(rgyud): btags so// btags pa yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba ston to// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud ba ni pham par byed pa dang /
31a4(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la thug pa'i bar dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang
31a5(rgyud): 'byor pa dang / rgud pa 'jig rten du kun tu ston to// rigs kyi bu de la sogs pa dus dang yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung nas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas te thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul rnams kyis
31a6(rgyud): sems can rnams la chos ston to// chos bstan pa de ni yang dag phul yin te/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba/ yul gcig yang dag par thob par byed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
31a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni gdags pa 'am/ rnam par rig pa med cing mi migs te/ ye shes rnam par mi rtog/
31b1(rgyud): pa'i phyir ro// de la ni spyad pa'ang med/ mi spang ba'ang med/ bslab pa'ang med/ bslab pa ma yin pa'ang med/ 'dul ba'ang med/ 'dul ba ma min pa'ang medado// des ni lus sam/ ngag/
31b2(rgyud): gam/ yid kyi 'jug pa'am ldog ma tshigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'ang/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'am/ nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/ rangs
31b3(rgyud): rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ chos zhes bya ba 'am/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'am/ lnga zhes bya ba 'am/ klu zhes bya ba 'am/ gnod sbyin zhes bya ba'am/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
31b4(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram/ yod ces bya ba 'am/ med ces bya ba 'am/ bsod nams zhes bya ba 'am/ 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mya
31b5(rgyud): ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba 'am/ thar pa zhes bya ba med do// rigs kyi bu de la ni dus zhes bya ba 'am/ tshod ces bya ba 'am/ skad cig ces bya ba 'am/ yud tsam zhes
31b6(rgyud): bya ba 'am/ thang cig ces bya ba med do// de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba'am/ spar pa zhes bya ba'am/ nyi mo zhes bya ba'am/ me zhes bya ba'am/ rlung zhes bya ba'am/ chu zhes bya ba 'am/ sa zhes
31b7(rgyud): ba 'am/ mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am/ nyin mo zhes bya ba 'am/ dus tshigs zhes bya ba 'am/ lo khyud kor zhes bya ba 'am/ zla ba zhis bya ba med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rtog pas btags pa'i sgo/
32a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi mthar snang baji med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i btags pa'i sgo ji srid pa de dag thams dadun del mi 'gyur zhing ming de tshigs so//
32a2(rgyud): de ci'i phyir na/ chos nyid de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ de la gnyis mi 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di sa ste/ dper na nam mkha' gnyis pa ma skyes pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams ni
32a3(rgyud): gnyis su med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyis su med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
32a4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams su bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyod pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o// slob pa ma
32a5(rgyud): yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o// thob pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob pa'o// rtsom pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsom pa'o// 'dul ba ma yin pa ni
32a6(rgyud): 'dul ba'o// gdags su med pa ni gdags pa'o// mthong ba med pa ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// mi nyan pa ni chos nyan pa'o//
32a7(rgyud): khong du chud pa med pa ni khong du chud pa'o// 'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba'o// gnas med pa ni gnas so// stong pa nyid ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes pa med mngon/
32b1(rgyud): par rtags pa med pa dang / mngon sum du byed pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di sngar rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyod pasrung pa'o//
32b2(rgyud): gang du'ang mi chags so// gang du'ang rjes su chags pa med do// gang du'ang khong khro ba med do// gang du'ang zhe sdang ba med do// de mi snang ma rmongs rkyen tsam log par rtag tu ma 'am par gzhag
32b3(rgyud): bste/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ zhi ba/ legs par gnas pa/ bu med pa/ mi gso ba/ rab tu mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / sems can gyi don bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba/ dus
32b4(rgyud): gsum yang sgyid lug pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams ni rdul lam/ ngu ba 'am/ sprin gyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro//
32b5(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu spyad pa'ang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi
32b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyan rdo rje chen po'i tog gi spyod pa rdo rje chen po las 'byung ba/
32b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod rnams sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka'
33a1(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang bste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad bsugasol to// bcom ldan 'das mnar to/ dang /
33a2(rgyud): par gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ga gni rna lam du grags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag nyan pa dang / 'chang /
33a3(rgyud): ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa
33a4(rgyud): chen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa chen po bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
33a5(rgyud): rnam par sprul pa ni gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la skal pa mchis pa lags so// bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po bla na med po 'phral du
33a6(rgyud): 'bras bu mang ba bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
33a7(rgyud): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mad la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje
33b1(rgyud): chen po'i sgra sgrogs te/ gsung gcig tu rdo rje chen po 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba rdo rje'i 'byung gnas rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brjod cing shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod
33b2(rgyud): pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdo rje chen po pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin
33b3(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bsnyun gsol te/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'tsho 'am
33b4(rgyud): bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshes
33b5(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad glod nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so// namaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA/ oM badz+rA kA ra li/
33b6(rgyud): du denas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis nub pa'i gas bsngags gsungs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ting /
33b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs so// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan du tshe'o snyam du snying 'dun par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gnon dur gyur mi la ning 'kha de/
34a1(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de ya mtshan du che snyam du rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
34a2(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus pa/ gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas// rnam par 'dren
34a3(rgyud): rnams mi gsung las// bde gshegs sras la rdo rje yis// dbang bskur du ni nges par gda'// gsang sngags spyod pa ye shes che// theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ der ni thams cad
34a4(rgyud): mkhyen nyid dang // don kun grub pa'i spyod pa thob// gsang sngags spyod las 'byung ba yi// theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen// sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis// nags tshal mchog
34a5(rgyud): 'dir rtag tu bshad// sA la'i rgyal mtshan nyams dga' che// spyod pa yang dag bstan pa'i gnas// sngon gyi spyod las byung gyur pas// gsang sngags shes las 'byung bar bshad// gang
34a6(rgyud): dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // mgon po gang dag lta byung // rnam par 'dren par bzhugs pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs shing // gsang /
34a7(rgyud): sngags spyong las byung ba yi// theg pa chen po'i dbang bskur 'di// bder gshegs sras la rab tu stsol// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po pa// kun gyi dbang ni bdag lags so// 'jig
34b1(rgyud): pa la sa/ thugs sa rgyams sasul / brlung bdang / ma sa dag sa sa ga /
34b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis dbang bskur stsol// gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// theg chen rtogs par khong du chud// sngon gyi smon lam nges 'byung ba// sangs rgyas sras po grags chen lam
34b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'dra'am ci zhig ste// bde gshegs sras po chags med pa// byang chub mthar thug dbang po lags// gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun tu// thog ma'i spyod ldan
34b4(rgyud): nges pa 'di// sangs rgyas 'dra 'am ci zhig ste// bder gshegs sras po chags med pa// byang chub mthar thug dbang po lags// gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun tu// 'khor
34b5(rgyud): 'di byin gyis brlabs lags na// gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas// ci slad mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs// thams cad ngo mtshar 'dzin 'gyur te// bde bar rtog la
34b6(rgyud): brtson par gnas// dpa' bo che rnams the tsom dang // de bzhin yid gnyis bsal du gsol// da ni dus la bab lags na// phyi ba shol ma mdzad bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin
34b7(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
35a1(rgyud): rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsungs pa/ 'dzin pa rnams kyis gang sangs rgyas// chos nyid 'du ni gcig tu mchog/ rtagar+b+has ma gag rnams kyis na/ 2/
35a2(rgyud): bsgoms te de rtog bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAk+Shu thub pa la sogs pas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i dgas tshal stug po n+dan d+hu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyams bkod pa/
35a3(rgyud): gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi ras bskor ba/ sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / stegs bus brgyan pa/ steng du rin po che'i bla re bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu
35a4(rgyud): sbyangs pa/ rin po che sna lnga'i srad bu 'brel bar byin gyis brlabs te dbus su rdo rje pad+ma'i khri dang / phyogs cha brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i 'phreng bas bskor ba dang / rdo rje'i phyi ras kun tu bskor ba/
35a5(rgyud): dang phyi rgyab tu ni rdo rje'i 'phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i srad bu bres pa dang / rdo rje'i bcing bas bcings pa dang / rdo rje'i phur bu dag btab pa dang / thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byin gyis
35a6(rgyud): brlabs nas steng gi gtsug tor nas thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo // 'od zer de dag byung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang
35a7(rgyud): bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyo gtsug tu zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa
35b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dga' zhing gunas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa stobs zhes bya ba'i mang po smras pa/ numaHsar+b+ba ta thAg tu ba shA su 'i b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA sarbad+ha/
35b2(rgyud): hata ba la/ mahA badz+ra a dz+nyA ka raN/ na mo s+yA te swAH/ de nas thogs pa med pa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gau ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang /
35b3(rgyud): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / stong pa nyid chen po'i mtha' las byas pa
35b4(rgyud): sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub sems
35b5(rgyud): dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag tu byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kun tu bzang po'i lag tu rdo rje byin ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rnams dang /
35b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams/
35b7(rgyud): cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu//
36a1(rgyud): kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni lag na rdo rje'o// lag na rdo rje'o zhes brjod do// / pags pa lag na rdo rje dbang /
36a2(rgyud): bskur ba bam po gsum pa// / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas yang gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga teb+h+ya
36a3(rgyud): san bule b+h+yaHsar+b+ba tra kraN+Da badz+rAd+ha raswAhA/ de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor zim
36a4(rgyud): cad du gsang ba'i bdag po'o// gsang ba'i dag po zhes sku gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags nas/ 'di lta ste/ snang pa 'di'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
36a5(rgyud): kyi rlabs kyi stongs kyis byung chubasams dpa' lag 'ang rjem bdi da gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / shes can du mi tshogs bdag mngan sum su zhugs so/
36a6(rgyud): da pa tu nas smra na na byung
36a7(rgyud): nga/ sa mig dzin gyi ma 'bya
36b1(rgyud): rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byabs thams cad dang /
36b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems dang po bskyed
36b3(rgyud): brnams dang / las dang po pa rnams dang / sems can rnams kyi rgyab dang / mdun dang / mnyal ba 'am/ gnyid kyis log pa'am/ chos ston pa 'am/ byang chub mngon par rdzog
36b4(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ sems can gyi don byed pa 'am/ sprul pa rab tu 'byed pa'i bar du thams cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i cho ga shes pa lag na rdo rje cod pa na
36b5(rgyud): can du kun tu snang ngo // yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis phyogs rdo rje bcing ba zhes bya ba rdo rje'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA rig
36b6(rgyud): badz+ra Ta Te Ta Ta tri swA h+lA/ phyogs rdo rje bcing ba'i snying po 'di gsungaso ma thag tu phyogs btsun sems can ma rungs pa thams cad rdo rje'i bcing bas bcings par snang ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs/
36b7(rgyud): pa de dag gis sa'i rdo rje'am phur bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA thadza dza Tha thaM swA hA/ sa rton gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsung /
37a1(rgyud): ma thag tu kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'dra rdo rje'is rton to zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ud ces grags so// yang de bzhin
37a2(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis sa 'og gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ya Ta yar+thaM swAhA/ sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs
37a3(rgyud): ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sa'i 'og gi phrag thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sa 'og gi rdo rje zhes
37a4(rgyud): sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi 'gro ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ nam
37a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+haHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsin+ta sar+b+ba bIr+yaM tu ra ka dim pra barma lab+d+ha bi dza ya swA hA/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'gro ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig
37a6(rgyud): rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro
37a7(rgyud): ba gcod pa'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ nam sar+b+ba ta thA ga
37b1(rgyud): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya sar+b+ba thA badz+ra lak+Sha nI gr-i sad ta swAhA/ gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad
37b2(rgyud): du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'od ni gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje
37b3(rgyud): bsgrags pa'i tog rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ nam sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha ra ha ra nA ga badz+ra swA hA/ de nas klu'i rdo rje'i sring po 'di gsung
37b4(rgyud): ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni klu'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas
37b5(rgyud): gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ma tha ma tha badz+ra gan+d+harba hri
37b6(rgyud): da pe swA hA/ rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / dri za'o gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa'i sem
37b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni dri za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po
38a1(rgyud): gsungs so// nam sarba ta thAg teHsarbA su b+h+yaHsarba thA badzab ta tu dkar ca stsu/ danas rdo rje chen po rnam mkha' yang gi dbang ba' snang po nga/
38a2(rgyud): gsungs mthag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / nam mkha' ldong ga gnas thams cad du ma byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na chen po 'dzin ma
38a3(rgyud): mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rdo rje nes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mi'am ci'i snying po gsungs pa/ nam sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA b+h+yaH
38a4(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yasar+b+ba thA badz+ra kin+da ra dan+da bi dza ya shab+da sA hA/ de nas mi'am ci'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / mi 'am tso'i gnas
38a5(rgyud): thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mi 'am ci'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
38a6(rgyud): gis rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ma ho ra ga badz+ra dz+wa la ya swA hA/ de nas rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying 'di gsungs ma
38a7(rgyud): thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lto 'phye chen po'i
38b1(rgyud): rnga rdza zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po srun pa'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ namaHsar+b+ba ta thag te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
38b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA badz+ra rAk+Sha sa kU ra da ha ba tsu tsu Tu TuM swA hA/ de nas rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams
38b3(rgyud): cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin po'i rdo rje nas sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur rjes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje
38b4(rgyud): chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+re hr-i te he ha swA hA/ de nas rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po 'di gsung
38b5(rgyud): ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mkha' 'gro/
38b6(rgyud): ma'i snying po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po gsungs pa/ namaHsar+b+ba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
38b7(rgyud): mu 'i b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha le hu le badz+ra ma hA b+hU te shwa ra swA hA/ rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / 'byung po'i gnas/
39a1(rgyud): thams cad du kyes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'byung ba 'ardo rje chen po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang /
39a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na mAHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ma hA badz+ra pi shA tsi shwa ra bi shra hr-i lag// mi tsi mi tsi/ mnam/
39a3(rgyud): Ta/ badz+ra swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sha za'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems
39a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma
39a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra dru ti pi shA tsi ki ri mi ri mi le swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad
39a6(rgyud): dang / sha za mo'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za mo'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de/
39a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje srin mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ka ra li ra shwa si hA ri mi ri swA hA/ rdo rje srin mo'i snying po
39b1(rgyud): 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / srin mo'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje
39b2(rgyud): srin ma'i zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po gnon po rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sar+b+bA ta thA ga te
39b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM stA ra ka badz+ra hi sa~M swAhA/ gnon po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gnon po'i gnas thams
39b4(rgyud): cad du kye maM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnon po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
39b5(rgyud): gis grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+hUHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ki li ki li badz+ra bi d+ha hi ni swA hA/ grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa
39b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / grib gnon gyi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
39b7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje 'di ni grib gnon gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis brjod byed kyi gnon 'gog pa rdo rje'i snying po gsung sa
40a1(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yasar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA graM graM s+pha ra Na badz+ra swAhA/ brjed byed kyi gdon 'gog pa rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi/
40a2(rgyud): khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / brjed byed kyi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni brjed byed kyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas
40a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'ur tse sa grags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hA
40a4(rgyud): ra badz+ra sar+b+ba gra ha ni kran+ta na dz+wa Ti la laM bo da ra ra Ta ra Ta swA hA/ gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'dri dag gsungs ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang
40a5(rgyud): gdon thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so//
40a6(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu led+d+haHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra badz+ra sa saM swAhA/ sA la sogs/
40a7(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas su kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las/
40b1(rgyud): na rdo rje 'din lha la sogs pa'i snying par rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gdon thams cad tshur gcod pa'i rdo rje snying po
40b2(rgyud): gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yasar+b+ba mu le b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA b+h+rU~MSha hUM badz+ra amr-i tA b+hA ba swAhA/ rtsi sman chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di dag gsungs thug tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams/
40b3(rgyud): thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rje 'di ni rtsi sman gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
40b4(rgyud): gis na gdon bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA dza ta trad badz+ra swA hA/ nad bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu
40b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu nyur
40b6(rgyud): ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rga ba'i gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a mr-i tod b+hA ba badz+rA
40b7(rgyud): la la la la swA hA/ rga ba 'gog pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'dzin
41a1(rgyud): ne ba 'gog pa'i rdo rjerje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu zhum ches grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa da dgags tsha sa rab tuni pa byed ba 'ang rje snying po 'di gsungs pa/
41a2(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ka di badz+ra dza ya ha ha swA hA/ 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
41a3(rgyud): cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'chi ba las kyang rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ud ces grags so// yang de bzhin
41a4(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis rgud pa'i gdon bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA ba ra ma badz+ra sar+b+ba shri ya~M a b+h+r-i da yan dang ma hAka/
41a5(rgyud): ru Ni ka d+ha ka swA hA/ rgud pa thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
41a6(rgyud): po lag na rdo rje 'odi ni rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba chen po stobs
41a7(rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje gsungs pa/ namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM badz+ra tsakra brti hUM swAhA/ de nas 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gsang sngags kyi rgya po de gsungs ma
41b1(rgyud): mthag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gdod sbyi dang /
41b2(rgyud): dri za dang / snga ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung ba dang / shabral sogs pa'i gnas thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' lag na/
41b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes snga gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po gsungs pa/
41b4(rgyud): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA dzI shri hUM swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang 'khor los sgyur ba chen po la sogs pa rdo rje chen po'i snying po rnams
41b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la byin no// byin nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin stug po'i dra ba chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig/
41b6(rgyud): rten gyi khams dang / shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas chos gsum gyi byin
41b7(rgyud): gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bsgyur nas me snang bar
42a1(rgyud): gyur to// bcom ldan sa grakra thub pas kyang / da'i rgya byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi byung bzhi na gshegs pa thams da/
42a2(rgyud): kyis dkyil 'khor 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lag tu rdo rje dbang bskur bas khyod dbang bskur to// ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las byas pa'i rdo
42a3(rgyud): rje khyod la byin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rjes khyod byin gyis brlabs so// rdo rje'i snying po thams cad khyod la bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyod la
42a4(rgyud): bstan pa thams cad kyi don bya ba dang srung bar gnang ngo // khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs so// rigs kyi bu da rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nges par ston cig/ rigra
42a5(rgyud): kyi bu lag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po shod cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// chos kyi
42a6(rgyud): rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ngo mtshar thob pa dang / bdag rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dam pa thob pa ni bcom ldan 'das/
42a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de'i
42b1(rgyud): tshe rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsngags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas lag na rdo rje rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po da
42b2(rgyud): nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// stong gsum gyi/
42b3(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// che mchem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem mo// 'gul/ rab tu/
42b4(rgyud): 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// shar phyogs mtho nub phyogs dma'a'o// nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'a'o// lho phyogs
42b5(rgyud): mthon byang phyogs dma' 'o// byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma' 'o// dbus mtho na mtha' dma'a'o// mtha' mtho na dbus dma' 'o// snang ba chen po'ang 'jig rten du 'byung /
42b6(rgyud): bar gyur to// gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar ma mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa na 'khod pa de dag kyang 'od des snang bar byas nas/ sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag phan tshun lta zhing
42b7(rgyud): gcig gis gcig mthong nas sems can gzhan dag cig 'dir skyes pa lta/ sems can gzhan dag cig 'dir skyes lta'o snyam mo// de dag gis bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
43a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po'i gzungs kyi chos ston to// de dag gis chos de thos nas dad pa rnyed de shi 'phos nas lha'i nang du smras te
43a2(rgyud): shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba chen pos dbang bskur ba chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
43a3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir dong ngo // tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang skad cig de dang / yud tsam de dang / thang cig de
43a4(rgyud): la chad par gyur to// de'i tshe dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi ming yang mi grags par gyur to// yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rabs kun tu bskor ba dang lha'i zas/
43a5(rgyud): dang skom dang / yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lha'i lus dang ldan par gyur to// shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po 'di thams cad kyang snang ba
43a6(rgyud): chen pos snang bar byas so// lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba 'di gnyis lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang /
43a7(rgyud): sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad mog mog por gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par bzhag
43b1(rgyud): mthag d+hA/ de'i tshe su'i dug thams cad nas khro ba'i rgyal po dag byung nas hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po ni bsgrags/ lag na rdu rjen thogs gdong gi dpral ba'i lo ga nyer ni bskur/ stong
43b2(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni dbyangs gcig gis go bar byed cing / kye ma rungs pa'i srin po dang / pa'i mtshun dang / sha za ba dang / ma mo dang / gdon dang / 'byung
43b3(rgyud): po dang / brjed byed dang / grub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa gdon gyi tshogs thams cad dang / ser sna yongs su
43b4(rgyud): btang byos la/ dul ba'i sems kyis mnyam bzhag ste// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// mkhas pa dag ni skyabs su deng // rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan de// rdo rje rab tu
43b5(rgyud): 'bar 'dzin pa// nags tshal dam pa nyams dga' bar// yid 'ong khang pa brtsegs na bzhugs// deng las mgon po de las ni// dam tshig yongs su brtsal byos la// nga rgyal
43b6(rgyud): nga yi med byos te// sa rnams kun tu rgyu bar byos// gzhan du khyed cag de ring nyid// rdo rje 'bar ba rab 'khrugs pa// 'bar ba 'jigs chen 'di dag gis// mgo ni shin/ gems par/
43b7(rgyud): 'gyur// de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po dag/ 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// brtsal med tshig gis go byas nas// rdo rje 'dzin gyi gan dengs shog/ ces tshig tu brjod pa 'di ched du brjod/
44a1(rgyud): rang 'byung gsam byung bas sa smra sa pa rjo la nga / sang+yas m+b+has nga /
44a2(rgyud): dge 'dun la skyabs su dong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i
44a3(rgyud): tshe rang gi snying po spras pa pa na ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na badz+ra pa Ni hU~M phaT/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po spras ma thag tu/
44a4(rgyud): de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
44a5(rgyud): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje
44a6(rgyud): 'di ni lag na rdo rje drag po'o// lag na rdo rje drag po'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces grags so// de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshul chen po la smon lam shin tu
44a7(rgyud): btab par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje drag po'i snying po 'di smras nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang bas thams
44b1(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas te dkyil 'khor chen po smras so// de la slob dpon ni gsang sngags de kho na'i don la mkhas pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/
44b2(rgyud): spu rtsal rnams la mkhas pa/ snying rje ba'i rang bzhin can/ bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bsam pa nges pa/ dus shes pa/ g.yer ba/ sro shig
44b3(rgyud): ma yin pa/ mdangs che ba/ zab mo'i chos la mos pa/ bzlas brjod la brtson pa/ rtag tu bsam gtan byed pa/ lag na rdo rje la dga' ba/ ming thos sngags pa rtag par ni// mchim
44b4(rgyud): 'byung zhing spu zing byed// rmi yang lag na rdo rje la// yid kyis the tsom med pa dang / 'du shes de bzhin tshad shes shing // byas gzo de bzhin bden pa smra// slob dpon de lta bus
44b5(rgyud): ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs te/ gong du smos pa'i snying po de dag re re zhing yang 'bum 'bum
44b6(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya'o// de'i 'og tu lag na rdo rje drag pa'i snying pos yungs kar dang mngar gsum bsres pa dag lan khror sbyin sreg bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
44b7(rgyud): po'i dbus su 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzlas brjod bya'o// drag po'i snying po chen pos slob ma dag par bya ba dang srung ba'i cho ga bya'o// de'i 'og tu sa
45a1(rgyud): brtag par bya ste/ rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa/ skye ba po grog skur la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sa ni thams cad du'ang shis pa'o// der
45a2(rgyud): gza' gtum po la ma bab pa/ tshes grangs ngan pa ma yin pa/ mi mthun par 'jug pa dang phrad pa spangs pa/ nyi ma dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dang bza' bzang por
45a3(rgyud): mngon pa la las brtsams na shis par 'gyur ro// dmar dang ser dang dkar dang gnag/ 'dren ma pa ni lnga pa yin// gang yang rung ba'i sa der ni// mkhas pas khru gang tsam brkos te//
45a4(rgyud): sngags pa yis ni brkos pa de// sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya// lhag na rnam pa kun tu mchog/ kha da chad ni 'bring du brjod// gang bar ma gyur sa de spang // mkhas pas der ni
45a5(rgyud): brtsam mi bya// dkar po dag ni zhi bar bstan// dmar po dbang gi don du 'dod// ser po rgyas par shes par bya// nag po drag shul spyod par shes// der ni mchod yon gtor ma
45a6(rgyud): dang // mar me spos dang bdug pa dag/ bsgrims te byin nas bsrung bya ste// mnyam par bzhag nas sa la brjod// de yi nub mo se der ni// ku sha bting ba'i steng du nyal// ga la
45a7(rgyud): te sa ni rung gyur na// der ni bsgrims te bri bar bya// sngon gyi sangs rgyas mi mchog gis// de ni bgegs med yin zhes brjod// gzhan du na ni der mi bri// bgegs dang bcas pas
45b1(rgyud): rung bar 'gyur/ de nas sngags pa langs nas ni// dam nyan ma mkhas pa yis// san shin tu yongs sbyangs phyir// sbyin sreg bya ba 'di bya ste/ sbrang ci dang ni 'om dang / mang rdzu
45b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg mchog tu 'gyur// zhi ba'i sems kyis sbyin thugs no// nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya// de nas sgrogs pasas brkos la// sa de nyid kyis slar dgang ngo // sang na du gyis
45b3(rgyud): 'khor las kyi tshe// sngags pas spos kyis sa dgang ngo // legs par brdung zhing mnyam 'jam bya// phyogs cha dag dang sgo yi rnams// kun kyang rnam pa thams cad du// rin chen
45b4(rgyud): sna lngas rab mdzes bya// bye brag tu ni sa dbus su// rin chen sna lnga bzhag par bya// de nas yon tan ldan pa yi// slob ma dag ni gdams te gzung // bzlas brjod sbyin sreg
45b5(rgyud): rnam kun gyis// bsgrims te de dag bsrung bar bya// mchog sbyin rdo rje blo ldan gyi// gsang sngags 'di ni zlos pa na// skyon dang yon tan rnam dpyad pas// de dag thog mar
45b6(rgyud): brtag par bya// yon tan 'di dag ldan pa ni// shin tu brtags nas gzung bar bya// rigs dang gzo ni phun sum tshogs// gsal zhing dul la brtson pa dang // shes rab ldan brtan
45b7(rgyud): byas gzo dang // dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang // gzugs mdzes yan lag yongs rdzogs dang // gang dag theg chen dga' ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' kun la yang //
46a1(rgyud): gang dag rtag tu gus gnas dang // pa la gus dang ma la gus// tha ma mchod la rab brtson dang // gang dag pha rol dor spyod la// sring nas rtag tu 'jug pa dang /
46a2(rgyud): gang dag dran zhing des pa dang // g.yo sgyu med cing chos brtson dang // lus dang ngag dang yid dag pa// de dag nye bar rtag gzung bya// gang dag snying nas 'jig rten 'di// 'jig rten pa rol/
46a3(rgyud): yid ches dang // bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs gang dag chos brtson zhing // sngags kyi theg pa rtogs 'dod pa// de dag bsgrims te gzung bar bya// nyan thos
46a4(rgyud): theg pa pa rnams yin// zhar ba lag zha za ma dang // sgur po 'on pa mi'u thung dang // gang dag sna leb gyur pa dang // de bzhin mig yon gnod bag can// 'jungs dang byas pa mi gzo dang //
46a5(rgyud): mkhas bsnyems sems dang g.yo can dang // sngags kyi theg pa skyid chen gyis// theg pa la ni ma mos pa// de dag nam yang gzung mi bya// de dag bstan 'dir skal ba med// bstan
46a6(rgyud): bcos mi shes mi gzung ste// tho bu tho bu 'dzin pa dang // de bzhin bla ma mi gus pa// smad pa de dag ring du spung // gang dag yan lag ma tshang dang // rkang zha dag dang 'the bo dang // yan lag/
46a7(rgyud): lhag par gyur pa rnams// mkhas pas bsgrims te yongs su spang // ji skad smos pa'i slob ma rnams// de tshe cho ga bzhin brtags te// gcig pu yod na'ang de gzung ngo // yang na slob
46b1(rgyud): ma bzhi zhig gzung // de nas lhung ba byed bcug la// spos dang me tog rnams kyis mchod// dkyil 'khor nang gi sA la ni// ku sha gding ba bting ba la// nges pas slob ma ldan gcig tu// der ni rang /
46b2(rgyud): tu nyal bar bya// slob dpon yud tsam yud tsam zhing // de tshe slob ma rnams la ni// theb chen zab mo rgya chen gyi// chos kyang rab tu bshad par bya// gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// yon
46b3(rgyud): tan kun tu brjod na pa na// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' rnams kyi// rdzu 'phrul la sogs yongs su brjod// pha rol rgyu la snying rje ba// de dag yud tsam yud tsamo brjod// nam gyi bani
46b4(rgyud): cha lus pa'i tshe// gal te rmi lam bzang rmin// dkon mchog gsum la gzhol rnams kyis// nam nangs pa dang legs rab tu// sangs rgyas spyan sngar 'dug nas ni// khyod kyis de
46b5(rgyud): dag brjod par gyis// pad+ma'i steng du 'dug na mchog/ gzung dang mthong ba'ang de bzhin te// rgya mtsho mthong bar rmis pa dang // rgyal dang 'thungs pa'ang de bzhin no// sangs rgyas
46b6(rgyud): mthong na snying dga' ste// byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang // 'jig rten rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos dag dang gang mkhas pa// de dag mthong na snying dga'a'o//
46b7(rgyud): me yi phung po grags pa dang // bgrang khyu mchog glang chen dregs// rta ni dkar por gang gyur pa// de dag mthong na zhon pa dang // ba lang khyu yang shis pa yin// bram ze dang ni rgyal
47a1(rgyud): rigs dang // rgyal po dge bar grags pa dang // sdug pa'i gnyen dang grub pa dang // nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // de dag mthong na shis par 'gyur// rmi lam smra
47a2(rgyud): zhing ga tam zer dang // rang gi mgo bo gcod pa dang // sha chen za bar byed pa dang // khrag gis khrus kyang byed pa dang // de bzhin mi gtsang nub pa dang // zho dang 'bras chan za ba dang // chang
47a3(rgyud): yang 'thung bar byed pa dang // skra 'dreg pa ni mchog yin no// so yang ltung bar gyur pa dang // r-i dang shing ni n+ya gro dang // de la 'dzegs na shis par 'gyur// legs so bu zhe'am blo ldan
47a4(rgyud): zhes/ sgra ni de skad thos pa dang // yid du 'ong ba'i bu med dang // nyin mo nyal po byed pa dang // tshangs pa drag po'i nyi ma dang // khyab 'jug dang ni zla ba dang // lus dran po dang
47a5(rgyud): nor sbyin dang // brgya byin dang ni chu lha dang // de dag mthong ngam smras pa dang // 'bel gtam byed na nges par 'grub// gzhan yang de lta'i rmi lam dag/ dngos grub 'dod pa rnams
47a6(rgyud): kyis gzung // rmi lam de las bzlog pa dag/ 'jigs pa med kyis gzung mi byed// sa la rgyug dang mchong ba dang // gar byed pa dang glu len dang // dgod dang bong bu rnga mo la/
47a7(rgyud): zhon pa shin tu ngan pa yin// 'bru mar gyis ni lus bskus dang // gcer bu dag dang smra ba dang // zhar ba 'theng po sgur po dang // mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa dang // phag rnams dang ni khyi
47b1(rgyud): rnams dang / khong bu rnams kyang de bzhin te// ma he rnga mo ce spyang dag/ mi lam mthong na rtag tu smad// rtse gsum rtse gsum gdengs thogs dang // mig dmar shin tu 'jigs pa dang /
47b2(rgyud): gcer bu dag dang sna le ba dang // sdigs mo byed pa'i 'jigs byed dang // mdog gnag mi bzad chen po dang // gos sngon gzugs byad mi sdug pa// su yi rmi lam rmis pa ni// de la
47b3(rgyud): dngos grub yod mi 'gyur/ zung zhig rgyob cig choms shig ce'am// zo zhig ces pa'i mi bzang sbra// drag po'i 'jigs byed khro thos dang // phud dang ma rnyed thos pa dang / bya rgod
47b4(rgyud): bzhad dang bya ga ra dang // 'ug pa bya rog byi la dang / byi ba sdig pa sre mo sprul// gang yang gzhan dag skye bo gdug/ de dag rmi lam mthong gyur tam// reg par gyur na'ang mi dge'o /
47b5(rgyud): nas phyi de nyin par slob dpon gyis rdo rje'i snying pos pa'i rnam lnga la sngags kyis btab te slob ma bos la rdo rje drag po'i snying pos bsang gtor byas te/ shing a shrad tha'i lo ma myong ba'am
47b6(rgyud): snyim pa'i nang du snod du bya ba sbyin zhing / khyed de ring zas kyi tshad shes par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// nyi ma nub na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs med kyi sreg blugs dang / yam sreg shing
47b7(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas a shwang tha'i shing ngam// yang na u dum par las// sor brgyad tsam gyis shing bya// thog ma gcig ni me tog brgyan// rdo rje drag po'i sngags
48a1(rgyud): btAb la// de dag la ni bca' phying sbyin// shar gyi phyogs su mdun bstan nam// yang na byung phyogs bstan te gnag/ gsang sngags mgon po rngan
48a2(rgyud): byas la// gar bltas de bzhin shes par bya// de nas phyi nyin slob ma rnams// smyung ba byed du bcug nas su// rdo rje mi 'dzom me zhes bya// srid pa gsum po rmongs byed pa
48a3(rgyud): rtag dran bya phyir de dag la// dri ma med pa'i gzungs byin bya// snying du sdug pa'i dam tshig brjod// nyams pa la yang lhag par brjod// sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed// mchog tu bkra/
48a4(rgyud): shis byed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa// thams cad kyis ni ma yin te// sdig pa thams cad byed byed pa// de ni kun tu rtag dran bya// slob dpon gyis ni
48a5(rgyud): thams cad du// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag sems kyis// sna lnga'i tshe na las byas pa yi// thig skud rab tu bzang blangs la// bsgrims te sa 'di thams cad la// thig ni leg
48a6(rgyud): per gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor dkyil du 'dug nas su// sngags pas de bzhin gshegs rnams la// de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba dang // 'khor los sgyur ba dran byas la// bdag/
48a7(rgyud): nyid der bsgoms byas nas su// de'i sngags yid kyis dran byas la// de nas shar phyogs kha bltas te// shar phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo// de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis//
48b1(rgyud): nub phyogs la bltas 'dug nas su// nub phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo// de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis// byang phyogs su ni kha bltas la// byang phyogs su ni thig gdab bo// de nas/
48b2(rgyud): kyang ni bsgyur byas la// lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te// rnam par dbye ba shes pa yi ni// lho phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo// de ltar nang logs dkyil 'khor ni// cha brgyad yod par
48b3(rgyud): rab tu bya// de nas de lta'i tshul gyis ni// phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor byas la// kun tu gru bzhi lham par ni// rab tu bsgrims te thig gdab pa// dbus kyi gnas nas byung nas
48b4(rgyud): su// me yi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la// sngags pas sngags kyi cho ga bzhin// shar phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// de nas cho ga shes pa yis// gus par dbang ldan phyogs
48b5(rgyud): song la// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas te// byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// dbang ldan phyogs nas song nas su// rlung gi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la// der ni lho phyogs kha
48b6(rgyud): bltas te// nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo// gnas de nas ni de byung la// bden bral phyogs su dong nas su// mi yi phyogs kyi bar du ni// thig skud legs par gdab par bya/
48b7(rgyud): kun tu grub ni lham par ni// de ltar gnas te byas nas su// de nas phyi rol de bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du cha brgyad bya// ched ni bcu drug bru yin te// slob dpon nyid kyi khru yin no//
49a1(rgyud): de nas byung la blo ldan gyis// cha gzhan dag ni bya bar bya// phyi rol sa dang bcas par ni// khru grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// der yang snga ma bzhin du ni// cha brgyad
49a2(rgyud): nyid du gcad par bya// brgyad pa nas ni gzung nas su// sngags pa yis ni thams cad du// 'khor sa'i thig ni gdab par bya// gnas gsum dag tu nges par yang / cha brgyad tsam
49a3(rgyud): yang 'tsham pa yi// thog ma'i sgo ni gdod par bya// dkyil 'khor rim pa bar ma la// snga ma nyis 'gyur sgor shes bya// rim pa gsum par sum 'gyur dang // sgo khang dag kyang mkhas
49a4(rgyud): pas bya// rta babs dag gi tshang rnams ni// dbus kyi cha dang mnyam par bya// lha yi gtso bo rnams la yang // sgo khang dag ni bya ba bya// rim pa gsum du rnam dbye bas// de ltar
49a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor legs phye la// sngags mgon gnas la 'dug nas su// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// tshon rtsi 'dir ni bye brag tu// rin chen sna lnga yin par 'dod// sa/
49a6(rgyud): la btags pa'i lce yang rung // ji ltar 'byor pas byur yang rung // gos dkar bgos shing gtsang byas la// dul zhing ze'u ka bsgyings nas su// bsgoms te byang shar phyogs
49a7(rgyud): mtshams nas// tshen rtsi dag ni dgye bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis sam// yang na lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas sam// snod kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sam// rig byed 'don pa'o lag pa
49b1(rgyud): so// thog mar dkar po dgye bar bya// de ma 'og tu dmar po dbye// de la 'og tu ser po ste// de yi 'og tu snang khud rtse/ thams cad dag ni nang rol du// sngags pas tshan rtsirna
49b2(rgyud): pa dgye// cha brgyad dag tu gang bsten pa// dbus kyi cha yin rnams ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste// de dag rdo rje bcing tshul 'dod// gdan ni bad+mar bstan pa ste// mchog
49b3(rgyud): tu dkar zhing mdzes pa yin// de yi steng du rdo rje bzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje'i gtsug tor te// me lce 'bar ba'i snying po bya// mdor na sa bon ldan par bya// de la shar phyogs su de bzhin/
49b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen me tog gzhag par bya'o// lho phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'o// nub phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
49b5(rgyud): med do// byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mo 'khrugs pa'o// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can no// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su de
49b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs so// lho nub kyi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob bo// nub byang gi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig go/
49b7(rgyud): mdor na dbus kyi pad+ma na// 'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa ste// 'dab ma dkar po shar phyogs su// nub phyogs su ni dmar po nyid// byang phyogs su ni ser po ste// lho phyogs su
50a1(rgyud): ni nag pacad// 'dab sa lhag sa rnams ku tu// rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dren ma gasmras// rnam skyong ba'i dbus // bum pan 'od 'dru bkra// dmi steng ngu rung /
50a2(rgyud): chen te// 'bar zhing tog dang ldan par bri// zla gam 'dra zhing drug po ste// 'od ni dbyar smin mdog 'dral// rlung gi steng du ma bris te// dbyibs ni gru gsung gnas pa min// rtags ni 'bras bu/
50a3(rgyud): zur gsum pa// 'jigs pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su pad+ma bri// 'od ni dus ma'i me dang 'dra// de yi snying po'i dbus su ni// 'khor los sgyur ba bri bar bya// de la bcom ldan
50a4(rgyud): 'das de ni gzugs sam// phyag rgya 'am/ yi ge ci rigs su gzhag par bya'o// phyag rgya gzhag na rdo rje ste// bsgrims nas sa bon ldan par bya// de yi phyir la cha rnams ni// brgyad po dag tu snga
50a5(rgyud): ma bzhin// sngags pas cho ga ji bzhin du// lha rnams rnam par dgod par bya// de la shar phyogs su ni 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du me'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs pa pad+ma sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'khor
50a6(rgyud): dang bcas pa rdo rje ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// shar lho'i mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yid
50a7(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// lho phyogs su ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas shing rdo rje 'chang thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang
50b1(rgyud): bcas par du'o// lho nub kyi mtshams sun rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'khor dang bcas pa yang bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag tu dang
50b2(rgyud): bcas par bri'o// nub phyogs suni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgyu dang bcas pa dgod par bri'o// dung
50b3(rgyud): byang gi mtshams su ni pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor dang bcas pa ril bu spyi rings kyi phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o// byang phyogs su ni pad+ma rdo rje 'khor
50b4(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyog rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bri'o// byang shar gyi mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil
50b5(rgyud): 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o// phyogs bzhir ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'khor dang
50b6(rgyud): bcas par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du chud par bri'o// de la rnam thos kyi bu'i phyag rgya ni dbyug to yin no// 'phags skyes po'i phyag rgya ni be con no// mig mi bzang gi phyag
50b7(rgyud): rgya ni rdo rje'o// yul 'khor srung gi phyag rgya ni zhags pa'o// phyi rol khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / mu ran shin
51a1(rgyud): tu rnam par phye ba khor yug chen pos yongs su bskor ba'o// de'i nang rol du ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas par bri'o// de la shar phyogs su ni
51a2(rgyud): lha'i dbang brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogs su ni tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// tshangs pa'i byang phyog
51a3(rgyud): su ni dbyangs can 'khor dang bcas pa pi wang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dang nye bar sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i byang phyogs su ni dpal
51a4(rgyud): chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am yod bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor dang bcas pam dung
51a5(rgyud): gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// brgya byin gyi lho phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor dang bcas pa shing rta'i phyag rgya dang bcas po bri'o// me'i phyogs su ni drang srong me'i lha 'khor dang bcas
51a6(rgyud): pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogs su ni shin rje 'khor dang bcas pa gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa dri'o// de'i shar phyogs su ni 'chi bdag gi/
51a7(rgyud): dril bu bri'o// mtshan mo nag ma'i ni tog go// nag po'i ni zhags pa'o// drag po'i chung ma'i ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o// tshangs pa'i chung ma'i ni pad+ma'o// khyob 'jug gi chung ma'i ni
51b1(rgyud): 'khor lo'o// gzhon nu ma'i ni mdung thung ngo // bag gi chung ma'i ni tho ba'o// dzA mur+N+Na'i ni mi thod do// dbang po'i chung ma'i ni rdo rje'o// lus ngan gyi chung ma'i ni dbyug to'o// gshin rjes/
51b2(rgyud): nub phyogs su ni yi dgas rnams 'khor dang bcas pa kha'i phyag rgya dang bcas pabri'o// sha za rnams ni dra ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// gnon po rnams lcags kyi rdo
51b3(rgyud): can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// grib gnon rnams ni gdugs rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// brjed byed rnams ni lag pa brang la bcar ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//
51b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni lag pa bkan pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// srin mo rnams ni mche ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya 'am lce rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// sha za mo rnams ni rdo rje
51b5(rgyud): bab col gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// bden bral gyi phyogs su ni bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// nub phyogs kyi sgo'i lho phyogs su ni chu
51b6(rgyud): lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de nas sgo dang nye bar dbang phyug chen po
51b7(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dang nye bar dka' thub bzlog pa rtse gsum gdengs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// sgo'i byang phyogs kyi dngos su tshogs kyi dag pa/
52a1(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pabri'o// de'i byang phyogs su thag bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa
52a2(rgyud): dbyug to rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa ba dan gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// byang phyogs su rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin
52a3(rgyud): gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug to rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dag gi shar phyogs su khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//
52a4(rgyud): de'i 'og tu nan mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa 'dab ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de'i shar phyogs su sna tshogs 'phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po rnams dang / ljon pa la
52a5(rgyud): sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/ de la dri za dag gi phyag rgya rnams ni rnga phreng bu dang pheg rnams so// mi 'am ci'i phyag rgya dag
52a6(rgyud): ni sku'i pi wang dang pi wang la sogs pa brdung ba sgreng ba rnams so// de nas lto 'phye chen po rnams dang 'bab chu chen po rnams rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de nas skye dgu'i bdag po
52a7(rgyud): rig byed 'don pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// de dag gi shar phyogs su zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma dkar po dang bum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// nub sgor ni ki
52b1(rgyud): l-i ki la rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri ste drag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// byang sgor ni sgo srungs gnyis bri bar bya ste/ de la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams thos kyi bu ni dbyug to'i phyag rgya dang bri'o//
52b2(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po nir rgyas kyi bu ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// shar sbyor ni khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis bri bar bya ste/ de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa/
52b3(rgyud): khri'o// be con sngon po can ni betson gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// lho sgor ni thub par dka' thob pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// mngon phyogs na rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//
52b4(rgyud): 'og logs su ni rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho'i 'gram ni sring mo bzhi rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// de la tum bu ru'i phyag rgya ni dbyug to'o// rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o//
52b5(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma'o// mi pham ma'i phyag rgya ni 'khor lo'o// gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o// sring mo bzhi'i lho phyogs su ni smin drug pu 'khor dang bcas
52b6(rgyud): pa mdung thung gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// byang phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams ral gri dang ras la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o// 'khor thams cad kyi
52b7(rgyud): gnas ni thig ler bri'o// de dang de ltar lhag ma brjod pa thams cad ni thig ler byas te/ thams cad kyang rdo rje drag pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi las ci bya ba
53a1(rgyud): de thams cad ni rdo rje drug po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ dkyil 'khor rnams dgod pa'i cho ga'o// cho ga
53a2(rgyud): shes pas de lta bur// rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog bris te// byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas su// rab tu bsgrims te mchod pa bya// de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnag/ kha yi cha ga shal
53a3(rgyud): kha can// mgrin pa ring zhing lto che ba// nyi shu rtsa lnga blang bar bya// sa bon rin chen sman gyis bkang // spos kyi chus kyang rab tu bkang // kha rgyan yal gas khebs byas shing // de bzhin 'bras
53a4(rgyud): bus kha bkang la// mgul chings kyis kyang bcings byas pa// kha dog ci rigs rnam par dgod// sgo bzhi po ni thams cad du// bum pa snga ma ji bzhin du// brgyad nyid du ni gsungs pa
53a5(rgyud): ste/ dgu pa de ni bsang gtor ba// rdo rje drag pos rnam kun tu// bsgrims te de ni sngags kyis gdab// bcu pa dbus su shes par bya// de ni 'khor los sgyur la dbul// rta babs
53a6(rgyud): rnam ni mdzes pa ste// rin chen rnam pa bzhi las byas// yang na yid 'ong shing la bya// tsan dan yang na gzhan yang rung // dum bu ma yin ma grugs pa// gas pa med cing 'dzer pa med//
53a7(rgyud): ba ru na dang sha ma dang // sa la ba'i kang ka ta yang rung // rin chen dril bu rab sbyangs shing // dar dang ras la sogs pas brgyan// khru ni brgyad dam bdun nam drug/ me tog 'phreng dang ldan par
53b1(rgyud): 'dod // steng du rin chen bu re bre// mu tig rgyan 'phreng rnam par spyad// dar dang ras kyang sbyang bar bya// dkyil 'khor bas ni che ba bya// kha dog sna tshogs pa dan rnams// phyogs bzhi
53b2(rgyud): dag tu sbyang bar bya// srad bu la ni brgyu bar bya// dril bu sgra 'byung ldan par bya// kha dog sna tshogs gdugs kyi rnams// ci rigs par ni ze bar bya// rin chen bzhi las byas pa'am/
53b3(rgyud): de med zongs las byas pa'ang rung // mchod pa'i g.yog ni snod bzhi zhig/ blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya// sna tshogs spos su gsungs pa ni// gur kum dang ni tsan ngan dang /
53b4(rgyud): spri ka la sogs ci yang rung // srog chags yan lag kun mi rung // sna tshogs bdug pa dbul bya ste// a ka ru dang sgron shing dang // ga pur shi ri ba sa ga/ ce pog dang ni ru rta dang /
53b5(rgyud): sA la'i shing gi thang chu 'am// yang na thang shing thang chu dbul// rdo rje 'byung ba'i rig pa'am// rdo rje drag pos bzlas brjod bya// ut+pa la dang pad+ma mchog/ tsam pa ka dang klu shing
53b6(rgyud): dang // ge sa ra dang ma li ka/ mya ngan 'tshang dang skya snar dang // ta ka ra deng pu na ka/ dong ka'i me tog mdzes pa yin// ka ra wI ra ku mu dang // sna ma d+ha nu ska ri yi// me tog tsa ri gr-i
53b7(rgyud): dbul bar bya// de bzhin lha bshos sna tshogs te// 'o thug shing dang 'bras chan dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi rab tu bzang // bag chos dang ni la thu dang // sbrang rtsi bzhag pa'i cung dang
54a1(rgyud): dang // a shi birta pe na ka/ spyan gzigs kha 'drar grags pa dang // shi ri ba d+ha ka mo dang // gar b+hod ka ra ka dang ni// be reg dang ni tre ye tse// sha ku la/
54a2(rgyud): dang pa ra pa ta// 'bru yi la thug 'breng bu dang // shu na di ba laM gi dag dang // g+ha ri ka dang swa sti ka/ mon sran gre'u gyi zhu te'u dang // rtsa ba dang ni drungs pa dang // 'bras bu sna tshogs
54a3(rgyud): dbul bar bya// sran tshod kha dog ldan pa dang // sge'u gsher nges par dbul bar bya// sran tshod ril bu che chung dang // be 'ga' na dang saM b+ha d+hi/ bu ram ba sres pa'i khu sman pa/
54a4(rgyud): rab tu bstims te byas pa dang // bu ram sna tshogs bcos pa dang // kun tu rnam pa thams cad dbul// rnam pa sna tshogs zho dag dang // zho bsrungs bu ram btab nges dbul/ ba'o ma/
54a5(rgyud): legs par btsags pa dang // de bzhin btung ba rnams kyang dbul/ kha ra'i dbu ba kha ra dang // mar dang bu ram 'bru mar dang // sbrang rtsi dang ni lan tshwa dang // dge bar grags pa dbul
54a6(rgyud): bar bya// btung ba bsgos pa byas pa dang // tam po la dang mal cha dang // snod spyad bzang zhing mdzes pa dang // rnam pa sna tshogs rtsi sman rnams// rab tu bsgrims te cho ga bzhin
54a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' skyob la dbul// de nas so so re re la'ang // na bza' ras zung re re dbul// me long mig sman yid 'ong dang // dung dang de bzhin gi'u wang rnams// byang chub tshogs
54b1(rgyud): ni bkang ba'i phyir// mgon po kun la dbul bar bya// skyob pa rnams la thams cad du// de ltar legs par mchod byas nas// de nas sngags pas sbyin sreg bya// snying po cho ga
54b2(rgyud): bzhin du bya// sreg zugs nyi shu rtsa gcig ni// cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// thams cad 'grub byed yid 'ong ba// mar dang 'o ma spang rtsi'o// l-i ge klog pa bzhi dag kyang /
54b3(rgyud): phyogs ba ni dag tu gzhag par bya// de la shar phyogs gzhag po ni// 'phags pa shes rab pha rol phyin// byang phyogs su ni mdo gzhag pa// gser 'od dam par dam pas bzhed/
54b4(rgyud): nub phyogs su ni gzhag bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin// sdong po bkod pa tshul chen ni// lho phyogs logs su shes par bya// dkyil 'khor lha rnams ji lta bar/
54b5(rgyud): de dag la yang gus par mchod// dam pa'i chos ni klog pa 'di// srung ba rnams kyi dam pa yin// de nas lha rnams thams cad kyang // de yi tshe na dgyes par 'gyur// gang dag 'jig
54b6(rgyud): rten mi bsrun pa// de dag phyogs phyogs 'gro bar 'gyur// de lta bas na rnam kun tu// de tshe dam chos bklag par bya// slob ma thams cad bos nas su// de dag la ni skyabs gsum
54b7(rgyud): sbyin// sdig pa mi bya brjod par bya// sdom pa dag kyang 'dzin du gzhug/ mkhas pas cho ga 'di bzhin du// byang chub sems kyang bskyed du gzhug/ rdo rje drag po'i sngags chu yis/
55a1(rgyud): de nas kun la bsang gtor bya// dam tshig yongs su brjod byas la// mkhas pas nang du zhugs nas su// gos rnams yongs su brjes byas te/
55a2(rgyud): sngags kyis yongs su gdab par bya// de tshe snying rje ldan pa yis// slob ma de dag gdong bkab la// 'khor los sgyur ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya sngags pas 'ching bcug ste/
55a3(rgyud): lag tu me tog sbyin byas la// de tshe snying khar yi ge bsam// skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni// me tog de dag 'thor du gzhug/ blo dang ldan pas slob ma yi// rna g.yas rdo rje dril bu gzhag/
55a4(rgyud): rdo rje rnga zhes bya ba yi// lha mo chen po g.yon par ro// me tog rnams ni gar bab po// lha de de yi yin par 'dod// de ltar slob ma bcug byas nas// de tshe dam tshig bstan par bya// mkhas
55a5(rgyud): pas bzhi par bya ba'i phyir// 'di ltar sbyin sreg rab tu bya// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba dang ni rgyas
55a6(rgyud): pa dang // dbang dang de bzhin drag shul spyod// sbyin sreg las ni mdor bsdus pa// sems dpa' chen pos brjod par mdzod// cho ga thams cad rgyas pa dang // de bzhin tha dad //
55a7(rgyud): las kyang gsungs// sems dpa' chen po'i gnas gang du// me yi thab kyi khung bu bgyi// yam sreg shing cis ji lta bur// las ni ci zhig brtsam par bgyi// khyab bdag thab
55b1(rgyud): khung bka' stsol la// bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur/
55b2(rgyud): pa la 'di skad ces smras so// sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// khyod kyis dri ba gang byas pa// de dag thams cad brjod par bya// g.yeng ba med pa'i yid kyis nyon
55b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni// sbyin sreg ma thab khung bu bya// de tshad gtan la dbab pa ni// khru gang tsam du brjod pa ste// mtho gang tsam zhig brkos nas su// dbus
55b4(rgyud): su rdo rje gnag par bya// kha khyer yang ni dor byas te// mkhas pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su bya// rtsa ba rtse mor dkris pa yi// ku sha dag ni der dgram mo// de ltar kun tu legs
55b5(rgyud): par yang // sngags pas shin tu dgram par bya// ha cang mi nye mi ring bar// sbyin sreg mo yo thab bya ste// tshul bzhin du ni byas nas su// der ni sbyin sreg brtsam par bya/
55b6(rgyud): na sbams steng bdag 'dug ste// de bzhin gshegs rnams dran byas nas// de nas me ni 'bar byas la// de la bsang gtor bye ba brtsam// de yi 'og tu me der ni// me tog gcig
55b7(rgyud): cig gzhag par bya// de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas 'gug par 'gyur// de la me yi phyag rgya ni// lag pa g.yas pa rdang rkyang ste// mthe bong mthe'u chung drung du gzug
56a1(rgyud): sngags 'di dag gis dgug par bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ag+na ye hA be kA bya ba ha na ya swA hA/ blo dang ldan pas rang sngags
56a2(rgyud): kyis// de nas dgang blugs sbyin sreg bya// de la dgang blugs phul nas ni// slob ma g.yon du gzhag par bya// de dag re re'i phyir yang na// dgang blugs nyi shu lnga lnga sreg/ rnam pa sna
56a3(rgyud): tshogs las kyi rnams// 'di lta bu dag rab bya ste// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang drag shul spyod pa'o// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'o mar bcas// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o// rgyas
56a4(rgyud): la zho dang 'bras chan dang // gang dag gzhan las gsungs pa'o// drag shul spyod pa tsher mar gsungs// dbang byar snga ma ji bzhin du// las 'dod 'jigs pa med rnams kyis//
56a5(rgyud): ci rigs par ni sbyin sreg bya// ji ltar rigs pa so so las// de dag las ni g.yon dgug go// yang na yid la gang 'dod pa// de ni ci bder sbyin par gyis// de yi tshe na slob dpon la//
56a6(rgyud): slob ma rnams kyi sa yon dbul lo// ma byin na ni dam tshig nyams// dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro// dper na nyi ma zla ba gnyis// 'jig rten mig tu mkhas pas 'dod// de//
56a7(rgyud): bzhin skye ba 'di la yang // slob dpon de ni mig 'drar 'dod// dper na me yi khams de ni// bud shing thams cad sreg par byed// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya// mi shes bud
56b1(rgyud): shing sreg par byed// dper na chu yi khams de ni// 'jig rten gdung ba thams cad gcod// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // gdung ba kun gcod shes par bya// dper na rlung gi/
56b2(rgyud): khams de ni// 'jig rten thams cad rtag tu sgrub// de bzhin slob dpon slob ma la// dge ba rnam par sgrub par byed// dper na lus can thams cad la// sa ni rten du grags pa yin/
56b3(rgyud): bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // chos kyi rten du 'dod pa yin// dper na bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad// chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud// de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya// dper na
56b4(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gsang ba thams cad 'thun par 'dzin// de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang // 'dir ni sngags kyi gsang ba 'dzin// dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams/
56b5(rgyud): de ni rtag tu rjod par byed// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// bsngags pa chen po'ang rjod par byed// dper na sangs rgyas mig 'dra ste// yang dag lam ni ston mdzad pa// de bzhin
56b6(rgyud): sngags pa 'jigs med kyang // theg chen gnas 'di ston pa yin// bdag ltar sngags pa de bzhin to// slob dpon ji bzhin rgyal de bzhin// slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung // skyon
56b7(rgyud): rnams nams kyang gzung mi bya// yon tan 'dzin na grub par gyur// nyes pa rnams ni dngos grub nyams// slob dpon la ni spang byas nas// 'jig rten dag na tshe thung zhing // de bzhin ngan song
57a1(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur// nya ba la sogs rigs su skye// 'di ni nyes kun 'byung gnas te// mkhas pas bla ma skur mi gdab// chos 'dod rnams kyis
57a2(rgyud): slob dpon la// rtag par rgyun du mnyes par bya// gang na rgyal ba'i sra so gnas pa// sa de mchod rten 'dra ba yin// de ni rgyal sras thams cad dang // bdag kyang snying las chung ngu yin// /
57a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg las ni dam pa 'di// dpa' bo khyod la brjod pa ni// sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa// mgon po rnams kyis sngon chad bshad// sbyin sreg bya ba'i las rnams la// gang gis 'di
57a4(rgyud): ltar rnam shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las me'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par phye ba'o//
57a5(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang skur ba bam po bzhi pa// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
57a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas snga mas sngags pa yi// dbang bskur dkyil 'khor brjod par bya// khru gsum tshad gcig bzhag nas su// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi tshad ni khru
57a7(rgyud): bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor logs su mngon phyogs bya// der yang sngags pas cha bsnyams shing // kun tu gru bzhi lham par bya// sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas te// me yi phyogs su 'dug byas
57b1(rgyud): la/ de tshe byang du mngon phyogs te// cho ga bzhin du thig skud bre// snga ma'i gnas ni spangs nas su// dbang ldar phyogs su 'dug byas te// rlung phyogs spyod yul bar du ni// byang phyogs ngos
57b2(rgyud): kyi thig gdab bo// rlung gi phyogs su 'dug nas ni// lho phyogs ngos su mngon bltas te/ bden bral phyogs kyi bar du ni// nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdang po// de bzhin rlung gi phyogs spangs te/
57b3(rgyud): bden bral phyogs su 'dug byas nas// de nas shar phyogs mngon bltas te// sngags pas gsang sngags rjes dran zhing // me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni// lho phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo//
57b4(rgyud): ga de bzhin thams cad kyang // gru bzhi lham par rab tu bya// mkhas pas thog ma nyid du ni// nang rim cha brgyad byas nas su// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// mkhas pas rim pa gnyis su
57b5(rgyud): bya// dbus kyi pad+ma mdor brjod na// 'dab brgyad zer bar bcas pa ste// 'dab ma'i bar bar thams cad du// rdo rje dag ni bri bar bya// de dag la yang snying po bri// rang gi snying po bskul nas ni//
57b6(rgyud): phyogs skyong brgyad po de dag kyang // ji bzhin gnas su rnam par dgod// de la nang rol grwa rnams su// 'jig rten skyong ba rnam par dgod// bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// sgor ni
57b7(rgyud): bdud rtsi thab sbyor gzhag/ dkyil 'khor lha la ji lta bar// der yang mchod pa rab tu bya// ras dang bla re dril bu dang // gdugs dang me tog rnams kyang dbul// mu tog 'phreng so/
58a1(rgyud): me tog 'breng // ci nus ci 'byor dbul bar bya// de la dbus su ni phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan pa'o// rin po che sna ba nam/
58a2(rgyud): bum pa rin po che dang sman thams kyis bkang ba rin po che me tog dang / me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / 'od dpag med dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang sgrib pa
58a3(rgyud): thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis spyi bor dbang bskur ro// sngags pa pad+ma dam pa der// rab tu bzhag nas
58a4(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis// me tog spos kyis mchod byas la// mar me mchod yon dbul bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang // sil snyan sgra rnams phyung ba dang //
58a5(rgyud): rol mo'i sgra sil snyan mang gis// yang dang mngon du dga' byas la// skyob kun gyis pa mngon sum du// bsgrims te de ni dbang bskur ro// ji ltar gling bzhi'i dbang phyug po/
58a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i sgyur rgyal dbang bskur ba// de bzhin sngags pas ngo mtshar dang // bkra shis kun gyis dbang bskur ro// me tog rnams dang bdug pa dang // spos mchog rnams kyis yang/
58a7(rgyud): mchod la// lag pa g.yas su rdo rje dang // g.yon du 'khor lo bzhag nas su// slob ma de la 'di skad du// rdo rje slob dpon khyod gyur te// de nas rdo rje ldan pa khyod// rdo rje chos ni rab/
58b1(rgyud): brjod pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis khyod lagaH// ting 'dzin 'byung bab rda rje byin// de nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi// lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// sdang ba rnams ni tshar gcad dang /
58b2(rgyud): bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa// de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dren pa rnams kyis rdo rje byin// ji ltar 'khor los sgyur bar rgyal// bdag par bya byor dbang sgyur ba/
58b3(rgyud): de bzhin chos rgyal dbang bskur phyir// rdo rje blo ldan dbong bskur brjod// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mis// de la bsrung bar bya ba ni// slob ma rdo rje chos brjod la// lag pas
58b4(rgyud): bslang bar byas nas su// dkyil 'khor chen po der khrid la// dam tshig dag ni rnams bsgrags te// byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya// khyod kyis byams dang snying rje dang /
58b5(rgyud): lag na 'khor lo gzhar mi gtang // blo dang ldan pas thabs rnams dang // rdo rje bzhag pa khyod kyis ni// nam yang yongs su btang mi bya// blo ldan byang chub sems dpa'//
58b6(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas dam tshig 'di yin te// ji ltar rang gis lus bsrungs pa// de ltar khyod kyis 'di srungs shig/ de byas sangs rgyas byas gzo ba// sangs rgyas sras
58b7(rgyud): zhes brjod pa yin// gzhan du na ni dam tshig nyams// rdo rje can du khyod mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi// rigs ni byang chub sems yin te// rtags ni snying
59a1(rgyud): rje na zhes brjod/ thabs ni dbang du bstan pardo rje nag pa gacha 'gas// darjematshan mthogs pa yin// khyod pa can mas
59a2(rgyud): 'chal/ byud la chung ba kun tu byed sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / rnam par ma srung ba ma dzang / lagadung rje dbang bskur ba las/ dbang bsgyur ba'i ra /
59a3(rgyud): bye ba rdzogs so// de nas 'jam rab dpal ldan pa/ sa mtshan gyis namigargyas pa// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad smos/ dpa' bo gzi brjid
59a4(rgyud): po legs// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog/ gang gis dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// gsang can bcas pa yang gsungs
59a5(rgyud): shig/ lha rnams thams cad so so dang // byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi// phyag rgya dang ni sngags bcas pa'o// sbyar ba rnams kyis rab sbyar dang / bsam gtan
59a6(rgyud): brtan bca' man ngag dang // rig pa'i chos ni gang yin dang / brtul zhugs dang ni spyod dang rtags// yul dang dus kyi rnam kun dang // zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin
59a7(rgyud): drag shul spyod pa dang // 'byung po dag ni dgug pa dang / nor pa'ang rab tu dgug pa dang // gseng sngags spyi yi mtshan nyid dang // bye brag rnams kyang bshad par mdzod//
59b1(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di ni 'dor ba su// gzhan du 'gro ba su zhig gsungs// 'di dang gzhan 'bras 'jig rten na// rnyed dka' rgyal ba rnams gsungs dang // las ni gzhan gyis
59b2(rgyud): byas 'gyur la// 'bras bu gzhan spyod 'gyur ba dang // dkyil 'khor 'di dang sngags rnams kyi// 'bras bu bdag la bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed
59b3(rgyud): par dka'// mi yi lus kyang rnyed par dka'// gsang sngags 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyis de ring khyed//
59b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// bstan pa 'di yi bya ba la// gsang chen 'dzin par dgongs pa ste// dkyil 'khor 'di yi bar dag gi/ cho ga rgyas par bshad par mdzad// de skad ces/
59b5(rgyud): smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal legs so legs so//
59b6(rgyud): kyis gang dris pa'i tshig de legs par smras pa ste de'i phyir 'jam dpal rab tu nyon cig/ 'jam dpal de la dkyil 'khor gyi gsang chen ni lha gang yin pa de kho bo yin no// kho bo
59b7(rgyud): gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor yin no// lha'i gnas gang yin pa de kho bo'i gnas so// kho bo'i gnas gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ni gsang sngags te/
60a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor med par gsang sngags med do// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dkyil 'khor ni gzugs yod pa dang gzugs med pa'o// de la gzugs yod pa/
60a2(rgyud): ni ri mor bri ba'o// gzugs med pa ni bri ba ma yin pa'o// gzhan yang bri bar bya ba ni bri ru rung ba'o// mi bri ba ni brir mi rung ba'o// gzhon nu de la bri ba ma yin pa ni las thams cad
60a3(rgyud): bya'o// bri ba ni bya ba dang las kyi rgyu tsam du zad de/ de ni pha rol dad pa skyed pa yin la gcig gis ni lha'i gnas su byin gyis brlab par bya ba ste/ don gnyis sgrub pa dang / bya ba dang //
60a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// slob dpon las dang / bya ba dang / dus dang / byed pa dang / nus pa dang / 'dzin pa
60a5(rgyud): dang ba sam gtan du bya ba dang / man ngag dang / rnal 'byor thams cad dang ldan pa bdag la dbang thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gzhon nu de la man ngag gang zhe na/
60a6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / slob ma'o// slob dpon ni slob dpon gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'o// de ni de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug cing tshig bzhin du byed la mi slu ba'o//
60a7(rgyud): tshad ma de ni man ngag go// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang tshad ma gang zhe na/ gang mdo sde dang go sang sngags kyi don mi slu ba dang por shes nas de'i ro myang ba dang /
60b1(rgyud): ngan de shin tu chud pas de las ma nyams pa dang / brtan par 'gyur ba den chos nyid do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa de ni man ngag pashad pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
60b2(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ gzhan du mi 'gyur bas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad ma ste de ni mi slu ba'o// de mngon par rtogs
