60b3(rgyud): pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / 'bras bu 'thob pa gang yin pa thob pa de ni chos nyid do// gzhan yang chos nyid de thob par byed pa'i rnal 'byor la sbyor ba nyid gang yin pa de
60b4(rgyud): ni rigs pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sngags pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du bzhed do// dkyil 'khor gyi ni gsang chen
60b5(rgyud): 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon bshad do// gzhan du bri ba 'ba' zhig ni// rgyu dang 'bras bu bral ba yin// 'jam dpal gzhan yang lha rnam pa gnyis te/ 'bras
60b6(rgyud): bu'i ngo bo dang / rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo'o// de la 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni chos nyid rtogs pa'o// chos nyid thob pa de gang yin pa ni 'bras bu'o// 'bras bu gang yin pa de rnam par
60b7(rgyud): smin pa'o// rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ngo bo'o// ngo bo gang yin pa de tha snyad du lhung ba'o// tha snyad du lhung ba gang yin pa dang / tha snyad kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni btags pa'o//
61a1(rgyud): de ni bya ba'o// bya ba gang yin pa de las so// chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni 'bras bu med/ mngon par rtogs pa med pa/ mngon sum du bya med/ rnam/
61a2(rgyud): par byung ba med kyang las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'bras bu dang / 'thob pa dang /
61a3(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ston to// gzung ngo // brjod do// 'dogs so// rab tu 'jog go// rnam par 'grel to// 'chad do// tshul bstan pa
61a4(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis tha snyad 'dogs so// 'jam dpal gzhan yang las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'
61a5(rgyud): rnams ni 'jig rten 'di zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol zhes bya ba dang / skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga ba zhes bya ba dang / 'chi ba zhes bya ba dang / nad ces bya ba dang / rgud pa
61a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dus byas zhes bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba dang / 'gro ba zhes bya ba dang / 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /
61a7(rgyud): rig pa zhes bya ba dang / ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab ces bya ba dang / rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags zhes bya ba dang / zhe sdang zhes bya ba dang / gti mu//
61b1(rgyud): ces bya ba dang / 'ching ba zhes bya ba dang / thar pa zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / thong pa zhes bya ba dang / de kho na zhes bya ba dang / yang
61b2(rgyud): dag pa zhes bya ba dang / mi sru ba zhes bya ba dang / mig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / snga zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya ba dang / lus zhes bya ba dang / yid ces bya
61b3(rgyud): ba dang / gzugs zhes bya ba dang / sde zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / reg ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / chos nas bya ba dang / dge 'dun
61b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / nyan thos zhes bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /
61b5(rgyud): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs
61b6(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba
61b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhan yang lha zhes bya ba dang / klu zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin zhes bya ba dang / dri za zhes bya ba dang / lha ma yin
62a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang nam mkha' lding zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci zhes bya ba dang / lto 'phye chen po zhes bya ba dang / mi zhes bya ba dang / mi ma yin pa zhes bya/
62a2(rgyud): ba dang / skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / bud med ces bya ba dang / ma ning zhes bya ba 'dogs so// 'jam dpal de ltar na las dang rnam par smin pa med pa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
62a3(rgyud): 'das rnams dang / sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis 'dogs pa mdzad do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos de la ji ltar gdags pa 'am rnam
62a4(rgyud): par rig par mdzad lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa nyid la gdags pa 'am rnam par rig par mdzad do// 'jam dpal las dang rnam
62a5(rgyud): par smin pa med pa stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid de la'ang gcig ces bya ba'am/ gnyis zhes bya bar 'dogs te/ de ltar grangs bstan pa rnams dang / ming gi brdar byas
62a6(rgyud): ba rnams kyis 'dogs pa mdzad pa la ltos/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang nam mkha'i khams las dang rnam par smin pa med pa ma yin na/ nam mkha' la'ang sngon po /
62a7(rgyud): bya ba dang / ser po zhes bya ba dang / dmar po zhes bya ba dang / dog ces bya ba dang / yangs zhes bya ba dang / ngag ces bya ba dang / ma dag ces bya bar 'dogs so// 'jam
62b1(rgyud): dpal de bzhin du las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dogs pa mdzad de/ 'dog
62b2(rgyud): pa de'ang las dang rnam par smin pa med pas byas pa yin na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyis khong du ma chud par zad de/ de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
62b3(rgyud): du mthong ba la gzhug pa'i sgo dkyil 'khor 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsum ni 'dus par gyur pa las// sngags 'byung bar ni 'dir bstan to// phyag rgya'ang de bzhin byung ba ste/
62b4(rgyud): gzugs can ma yin bstan du med// rtag tu 'jig rten gsum rnams su// thogs pa med cing mchod pa med// dper na gtsub stan bsten nas su// gtsub shing gtsub pa byas gyur na/
62b5(rgyud): mi yis rtsol ba byas rgyu las// stobs dang ldan pa'i me 'byung ngo // de bzhin gsum ni 'dus pa las// gsang sngags dang ni phyag rgya lnga// chen po dag ni 'byung 'gyur te/ byung
62b6(rgyud): nas yid la gang bsams pa'i// las rnams byed par gyur pa yin// 'jam dpal dper na rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bsams ma thag tu lha'i zas dang / skom dang /
62b7(rgyud): rgyan dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bud med dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang la sogs pa thams cad 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gas
63a1(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya dang lha 'dus pa las thams cad 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ni skyon thams cad/
63a2(rgyud): dang bral ba med par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe gang bsams pa de thams cad 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du sngags kyi tshul yang khong du chud par bya'o// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi
63a3(rgyud): gzugs yongs su spangs te/ lha'i nga rgyal la the tsom med pa thob pa de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi chos nyid des chos nyid ston te/ de'i tshe des tshig gis de'i rnam pa brten pa na bya ba nus par
63a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal brten pa'i chos nyid ji ltar las byed nus par 'gyur ba la ltos 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal brten nas rgya'i 'bur 'byung bar 'gyur te/
63a5(rgyud): rdzas med na yang rgya'i 'bur ni mi 'byung la/ yod kyang bya ba dang wa dang bral na rgya'i 'bur mi 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal gnyis ka'ang phan tshun du bltos pa dang bcas pa'i
63a6(rgyud): phyir ro// mis rtsol ba byas pa 'di las ci 'dir rdzas byung ngam/ 'on te las kyi bya ba de byung ngam/ gang yin te snga phyi 'gal ba'i phyir brten nas/ gsang sngags
63a7(rgyud): sa ma phyag rgya 'byung ba tsam la ma gtogs par 'byung ba med do// 'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' gzhan las rgyal ba'i sbyor ba'/
63b1(rgyud): de snyed du blta'o// 'di sa rgyal bar byed pa su yin zhe na/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rgyal bar byed do// 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa/
63b2(rgyud): mang por brtags pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di ni gsang sngags so// 'di ni phyag rgya'o// 'di ni lha'o zhes rnam par gnag pa mdzad do//
63b3(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings de ni gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ gzung ba ma yin pa/ dkrug pa ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rnam par
63b4(rgyud): gzhag pas rnam par gzhag go// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir bya ba thams cad byed do// 'jam dpal gzhan yang ji ltar gzhan gyis las byas pa la ji ltar gzhan spyod ces
63b5(rgyud): gang smra ba de ni/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu dbang phyug rang gi sems la dbang thob pa de 'dod pa bzhin du longs spyod sna tshogs la yongs su spyod par byed de/ 'di lta ste/
63b6(rgyud): lha'i khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang la sogs pa dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bud med dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul
63b7(rgyud): nas bdag kyang yongs su spyod cing gzhan dag la'ang sbyin par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid kyis sngags de bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gzhan gyis byas//
64a1(rgyud): ba la gzhan yongs su spyod do// 'jam dpal gcig byed pa la mang po yongs su spyod pa'i rnam grangs yod do// dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'am/
64a2(rgyud): zhing ba bzhin no// 'jam dpal gzhan yang 'jig rten 'di 'dor ba ni su gzhan du 'gro ba ni su zhes smra ba ni 'jam dpal gang gi tshe sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs
64a3(rgyud): 'dus byas kyi khams la gnas pa de'i tshe de 'jig rten 'di yin no// gang gi tshe sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs de nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe
64a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten 'di 'dor zhing 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'o zhes 'dogs te/ 'di ni chos nyid rtogs pa'i
64a5(rgyud): gang zag gi tshig bla dgras so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams su rnam par gnas pa ste/ de ni nam du'ang 'dus byas kyi dri mas mi gos so// 'di lta ste/
64a6(rgyud): dper na rdo rje ni 'dam rdzab kyi rnyog pa'i dri ma'i skyon thams cad kyis mi gos so// de bzhin du chos nyid de'ang 'dus byas kyi skyon thams cad kyis mi gos so// 'jam dpal byis
64a7(rgyud): pa so so'i skye bo 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa dag ni nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyun du ltung ba ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa las byung ba'i sems pas srid par skye ba nyon mongs
64b1(rgyud): pa can rnam par grub bo// de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas te 'du byed kyi tshogs 'di 'gags pa'i cha lha'o snyam pa'am/ mi'o snyam pa'i ngargyal cing chud de'i rjes su 'brel te
64b2(rgyud): 'ad sa ste/ dper na rab tu phyis pa'i me yang gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin lta ba'i mi ni bdag gi bzhin yon tan khyad par can 'di lta bus bzang ngo zhe'am/ mi bzang ba zhes rtog
64b3(rgyud): par byed kyi de dang tha dad pa'ang ma yin tha mi dad pa'ang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang 'khrul pa'i phyir sems la ngar 'dzin pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal mthong ba'i
64b4(rgyud): 'bras bu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags rnams kyi dug dang rims la sogs pa sel ba'o// ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na/ mngon sum dang rtog pa'i dra dang bral
64b5(rgyud): ba bsams gtan rtogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ste/ rjes su dpag pa dang dpag par bya ba'i rtog ge ba'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa yid ches pa'i lung gis grub pa dang //
64b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor dang / rigs pa dang ldan pa dang / rang gis myong ba'i rnam pa ni 'bras bur bstan te/ 'di ni ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang drug shug
64b7(rgyud): spyod pa'i las smros shig ces gang smras pa ni bya dgos par gyur pa na khro bo nyid brtsam par bya ste/ zhi ba'i sems dang / snying rje ba dang byams pa'i rang bzhin dang rang gi las
65a1(rgyud): kyi 'bras bu la lta bas lha'i gzugs dang / rang gi khro bo'i gzugs tha mi dad par sbyor ba dang ldan par bya bas me'i khro bo'i gzugs la cig shos kyang khro bor/
65a2(rgyud): gzugs so// rang bsgyur ba'i khro bos sngags kyi ngo bos bkug la myur du brang ngam/ snying kha'am/ mgo'am/ lto 'am/ rked pa 'am/ byin pa'am/ rkang pa'am/ rgyab tu rkang pa
65a3(rgyud): g.yon pas mnan la srog chags thams cad dgod kyang rung / rtse'ang rung / chags kyang rung / sdang yang rung lam du 'gro'ang rung / nyal yang rung / 'dug kyang
65a4(rgyud): rung 'greng yang rung / chu klung gi pha rol dpag tshad brgyan 'dug kyang rung / lha la sogs pas bsrungs kyang rung / bdag la me sbar bas sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin
65a5(rgyud): sreg bya'o// zhi ba la ni zhi ba ma zhi ba la ni ma zhi bar gsungs so// de nas lag na rdo rjes thogs pa med pa'i ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang bstan pa don yong/
65a6(rgyud): par yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ting /
65a7(rgyud): 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stobs mtshungs pa med pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dam tshig chen po'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
65b1(rgyud): sar+b+ba pra'e b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra sa ma patrA~M// dmatshig gi rdo rje'i gsang sngags smras mthug tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'byor thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byungs
65b2(rgyud): thams cad du dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i sgra'ur ces grags so// 'di thos byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ de dag skad cig de nyid la// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga ru// rdo rje mcho
65b3(rgyud): stobs gzung thob bo// yang bdud bzhi pham par byed pa'i rnam par bgyings pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ srung ba chen po sdebs po che stobs
65b4(rgyud): bcu'i gzi brjid las byung ba'i gsang sngags 'di smras so// nA maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA/ badz+ra gi ni badz+re shu u la nI/ badz+rA mu ta re ba lin ma a
65b5(rgyud): gra ma hA ba le/ hi li hI li/ mi li mi li shi li shi li/ Ti li Ti lo/ To Ta le/ mA hr-i tsiN+Da/ ku ru g+hon/ shreta pad+ma mA li na/ hi hi he he/ rA
65b6(rgyud): rak+Sha ma hA sa ma ya a nug te swA hA/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma srung ba dam pa 'di// gsang sngags rjes su spyod pa
65b7(rgyud): yi// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ lag na rdo rjes rab tu brjod// de nas lag na rdo rjes yang dkyil 'khor gyi thabs thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod smras pa/ na maH
66a1(rgyud): / spya ga d+hA san gas nga da ba sa zugs/ sma s+yAr+b+ba d+hAd+d+ha
66a2(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHtsar+N+Na badz+ra a tsi s+pha ra Na swAhA/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i sngags so// nam sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHma hA tsar+N+Na badz+ra ka ba tsa bi s+pha ra brjeg swA/
66a3(rgyud): rdo rje go cha'i sngags so// namasar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHmahA badz+ra a gra d+hA ri te dze ga te swAH/ rdo rje mchog gi spyi gtsug gi sngags so// nam
66a4(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya badz+ra e nan+ta go ti hi swA hA/ rdo rje gtsug tor chen po'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya d+hA ta thA ga te A shwA
66a5(rgyud): pa ri pu ra tsin+d+ra ma Ni rA dza badz+ra hUM/ rdo rje mdzod spu'i sngags so// namasar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHta thA ga te lo tsa na dz+nyA no badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje can gyi sngags so//
66a6(rgyud): nam sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHoM badz+ra an nA sAhA/ rdo rje nal gyi sngags so// na mob+h+yasar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te sat+ya d+harma
66a7(rgyud): pra tiSh+Thi te badz+ra ka ru sa ra swa ti bu ha a laM kA ra gar+b+ha badz+ra dzi hA hu~M b+ha ga rba ti/ sar+b+ba satwa an+do sha na ka ri swA hA/ rdo rje sngags kyi sngags so// na ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya
66b1(rgyud): badz+ra mgras me rgya ba bi drub tA ra swAH/ rdo rje sku'i sngags so// num/ sar+b+ba twA thA ga te b+h+yasar+b+ba mA khed+d+ha.ar+g+ha badz+ra swAH/ mchod yon gyi sngags so// nam
66b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHgan d+ha a ba b+hA sa na swAh+ma/ dri'i sngags so// nam sar+b+ba ta thA ga tau b+h+yasar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yapuSh+pa badz+ra a gra d+ha ra ka swAhA/ me toH/
66b3(rgyud): gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+hUHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHdz+nyA na badz+ra swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yasar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHA sha k+Sha
66b4(rgyud): ya d+harmA d+hA tu s+pha ra Na badz+ra swAhA/ lha bshos kyi sngags so// na masar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHta thA ga te tsak+Shur badz+ra swAhA/ mar me'i sngags so// dkyil
66b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi thabs kyi sngags kyi mdzod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas ting nge 'dzin de las
66b6(rgyud): langs te/ rdo rje chen po gsang mtho ba'i tog rdo rje mthon po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu
66b7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje lhangs zhes bya ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba de byin no// nam
67a1(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba muShe b+hUHta Ta ta Ta/ s+pho Ta ya badz+ra shaM kr-i ta bi d+hu dza~M tra dur dAn+ta dam kaHda ha sa tA la~M bo dar ka ha ka ha tsu lu tsu lu muny+tsa aH
67a2(rgyud): hA sa na/ dA ra bi dA ra badz+ra gA tra/ badz+ra aMg/ badz+ra ni tra/ badz+ra shro tra/ badz+ra g+hA Na/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta a nu tsa ra/ kiny+tsi ra ya si pra bi sha/ badz+ra pA ni hr-i da yan A \u0f7f
67a3(rgyud): sha A bi sha/ g+hur+Na g+hAH/ g+hur+Na pa ya g+hAr+Na pa ya/ ta thA ga ta A dzA ka ra/ pa bar d+harma lab+hU badz+ra ya hUM kr-i ta swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lhangs zhes bya ba'i/
67a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i snying po gsungs mi thag tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje tshim zhing yi rangs nas de'i tshe rdo rje me wa~M bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems
67a5(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gug/
67a6(rgyud): rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// rgya mtsho chen po thams cad 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyang 'gul
67a7(rgyud): rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// chem chem/ rab tu che mchim kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang 'bar/ rab tu 'bar
67b1(rgyud): kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lde gcig tu gyur par snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'ang 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'jigs 'jigs lha chen po'i
67b2(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin la/ rdo rje'i mig las me lce 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcur snang bar byed cing / rdo rje 'jigs 'jigs lha chen po'i zhes bya ba'i khro bo 'bar ba rab tu
67b3(rgyud): 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa/ mig gsum pa/ mche ba bzhi pa/ gad mo rta gang 'byin pa/ lus la glang po che'i pags pa khrag can
67b4(rgyud): gyon pa lag na rdo rje thogs pa phyung ngo // yang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad dang yan lag gi tshigs thams cad nas rdo rje khro bo thams cad mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs
67b5(rgyud): can dang lag na rdo rje thogs pa dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgras go bar byed pa dang / lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa dang
67b6(rgyud): sdang ba thams cad skrag par byed pa dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / rgod pa dang / 'bug 'bug po'i sgra 'byin pa dang / spug smug po'i sgra 'byin
67b7(rgyud): pa dang / lag na rtse gsum gdengs pa dang / gtun rked nyag thogs pa dang / lag na be con thogs pa dang / lag na tho ba thogs pa dang / lag na dgra sta thogs pa dang
68a1(rgyud): lag na mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / kan sa dang / mda' bo che dang 'khor lo dang / lcags mda' dang / zhags pa dang dbyug to dang
68a2(rgyud): lcags thag dang / khab 'dra dang gshol dang rnga dang 'khar rnga dang dril bu dang rnga bo che thogs pa dang / gzi brjid can thams cad kyi gzi brjid mi snang
68a3(rgyud): bar byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la lta ba lhur len par bstan nas/ yang gtsug tor nas khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes de bzhin ga gegs
68a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi yul las byung ba me lce 'bar bas lang long du gyur pa/ thor tsugs can gsus pa 'phyangs po// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i tshad
68a5(rgyud): tsam gyi lus dang ldan pa/ rab tu 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang 'drad / dpral ba khro gnyer gyi rim pa can/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i pags pa khrag can gyi smad g.yogs gyon pa
68a6(rgyud): bka' nod cing 'dug pa bstan to// yang dpral ba'i dkyil nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gzhan khro bo'i zla ba'i thig le zhes bya ba lag pa brgya stong du ma yod pa mig gsum pa
68a7(rgyud): mche ba bzhi pa gad mo rta gad kyi sgra 'byin pa gshin rje'i gzugs 'dra ba khro bo'i g.yog 'khor brgya stang du ma dang ldan pa/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa
68b1(rgyud): stag sngags kyi sham thabs ston pa/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa kun tu bstan to// yang lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las langs nas khro bo rdo rje btson chen po can sto
68b2(rgyud): spyang ki'i lto ba 'dra ba/ mig dmar ba/ khros pa dang bcas pa/ an da rnyil ltung sngob/ lag na be con thogs pa skrag par byed pa drug pa sdig pa'i bkra
68b3(rgyud): po'i sham thabs can sdigs mo byed pa bstan to// yang stobs mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po stobs
68b4(rgyud): po che zhes bya ba lag pa bzhi pa skra gyen du bsgreng ba/ mig ser ba/ mche ba bzhi pa/ dbyar gyi sprin 'dra ba lag na be con thogs pa lag na dgu sta
68b5(rgyud): thogs pa / gsus 'phyang po/ mig gsum pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs can/ rang gi me lce 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa bstan to// yang lag na rdo rje de bzhin
68b6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gom pa 'dor ba'i rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo spa shor zhing gyen du bsgreng ba/ gshin rje'i
68b7(rgyud): gzugs 'dra ba gdong gi dpral ba khro gnyer gyi rim pa can mig dmar ba/ gad mo cher dgod pa kha gdangs pa lag pa bzhi pa lag ni mdung rtse gsum pa
69a1(rgyud): dang / rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri thogs pa phyogs su lta ba bstan to// yang lag na rdo rjes rdo rje drag po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa/
69a2(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'jig rten gsum kun tu rmongs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs bskyed
69a3(rgyud): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las byung ba/ mdog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs ma/ rdo rje'i rtags can me lce'i 'phreng bas lang long du gyur pa/ bzhin yid khros pa 'dra ba
69a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i lcags thag thogs pa/ bka' nyan pa lhur len pa/ 'khor pho nya mo khri dang ldan pa 'di bstan to// yang rdo rje rtse mo chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa/ stobs thob
69a5(rgyud): pa med pa sems can sdang ba thams cad 'dul ba stobs che ba rdo rje rtse mo lag na thogs pa/ gdong khro gnyer gyi rim pa can bud med 'bring mo'i tshod tsam pa
69a6(rgyud): lag pa drug pa lag na zhags pa dang / gtun shing dang / tho ba dang / gtum rked nyag dang / khab thogs pa/ 'khor ponya mo khri dang ldan pa bstan to//
69a7(rgyud): yang rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi khu tshur las byung ba/ rdo rje'i rtags can/ rab tu 'bar ba 'di ston gyi zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba/ migs su
69b1(rgyud): lha mo thor tshugs can/ ras dkar ba'i sham thabs can/ lnga dang lha ma yin gnom par dka' ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa bstan to// khro bo de dag gi snying po ni 'di ngan
69b2(rgyud): sin no// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra dz+wa la yan lasam+b+ha ba/ dzar dzaH/ sngo Tar sproT pa hU~M kro d+ha swAH/ rdo rje 'jigs
69b3(rgyud): 'jigs lha'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA he trai lo kya dza ya ha ha swA hA/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags so//
69b4(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ka Ta ka rba/ ma Ta ma rba/ ma tha ma tha/ kro d+hin+du ti la ka sAhA/ khro bo zla ba'i thig le'i sngags so// na maH
69b5(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA te nI la badz+ra daN+Da kiny+tsi rA ya si ha na da ha b+hany+dza ta thA ga ta/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra Na swA hA/ rdo rje be con sngon po can gyi sngags so//
69b6(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsor+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ma hA ba la rak+Sha ba lo ka ta badz+ra a d+hi ka ha na bi d+hA na sa ya hUM hU~M swA hA/ stobs po che'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba
69b7(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ta thA ga ta no dAr+ya a nA ba lo ki ti badz+ra mar d+ha/ badz+raSh+NI Sha hUM hUM pra dz+wa li ta mU ti swAhA/ rdo rje gtsug tor gyi sngags so// na maHsarba
70a1(rgyud): thAg N+Teb+h+ya/ nas b+h+ya thub pa badz+ra la sa ma rnas sa/ bang+yas / du
70a2(rgyud): kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yoHsar+b+ba thA b+hin+da b+hin+dasar+b+ba duSh+TA~M nA maHsar+b+ba da tra a pra tihab+ha ga ba ti badz+ra sa tsi ba ra he twe mi ni sI ts+tsha
70a3(rgyud): rdorje rtse mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+bo ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ga tod b+ha be dzA ti ni trai lo tsa ne sar+b+ba d+he ma nir d+he d+ha ni ki ti saM ka ra Ni swA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi sngags so//
70a4(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra pa tI ke badz+ra man se swA hA/ rdo rje ba dan gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA
70a5(rgyud): badz+ra mA la ni badz+ra pA Na ye ba hu rA dza ma ri swA hA/ rdo rje 'phreng ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+haHsar+b+ba mu khe b+haHsar+b+ba thA badz+ro ku la sun+da ri/ badz+re gi tsi ta ri Ni
70a6(rgyud): bu ra ri swAhA/ rdo rje rigs mdzes ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a dzA dz+wa li naM/ badz+ra tri shU li ni he hi he hai swA hA/ rdo rje mdung rtse
70a7(rgyud): gsum pa can gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA A kaR+Sha ya~M sar+b+baM b+ha ga ba te/ badz+ra ku shi/ ki ri ki ri/ mi ri mi ri he ha le swA hA/ rdo rje lcags kyu
70b1(rgyud): ma'i sngags so// nam sar+b+ba ta brag te b+h+ya sar+b+ba mu'i b+h+ya sar+b+ba thAg te bag tu sa b+ha ba brjod dang ma sar+b+ba ku rba thug ta ma dAr tan sarba/ rdo rje mche pa'i sngags sa
70b2(rgyud): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga teHsar+b+ba suShe d+ha/ sar+b+ba thA sar+b+ba d+ha rdza pra byed na kar badz+ra mu gdu tsi la hi tha swAhA/ rdo rje tho ba'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+baHthA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba muSha d+d+haH
70b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA badz+ra pra kA ra ta thA ga ta b+he dza na ka ku ru ku ru tsakre Ne sAHrdo rje ra ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ta thA ga ta bi saM b+ha badz+ra kA la~M kA
70b4(rgyud): la ka ra sA hA/ rdo rje phur pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra pony+dza ra ni ka k+She pra ga go na khaM swA hA/ rdo rje dra ba'i sngags so//
70b5(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hA sa badz+ra dza la dza la swohA/ rdo rje bzhad pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ta thA ga ta
70b6(rgyud): nir g+hor Sha badz+ra dun du d+hi ha sa swA hA/ rdo rje rje bo che'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra g+hi Te Na b+ha ga ba ta~M dz+nyA na ra smai sa b+hU te ha ri swAhArdo rje
70b7(rgyud): dril bu'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ro ma ma ni ni ri ti ni swAhA/ rdo rje spu'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
71a1(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA badz+ra bu lan wa shi Shi nI sAhA/ rdo rje sen mo can gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu'i d+hAHsar+b+ba thA badz+rAd+had du ti tsi bi ta mu lagats+tsha
71a2(rgyud): gats+tsha ku ru ta thA ga ta A dzA swA hA rdo rje pho nya mo'i spags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA badz+rod b+hA be badz+ra badz+re sha~M kha bi tsi tre shwa ri swAhA/ rdo rje spyi gtsug gi
71a3(rgyud): sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA gA te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe d+haHsar+b+ba thA thA ga ba ti badz+ra kA rA la~M bi shAHdza~M dzi ra~M swA hA/ rdo rje sha za mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu She d+hAH
71a4(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA bash+tsa ka rA la badz+ra An na badz+re pa shA tsi raM ku ru sAhA/ rdo rje sha za'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra rAk+Sha sa ga da ya sarba ta thA ga ta sa~M d+ha bi
71a5(rgyud): sha ma ka ri badz+ra tsa na swA hA/ rdo rje srin po'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a ma hA badz+ra khad ga ts+tshin+da sarba ga tsi sa ra ba sAd ta nan ta thA ga ta saM ga
71a6(rgyud): saM b+ha na sA hA/ rdo rje ral gri'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ta thA ga ta ko Sha saM b+ha ba b+hU ta ba shi prAp+ta sA hA/ rdo rje 'byung po'i sngags so// na maH
71a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra a na la~M bid+hu dzi hA badz+ra rak+Sha sa~M swA hA/ rdo rje srin mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsI ya ga ta sar+b+ba
71b1(rgyud): ga ti ta thA ga tats+tsha la sa b+hA ba rAk+Sha sa badz+ra sA hA rdo rje grib gnon gyi sngags so// nam sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA an tata ta ya bin shan bi kr-i ta ro tra ta sha badz+ras
71b2(rgyud): swA hA/ rdo rje gnon po'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha ra ha ra badz+ra/ badz+ra badz+ra ti la piM ga la lo tsa na kA la kA la swA hA/ rdo rje brjed byed kyi
71b3(rgyud): sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA de baM ga bu ga ta/ ta thA ga ta a dzAM kar tri pa tha/ se bi thA badz+ra satwa swA hA/ rdo rje lha'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
71b4(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra nA ga mu khi gau ri nI la ti ti ni swA hA/ rdo rje klu'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra d+ha ra/ yak+Sha ku la su na dar
71b5(rgyud): swA hA/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bi ka ra badz+ra/ shi kha ra ga ga na tsa ri ni sA hA/ rdo rje dri za'i sngags so// na ma
71b6(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu le b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA dan sa~M b+hA be badz+ra ma thAn nr-i ma d+hi tsa~M swAhA/ rdo rje lha ma yin gyi sngags so// na mat+ma sAr+b+bA twA thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+tha
71b7(rgyud): thA lan dzar to re re Ti badz+ra mu kha~M swA trA~M/ rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu le b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ga ra~M Ti ki Ti ni swA traM/ rdo rje lto 'phye chen
72a1(rgyud): pa'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsAr+b+ba mu She d+d+haHsar+b+ba bA rA ga d+hA rA s+yAn na dza'i 'jug// mA m+b+hi dA n+d+har brdab N+DI gro la swA/ rdo rje lus par /
72a2(rgyud): gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tre b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tho ka la~M ki l-i ka le kAr mA bzlas ris gr-ing kroh+Na swAhA/ rdo dza ka lo ka ma'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba trA thAg
72a3(rgyud): te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra bi dA ra b+hU tA yab+hU tA yab ha ba ha swAhA/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sngags so// na miHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe d+hUHsar+b+ba thA tsi laM gi laM
72a4(rgyud): kur da ni ha he ki he sA hA/ rdo rje 'gro lding ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha la du na ra ku ba ra ba d+ha ra d+ha ra bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra ka d+ha ka d+ha ka thA
72a5(rgyud): badz+ra pA Ni badz+ra pri ya ke ha ka ha ha ha he he kiny+tsa ra ya si sa ha sra b+hu dza sa ha sra A na na baM du daMSh+Ta dur dan+da da ma ka pra dz+wa li ta ke sha/ na kha ro ma da shaM na da li bi du s+phu ri ta dzi ta/ tsan+da a di t+ya ma ku Ta
72a6(rgyud): go ti bi ra tsi ta shi kha ra badz+ra ga da ke yU ra kuN+Da laM a laM kr-i Da sha rI ra/ badz+ra na kha badz+ra aM gu li/ badz+ra ha sta/ badz+ra tsa ra Na/ badz+ra gA tra/ badz+ra ne tA nI la badz+ra/ badz+ra ga ta thA Ta ba yu kha/
72a7(rgyud): ga ni gaM b+hI ra hUM kA ra ra ti ta sa ta si ta ha si ta laM bo dar/ gra sa gras/ pra bi sha/ A bi sha A bi sha/ g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/ g+hur+Na pa ya b+hur+Na pa ya/ sar+b+ba satwa b+h+yA ma b+hU ma b+hU ma ya b+hU ma ya
72b1(rgyud): sar+b+ba dub+hA pa tsab tsa da ha da ha/ mtha ma tha rbu hUM badz+ra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya ti sAHrdo rje na dku be ra'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pra tsa la mo bu li b+h+yo /
72b2(rgyud): d+har badz+ra kr-i ta na kha badz+ra satwa swAhA/ rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA shud+d+ha badz+ra pra kr-i tri shud+d+ha sho d+ha ya~M sar+b+ba sAdz+dza/ rdzas
72b3(rgyud): thams cad dag par byed pa'i sngags so// nA maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ag+ni badz+ra swAH/ rdo rje me'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te rgyu
72b4(rgyud): sar+b+ba pu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rA an la pra tsal ma ma thing d+ya dar snehArdo rje rlung gi sngags so// namaHsir+b+ba ta thA ga te d+h+yaHsar+b+ba pu'i b+h+yaHsar+b+ba pra badz+rag badz+ra d+ha ra dza ga na sA tra~M kar
72b5(rgyud): rdo rje sa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bi ra dze badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje rdul dang bral ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
72b6(rgyud): mu She b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA smr-i ti daM da badz+ra satwa swAhA/ rdo rje dran pa'o sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pad+ma badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i sngags so//
72b7(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te d+huHsar+b+ba mu She b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rod ta me ka ru Na a ga d+ha ri ka ru Na maN+Da la swA hA/ rdo rje snying rje'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya
73a1(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA me d+h+ya ga ta/ sar+b+ba satwa hi taM ka ta sAtra/ rdo rje byams pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hU dA ra mi tra ga r+b+ha sar+b+ba
73a2(rgyud): tra a prA ti ha ta badz+rA tsin+ta sAhA/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA sar+b+ba shUn+ya tA badz+ran bi shud d+ha satwa a ber+ya badz+ra hr-i da ya swAhArdo rje stong
73a3(rgyud): panyid kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra d+hA ra d+h+r-i shwa ra d+ha ra badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje gzungs kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu
73a4(rgyud): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra bo d+h+yaM ga dr-i D+ha A sha ya sar+b+ba bud+d+ha sA hA/ rdo rje byang chub yan lag gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA mArga bi Shi d+ha ka d+ha ka
73a5(rgyud): d+ha ka/ tse ra tsa ra swA hA rdo rje lam gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA sat+ya badz+ra sa mud ga taM bud+d+ha rU pa d+ha ra swA hA/ rdo rje bden pa'i
73a6(rgyud): sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a be ni ka badz+ra saM b+ha bud+d+he putra swA hA/ rdo rje ma 'dres pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yad+d+hasar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
73a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA a be sha rang badz+ra marga na da ri Sha ka sIH/ rdo rje me 'jigs pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+be ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ti rat+na sar+b+ba pa ka bud+d+ha d+ha po Ni da ra swAhA
73b1(rgyud): rang kon ma chog gsum gyi lags so// nam san thazug te bya stsan su'i bya/ sa rba ma dzin m+b+hal ba zlab+ha ba tu nad du smras rdo rje byang chub shing gi sngags so// nam
73b2(rgyud): sar+b+baH thAg teb+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu re \u0f7fsan m+b+ha sa par dzi te 'adz+ra/ dziHril br-id ru nga swAH/ rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba ta thAg b+h+yasad+g+ha s+'u
73b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba ma brji na dza~M seMH/ rjen chen 'byung banas kyi sngags sa// sar+b+batwathA ga teHsar+b+ba su'aMSh+Thasar+b+bA pA phru la la badzad rjes rje rdorje rjes
73b4(rgyud): hri~Mzhes so// nam sar+b+ba thA b+h+ya/ sang+gas b+h+yasang+gA b+ha brngub ba rnam sardzun mas par thamams// nam sarba thAka tu
73b5(rgyud): dzaHsarbaHsasarba brjod tum-i ka du ma me hU~M/ rdorje 'jigs pa'i sngags so// namaHsarba tA thA ga d+haSh+Thasardza sarnams paN+Di brjes ma
73b6(rgyud): rigs pa sngagasas T+Ta k+She r+dz+dza ma / na thugs so/
73b7(rgyud): rnam 'di ma'i ma rtsams / las
74a1(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA kA ma badz+ra bid+yA d+ha ri ku bu de swAhA/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje'i rig sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA rak+Sha badz+ra ni kA man+da de kA ma ya/
74a2(rgyud): Ni sA tra/ rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ma taM ki khi ri khi ga kha ri kA swA hA rdo rje gdol ma'i sngags so// na maH
74a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ru d+hi ra pri ya ra d+hi ri be tA li/ li ha~M la ba li li gi ni badz+ra ma thi ni riHrdo rje khrag gi ro langs ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
74a4(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+re be tA li ka li mA lin ba mA li lu shud d+ha sA ri he swA hA/ rdo rje rosangs ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra dun
74a5(rgyud): te badz+ra shi ti ki/ ud pA da ni pA da mA bi laM badz+ra pA ni a dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ rdo rje khro bo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA kun khi ku na khi badz+ra pA ni
74a6(rgyud): pri ye ha ti hi de swA hA rdo rje sen ngan ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra gaM ku ru ga ni badz+ra tun+de ke swA hA/ rdo rje skyes ma'i sngags so//
74a7(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra d+ha ba li d+ha li ti gi badz+ra b+h+ra ma ri ke swA hA/ rdo rje bung ba mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba tra thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra/
74b1(rgyud): ba ga bar drubadz+rad ci b+hin gyun rtog sma/ rdo rjeg para'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsam+ba su be d+d+ha sam+b+ha thA badz+rabasan ti ga badz+rag sum sas badzag sum
74b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba She swAr+b+ba pam ma rdo rje ma nyag gi sngags so// nam sar+b+ba thA ga te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu le b+h+ya/ sarba thA thAs brjigs su t+yarba t+ya swAhA/ po'i ma rdo rje pa 'ang pa'i sngags so
74b3(rgyud): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te d+hAHsar+b+ba mu le b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA he mang ba li ge baja ma badz+ra pA N+Di ma du s+yAr sa~Msa? panya mardo rjer ro ma'i sngags so// nam sar+b+ba tra thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu le d+d+ha
74b4(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA badz+ra badz+ra ku ga rims bu la brjed the po mo la kaun dan de nga ba badz+ra pa ta ki swA hA/ rdo rje khyim sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba tA thA ga te b+h+ya sam+b+ha pu le b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA brjod pa la gsen rdzo /
74b5(rgyud): binI ba~M kuni swA hA/ rdo rje ut+pa la mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga taM b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu le b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rA mA li ni khi lan ti ka tsa la tsi la bi tsi la bi tsi la ru nu la lu ru swA hApo ma chen
74b6(rgyud): ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ha ra Na khA da ya sar+b+ba dur ni ba ri Ni pa re swAhA/ rdo rje shabakra mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
74b7(rgyud): sar+b+ba pu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ma ka tir k+Sha mu khi rak+to ak+Shi badz+rod ri kad dka dam bi la ba badz+ra dA tsir A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ panya ma phra ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
75a1(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra d+ha ra NI/ d+ha ra d+ha ra san d+ha ra sA hA/ pho nya mo rdo rje 'chang ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra
75a2(rgyud): kA li ke dra mi ti ko ran di ka ha Ta hu Ti swAhA/ pho nya mo rdo rje nag mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tha la~M ba bi ga li ta ma hA ma Ni ku traM sa swAhA
75a3(rgyud): po nya snyems par 'dug gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pra tsaN+Da badz+ra d+ha ra ka nir da yaM da ha da ha b+haM dza b+ha dza sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sA hApo nya rab gtum
75a4(rgyud): gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra la l-i ta badz+ra pA Ni pri ya sar+b+ba satwa ba shaM ka ri swA hA ponya rdo rje rol pa'i sngags so/ sa na maHsar+b+ba ta thA
75a5(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rI tsan+d+ra mu khe kha kha khA hi kha hi sma ra pra ti dz+nyA na sA hA/ pho nya rdo rje zla gdong gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra g+ho
75a6(rgyud): na dur dAn ta da ma ka ba mi la mu kha dza hi dza hi swAh+ma/ pho nya rdo rje dri ma med pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ba la d+ha ri si si mi sAhA/ pho nya rdo rje stobs 'chang
75a7(rgyud): gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA khe tsa ra badz+ra ga man he ha ha swA hA/ pho nya rdo rje mkha' rgyud kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
75b1(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu le b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ri ga to ta ra ta ra du ba ra ba ra tsa ra tsa ra kA ma kA ma sA hA po nya rdo rje 'phags kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
75b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA badz+rod ta ma swAhA/ pho nya rdo rje mchog gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rod bAka tra tu ha tu ha swA hA pho nya rdo rje gdong gi sngags so
75b3(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra dan du ra tsa pi Ta badz+ra ra na sau la da ha ri laM bo d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hu sa ra sA hA/ pho nya rdo rje so'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
75b4(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ran dza ya dza ya badz+ra ru dra dza ya tsany+dza ro Sha Na swA hA/ pho nya rdo rje khro bo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA trai li kya gra sa na
75b5(rgyud): badz+ra du hra badz+ra pA sha hasta A na ya A na ya kiny+dzi rA ya si/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sA hA pho nya 'jig rten gsum gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+ya d+hasar+b+ba
75b6(rgyud): thA tsaN+Da la badz+ra kaM ka ra ku ru sar+b+ba kiny+tsi ra ya saM bi tsi tra ba ti pa ri te sAhA/ phyag bstan rdo rje gtum po'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yasar+b+ba
75b7(rgyud): thA badz+ra pa~M ga la la li ti ki sha pra dz+wa li ta sha rI ra ha ka d+ha ka ku ru ku ru swA hA/ phyag brnyan rdo rje ser po'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ke tu
76a1(rgyud): ki kar d+ha raHra/ thar thar/ kar kar swAH/ phyag brnyan rdo rje me tog gi sngags so// numaHsar+b+ba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsarba mu le b+h+yaHsarba pra ta gad+ha/
76a2(rgyud): ka kiny+dza ra ya la li ta be Sha d+ha rI/ d+ha ra Ni d+hA ra Ni/ pra ti trA mu hra mu gu mu~M rbade ha saM swAdz+dza/ phyag brnyan rdo rje dus po che'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba
76a3(rgyud): thA badz+ra ku la A dz+nyA ka ra ra ta ra tA ri bi swA hA/ phyag brnyan rdo rje bka' bzhin byed kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hAM kr-i tAn+da/ sha ma na b+h+r-i dza kA la
76a4(rgyud): bri ma hi ma tsi li la li ta dushrI sar+b+ba hr-id yoswAHphyag brnyan rdo rje thab sred kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khi b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra shi kha ra/
76a5(rgyud): mu lu mu lu he lu he lu swAhA/ phyag brnyan rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ka ta ka Ta/ mo thA maT ts+tsha hU~M badz+ra ku la sun+na d+ha
76a6(rgyud): d+ha ha ra ha ra swA hA/ phyag brnyan rdo rje rigs mdzes kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ha la ha la Ta ra Ta ra lun ta na badz+ra kai ka ra swA hA/ phyag brnyan
76a7(rgyud): rdo rje phung byed kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra d+ha ta na dzi ya dza~M ka ra bu tan+ta ra sA hA/ phyag brnyan rdo rje rlung las rgyal gyi sngags so// na maH
76b1(rgyud): sarbutra thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu la b+d+ha/ sar+b+ba thA ko ta na dam+b+ha/ kit+ya mas rba s+thA mar+b+ba katrA~M tig tig swaH/ phyag brtan rdo rje mtha' las rgyal gyi sngags so// na
76b2(rgyud): b+hag te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba pu She b+h+yaHsar+b+bo thA tsa pa'i ke tsa pa la badz+riHsAdz+ra/ zan mo rdo rje phyar ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba tA thAg te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu Shed+d+haHsar+b+ba thAs su badz+ra Ni badz+radaH
76b3(rgyud): ke swA hA/ bran mo rdo rje legs kyi sngags so// na maHswar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra pany+tsa ri ke ba dzi ni sr-i hA/ bran mo rdo rje drag mo'i sngags so// na maHsa~MH
76b4(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA rat+na mA li ke badz+ra pA Ni pri ye swA hA/ bran mo rdo rje rin chen 'phreng ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+be ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra mA/
76b5(rgyud): li ni da ba la mu khi badz+ri Ni swA hA/ bran mo rdo rje dkar mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra laM bi ke swAhA/ bran mo rdo rje spyan ma'i sngags so//
76b6(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te d+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra su ga na ti ge badz+ra ge badz+ra da yi ta ke swA hA/ bran mo rdo rje snying brtse mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yoHsar+b+ba mu She b+h+ya
76b7(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA su s+thi ti ta badz+ra Na~M badz+ra pA Ni hri da yaM ge me swA hA/ bran mo rdo rje legs gnas ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra du ku la bak+She Shu ha ra ni swAH/
77a1(rgyud): bran mo rdo rje du ku la'i ras can gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ka ra li ke brti ke swA hA/ bran mo rdo rje mnyam pa mo'i sngags so//
77a2(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra dza ya ka ri badz+ra sha rI rA Ni swA hA/ bran mo rdo rje rgyal byed ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra
77a3(rgyud): ka ra b+hi badz+ra a ti sha ni ki swA hA/ bran mo rdo rje sdigs ma'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra badz+ri Ni badz+ra ma ba ti ke swA hA bran mo rdo rje gsod
77a4(rgyud): byed kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA me kha la la li ta ke sha ba ri badz+ra gan+d+ha r-i swA hA da/ bran mo rdo rje tshig 'dzin gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA
77a5(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA su sid+d+hi ka ra badz+ra sA d+ha ka yaM sar+b+ba badz+ra pA Ni ra a dzA ku ru swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po legs par grub byed kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
77a6(rgyud): sar+b+ba mr-i khe b+h+yaHsarba thA raN+Da mA li badz+ra d+ha ra swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rin chen dbu rkyen rtse gsum gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bo d+yAd+ham
77a7(rgyud): tsin+ta badz+ra hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa mchog gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ba la ke li kI la badz+ra ma ku Ta d+ha ra swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po bal
77b1(rgyud): gamag pa'i sngags sa nam san 'brug teH/ sar+b+ba su d+d+haHsar+b+ba mAr na kA ma kI la rdza mA kun nar smyahA/ rig pa'i rgyal ba rin can g.yo ka la'i sngags so// nam
77b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA s+yA rU pa mA la badz+ra badz+re tsi ti kar swAH/ rig pa'i rgyal po gzugs legs kyi sngags so// na maHsAr+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba pu Shad+d+haH
77b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA badz+ra bi go da badz+ra d+ha ra swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje thogs pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA la li ta badz+ra pu ru la~M ma hA yak+ShA rU pa d+h+r-ingasar
77b4(rgyud): sa ra swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rol pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ga dza karna badz+ra lo tsa na tsa tsi na lak+Sha swahA/ rig pa'i rgyal po glang
77b5(rgyud): po rna ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA traTe badz+ra kany+tsA hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba/
77b6(rgyud): mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA b+hI Sha Na badz+ra b+hi ma badz+ra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thAd+hA ra~M des rba
77b7(rgyud): me pra ti ha ta ta ra ta ra swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'phrog byed kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hA sa badz+ra d+ha re sutA nu sar+b+ba ar+ha sarba ka hi hi ra
78a1(rgyud): swAhA/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje bzhad pa'i sngags so// / phyag na rdo rje dbang bsrung ba'i rgyud bam po lnga pa/ de nas yang /
78a2(rgyud): lagan rdo rje yan lag thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus bu snying nas skyes pa'i kha nas byung ba dag yid dang yan lag thams
78a3(rgyud): cad las byung ngo // de la lag pa gnyis las ni gnon nu lag bzangs so// kha nas ni gzhon nu rdo rje sde'o// rdo rje cod ngan las ni gzhon nu rdo rje cod pan no// spyi gtsug nas ni gzhon nu rdo rje
78a4(rgyud): gtsug nas byung ngo // rdo rje me tog rnams las ni gzhon nu rdo rje me tog go// rdo rje me tog thod las ni gzhon nu rdo rje me tog thod do// rdo rje'i brang las ni gzhon nu rdo rje brang ngo //
78a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i snying las ni gzhon nu rdo rje sdug go// rdo rje'i dpral ba las ni gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'o// rdo rje'i smin ma las ni gzhon nu rdo rje smin ma'o// rdo rje'i rna ba las ni gnon nu rdo rje 'chang ngo //
78a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i mig las ni gzhon nu 'jig rten mig gcig pa'o// rdo rje'i sna las ni gzhon nu rdo rje shugs 'chang ngo // rdo rje'i mkhur chos las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i rten no// rdo rje'i ke sko las
78a7(rgyud): ni gzhon nu rdo rje gces pa 'dzin to// rdo rje'i so rnams las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i mche ba'o// rdo rje'i mgul pa las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i glu'o// rdo rje'i mtshan khung las ni gzhon nu rdo rje
78b1(rgyud): mi 'bar ba'i gzi brjid do// rgyab las ni gzhon nu rdo rje gnya' shing 'dzin to// de ltar de dag la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i bu gzhon nu khro bo dag lag na rdo rje thogs pa sems
78b2(rgyud): can gyi don la brtson pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ snying rje'i dkyil 'khor las yang dag par byung ba lag na rdo rje'i smon lam gyis snying rangs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thA dad pa
78b3(rgyud): rnams su byang chub mchog dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
78b4(rgyud): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / stong pa nyid chen pos lus rnam par bskyed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
78b5(rgyud): par byed pa/ lag na rdo rje'i snying du 'thad pa sha stag go// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te gsang sngags smras pa na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga
78b6(rgyud): te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra se nod b+ha ba badz+ra pA Ni pri ya swA hA/ rdo rje sde'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ba hUd d+ha ba badz+ra ba tu
78b7(rgyud): shu ra ga ma swA hA/ rdo rje lag bzang gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bi tsi tra badz+ra she kha ra badz+ra shi khar 'i lam po ta har swAhA/ rdo rje me tog thod kyi
79a1(rgyud): sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ki ri Ti badz+ra d+ha ri bi shud+d+ha a~M gar swA hA/ rdo rje cod pan gyi sngags so// namaH
79a2(rgyud): sar+b+ba twA thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra mAr d+ha a ga~M ta hUM hUM hUM swAhArdo rje gtsug nas byung ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba te thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba pu She b+h+ya sarba thA ku su
79a3(rgyud): ma a tsi dra ta badz+ra murti badz+ra swa b+hA ba swAhA/ rdo rje me tog gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ba ra d+ha ri ur badz+rod ta ma swA hA/ rdo rje brang gi sngags
79a4(rgyud): so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra hr-i da ya badz+ra pA Nau pri ya satwa hi haM ka ra swA hA/ gzhon nu rdo rje sdug gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
79a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsan+d+ra badz+ra a~M ga sun+da ra swA hA/ gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra tsakra maN+Da la saM pu ta badz+ra hu ba swAH/
79a6(rgyud): rdo rje smin mo'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra aM ku d+ha ri shud+d+ha d+ha ra d+ha ra ni rbad sAhA/ rdo rje rna mchog 'chang gi sngags so// na maH
79a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra lo tsa na dz+nyA na tsak+Sharba da sA hA/ rdo rje mig gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra be ga d+ha ri mnoH/
79b1(rgyud): bcar tar srung/ rdong grags 'chang gi sngags so// nam sarbA phyug tu m+b+ha sarba su n+d+ha/ sud d+har brdzus ma la mdu pa la sa swA hA/ rnga rje chen gyi sngags so
79b2(rgyud): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te d+hAHsar+b+ba mu khed+d+haHsar+b+ba thA badz+rad+har d+ha ra dz+wa la ta mAd+hi swAH/ rdo rje gces pa 'dzin gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba tA thAg te b+h+yaHsarba mu khad+b+ha sar+b+bad+hA
79b3(rgyud): badz+ra aM ku ra badz+ra ke tu sa ra sa ra swA hA/ rdo rje mche ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA saM bo d+hi badz+ra d+ha ra pri ya badz+ra gI ti swA hA/ rdo rje glu'i sngags
79b4(rgyud): so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra dza li ti badz+ra murti badz+ra d+ha ra sA hA/ gzhon nu rdo rje 'bar ba'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yeHsar+b+ba mu /
79b5(rgyud): b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA te dza a ba laM ti bi ta mod+hi d+ha ka swAhA/ gzhon nu gnya' shing 'dzin gyi sngags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa lag no rdo rjes rdo rje
79b6(rgyud): las yang dag par byung ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang bskur zhing gnod pa thams cad 'gog pa lus la srung ba
79b7(rgyud): chen po'i srad bu thogs pa/ rtag tu ma byed ces zes pa phyung ngo // na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA he badz+ra shU li ni badz+ra ma taM gi A nan+da mu kha badz+ra ti liH
80a1(rgyud): yan ta~M ru ti mu kha ti sa pu ran+ti sAhA/ mA ma kI'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pu bi mo badz+ra mA lI nibadz+ra ad b+hu te
80a2(rgyud): sas+ya ya sa man+ta shI di sha ma badz+ra ran d+ha de na g+hu d+hu g+hu d+b+ha dza hi dza hi mA bi lam+ba/ b+ha ga ba ti bA rA tri// s+pha ra s+pha ra/ badz+ra sa~M gI ti swAhA/ rdo rje mtshams kyi sngags so// na maH
80a3(rgyud): sar+b+bA ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rI ma hA man+da daR+sha ya badz+ri bi kra ma s+yA hA/ rdo rje lding khang gi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra sitwA ta
80a4(rgyud): d+hA kr-i ta swAHrdo rje gdugs dkar po'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsar+b+ba pu She b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bi tata ma hA badz+ra bi dan ga rig pa la swAt+ma/ rdo rjen po che'i bla chen pa'i sngags
80a5(rgyud): so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA rat+na kU Ta/ dz+wa li ta badz+rod b+ha ba swA hA/ rdo rje khang pa brtsegs pa'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
80a6(rgyud): thA badz+ra pad+mod b+ha ba / badz+ra A~M sa na badz+ra na da da swA hA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan gyi sngags so// ne maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA smr-i ti/ badz+ra d+ha ra ka swA hA/ rdo rje dran pa'i sngag
80a7(rgyud): so/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bo d+hi bi bo d+ha na badz+ra ba ma ba ma ba swA hA/ rdo rje byang chub kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
80b1(rgyud): bi ma hA ba rA ka/ badz+ra rat+na d+ha margyam sang/ rdo rje meng gnyis rnam par bcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sngags so// namaHsar+b+ba tra thAg te b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba mu She g+h+na sar+b+ba ba rdzun brda smrardo
80b2(rgyud): shes sbyin gyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a mr-i ta badz+ra pa sA hA/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA
80b3(rgyud): pra brta ya badz+ra dz+nyA na sA ga ra na ra swA hA/ rdo rje chos brjod kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra saM sa thA pri ya bi ra ga ko Ti swAhA/ rdo rje chags bral gyi sngags
80b4(rgyud): so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA shU n+ya tA ko Ti badz+ra saM d+ha ra ke swAhA/ rdo rje stong pa nyid kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba tA thA ga ti b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA sar+b+ba
80b5(rgyud): d+harmA sa ma tA pra ba ka badz+ra satwa swA hA/ rdo rje mnyamo pa nyid kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ga ga na gaM dza ni ta ra shi sha ya mo khaM badz+ra swA hA/ rdo rje nam
80b6(rgyud): mkha' mdzod kyi sngags so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra ya kA Ni badz+rad de id dI pa ra Ni man si badz+ra mA lin swA hA/ rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i sngags so// de nas
80b7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
81a1(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi srog la dbab pa'i tshogs kyis bye ba bsreg pa na/
81a2(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'jig pa'i dus chen po'i tshe 'byung ba'i nyi ma bdun ltar 'bar ba rgya mtsho'i gling chen po'i me sgron ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems
81a3(rgyud): dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs za ba/ 'jigs pa'i me chen po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje snying po'i mchog 'di smras so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA phaT hUM 'jig
81a4(rgyud): pa'i me chen po'i snying po smras ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chu shing gi tshal rtsa ba bcad pa lta bu dang / rlung drag po chen pos bskyod pa bzhin du 'gul nas// stan
81a5(rgyud): thams cad las kha sbub tu 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'gyel to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so//
81a6(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dang / ri rab dang / ri rab chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po 'bar
81a7(rgyud): zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho chen po thams cad bskams nas rnam par tshig ste thal bar gyur par mthong ngo // lag na rdo rje'i snying kha nas kyang khro bo'i rgyal po
81b1(rgyud): 'jig pa'i me lce chen po zhes bya ba byung nas/ gang mo rta ba gad chen po rgyas par 'byin cing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi snying rnams yongs su bsdus nas nam mkha' dang mtshungs
81b2(rgyud): pa nyid du gyur te/ lag na rdo rje'i snying gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs so// lag na rdo rje'ang snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
81b3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba brjod de bka' stsal pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ni// /
81b4(rgyud): snying po stobs chen ldan pa 'di// bstan pa 'di ni srung byed cing // theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di la// gdul dka' rtag tu 'dul ba ste// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bshad//
81b5(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo chen po rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyel bar rig nas cher snying rje skyes te/ mig gnyis kyis ring du bltas nas
81b6(rgyud): rdo rje mchog gi snying po dam pa sbyin pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ spyod pa chen po mchog gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po la lta zhing de bzhin gshegs
81b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos rab dam pa rnam par rgyal ba thob pa byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'khor 'di la dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sgo cung zad
82a1(rgyud): cig stsol cig dang / des bstan pa 'di la srog gi re ba thob cing dad pa thob nas rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi snying po 'bul bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces
82a2(rgyud): smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing // nam mkha' lta bur chags
82a3(rgyud): med la// kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa// gsang sngags kun gyi spyod pa dang // de bzhin gsang sngags sgrub pa dang // brtul zhugs
82a4(rgyud): dang ni rtags dang gzugs// dus dang yul dang cho ga shod// de'i tshe rdo rje de rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyi gzungs dang lhan cig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la byin no//
82a5(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta tha ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA e hi ma hA badz+ra kro Ti ku Ti la pA pa ka a~M ku la shi khe ka pi la ke shrI ta Ti ta rbi/ ko Ti ko Ti/ karka Ti mu Ti ma hA thin dud lo lo/ duka
82a6(rgyud): duka/ sam sam/ sar sa ra/ bi sa ra bis ra/ sU ra s+phu ra/ ud do ti ta/ ha ri bi ga le tsa Ti bi tsu Ti/ dz+wa le bi dz+wa le badz+ra g+ho na/ badz+ra sa ra d+hiSh+Ta pra ha ra
82a7(rgyud): ma ti b+hU ta/ rat+na tra ya/ a ti ta le/ badz+ra d+ha ra bI shA sa ma a pra ti tsi ta pra marda ni sAhA/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
82b1(rgyud): dag rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje mi 'pham pa mes rab tu rmongs byed 'di dran par gyis shig dang / 'di khyed la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / srog thob par byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes
82b2(rgyud): rig pa chen po 'di smras ma thag tu/ de nas dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rjes 'khor de byin gyis brlabs nas mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das mi 'pham pa
82b3(rgyud): mes rab tu rmongs byed de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras te/ skad cig de nyid la 'khor de langs nas kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / byang chub sems
82b4(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lta zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma ye shes kye ma skyid// kye ma sngags shes bsam mi khyab// des ni bdag cag
82b5(rgyud): thams cad kyang // dgon dang bsam gtan dga' dang ldan// sems zhi tshigs ni ma mchis par// sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur len 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni//
82b6(rgyud): bdag cag thams cad mchis nas su// cho ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir// snying po dag ni da dbul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
82b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang lag na rdo rjes dbang chen po bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH
83a1(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA oM/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying po'i mchog lags te/ rig byed bzhi rab tu brjod pa/ rigs bani kun kun tu 'jog pa/ dbyung /
83a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i bkod pa chen po 'gad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las rig byed rnams 'byung sngags rnams dang mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i las rnams 'byung ste/ rgya mtsho chen/
83a3(rgyud): po bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gnir gyur pa'o// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje oM zhes bya ba ste/ byams dang ting nge 'dzin las skyes// nga rgyal
83a4(rgyud): rnam par sbyangs pa legs// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das dag gi snying po
83a5(rgyud): rgyal srid thams cad la dbang sbyin par bgyid pa 'di bzhes su gsol// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA bi d+ha rA ya/ mau li mo li/ bi hu bi hu swA hA/ bcom ldan
83a6(rgyud): 'das snying po 'dis bdag lha rnams kyi bdag po bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs par gyur pa der bdag gi snying po sgrub par
83a7(rgyud): 'tshal na/ des dang por lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan gsum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar thang shing gi yam sreg shing mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig tu lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o//
83b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// shi 'phos nas kyang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyas par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje la lta zhing
83b2(rgyud): zas mi 'tshal bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal srid 'thob ste/ dam tshig nyams pa ni ma gtogs te mi 'grub bo// de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis byang chub
83b3(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po mchis te/ des na bdag cag thams cad dbang du mchi'o// dngos grub stsal bar bgyi/
83b4(rgyud): srung bar bgyi'o// dug bsal bar bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA re re ra ti nA ga le li ri/ pud+d+ha ri/
83b5(rgyud): swA hA/ snying po 'di'i sgrub pa lags te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ mtsho chen por zhugs te lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas klu gang yang rung ba mngon du phyogs par/
83b6(rgyud): mchis par mthong ngam/ mtsho 'khrugs kyang de la 'jigs par ma bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro// tha mar seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing yungs kar gyi 'bru mar la bsnyugs pas lan
83b7(rgyud): khri bzlas brjod bgyis te de lta na'ang 'grub bo// de 'gro ba 'am mi 'gro ba'i dug rnams kyang bsams pa tsam gyis sel bar 'gyur/ sgrub pa po'i las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang
84a1(rgyud): #bsams pa tsam gyis bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces spras
84a2(rgyud): so/ bcom ldan 'das pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ba mang po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar bgyid pa'i rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maH
84a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA yak+Sha sha ra/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ de bi mi bai shra ba Na pri ya sA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di sgrub pa des ring
84a4(rgyud): bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du gcig pu mchis te snying po 'di lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyis la mtshan thog thag tu til
84a5(rgyud): nag po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsreg pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol bar 'gyur ro// zas mi 'tshal bar lkog tu dben par gnod sbyin mo yid la bgyis
84a6(rgyud): te nyin zhag mdun du lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis na gnod sbyin mo stsol bar 'gyur ro// lo gcig gi bar du nyin re zhing dran par bgyis na gter gcig stsol bar bgyid do// de nas
84a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag kyang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi
84b1(rgyud): snying po 'bul lo// na maHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA khrim sar sAH/ pa dUr yan/ prata dz+nyA maN+Di ta ke swAH/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying
84b2(rgyud): 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid pa de'i slad bzhin du bdag brtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mir mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi zhing yungs kar dang /
84b3(rgyud): zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung gis byang chub sems
84b4(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba/
84b5(rgyud): thA bi d+ha d+ha ri/ gan+d+ha ri ri si swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid pa de la dus ma lags par 'gum pa mi 'byung ngo // rtag tu dpal gyis 'khor bar 'gyur/
84b6(rgyud): re/ ci ste sgrub par 'tsha'i bdes zla ba tshes nas bzung ste/ nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin me tog gi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa
84b7(rgyud): bgyis la/ mtshan thog thag 'bras kyi 'o thug sbyin sreg bgyis na grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de stsal to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang gis byang chub
85a1(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang
85a2(rgyud): gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA shri d+hi d+ha ra ya bi rU pA k+Sha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gi snying
85a3(rgyud): po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid pa de'i slad bzhin bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan
85a4(rgyud): sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la/ mtshan thog thag gu gul shing gi yam sreg sbrang rtsi dang mar la bsnyugs pa khri sbyin sreg
85a5(rgyud): bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de stsol to// ma grub na'ang yul gru bzang po lnga stsol to// de nas chu dbang rmugs byed 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
85a6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi don thams cad grub pa snying po mchog 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
85a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ku ru tsu ru mu ru dzam+b+ha dza lod+b+ha ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la ci 'tshal ba bsgrub par
85b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na nyi ma 'gyur ba'i tshe ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal srid dam gter chen po stsol to// gi'u wang la lan cig bsngags
85b2(rgyud): te mig la bskus na gang bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan mo gdong la bsngags te bsams nas nyal na ci bsams pa de rmi lam du mthong ngo // gos 'dod na me tog kha dog ci 'dra
85b3(rgyud): ba chur bor ba de 'dra ba'i gos dag rnyed par 'gyur ro// phyugs chung 'dod na zhag bdun gsum du nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan la bsngags lan cig btab pa'i me tog phog par bor na rnyed par
85b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal che bar 'gyur ro// de nas lag brgyad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das
85b5(rgyud): 'di lta ste 'dod pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba
85b6(rgyud): thA tsakra dA dra bA hu rA dza swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di sgrub par bgyid pa des bsrung ba bgyis la skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs gtsang mar shing mya ngan 'chang gi 'og
85b7(rgyud): tu lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar gzhon nu la ci 'byor pas mchod de mtshon thog thag a ka ru'i bdug pa bsregs la bzlas brjod bgyis na nam phyed dam nang par de la bdag
86a1(rgyud): bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa gang 'tshal ba stsol te/ zan mi za bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nyid du gnod sbyin mo mchi'o// gang 'tshal ba de stsol/
86a2(rgyud): to// ci ste mi mchi na 'gum par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen gyis btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das
86a3(rgyud): bdag kyang sgrub pa po gsang sngags sgrub pa la brtson pa rnams la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul la// na maHsar+b+ba
86a4(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA pany+tsa la pany+tsa mu kha pAny+tsi ka hr-i hriM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor chen po
86a5(rgyud): 'dir dam tshig thob ste/ gsang sngags sgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma kho nar bdag gi snying po 'di lan cig brjod par bgyi'o// de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyi
86a6(rgyud): ba'i slad du bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can bdag de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag mchi ba'i snga ltas ni sgrub pa po de'i lus la lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngang 'bab par 'gyur/ spro ba'i stobs
86a7(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ bgegs thams cad ma mchis par tshegs chung ngus des dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// ci ste bdag gi snying po 'di sgrub par 'tshal na/ des sangs
86b1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ba dmar ser gyi mar zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag ste du ba 'thul lam 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis
86b2(rgyud): la de 'thungs na gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ci ste ma grub na'ang skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod
86b3(rgyud): bgyis na nor 'du bar 'gyur ro// ba lang gi lci ba sa lam lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsams nas lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na grub
86b4(rgyud): par 'gyur te gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de nas thag bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//
86b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA traM gi ni bo de de mA li na~M dza ti mi hUM
86b6(rgyud): swA hA bcom ldan 'das gang la la bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang chen drag po dam pa 'di sgrub par bgyid pa des/ dpal gyi sgo mo'i sgor mchis la snying po 'di lan drug 'bum
86b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe'i 'bru ba sreg pa lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad gtan pa ma mchis shing 'khrul 'khor
87a1(rgyud): @ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas bdag cag gis rim gro cher bgyis te rigs kyi bu de gzhug par brgya'o// yo byad thams cad kyang stsol bar bgyi'o//
87a2(rgyud): dngul chu dang sman bcud kyis len thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas sna tshogs 'phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje
87a3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA mad
87a4(rgyud): ta ma tang gi swA hA/ 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te/ 'dis dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// 'dis bdag cag dri za'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o// lha'i bde ba'i rnam pa
87a5(rgyud): sna tshogs myong ngo // mdor na bgyi ba bgyid pa thams cad nus so// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas thams cad na mchis so// ci ste gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshal na/ des
87a6(rgyud): thog mar ri phug tu ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la snying po 'di 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas grub par 'gyur ro// tha mar du ru ka'i 'bru mar gyi mar me bus la/ a ka ru'i
87a7(rgyud): ya ma sreg shing khri sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// gi'u wang la sngags kyis btab ste dpral bar thig le bgyis na skye bo thams cad
87b1(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil la sngags kyis btab ste gdong la bya bas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am
87b2(rgyud): ci'i rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul
87b3(rgyud): lo na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ti ti li bu swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te/ 'dis bdag cag mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
87b4(rgyud): zhes bgyi'o// sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchi'o//
87b5(rgyud): lha dang klu'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis kyang bkur ro// snying po 'dis ci la'ang mi brjod do// ci ste gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshal na/ des gcig pur dgon par slong mo
87b6(rgyud): zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ba lang gi lci bas la ma lhung ba'i sna lnga dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor bskus la ci 'byor pas mchod de/
87b7(rgyud): gur kum gyi sreg thugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas grub par 'gyur te/ mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis bkur cing gang 'dod pa de bgyid do// de nas rnam par bdud
88a1(rgyud): kyi bu la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
88a2(rgyud): kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ra kA ri bi Sha ri bi She Sha ni kr-in+ta ni ku mA ri ke ha swA hA/ pu pu swAh+ma/ bdag
88a3(rgyud): cag gi snying po 'dis klu thams cad rang gi dam tshig la dgod par bgyi'o// snying po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis klu thams cad bdag cag gi phyag brnyan du 'gyur te/ 'jigs shing zhum pa dang /
88a4(rgyud): sdang ba dang / re ba chad par 'gyur// dug ma mchis shing phyogs phyogs su 'bros par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ci ste rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig snying po 'di grub
88a5(rgyud): par 'tshal na/ des mtsho chen por zhugs la mid pa tsam nub par 'greng ste snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas mtsho de nyid nyin gcig bzhin skam mo// klu'i gnas thams
88a6(rgyud): cad kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rang gi gzugs kyang ston to// bgegs gzhan brgya dag kyang bgyid de/ de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o// de nas mtshan ma de dag byung nas tha
88a7(rgyud): mar ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba de nyid kyis rgya mtsho ngos su dkyil 'khor bskus la/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ dug dang nye ba'i dug thams cad las
88b1(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po brgyad bgyis la de nas ske tshe'i 'bru re re nas khrag gis bskus te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas klu thams cad lhags nas dam pa long zhig ces mchi na skrag par mi bgyi'o//
88b2(rgyud): 'di skad du phyag brnyan dag tu gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mi snang bar gyur te/ de slan chad ci 'tshal bde bgyid do// de nas 'jigs su rung
88b3(rgyud): ba la sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi
