184a5(rgyud): stabs ni// sngags rgyal rnams kyi spyi yin te// 'dug pa dang ni 'gro ba dang // ldang dang rnam par gtor ba dang // dgug pa dang ni brkyang ba dang // rkang pas
184a6(rgyud): sa bcing bskum pa dang // spo ba dang ni gzhag pa dang // khu tshur bcangs pas gzung ba dang // gzir dang rdo rje'i gzhum pa dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya phur gdab dang //
184a7(rgyud): seng ge lta bur mchong ba dang // hUM zhes bya ba'i bsdigs pa dang // stan las langs nas mchu mnan dang / khro gnyer dpral bar blta ba dang // smon ma bskyod par
184b1(rgyud): byang dang / de bzhinamig gnyis bgrang ba dang / rkang stabs rnam par 'byed pa dang / lag gnyis sbyar bar bya ba dang / de bzhin lag pa bskyod pa dang / rkang pa
184b2(rgyud): gnyis kyis mtshang ba dang // lus ni sems dang bcas par yang / bye brag tuni ldan pa dang // gcad dang gtu ba dang bgad pa dang / bza' dang rnam par bgang ba dang /
184b3(rgyud): kun tu sgra dang rnam skra dang / drag tu byed dang bcangs pa dang // sdang ba thams cad tshar gcad dang / rengs par bya dang rmongs bya dang / gyen du mchong dang nges
184b4(rgyud): basman dang // mdzes pa'i stabs dang gtsub bsdun dang / srub phyir dang po sngar spyad pa/ de bzhin lha la bsnyen bya dang / sngags pa yin dkyil 'khor dang /
184b5(rgyud): dngos grub ci 'dra yin pa dang // sems can khams la rnam kun tu// bsrung dang spab bya ba dang // dbang po 'di dag thams cad dang / gzhan yang med la ci 'dod
184b6(rgyud): dang sdang sems ldan pa de dag la// de bzhin phyir ni dgug pa dang // de dag thams cad rgya cher ni// sems can 'phang bar 'dod par smos// de nas de bzhin
184b7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rkang stabs kyis rnam par rgyal ba ba'i gsang sngags 'di lta bu gsungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA hU hU~M hUM @\u0f7f/
185a1(rgyud): phaT phaT phaT tsaN+Da badz+ra pra dz+wa li ti mUrti swA hA/ de nas lag na rdo rje sa gsang sngags 'di thos nas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/
185a2(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la rnam par bltas nas smras pa kye grogs pa dag nyon cig/ sems can gang la la sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'dong
185a3(rgyud): ba rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod cing gsang sngags kyi tshul la brtson pa de dag la ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya
185a4(rgyud): ba'i phyir deng phyin chad srung bgyis shig/ bsti stang du gyis shig/ rim gror gyis shig/ mchod par gyis shig/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu
185a5(rgyud): smras pa chos kyi rjes bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de nas lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
185a6(rgyud): la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la srung ba sgrub par brtson pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
185a7(rgyud): pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam tshig las 'gal bar byed na rig pa'i rgyal po drag pos 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu mched cing rab
185b1(rgyud): tu 'bang bas de'i mgo tshol ba bdun du 'gems so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' ni ba'i zla gros la 'di skad ces smras so//
185b2(rgyud): rdo ba'i blo gros sbyang stabs kyi mtshan nyid sngoran gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'thun pa'i rkang stang stabs byas nas su de bzhin gshegs
185b3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas te// 'greng la thal mo 'tshogs mar gzhag/ gsang sngags lta bur 'joms mchog gis// rdo rje stangs
185b4(rgyud): tshul gar byed cing // 'tshegs nas thal mo phab nas su/ snying khar gzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni/ phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su/
185b5(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa bteg byas la// g.yon pa rked pa'i rgyab tu gzhag/ rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su// g.yas pa bskum par legs par sbyar// g.yon pa 'tshogs
185b6(rgyud): mar bstod nas su// sdang ba kun la bsdigs par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang bya zhing // gnyis ka rdo rje khu tshur bcangs// khro bcas hUM zhes bya bas bgyid/
185b7(rgyud): bsnun pas bsnun par bya// rdo rje gar gyis bsgyur nas su/ rkang pa g.yon pa bkug byos la// de ltar phyogs bzhi rnams su yang // rdo rje'i mnan 'gros mnan par bya/
186a1(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// rkad pa'i gnas su bzhag par bya// ting spyad gnas la gnas nas su// mig ni thur ru ngas par bya/ rdo rje zung nus
186a2(rgyud): btab pa ni// sa 'og rnam bdun g.yo bar 'gyur// 'brug spang la 'dra'i tsu ldan ring // 'bar bar rdo rje 'chang 'ja bar// rdo rje gyen du gdag par bya// rgyab tu thal mo
186a3(rgyud): sbyar bar bya// de nas rdo rje gar bya zhing // lte ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya// 'di 'dra'i gnas la gnas nas su// tsham rnga ma legs par bslab par bya// sangs rgyas
186a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang // khro bo phyag brnyan bran mo yi// mtshon cha'i phyag brnyan ji snyed pa// rdo rje be con dbyug to dang // mdung thung mda' chen 'khor lo dang
186a5(rgyud): ka na ya dang gtun shing thogs// pho nya pho smos gang yin dang // bgegs la sogs pa rnam par bzlog/ phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan gang gsungs pa// bgegs rnams gzhig
186a6(rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan rnams kyis// spyi mi cho ga rgyas par ni// bslabs pa'i sngags pas lhar bcas dang // lha min gsang ba kun tu gnom// dkyil
186a7(rgyud): 'khor la ni bgegs bya'i phyir// tshangs pa'i sdong bur thug pa nas/ sa stengs gnas pa'i lha yi bar// gcig tu 'dus nas lcags gyur kyang // stang stabs cho ga
186b1(rgyud): pas rnanas ma sa kham pa pa yang sa kA su gyur
186b2(rgyud): pa'i me 'drar yangs nas su// rdo rje dang pa ldan par // rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gnam// rdo rjes gnor dang ldan par ni/ de rjes byag rgyas btsa nas su// sngag sa
186b3(rgyud): sa gsum phung byed na// bgegs dang log 'dzin spos ci dgos// bdag nyid chen po rdo rje'i rgya// stang stabs 'dun myi yin te// bsgrubs med don yang grub byed na/
186b4(rgyud): cho ga zhibs las 'byung ci dgos// rdo rje 'byung ba'i dam pa ni// thog mar bcing ba byas nas su// de nas rdo rje mchog rigs las// 'byung ba gzhan yang bcing bar bya//
186b5(rgyud): 'di las gsang sngags rnams dang ni// stang stabs rnam pa thams cad 'byung // de lta bas na rnam kun tu// sngags pas bsgrims te bslab par bya// dam chog chen
186b6(rgyud): bo rdo rje 'byung rtsa ba'i stang stabs so// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// seng ge bzhin du pha rol mnan// rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// rdo rje rkang pa brkyang bar bya/
186b7(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra skra ga cing // rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom nas su// sa rnams kun kyang gami 'gyur na// gsang dang klu rnams smos ci dgos// seng ge'i tshul
187a1(rgyud): #mchongs nas ni// bgegs dang seng ge'i gzugs 'dra dang // glang chen shing rta spre'u dang // gzhan yang gang dag rkang bzhi pa// de nas rnam par/
187a2(rgyud): 'bros pa 'am// 'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med// tshangs pas byas pa'i bgegs rnams kyang // skad cig de la myur du 'joms// seng ge ltar pha rol gnon pa'i stang stabs so//
187a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'dug ste// rkang pa bsnol ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ka ni/ rked pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya// hUM brjod mgul pa bsal ba'i sngas/
187a4(rgyud): rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing // rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas ni// de yi rtse mo sar btsugs la// rkang pa g.yon pa bte gnas ni// lag pa rdo rje gsor bcas par/ lag
187a5(rgyud): g.yon snying khar bzhag nas ni// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mer bsgyur nas// rdo rje nyi ma'i dmigs ldan par// rdo rje mgul ba bsal
187a6(rgyud): ba'i sgras// phyogs kun yongs su rgyas par bya// bgegs kyi gnas su dmigs nas ni// myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis// g.yas brkyang ba yis gnas nas te//
187a7(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom// de bzhin phyogs dang mtshams rnams kyang // kun tu yang dag gzhom par bya// bdud sde mi bzad chen po dag/ phyogs rnams kun nas
187b1(rgyud): 'byung ba kun/ g.yas brkyang gom pa'i stabs sbyar te/ rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kun tu gnom// sa gsum thams cad g.yo 'gyur na// bgegs dang log 'dzin spos cing /
187b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bltas nas ni// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // me bzang gzugs can srin po rnams// phyogs rnams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur//
187b3(rgyud): galas brkyang bya ba'o// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/ 'tshogs mar rdo rje thal sbyar te// rdo rjer bcas pa'i lag bskor zhing // sprin ltar yongs su khyab par bya/
187b4(rgyud): rdo rje gar gyi sa gar bya zhing // mchu ni so yis mnan par bya// khu tshur g.yon pa gdeg par bya// g.yas pa snying khar gzhag par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas su/
187b5(rgyud): g.yas rol du ni gtsu bar bya// 'brug sbra la ltar hU~M brjod pa// g.yon pa brkyang ba'i rkang gnas te/ rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya// g.yas pas la gzugs par bya/
187b6(rgyud): rdo rje rkang pas sa 'og tu// bsnun na thams cad g.yo bar byed// sa yi 'og na gnas pa'i klu// gsang dang lha min srin por bcas// thams cad gsos pa 'di ci zhes/
187b7(rgyud): ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i sems gyur nas// ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i snying gis su// 'di dag thams cad cir 'gyur kye// bskal pa zad par ma gyur grang // de skad phan tshun 'dri bar byed//
188a1(rgyud): #gnas de nas ni yang bskyod nas/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig ldan par/ rdo rje'i phyag rgyas hUM brjod de// rdo rje'i rkang pas bsnun par bya// klu dang gsang/
188a2(rgyud): ba thams cad dang // gzhan yang gang dag sar gnas pa// gang na sngags 'chang 'dug pa yi// gnas der thams cad lhags nas su// lung ni yongs su nod byed cing // rdo rje 'bar
188a3(rgyud): bas rab nyen pas// jo bo ci zhig tshol cig pa// bka' lung myur du dag cag stsol// bcud kyis len dang dngul chu 'am// 'on te mig bsku'i sman rdzas sam// gnod sbyin
188a4(rgyud): pho mos 'bangs su 'am// 'on te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam// 'on te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam// 'on te yul sa gzhan bzhed na// rdo rje 'bar ba sa gzir gyur pas//
188a5(rgyud): bzhed pa thams cad bskang bar bgyi// sngags pas 'ga' zhig blangs nas su// de dag la ni bsam par bya// rdo rje gar ni legs bya zhing // phyag rgya de ni bsdu bar bya//
188a6(rgyud): cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis su// rdo rje gnas su gzhag par bya// gzhan du nA ni gsang ba dang / srin po kun la gnod 'gyur te/ glags lha klan ka tshel byed pa// gzir ba de
188a7(rgyud): dag gnod par byed// glags su 'gyur ba rtogs nas su// sngags pa la ni gnod pa byed// de lta ba sa na rnam kun tu// blo dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa po sa// rdo rje'i gnas ni rig byas la//
188b1(rgyud): stang stabs bya ba sbyar bar bya// g.yon brkyang rkang pa'i stang stabs so// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// dpral bar thal mo sbyar bar bya// rdo rje gar na byas nas su// thal ma
188b2(rgyud): snying par gzhag par bya// tshangs pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// pad+ma'i thal mo rgyas par bya// gnyis ka khu tshur bcangs nas su// g.yas pagyen du bsgreng bar bya// g.yon
188b3(rgyud): pa snying khar bzhag nas su// hUM dang bcas pas khro bsgyings shing // sos ni mchu yang mnan byas la// rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan zhing / bzhin ni khro gnyer mi 'chang bas// gar byed
188b4(rgyud): pa yi tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yas pas bsnun par bya// g.yon pas kyang ni de bzhin bsdun// rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya yis// lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// gyen du bltas
188b5(rgyud): nas drag tu ni// rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas pa snun nas kyang // tshangs par bcas dang brgya byin bcas// gnas dang bcas par thams
188b6(rgyud): cad 'gul// phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing // grogs dag bskal pa 'khrugs gyur tam// 'on te sems can che 'byung ngam// 'on te sangs rgyas byung gyur tam/
188b7(rgyud): ci zhes thams cad phan tshun smras// myos ches gyur nas phan tshun dang / phyogs bcu dag tu lta bar byed// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir bas na// gnas de nas ni dong nas su//
189a1(rgyud): rdo rje ldan pa ci bzhed pa// gsungs zhes lung ni nod par byed// bdag cag nongs pa ma mchis shing // bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid ma lags// rdo rje 'bar/
189a2(rgyud): bas gzir gyur na// bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol// rdo rje can gyis rdo rje la// mig mi 'dzum par rtag tu lta// lha phal gzhan rnams de dag kyang // rdo rje 'bar ba sa
189a3(rgyud): brgyal gyur nas// rdo rje dam pa ldan pa la// thugs la ci dgongs bslang mdzod dang // gal te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam// de bzhin mi dang lha bzhed dam// lha yi bu mo brnyes
189a4(rgyud): pa dang // lha yi bde ba yid mthun bzhed// thugs la gang bzhed de rnams kun// de dag 'bul bar bgyid par 'gyur// de nas lha mang rdzu 'phrul che// de dag yid ni rab dag
189a5(rgyud): nas// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir ba dag/ sgrub pa po la myur du 'bul// de nas byams pa'i sems kyis ni// sngags pas bltas nas gtang bar bya// gzhan du na ni gzir
189a6(rgyud): de dag/ glags rnyed gnod pa byed par 'gyur// rdo rje'i 'byung bar yang 'dug ste// rdo rje gang ni rab tu bya// 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas
189a7(rgyud): par bya// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas pa bteg cing de bzhin g.yon// rdo rje'i khu tshur tshul gyis ni// g.yas babyen du bsgreng bar bya// g.yon pa snying khar gnag
189b1(rgyud): nas su// smin ma dgug cing bskul ba spyod de// mig gis bgegs la bltas byas la// hUM dang bcas pas rab bskul na// gal te tshangs pa nyid gyur tAm// nam/
189b2(rgyud): te khyab 'jug nyid gyur tam// drag po brgya byin nyid gyur yang // bltas pas myur du 'jigs par 'gyur// ci ste khyab 'jug drag po rnams// bdag gi dbang du
189b3(rgyud): 'gyur 'dod pas// kun tu spyod pa'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje nyi ma'i mig can gyis// rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya// rdo rje'i phyag
189b4(rgyud): rgyas bsnun pas na// sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yo// de nas brgya byin lha rnams dang // lha min srin po gsang ba dang // stan las nyams par bdag nyid kyis//
189b5(rgyud): ma shes shig ni nga rgyal bar gyur// de nas khyab 'jug drag po rnams// yid ni blong zhes gyur nas su// rdo rje rnal 'byor che ldan pa// ga la ba der thal sbyar to// bdag
189b6(rgyud): cag nongs pa ma mchis par// sngags kyis bdag cag shin tu gzir// gzir ba'i lha rnams de dag kun// stan las sems ni nyams par gyur// ji ltar
189b7(rgyud): bgyi bka' stsol ces// lus la gus par blta zhing 'khor// kun la byams pa byas nas su// snying la bsam pa gcig bslangs na// de yi med la de dag rnams//
190a1(rgyud): dga' zhing mgu nas sbyin par byed// sngags pa mnyam par bzhag nas su// de nas phyag rgya'i rgyal po gtang // rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su//
190a2(rgyud): rdo rje gnas su gzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i gnas ni rked gnas brjod// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// dbang po chen po'i gnas su brten//
190a3(rgyud): 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs byas la// gar byed pa yi lag pa yis//
190a4(rgyud): bgegs kyi gzugs rnams bsdigs par bya// de bzhin g.yas dang g.yon gyis kyang // gnas nas song ba'i bar du bya// de ste bgegs chen rab sdang ba// bsdigs
190a5(rgyud): kyang 'gro bar mi byed// rdo rje gom pa myur bor la// gyen du lag pa kun tu bskyod// lag gnyis sa la brdabs nas su// 'brug sma la 'dra'i hUM brjod la// gsang
190a6(rgyud): sngags blo ldan rkang bskum ste// rnam pa kun tu lus bskor ro// de nas ldang ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje'i lag pa g.yas brkyang la// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// bges
190a7(rgyud): rnams thams cad dgug par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul du ni// lag gnyis gcig tu sbyar byas la// 'brug smad la 'dra'i sku rnams dang / phaT rnams
190b1(rgyud): byas na rab thus te// rdordzag pa pa phyug mas// pagags rnams thams cad gapar ba / bad ga shegs ga'aphang ma gtogs papa/ dadza du 'dza/
190b2(rgyud): mtshan// sangs rgyas mas pa gang zhig gis// del lus la mi sems na// swa dang dri tho gsang ba dang // gzhan yang gang dag klu rnams kun// shing
190b3(rgyud): 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin// hUM brjod 'jigs 'gyur sngas ci dgas// lha min srin po ma rungs dang // yi dgas grul bum mngag gzhug dang / bdud dang bdud
190b4(rgyud): kyi bo nya rnams// 'di ltar 'gyur ba ci zhig spos// byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag cing // snying rje la yang mnyam bzhag nas/ byang chub sems dran sdug
190b5(rgyud): pa yis// phyag rgya bsdu ba brtsam par bya// nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir// bgegs rnams la ni gnod mi bya// shin tu sdang bar rig nas ni// gal te bgegs
190b6(rgyud): la gnod byen// shin tu sdang ba drag rnams la// 'jam des nyid ni mi bya'o// gal te 'jam des nyid byas na// de yi mod la gnod par byed// thog mar 'jam
190b7(rgyud): por sbyar bar bya// lag gnyis tshe ni dbye bar brtson// gsum po mchod yon thogs nas su// me tog snyim par gnas byas la// de nas bgegs la mchod par bya//
191a1(rgyud): 'byung po kun pan gtor byin nas// 'di skad kyi na chog brjod de// bdag gis de ring khyod mchod kyis// song zhig bgegs chen 'gro bar /
191a2(rgyud): phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ khyod kyi stobs dang rtsal mthong ste// khyod ni bgegs kyang byed par nus// khyod ni lha yi sprul pa ste// khyod ni bgegs byed mi nus min// sngon
191a3(rgyud): chad mchod pa ma mthong la// de ring bdag gis mchod byas te// mchod kyis da ni mchod khyer la// bgegs kyi dbang po song zhes brjod// gal te 'dug kyang bgegs min
191a4(rgyud): na/ de yi spyod pa bzang po yin// sngags pas mchod byas 'on kyang ni// ci ste bgegs ni yang byed na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang gyur pas// mi mchod rnams la
191a5(rgyud): mkhyen pa gsol// bgegs la chad pas gcad slad du// sbyor ba bgyis kyi nongs ma mchis// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' rnam
191a6(rgyud): kyi bka' dang bdag 'gal mi bgyid brjod// lha dang lha min gsang rnams dang // phyogs bcu kun gyi dri za dang // gza' dang mi 'am tso gang dag/ mgon po mgon po
191a7(rgyud): rnams la// bgegs kyis gtses pa bsgrag par bya// gal te cung nig bskyab ce na// myur du yongs su skyobs shig ces// bsgrags pa gang dag mnyan byas nas// bgegs
191b1(rgyud): byed zhi bar gyur na ni// de nas phyogs rnams thams cad kyi// lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya// gal te de ltar mi 'dug na// me tog thal mo mchod yon gyis// sangs rgyas
191b2(rgyud): la sogs rab bskul la// de la chad pas gcad par bya// drag po shin tu sdang sems pa// bka' lung las ni 'gal byed cing // srog kyang shin tu 'phrog byed la// sangs
191b3(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyang mi g.yel bar// de la phan pa shes nas su// bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// sems dmyal rnams su skye ba yi// sdug bsngal mang por 'dis 'gyur te//
191b4(rgyud): ji ltar sman pas sems can gyi// nad rnams gso bar byed pa bzhin// gzir bas bdag la nyes pa med// mkhas pa rnam par sbyangs pa yi// de ltar sems ni mnyam
191b5(rgyud): gzhag cig/ snying rje'i yid dang ldan pa yis// byang chub sems ni brtan byas la// de la chad pas gcad pa brtsam// ji ltar sman pa mkhas pa yis// nyes de yal
191b6(rgyud): bar mi 'dor bzhin// thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa yang // mi 'byed mkhas na'ang nyes dang bcas// ji ltar sman pa mi mkhas pa// thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis//
191b7(rgyud): nad pa yal bar 'dor byed cing // gso ba'i cho ga mi byed pa// de bzhin shes dang bral ba yis// gal te gso bar brtson na yang // thabs dang shes rab bral ba la//
192a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni bsngags mi mdzad// nad pa dang pa rnams man// spyad pas dza star skad byed pa// dpa' dang bskabasang /
192a2(rgyud): 'jig rten smod pa mi byed pa// de bzhin 'dul ba'i bye brag gis// ci rigs pa ni gso bar bya// sdang ba'i sems can rnams la ni// byas te sangs rgyas rnams mi spong/
192a3(rgyud): 'das pas dus na sngon byung ba// shin tu rmad byung rgyal ba 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i chos ni 'di 'dra ste// shin tu sdang sems drag po/
192a4(rgyud): yi// sems can thams cad de tshe byung // shin tu drag po mthong nas ni// 'jam po nyid du mi sbyor te// shes rab thabs kyi snying stobs can// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
192a5(rgyud): gshegs// rdo rje'i snying stobs zos gyur pa// sems can rnams la phan byed pa// de nas pha rol gnon pa yis// sems can khams ni du ma rnams// sdig
192a6(rgyud): med nan gyis stobs kyis su// thams cad dbang du dgod par bya// pha rol gnon pa'i rim tshul gyis// ji ltar byang chub 'dod byas nas// sems can khams ni du/
192a7(rgyud): ma dag/ thams cad dbang du dgod pa byas// rdo rje slob dpon chen po yis// log 'dren bgegs rnams de ltar dgod// byang chub sems dran pa sgrim byas nas//
192b1(rgyud): rgyun gyis gos par mi 'gyur ro// dpyir sngags pa che thos la// bskal par me yi mthu lta bus// rdo rje ma gra'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad
192b2(rgyud): gcad par bya// rkang pa'i tshul ni de nyid kyis// rdo rje'i gar gyi sa gar byas la// rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang zhes 'dor// rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas brten te/
192b3(rgyud): rked pa'i gnas kyi ral gri de// shugs nas phyung nas gdab par bya// rdo ba med pa'i tshul gyis su// shugs kyis lag pa sang bsdams la// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis
192b4(rgyud): su// ral gri 'phyar ba 'dra bar gzung // ral gri tshul du gzhug pa ni// mdzub mo gung monazhibs par bya// de nas lag pa g.yon pa yis// ral gri shugs su bya ba
192b5(rgyud): mthe'u chung dang ni srin lag dang // mthe bo sa ral gri shugs su bya// de nas rkang pa g.yas pa yis// sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te// sau yis
192b6(rgyud): mchu mnan khros byas la// bdag ni rdo rje'i gnyis 'bar bas// rkang pas mgo ni mnan byas nas// lag pas ral gri phyung nas su// rdo rje 'gro ba'i gom stabs kyis//
192b7(rgyud): gar gyi tshul du kun bskyod de// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par bya// rdo rje ldan de sa gang bcom pa// de ni srog la mi sems so//
193a1(rgyud): de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi 'gyur the tsom med// brgya byin mtshungs pa'i bgegs shig na'ang // de yi mod la rlag par 'gyur//
193a2(rgyud): de nas rdo rje slob dpon che// snying rje snying brtse'i sems ldan pas// ji ltar de yang skye 'gyur ba// de ltar de la snying brtse bya// rdo rje ral gri'i stang stabs so// de nas
193a3(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon ches// rdo rjes gtub par bya ba bas// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// gnod par sems pa thams cad gtub// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su//
193a4(rgyud): rdo rje mthu rtsal brtsam byas la// rkang pa btog cing gnag tshul gyis// rdo rje gor ni rab tu bya// 'khor los sgyur bar bya rim gyi// pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar byas la/
193a5(rgyud): rkang pa rnam par bzhag byas nas// sa la 'khor lo 'phang bar bya// rting skang gnas su 'dug byas la// 'brug sngad la 'dri'i hUM brjod de// thal mo brdob pa'i tshul
193a6(rgyud): gyis su// sa la 'khor los bsnun par bya// bzlog ste lan bur byas nas su// lag pa sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni// 'khor lo lta bur byas nas su// gyen du 'phang //
193a7(rgyud): la gzhig par bya// bkug ste rkang pas mgo mnan nas// bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya// 'on te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// yang na shi 'gyur the tsom med//
193b1(rgyud): de ltar rim pa'i tshul 'di yis// bgegs rnams la ni gnod pa bya// sdig pa'i gnod pa med par ni// bskul kyang bde bar mi 'dong ngo // gal te rdo rje sems dpa' /
193b2(rgyud): snying rje'i sems dang ldan gyur pas// bgegs la zhi bar bya 'dod na// tshig 'di mi tshul du bya// ba lang gi no lnga ba las// de 'dra ba yi gzugs byas la/
193b3(rgyud): sngags pas ni ba'i sems kyis su// sngags pas 'o mas bkrus nas ni// mod la snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur// de ltar kun tu bgegs rnams ni// kun la chog
193b4(rgyud): 'di bzhin bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni// gsang sngags rnams la sbyar bya ste// bcad dang gnod pa byas pa dang // bkag pa dang ni bcing ba'ang rung // gal
193b5(rgyud): te sgrub par 'dod pa ni// de nas snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur// 'on kyang gsang sngags rnams la ni// bye brag tu ni spos kyis bya// de ni ser mo'i 'o ma dang // yang
193b6(rgyud): namang gyi sbyin sreg bya// yang na brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyi// sbyin sreg gis ni kun ni 'gyur// zhi bo'i sems kyis zhi ba ste// dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa'o//
193b7(rgyud): drag shu la spyod lam gang yin pa/ de ni khros pas brtsam par bya// de ltar la sen ci rigs pas// gsang sngags rnams la sngags pas bya/ rnam pa gzhan du mi
194a1(rgyud): ste// las kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur// rdo rje 'khor lo'i stang stabs so// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su/
194a2(rgyud): 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas te// rdo rje'i gar ni rab tu byas// rting spang rnams kyi tshul gyis su// smin bsgyur rked pas reg par bya// lag pa gnyis kas sa la
194a3(rgyud): reg de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang // yid kyis bskor ba'i tshul gyis su// rkang pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// lag gnyis rked pa'i gnas bzhag la//
194a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i bgad pa rab byed cing // lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng bar bya// rdo rje'i mdzub mos rab tu bsdigs// hUM brjod bsgyings dang bcas byas la// rdo rje nyi ma'i mig
194a5(rgyud): ldan pas// rdo rje'i mdzub mos bsdigs nas ni// bdud kyi dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang // bltas pa de ni mod la 'bros// bya rog bong rdo 'phen mthong bzhin//
194a6(rgyud): rdo rje bgad pa'o// de nas rdo rje sngags pa ches// rdo rje'i 'byung bar byas nas su// mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa bsnol te khu tshur bcang // mthe bong byin du
194a7(rgyud): bsgreng byas la// gung mo gzhibs te bsgreng bar bya// mdzub mo de gnyis bral bsgreng // rdo rje kha zhes brjod pa yin// rkang pa g.yas pa brdeg par bya// g.yon pa gzugs shing rdo
194b1(rgyud): bzhir bya// rdorjem snyam ldar 'bab dgod pa'i khalar mngon sum bya// 'jug sa dal 'dra'i dru brjod/ kham zad kar gzhag / phyogs rnams dag thams dang
194b2(rgyud): rgya mtshab na mo chu 'thungs na// mig par snang bar gyur ba mo// snang ba gams thos ci dgos// de sar byas dmyigs ngan po// bran nas byung ba thams cad nam/
194b3(rgyud): tshuchub ma kun tu lce 'bab dang // sprin rnams kun nas 'du ba dang // rdo rje'i kha ni glal ba dang // gtor bas rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur// 'jig rten du ni lhas
194b4(rgyud): 'byung ba// kun nas gnas grub gang yin pa// sngags pa rdo rje me lce yi// me ltar bsgyur na de kun ni// rdo rje kha yi phyag rgya mis// bgegs rnams thams cad
194b5(rgyud): bca' bar bya// rdo rje kha glal ba'i gar stabs so// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor che// rdo rje ye shes bsgyur nas su// bgegs la gso ba byas na ni// nyes pa yo ba ma
194b6(rgyud): yin no// rgyal ba'i ye shes las byung ste// rdo rje slob dpon gas byed pas// bdag 'drar ba sngags pa de 'dra ste// bsngags pa tso 'drang rgyal de bzhin// sems
194b7(rgyud): can kun la snying rje dang // byang chub sems ni bsnun byas te// thabs kyis dam pa thob gyur nas// rnam par gso ba thams cad bya// gzhan du na ni phyogs rnams na//
195a1(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bsngags mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dang bral ban/ rnams mchod 'osam min no// thabs dang shes rab bral rgyas//
195a2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos dang // gang yang rang sangs rgyas dag ni// bka' 'grub gnas la gnas pa ste// bdag don phan pa'i sems ldan pas// de dag la ni bya ba med//
195a3(rgyud): thabs dang ye shes las byung ba// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can// byang chub sems kyi shing rta dang // byams dang snying rje'i kha bsgyur dang // sa dang pha rol
195a4(rgyud): phyin pa dang // bsdu ba bzhi yi rdo rje dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa dang // byang chub phyogs kyi rtsa lag la// brten nas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// sems
195a5(rgyud): can don dga'i brtse ba sa brtse// de ltar slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // thabs dang ye shes mkhas pa yis// sdang ba rnams ni thams cad kyi// sems ni rab tu gso bar
195a6(rgyud): bya// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas ni// rkang pa mthun pa'i gnas bzhag ste// rdo rje thal mo gzhum byas la// rdo rje'i gar ni byas nas su//
195a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng // g.yon pa kos skor brten nas su// gung mo dang ni mdzub mo gzhi ba// mthe'u chung mthe bong phrad par bya// g.yas pa lha yi ba dan gsum//
195b1(rgyud): g.yas brkyang rkang par gnas nas su// rdo rje bgad pa'i tshul gyis ni// kye mdag nyid rdo rje can// bdag nyid du ni bdag gnas so// hUM brjod snyems dang khros pa
195b2(rgyud): yis// rdo rje yid kyis gtang bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rjes bsdigs// rdo rje bgad pas bsdigs pas na// lha dang lha min gsang bar bcas// dkyil 'khor
195b3(rgyud): tshe 'am sgrub pa'i tshe// bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar bcing // gtsug nas byung ba nyid kyang ni// bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur//
195b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum zhes// bgegs rnams phan tshun smra byed cing // srung ba'i phyir ni de dag kun// lhan gcig dkyil 'khor drung du 'dong // rdo rje stang sa kyis bskul /
195b5(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che// bsod nams tshogs ni bsags pa la// gzhan rnams thams cad phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/
195b6(rgyud): pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul byas te// bskal pa'i me yi 'od 'dra bas// thal mo brdabs pa'i
195b7(rgyud): tshul gyis su// khros te lag pa phur bar bya// lag gnyis rdo rje'i tshul gyis su// mthe'u chung mthe bong spang byas la// g.yon pas kos skor brten nas su// g.yas
196a1(rgyud): bgyen du bsgreng byas la// Arbu rbu chu brjod de bskul ba yis// sngags pas ku tu smra mang brjod// rdo rje'i sman phyung bas na// sdang ba thams/
196a2(rgyud): cad phung bar 'gyur/ brgya byin tshangs dang zla ba sogs// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gza' gzhan yang // zlos pa tsam gyis sa g.yos te// kun tu smai yis sems kyang nyams/
196a3(rgyud): de tshe thal mo sbyar te 'dud// rdo rje snga chen gang na bar// thams cad lhan cig lhags nas su// rdo rje sgra yis gzir gyur te// stan las sems ni nyams pas na/
196a4(rgyud): mnga' bdag sug las ci 'tshal ba// bdag cag myur du bka' stsol ces// sngags pa la ni lung yang nod// sngags pas bsams te gar byas na// lha rnams myur du
196a5(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur// de nas byams pa'i sems bskyed la// brtul zhugs can gyis phyag rgya dgrol// rdo rje kun tu sla'o// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// rje
196a6(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas te// mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su// bsnol te khu tshur bcangs byas la// mthe bong gnyis ni gshibs
196a7(rgyud): te bsgreng // gung mo gnyis ni gshibs byas la// mdzub mo dbu ma'i tshogs bkug ste// gung mo gnyis la gzhar bar bya// rdo rje kha ni byas pas na// sdang ba
196b1(rgyud): thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// kha mi thad kar bzhag nas ni// rdo rje la yang 'byung bar 'gyur// bdag ni rdo rje chen po can// rdo rje'i ye shes stobs dang ldan// hri
196b2(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ rdo rje'i gom stabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje gnon pa'i gom pa yis// gzhag dang gdeg pas 'gro byed cing / phyogs rnams bzhi por brjod par
196b3(rgyud): bya// rdo rje sgra phyung bskul bas na// bgegs chen rnams dang bgegs rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang // de yi mdun du 'gro bar byed// rdo rje sgra yis
196b4(rgyud): bdag cag tshig/ rdo rje sgra yis bskul bas na// bdag cag rang gi gnas nas g.yos/ rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol// gal te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam/
196b5(rgyud): rgyal srid dngul chu mig bsku dang // kun nas gter rnams gzigs bzhed dam// bka' stsol cig ces de skad smra// dga' bar byin nas sgrub pa la// phyag 'tshal
196b6(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas dong // rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i slob dpon mthu chen gyis// rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya bcing // rkang pa
196b7(rgyud): pus mo btsugs nas su// lag pa gnyis ni khu tshur bcangs// gung mo gnyis ni bsgrengs nas su// mdzub mo gnyis ni ngos la gzhar// g.yas brkyang gom sta
197a1(rgyud): #/ byas nas su// myur du rdo rje gom stabs kyis// 'khrul 'khor kun la bsdun byas la/ sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya// lha min gnod
197a2(rgyud): sbyin rgyal po dang // srin po rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyang // thams cad rang gi gnas nas g.yos// bskal pa zad dam ji snyam sems// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na//
197a3(rgyud): sems ni blong zhes gyur nas su// ye shes rdo rje che ldan pa// ga la ba der nye bar 'dong // rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag tshig/ sngags pas dpal gyi sgo bzhad dam//
197a4(rgyud): 'on te dngul chu bcud len bzhed// rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol// smras nas kun gyis de mod la// yid la 'dod pa sbyin par byed// gal te lha dang lha ma yin//
197a5(rgyud): gsang ba bkol bar 'dod na yang // 'dod pas de dag lpags nas su// 'dod pa bzhin du las byed do// lung dang 'gal bar byed pa dag/ ci ste ma bcas mi 'ong na/
197a6(rgyud): slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas yongs ldan pa// so sa ni mchu mnan zos pa dang // me 'bar lta bur 'jigs rung bas/ myur du rdo rje'i gom
197a7(rgyud): stabs kyis// sa rnams kun la bsnun par bya// g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su// ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya// rdo rje
197b1(rgyud): phyag rgyas bsnun pas na// ha ha zhes ni de dag sba// stan las lus kyang rab tu nyams// lus ni me yis rab tu 'bar// rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po pa// gal ba der
197b2(rgyud): bar 'dong // skal pa chen po sa yongs su skyobs// bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol// lnga dang gsang ba lha min rnams// 'phral du bsgo ba'i lung bzhin byed//
197b3(rgyud): bsgo ba'i lung ni bsgrubs nas su// rang rang gi ni gnas su 'dong // de lta na ni lha dbang song // de lta ma yin mi gtang ngo // de nas bsgo lung bzhin byas nas/
197b4(rgyud): dag myur du gnas su 'dong // slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos// de nas phyag rgya gtang bya ste// rdo rje'i gar gyi tshul gyis ni// rked pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya// rdo rje
197b5(rgyud): tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje zhabs pa'i phyag rgya yis// sdang ba thams cad bcing bar bya// dus bzhin rab tu bskul byas la// gal
197b6(rgyud): te bsgo lung 'gal byed na// rdo rje'i lcags kyus dgug bya zhing // rdo rje'i zhags pas bcing bar bya// rdo rje rnam pa'i sgra'o// rdo rje thal mo btsum nas su// mthun
197b7(rgyud): pa'i stabs su gnas bya ste// lag pa rgyab tu bsnun byas la// rdo rje gyen du 'phang bar bya// de nas rdo rje la bltas la// 'brug sgrad la 'dra'i hUM brjod de// rkang
198a1(rgyud): pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa so// lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dang / mthe bong spang de zhags par bya// lag/
198a2(rgyud): pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis// rtse bkug lpags kyu brtan por bya// rdo rje rgyags pa'i mig ldan pa// so yis mchu mnan zos pa yis// gang la bgegs ni yod pa der/
198a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i stabs kyis myur song la/ rkang pa g.yas btung skabs byas te/ rdo rje'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya mas// bgegs rnams thams cad dgug bya dang / rdo rje zhams
198a4(rgyud): pas bcing bar bya// gal gte 'khor lo can dang ni// dbang bcas drag po tshangs bcas pa// gal te rdo rje 'chang srung yang // sngags pas gzhan nas drangs te
198a5(rgyud): dgug/ dkug nas rdo rjes bcings pa yis// rdo rje'i gzeb tu gzhag par bya// ji srid 'dod pa chags 'gyur ba// de srid bar du gzhag par bya// bsgo ba'i
198a6(rgyud): lung ni / gal te 'dod pa mardzogs na// bdag gi 'byor pa 'dod pa yis// de la chad pas gtsad par bya// de sa gzugs byas nas su// rdo rdza na
198a7(rgyud): pas gzor byas nas/ ha ha ha zhes sla byin cing // lha mi dbang po yang 'ong 'gyur/ de la bsgo ba'i lung yang 'jig rdo rje gang gyis de nas yang / thal mo
198b1(rgyud): shin tu sbyar byas la// dbang chen stabs kyis 'dug nas su// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa sngo/
198b2(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su// phar tshun bsnol te khu tshur bcangs// gung mo gnyis ni gshibs nas su// mdzub mo de la gzugs par bya// nga yi rdo rje phyag
198b3(rgyud): rgya de// bgegs rnams kun gyi dam tshig yin// snga ma bzhin du stabs tshul gyi// phyag rgya bgegs rnams bkug nas su// khro bo yi ni rdo rje 'dis// de la
198b4(rgyud): dam tshig sbyin par bya// rdo rje stabs kyis phyag rgya bcing // hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung la// bdag nyid rdo rje bsgyur nas su// bgegs rnams thams cad bkug par
198b5(rgyud): bya// lan ni smra bar mi byed na// de ni gtang bar mi bya'o// gal te cung zad mi smra na// de la chad pas gcad bya ste// shing gi dug dang star bu dang // yungs
198b6(rgyud): kar dag ni bsregs pa las// de yi gzugs ni byas nas su// me yi nang du bor byas na// gal te tshangs pas bsrungs na yang // bgegs de de yi mod la 'gro/
198b7(rgyud): sngags pas de la bsgo bar bya// de nas de la rgyas par bya// byams pa'i sems ni bskyed nas su// phyag rgya btang bar brtsams byas na// gzir dang bcing dang bkug pa
199a1(rgyud): rnams// thar nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // ye shes tshil rab gnog cing // sems can don la stong rje bas//
199a2(rgyud): rdo rje nyid du yang sbyar te// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje thal mo legs sbyar te// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya// gom pa sngo
199a3(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spro// lag pa gar byed tshul gyis ni// de nas thal mo yang sbyar ro// gom pa bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas
199a4(rgyud): phyogs bzhi rnams su bskor// rdo rje rengs byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par bya// myur du rdo rje gom pa yiso// phyogs rnams rdo rje rengs par bya//
199a5(rgyud): rtse mo brgyad pa'i lhun po che// rdo rje mtshan can bsam par bya// 'og tu lag pa rdo rje can// steng du g.yas pa'ang rdo rje can// rdo rje rengs byed rab byed cing // phyogs rnams
199a6(rgyud): kun tu bskor byas na// gang dag sdang ba'i sems ldan pa// bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par 'gyur// rdo rje rengs byed byas pas na// bgegs byed phyir ni 'tshe mi byed//
199a7(rgyud): de yi spyi bor rdo rje ni// legs par bkug nas bsam byas na// tshangs pa'i gnas la thug pa nas// sa 'og bdun la thug pa'i bar// rdo rje rengs pas rengs 'gyur te// rmongs shing
199b1(rgyud): sems kyang med par 'gyur// sngags pa mkhas pas 'dod par du// de srid ni rengs par byed// rdo rje tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// 'tshogs par thal mo sbyar/
199b2(rgyud): byas te// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas na// kun nas 'byung ba'i chu rnams kyang // sngags pas skam par byed par nus// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// rdo rje'i thal
199b3(rgyud): mo gzhum byas la// lag pa g.yas pa gyen du ni// zhags pa bcas par brkyang bar bya// de bzhin rkang pa g.yon pa ni// g.yon dang lhan cig gdeg par bya// de bzhin phyogs
199b4(rgyud): bzhi rnams su yang // gom pa 'dor ba'i tshul gyis ni// mngon du bskal pa'i me lta bu// so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis// 'og logs su ni mig bltas te// rdo rje'i
199b5(rgyud): gom pas myur song la// rkang pa g.yon pa bsku ma byas te// lhun po'i rtse mor gzhag par bya// 'og ma shugs nas 'byin pa'i lag/ g.yas pa steng nas de bzhin te//
199b6(rgyud): mchong ba'i rkang stabs sbyar ba yis// kha yi tshul du 'dug par bya// rgod ma rta yi kha tshul gyis// rgya mtsho'i chu rnams btung bar bya// rdo rje ldan pa bshad pa/
199b7(rgyud): yis/ bsam gtan sngags pa ldan gyur nas// chu ni ha ha ha zhes su// sgra 'byin nas ni 'du 'gyur na// 'bab chu dang ni chu klung dang // sprin las bya ba smos ci dgos// bskyod
200a1(rgyud): na gal te 'o ma yi// chu las byung ba'ang skam par 'gyur/ rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje'i thal mo 'tshogs mar sbyar// phyogs rnams kun
200a2(rgyud): tu rgyas byas te// sprin bzhin yongs su rgyas par bya// dbang chen gom stabs byas nas su// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yon pa gyen bteg ste// de nas
200a3(rgyud): sa la gzhag par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa bteganas su// g.yas phyogs su ni bskor bar bya// lag gnyis khu tshur tshul gyis su// rdo rje ldan pa g.yas pa bsgreng //
200a4(rgyud): g.yon pa mkhur bar brteg nas su// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor// de bzhin g.yas pa bzhag nas su// rkang pa g.yon pas yongs su bskor// g.yas pa/
200a5(rgyud): mkhur bar brten nas su// rdo rje ldan pa g.yon pa bsgreng // rdo rje gom pas myur song la// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i gom skyabs kyis// ti se'i rtse mor rkang bzhag
200a6(rgyud): ste/ rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni// lus ni 'dud pa byas nas su// rengs byed rtsa bar sbyor ldan pas// so yis mchu mnan zos gyur cing // bdag
200a7(rgyud): nyid me dang 'dra 'gyur po// stabs chen sgra yang che ldan pa// gtum po chen po pha rol gnon// rdo rje'i tshul gyis steng bskor la// nges pa mnan pa blang bar bya// sngags pa sngags
200b1(rgyud): la 'jigs med pa// de ni gang du khros par 'dod// rdo rje des mnan tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yon pa btsugs nas su// rdo rje mnan pas bsnun byas nas// dbang po chen po'/
200b2(rgyud): bye mar rlog/ rdo rje mnan pas bsnun pas na// sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yos// lhun po man dar ti se dang // khor yug ri rnams g.yo 'gyur na// lha min sgo lta spos
200b3(rgyud): ci dgos// rdo rje ldan pas bshad na'o// bsnun pas rnam pa brgyar 'gyur te// phub ma spar gang rlung gtor bzhin// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos// sa sbyang brtsam
200b4(rgyud): par bya ba ni// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// snying khar bzhag ste rgyas par bya// rkang pa rting pa spang nas su// lag pa gar byed sbyong ba dang // rkang pa gzhag pa'i tshul gyis
200b5(rgyud): su// g.yas dang g.yon pa gzhag par bya// rkang pa bskyod pa byas nas su// de nas rting pa yang sprad de// gar gyi tshul ni de nyid kyis// phyogs bzhir yongs su bsgo
200b6(rgyud): bar bya// zos pas dbus kyi gnas su ni// rdo rje gom pas myur song la// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// gung mos srin lag 'khyud byas la// gnyis ka khu tshur bcang
200b7(rgyud): byas te// rting pa spang ba'i rkang stabs kyis/ sa la gzhag dang bteg byas te// g.yos su yongs su brkyang byas la// bar bur thams cad gsal bar bya// me
201a1(rgyud): zhes ni brjod byas la// nang na gang dag ci yod pa// sngags pas thams cad bsal bar bya// hUM dang bcas shing phaT bcas pa'i// gsang sngags mkhas
201a2(rgyud): pas brjod par bya// 'og dang sa yi steng na ni// bar bur thams cad zhi gyur te// kun tu bgegs ni med gyur nas// sngags pas mnyam gzhag las rnams bya// de nas
201a3(rgyud): slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje gzhag pas legs bslabs pas// rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// tshangs pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar byas te/
201a4(rgyud): snying kha'i thad kar bskor bar bya// gar byed tshul gyis lag pa gnyis// rdo rje khu tshur bcang bar bya// g.yon pa g.yon du brkyang bar bya// g.yas pa g.yas su
201a5(rgyud): brkyang bar bya// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod la// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rdo rje gom pas myur song la/
201a6(rgyud): g.yas brkyang gom stabs tshul gyis ni// rkang pa gzhag pa'i tshul gyis su// de nyid kyis ni yang bskor ro// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la// de bzhin phyogs bzhi
201a7(rgyud): rnams su bya// rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pas na// bgegs rnams thams cad da bar 'gyur// rdo rje blo dang ldan pa yis// se bsdus 'dor bar 'dod na ni// gom pa
201b1(rgyud): gzhag pa'i sras kyis su// myur du gams pa byang byas la// gcig nor rab rjel gzhag/ cig shos tan na song gzhag/ de sar kang stabs gnag pa ni/ kun
201b2(rgyud): tu 'dor bar rang byed cing // saM 'og na ni lag pa g.yon// g.yas pas mi steng na te/ ha \u0f7f zhes ni sgra 'byin cing // 'jig rten khams su 'phen byed pa/ bgegs
201b3(rgyud): rnams gzhan lta smos ci dgos// logs 'dren sdang ba drag po rnams// mi yi 'jig rten 'di nas ni// gzhan du 'phen pa smos ci dgos// ci ste 'jig rten khams rnams
201b4(rgyud): kyang // kun nas tshig par byed 'dod na// rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'jug par bya// rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la// g.yas pa brkyang
201b5(rgyud): ba'i stabs tshul gyis// nyi ma bcu gnyis lta bur ni// lce yi 'phreng ldan bzod dka' ba// rkang pa g.yon pa brtan byas la// rdo rje 'dzin de lag pa bsgreng // lus
201b6(rgyud): ni btud par byas nas su// rkang pa g.yas pa bteg byas la// sngags pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rlung rnams kun kyang srung byed cing // nar mkha' me 'drang ba sgyur
201b7(rgyud): nas su// sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur 'jug/ lag na 'dzin pa'i rdo rje ni// kun tu ri rab 'drar ba sams la// hU~M zhes bya ba'i sbas gnon cing // rdo rje 'og tu 'phang
202a1(rgyud): byas na// ri dang nags su bcas pa yis// sa rnams thams cad 'khrug par 'gyur// de nas thal ba nyid 'gyur te// mer ni shing bal bcug

202a3(rgyud): pas bskor ba byas nas su// phyag rgya yi ni stang stabs bya// rgyab nas rkang stabs tshul gyis ni// dbus kyi gnas su phyin par bya// de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su
202a4(rgyud): yang // rdo rje bsnun pas brdab par bya// rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid dang // sngags pa blo ldan lag tshul gyis// sa rnams thams cad blang byas la// de nyid du na
202a5(rgyud): gzhag par bya// kun nas bsdu bar rab byed cing // mkhas pas gsang sngags brjod byas la// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa bzhin// sa rnams kun tu gzhag par bya// rim
202a6(rgyud): pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyis// mkhas pas thams cad kun tu gzhag/ de nas slob dpor rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje gzhag pa legs bslabs pas// snang ba lnga dang lha min dang /
202a7(rgyud): mi rnams gzhag bya gdul bar bya// bsam dbang bzhin du 'byung ba yis// rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pa// 'dul ba'i tshogs ni tha dad pa// thams cad rnam par
202b1(rgyud): gdul bar bya// gdung bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten ni// gdung ba nyid kyis grub par 'gyur// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// dpa' bos lnga po kun tu bya// mthun pa'i/
202b2(rgyud): rkang stabs byas nas su// g.yas brkyang stabs kyis mnan par bya// rkang stabs gzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'bem la lta zhing lag pa gtad// srin lag mthe'u
202b3(rgyud): chung sprad byas la// lag gnyis lu gu rgyud du bya// g.yon pa'i gung mo mtshungs par gzhar// g.yas pa yi ni mdzub mo de// brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni// gzhu dang
202b4(rgyud): mda' zhes brjod pa yin// gung mo yini brgyab logs su// mdzub mo mda' yi tshul du gzhag/ g.yas brkyang rkang stabs tshul gyis ni// hUM bcas brjod de phog par
202b5(rgyud): bsdun// gal te sa yi 'og gnas sam// tshangs pa rab tu gnas gyur tam// drag pos bsrungs par gyur kyang rung // rdo rje 'phang bar byas nas su// rdo rje mda' yis phyogs
202b6(rgyud): gyur na// de ni gsod par mi bsam mo// 'phang ba'i stang stabs so// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // thabs shes pa la mkhas gyur cing // 'phang ba'i tshul du legs
202b7(rgyud): bslabs pa// sdang ba'i sems can gdul bar bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje zhags pa'i legs bslabs pas// srid pa gsum la khyab lus kyis// bgegs
203a1(rgyud): rnams thams cad gdul bar bya// mthun pa'i rkang thabs byas nas ni/ rkang pa gzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni/ lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa
203a2(rgyud): gnyis// thal mo khong stong sbyar bar bya// de yi phyag rgya bcings nas su// phyogs rnams kun la bskor byas na// srid pa gsum yang 'gugs 'gyur na// log 'dren
203a3(rgyud): bgegs rnams smos ci dgos// dgug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar byas la/
203a4(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par byas// rkang stabs gzhag pa'i tshul gyis su// gnas ni myur du bzung byas la// rdo rje khu tshur snying khar gzhag/ khros pas hUM gi sgra brjod de/
203a5(rgyud): rgya mtsho bzhi po'i gnas rnams la// rdo rje'i lag pa'i bsnun par bya// klu skra thal mo sbyar ba dag/ rgya mtsho nas ni 'thon par 'gyur// gang dag sa yi 'og gnas pa//
203a6(rgyud): min gsang ba srin po rnams// bsgo ba'i lung la brtson yid kyis// ci tshol cig ces 'khor bar byed// rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag gzir// gnod sbyin mo 'am srin mo'am//
203a7(rgyud): lha min mo 'am klu mo 'am// bcud kyis len nam dngul chu'am// rin chen rnams sam rnor bu rgyan// dpal dang phun sum 'dod ldan nam// thugs la tsi dang ci bzhed pa// bdag
203b1(rgyud): cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/ sngags pas gang yang rung blangs te// gsang ba pa kun gtang bar bya// bsgo ba'i lung dang gal byed pa// ci ste bsgo yang mi 'ong na// rkang sa/
203b2(rgyud): tshul ni de nyid kyis// g.yon brkyang stabs kyis mnan par bya// lhun po la ni rkang gzhag ste// lag pas dbyug pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgra sgrogs cing ni thams cad nas// sa 'og
203b3(rgyud): thams cad mnan par bya// ha ha zhes ni sgra 'don cing // bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa// thams cad kyis ni bzung nas su// shin tu myur bar 'bul bar byed// sngags pas
203b4(rgyud): de gcig tshar gcad do// lhag ma thams cad gtang bar bya// bsgo ba'i lung la de bzhag la// mkhas pas legs par bslabs par bya// gsang ba srin po thams cad la//
203b5(rgyud): byams pa'i sems ni yang bskyed de// de dag dam tshig byin nas ni// de rnams kun tu gtang bar bya// // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las bam po
203b6(rgyud): bcu gcig pa// / de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // snying brtse snying rje'i sems ldan pas// mi dang mi min la sogs pa// shin tu gnod byed lha rnams la// lha min gsang
203b7(rgyud): bar bcas pa rnams// gzhan yang sdang ba'i gdon la sogs// nad sbrul dug la sogs rnams kyis// sems can rnams la gnod byed cing // dam tshig la ni mi gnas te// rgyags pa'i yid//
204a1(rgyud): dang ldan pa dag/ nad dang mu ge la sogs pa// sems can rnams la gnod byed de// pha rol la gnod mngon dga' ba// de dag snying rje med pa dang // bstan pa las ni
204a2(rgyud): 'gal byed cing // shin tu rgyags pa'i shas che ba// mthong nas de dag tshar gcad phyir// sngags pa mkhas pas sbyar bar bya// bdag la sdig par 'gyur snyam du// bdag nyid las ni mi sems
204a3(rgyud): shing // bdag nyid la min zhugs gyur la// gzhan dang gzhan yang phung byed pa// gzhan la gnod byed de dag la// sngags pas bzod par mi bya ste// skrag par bya zhing bcing
204a4(rgyud): bar bya// gtub par bya zhing gsad par bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas// nam mkha' go skabs med byas te/ rdo rje'i dbyibs su
204a5(rgyud): bsgyur nas su// gus pas sgrim bcas 'jo tshul dang // bzhin 'dzum rgyags dang ldan pa yis// rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la// lag pa bskyod pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyogs rnams kun tu/
204a6(rgyud): gar bya zhing // dngos dang mthun par gzung byas la// bsgo ba la ni sems gzhag cing // rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus sra bas// mi mthun rkang stabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje 'chang
204a7(rgyud): bas lag bsgreng ste// rdo rje mig gis kun bltas la// srid pa gsum po thams cad mnan// dpa' bo'i gnas su gnas nas su// rkang pa gdegs pa'i tshul gyis ni//
204b1(rgyud): rdzu brjod 'jigs pa 'jigs rung ba// mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba ste/ kha ni rgod maN+Da ma la// lte ba dga' bo nye dga' bo// stob rgya ma sbyor bsam par bya// kun po de mi mgo bo d+yA/
204b2(rgyud): bzhin lag pa khor yug ri// sa ni rkang pa gnyis yin te// nor rgyas bu sbrul gsang bsrel min// rlung na de yi na pa gnyis// de'i sgra rnams ma yinaH// lce ni 'jigs pa chen po'i grog
204b3(rgyud): ha ha ha zhes sgra chen ldan// 'brug sgra hUM zhes sgra phyung la// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su bskor// rab tu bskul bas de nas ni// rdo rje'i sgra yis brgyal gyur nas/
204b4(rgyud): dang dri za srin po dang // lha dang lha min sogs kun 'dong // hUM brjod pa ni 'jigs 'gyur zhing // 'chi bar 'gyur te the tsom med// rdo rje sgra yis tshig gyur cing // blong bar gyur te/
204b5(rgyud): dman par ste// rdo rje rnal 'byor che ldan pa// ga la ba der nye bar 'dong // rdo rje chen po bka' stsol la// sman chad de ltar ma mdzad cig/ de nas dam tshig bzhag byas la//
204b6(rgyud): rnams thams cad gtsang bar bya// rdo rje 'jigs pa gtum pa che// 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs bya rnams la 'jigs bskyed pa// chen pos mchod 'os rmad byung
204b7(rgyud): bas// mi dang mi ma yin rnams la// 'jigs chen lhas byung che 'byung dang // lha dang klu dang sha za dang // gza' dang ma mo brtse med rnams// nad dang mu ge la sogs dang // yul 'khrugs
205a1(rgyud): pa dang 'ching byed dang // bdud rnams dang ni log 'dren rnams// srul po srin po la sogs pa// bdag yul gzhan yul las byung ba'i// gnod pa gnan/
205a2(rgyud): yang du ma rnams// de dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyar bar bya// rkang pa rgyas par bya tshul gyis// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na// rdo rje 'jigs pa rab bskul/
205a3(rgyud): bas// thams cad myur du 'jigs par 'gyur// 'di ni don yod thogs pa med// rdo rje 'jigs pa mi bzad pa// sngags pas kun tu sbyor byas na// srid pa gsum yang dbang
205a4(rgyud): 'gyur na// mi yi 'jig rten mngag gzhug pa// byed par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// tshig gis cung zad bskul bas na// gang dag shin tu dregs ldan pa// srin po lha min gsang ba
205a5(rgyud): dang // de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas// dbang phyug kun dang yon tan 'thob// lha rnams kun gyi rgyal por 'gyur// mkhas pas dbang la 'god par/
205a6(rgyud): byed// klu yi gnas su klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin rgyal dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// lha min gnas su lha min dang // mkha' lding gnas su mkha' lding
205a7(rgyud): dang // mi ci rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// lha dang lha min mir bcas pa// bsgo ba'i lung bzhin gus sems kyis// rdo rje 'jigs sgra che ldan pa// de yi dbang du thams cad 'gyur//
205b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra chen po'i phyag rgya'o// kun la rdo rje rnam 'phrul ba// de yi 'og tu brjod par bya// dpal ldan mchod pa byed pa pos// phyogs bcu dgan bzhugs rnams
205b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnam pa kun tu mchod// srid par bdag nyid che rnams kyi// bsam yas mchod min gang yang med// 'dzum dang bcas shing mig rgyas pas// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon tshul gyis//
205b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i thal mo bcum byas la// phyogs bcu rnam pa kun tu gdung // dpral bar thal mo sbyar byas la// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs bskor zhing // dus gsum rnam par bzhugs pa
205b4(rgyud): yi// sangs rgyas kun la phyag bya'o// bde gshegs kun la phyag bya mchod// sems can gdul ba'i mchod pa ni// bsam pa ji bzhin 'dug pa ste// bsam pa tha dad sems
205b5(rgyud): can khams// bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phel// bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par rtogs// bsam pa chags byed de dang des// sngags pas rnam pa thams cad du// sems can
205b6(rgyud): khams mang gdul bar bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // kun la shes pa cher 'byung ba'i// stegs dang dpa' dang snying rje dang // bgad dang khros dang 'jigs byed dang // 'jigs rung
205b7(rgyud): rmad byung zhi ba rnams// bsam pa chags pa rnam dgur dgongs// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // kun la ye shes 'byung byed pa// rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni// gom pa mdzes dang /
206a1(rgyud): ldan pa yis// lag pags su dang g.yod pa na// gar byed pa la tshul gyis su// mdzub mo mtho bong rje spyad la/ sa na phyogs su ni blta par bya// gams
206a2(rgyud): drang gson pa sbyar tshul gyis// 'dzum byas rgyas pagus sgrim zhing // lag na rdo rje gsor ldan pas// rjes su chags pas gar bya'o// lha rnams kun dang gsang ba dang // lha ma yin dang
206a3(rgyud): mi rnams dang // 'dod khams dbang phyug bdag po dang // sa gsum gnas rnams chags byed cing // mig pur bzang dang ltab maso// de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// sa gsum thams/
206a4(rgyud): cad 'gugs byed na// sa stengs mi rnams spos ci dgos// lha mi rgyal po sogs bkug nas// sdom pa can gyis dbang 'jog ste// thams cad bsgo ba bzhin
206a5(rgyud): byed cing // mngag gzhug par ni rab tu dgod// rdo rje che ldan kun shes pas// rdo rje kuni brang bar bya// rdo rje'i gu yis bskul bsan/ rjes su chags shing chags
206a6(rgyud): chen 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar smras pa yis// gru dang gar ni rab tu bya// bsam pa chags pas brgyal 'gyur bas// sems can khams ni rjes chags bya// rdo rje'i klu ni 'byung
206a7(rgyud): ba ste// sa gsum dag na 'bar ba'i sku mnga' rjes su chags mdzad 'dul ldan pas// nyi ma stong phrag bcu pas rno ba'i 'od zer stong dang ldan pa'o// rnam mang cha byad gzugs kyis
206b1(rgyud): sems can 'gro ba rjes su chags mdzad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa mdzes pa'i stobs ldan gar mdzad gsol// shardza ba la sogs klu yis// rdo rje gar ni rab byas pas/
206b2(rgyud): sa gsum thams cad 'gugs byed na// sa stengs mi rnams spos ci dgos// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje nyid du yang bsgyur zhing /
206b3(rgyud): rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// thams cad la ni gar mkhan bya// gom stabs thams cad mdzes ldan par// g.yas pas dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pas gtang ba'i phyag rgya
206b4(rgyud): bya/ maug zur bgrang dang lta ba yis// lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis// 'khyud par byed pa'i sbyor ldan pa// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams ni// rnam pa kun tu dbang
206b5(rgyud): 'gyur te// mngag gzhug pa ni rab byed cing // rdo rje can gyi lung la brtson// rdo rje chags pas chags byas pas// shin tu chags pas dregs myos pa'i// lha dang mi dang gas
206b6(rgyud): ba pas// sgrub dka' rnams kyang sngags pas sgrub// rdo rje'i lus la yongs chags pas// 'dod chags thams cad yongs su dor// rdo rje'i glu snyan ldan pa yis// sems can kham/
206b7(rgyud): rnams chags par bya// rjes su chags pas chags pa'i phyir// lha rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje'i glu yis snyan pa'i sgra rnams thams cad dang // gzod nas rang
207a1(rgyud): bzhin dag pas rdo rje sems dpa' bskul// sgyu ma'i dngos po rnam mang dang // snyan pa'i sgra ni de nyid dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad kyis// dngang
207a2(rgyud): sgyur de nas sangs rgyas snang // 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dren// bdud rnams thams cad yongs su 'dul// shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyong // sems can thams cad
207a3(rgyud): yongs smin byed// glu 'di rab tu len byed cing // rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas na// lha dang gang dag gnod sbyin dang // lha min krur bcas thams cad 'grub// rdo rje'i glus ni 'dren
207a4(rgyud): pa'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpar yang bsgyur te// dpa' chen bsam pas kun chags pas// dpa' bo'i lnga po brten par bya// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas/
207a5(rgyud): nas su// g.yas pa brkyang ba pha rol mnan// g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng ge bzhin du basbyang bar bya// tshangs pa'i gnas la yang gnas te// rdo rje se gol sbyor ba dang //
207a6(rgyud): rdo rje bsnun stabs tshul gyis ni// tshangs pa la sogs bsdu bar bya// rdo rje'i glu ni len byed cing // sa gsum 'bar ba'i sku ldan pa// nyi ma bye ba 'bar mtshungs pa// nam mkha' mtshungs
207a7(rgyud): shing mnyam pa med// chos dang rgyal mchog rnams kyi gtso// sangs rgyas sku mchog de la 'dud// so yis mchu ni rab mnan cing // kun nas mig can khro gnyer bzhin// rked par rdo rje
207b1(rgyud): brten nas su// phyogs bcu kun tu blta bar bya// g.yas pa rdo rje tshul gyis ni// phyogs rnams kun tu rab bsgrags pa// lha 'jigs 'od zer 'bar ldan zhing // sreg pa'i bskal pa bzhin
207b2(rgyud): lta bu// grub 'gyur rdo rje me 'bar bas// 'jigs pa che ltar bzod dka' bas// bgegs rnams la ni sbyong bar bya// 'jig rten gsum po thal bar rlog/ nyes pa chen po ma yin la// phyag
207b3(rgyud): rgya 'di ni sbyar mi bya// thun mong ma yin dgos pa ni// tha ma'i tshe na sbyar bar bya// rdo rje 'chang bas bsrungs gyur kyang // hUM brjod pas na thal bar rlog/ 'jig pa'i me ltar bzod dka' bas// rdo
207b4(rgyud): rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas// snying khar rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis// bzhag nas 'di snyam bsam byas te// sems dmyal
207b5(rgyud): yi dgas dud 'gro dang // gang gzhan sdug bsngal sdug bsngal rnams// lag pa drang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba kun gyis bstabs par bya// bza' btung la sogs char pa dang // gos
207b6(rgyud): dang rin chen rgyan gyi char// de dag rnams la kun tu dbab// ci bder yang dag bstabs pas na// snying rjes spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhin// kun tu yongs su rgyas par bya// sems
207b7(rgyud): can kun gyis bla med bde// thob par shog cig bsam par bya// snying rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bya zhing /
208a1(rgyud): 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar bar bya// bteg dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nas myur du smad par bya// rdo rje bgad chen phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin du
208a2(rgyud): dgod// bgad pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nas lag g.yas bteg byas te// g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su gzhag/ g.yon brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su// de nas thal mo yang sbyar te/
208a3(rgyud): 'jigs rung sbra ni drag byed cing // thal mo sbyar ba btud par bya// 'jigs su rung ba chen po'i sgra'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas brkyang rkang pa'i stabs byas te// lag pa gnyis ni rgyab rol
208a4(rgyud): du// khu tshur gnyis ni bcang bar bya// bgegs kun da bar bya ba'i phyir// mgul pa nges par smad bya zhing // sgra chen rab tu brjod byas na// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba yis// bgegs
208a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad da bar 'gyur// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la// lag pa gnyis ka lto bar gzhag/ g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor/
208a6(rgyud): ba yis// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// ha ha zhes pas rab brgyan pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rgya che ste// ri rnams phye mar rlog byed na// sdang ba'i sems can ci smos te// sngags
208a7(rgyud): pa'i 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa gyen du bsgreng byas la// gdu bu'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de bzhin so yis mchu mnan cing // g.yon
208b1(rgyud): pa brkyang ba legs sbyar bas// bgegs rnams kun la bsnun par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni sgra chen te// bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar
208b2(rgyud): bas// thams cad bzlog par gyur pa yin// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag gnyis brang la bcar ba las// lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng byas te// rkang pa g.yor brkyang
208b3(rgyud): legs sbyar bas// tho ba yi ni phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'chang nyid yin na'ang bsdun// rdo rje thobs bsnun pas na// de yi mod la phye mar 'gyur// tho ba'i stang stabs so// g.yas
208b4(rgyud): dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang // lag pa mtshan khung gzhug par bya// nyi ma 'bar 'dra'o lta 'bar bas// hUM brjod bsnyems par thur du blta// lag pa rdo rje nyid bsgyur te// 'jigs su
208b5(rgyud): rung ba'i sgra phyung la// rgya mtsho man dang bcas pa yis// sa rnams thams cad g.yo bar bya// so yis mchu ni mnan bya zhing // rdo rje rkang pas bstan par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni leg
208b6(rgyud): sbyar byas// de dag thams cad nga bar 'gyur// g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs tshul gyis// g.yon pa brang la gzhar bar bya// g.yas pa/
208b7(rgyud): gyen du bsgreng byas la// mdzub mo myur du bsgreng byas shing // rdo rje'i sgra ni 'byung byas na// gal te sangs rgyas nyid gyur kyang // bgegs rnams thams cad bskyel bar bya//
209a1(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis bshad na'o// sdang ba'i sems can smos ci dgos// phyag rgya 'dis ni bskyod pas na// de dag thams cad da par 'gyur// mthun pa'i rkang /
209a2(rgyud): stabs byas nas su// g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la// lag pa thal mo brkyang bar bya// g.yon pa brang du gzhar bar bya// lag pas myur du bsdu na stabs kyis// hUM dang bcas
209a3(rgyud): pas sal bsdun// nam mkha' me 'bar 'dra ba yi// ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings byas la// bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya// rdo rje can gyis bshad na'o// mthun
209a4(rgyud): pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa 'og tu btang nas ni// rkang pa'i bar nas bzung byas la// de ni gyen du gdeg par bya// rdo rje hUM brjod sgra dang ni// khros shing khro gnyer
209a5(rgyud): bcas pa yis// rkang pa de yis yang bsnun la// de nas bgegs ni bsam par bya// rdo rje'i rkang pas bsnun byas nas// ri rab rnams kyang phye mar rlog/ rdo rje rkang pa'i stang
209a6(rgyud): stabs so// g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis// lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du brkyang // so yi sa mchu mnan khros pa yis// kun tu 'khor lo 'phang bar bya// phyogs
209a7(rgyud): rnams kun na gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams gzhig par 'gyur// zhig par gyur pa'i zhing rnams nas// rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyang 'byon// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu/
209b1(rgyud): 'phrul che// gang gzhan dbang ni thob gyur rnams// blong zhes gyur nas blo ldan pa// lag na rdo rje'i gan du 'ong // srog zad na ni mi rung gis// bu gcig nged kyis ci zhig bya// khyod/
209b2(rgyud): ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// nged kyis myur du sgrub bo zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pas// lung ni yongs su nod par mdzad// bskal pa'i me ltar gyur pa yis// g.yas brkyang
209b3(rgyud): rkang stabs byas nas su// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya legs sbyar bas// sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar bya// sa gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas// sngags pa rnams la rtag 'tshe ga
209b4(rgyud): bgegs byed ma rungs chen po pa// srin po sdang ba rnams skrag go// phyag rgya 'di 'dra mthong gyur nas// de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// de chongs
209b5(rgyud): par bsdun blangs la// sngags pas gyen du 'phang bar bya// de tshe so yis mchu mnan la// myur du gom pa gcig bor te// nges par bsnun pas bsnun pa'i tshe// srin po sdang ba
209b6(rgyud): bgegs byed pa// de dag thams cad phye mar 'gyur// rdo rje ngos bsdun phyag rgya yis// de dag thams cad bzlog par 'gyur// dbang chen gnas la gnas nas su// lag pa gnyis ni
209b7(rgyud): bsgreng byas la// lhun po'i rgyal po blangs nas su// lag pa gnyis su de bzhag nas// sngags pa la ni gegs byed pa// sdang ba'i sems can rnams la bsnun// bsnun pas rnam
210a1(rgyud): par phung 'gyur zhing // 'chi bar 'gyur te the tsom med// rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i sngags pa la// gang tshe bgegs shig bgegs byed pa// de tshe sngags pa stobs
210a2(rgyud): chen gyi// phyag rgya 'di la sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di la sbyar ba na// mthong nas de dag bar 'gyur// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslangs pas// rgyal ba kun la phyag
210a3(rgyud): byas nas// cod pan stabs kyi thabs bshad do// sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas la// lag pa g.yas pa 'tshogs mar gzhag/ g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su gzhag/ hUM zhes bya/
210a4(rgyud): ba'i sgra phyung la// 'brug sgra dal 'dra'i phyag rgya yis// phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis kyang // ngang pa'i rtsal gyi sbyor ba yis// lag pa
210a5(rgyud): g.yas pa bteg byas na// rgya mtsho rnams kyang bteg par 'gyur// ngang pa'i rtsal gyi phyag rgya'o// rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su// lag pa gnyis ni sar btsugs la// ha ha zhes
210a6(rgyud): pas rnam brgyan pas// sa gsum thams cad bteg byas na// rgya mtshor bcas pa'i ri rab kyang // thams cad shin tu bteg par 'gyur// man da ra dang ti se dang // gzhan
210a7(rgyud): yang gang dag ri rnams kyang // ha la ha la'i phyag rgya yis// bsnun pa de dag slar mi 'chags// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba dang // lag gnyis ni can khung gzhag/ hUM brjod
210b1(rgyud): bsnyen pas mar bltas te// so yis mchu ni mnan byas la// rdo rje'i cod pan phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// g.yon pa brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis
210b2(rgyud): de ma chen g.yon bteg ste// zos dang bcas pas rkang gzhag pas// sa gsum thams cad drang bar bya// drang ba'i cod pan phyag rgya'o// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/
210b3(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni bteg byas la// bgegs rnams thams cad 'ching byed cing // 'khor lo bzhin du phyogs su bskor// phyag rgya 'di la legs sbyar nas// de dag 'ching dang
210b4(rgyud): gzir bar 'gyur// bgegs rnams thams cad sel byed pa// rdo rje can ni nyid kyis bshad// bgegs rnams skrag pa'i phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor stan la 'dug nas su/
210b5(rgyud): rkang pa g.yas pa gdeg par bya// lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du bya// rkang pa gcig gis yongs su bskor// 'khor lo cong can phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad/
210b6(rgyud): bsgyel bar bya// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// me tog thal mo sbyar tshul gyis// de yi tshe na sa la gzhag/ de nas myur du yang gdeg go// 'dis mchod pas na sngags pa
210b7(rgyud): la// thams cad bgegs byed mi 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' lag na
211a1(rgyud): rdo rjel bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sangs bas so// ngabyang chub sems dang gyur pa bsas pa dpan
211a2(rgyud): gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la sa ngas thos kyis// de legs par rab tu na la med la drung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//
211a3(rgyud): de yis skrag par byas las bgegs// log 'dren thams cad gdung bar 'gyur// phyogs rnams kun tu 'bros byed cing // 'tsho bar 'gyur te the tsom med// lag gnyis
211a4(rgyud): phan tshun pa snol nas su// g.yon pa brkyang bar rab sbyar te// phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya'o// de nas rkang pas yang mnan to// skrag byed 'di ni skrag pa che//
211a5(rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa ste// skrag pas rnam par phung 'gyur zhing // 'chi bar 'gyur te the tsom med// de nas rkang pa'i tshul gyis kyang // mig ni thur du bltas
211a6(rgyud): byas la// lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng nas ni// g.yon pa brang la bzhag byas te// lag pa sa la brdebs pas ni// rdo rje'i thal mos bsnun par bya// rdo rje'i thal mo'i sbyang
211a7(rgyud): stabs so// rnal 'byor stan la yang 'dug ste// 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la// rkang pa g.yas pa bte gnas su// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor// 'di ni rlung 'tsho chen
211b1(rgyud): bo ste// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// gal te rnam 'thor rlung byung yang // de yang mi g.yo 'dug par 'gyur// rlung 'chang ba'i stang skabs so// gar gyi tshul la legs
211b2(rgyud): bslabs pas// rkang pa spo bar bya bas kyang // lag pa thur du spang byas la// lag gnyis mthe bong srin lag spad// g.yon pa brkyang la legs skur te// lag pagasas pas/
211b3(rgyud): gar bya'o// gar gyis bgegs rnams thams cad ni// shin tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur// dga' bas sngags pa de la ni// de dag phyin chad 'gegs mi byed// mthun pa'i
211b4(rgyud): rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng byas te// g.yon pa ral gri'i tshul byas la// gnyis ka gcig tu sbyar bar bya// gal te rdo rje 'chang gyur kyang // bgegs
211b5(rgyud): rnams thams cad drang bar bya// kun nas shin tu drangs nas kyang // de nas phyag rgya gtad par bya// rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings byas la// gnod par gyur pas kun tu yang /
211b6(rgyud): zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing // sems ni blong zhes gyur pa yis// blo ldan lag na rdo rje la// lung ni yongs su nod par byed// phyin chad bgegs ni ma byed ces// lag na rdo rje lung
211b7(rgyud): bsgo'o// rdo rjes gzing ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags pas ji lar 'dod pa bzhin// de nas song rje yang de skyed de// sngags pas mnyam par bzhag pa la/ me tag thal ma stsa
212a1(rgyud): nas su// de yi tshe na de dag la// gang tshe sngags pas mnyam bzhag tshe// khyed cag bgegs ni ma byed par// gnas su dengs shig brjod par bya/
212a2(rgyud): g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis kyang // khu tshur mchan khung gnyis su gzhag/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra ldan pa/
212a3(rgyud): sngags pa drag po'i las byed pas// phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas kyang // rdo rje gzir bas gzir bar bya// gzhan yang gang dag log 'dren bgegs// srin po gang dag
212a4(rgyud): dregs pa dang // rgod mA ha yi khar gnas pa// de dag thams cad gzir gyur cing // rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis// gzir nas de dag lhags 'gyur te// shin tu mi bzadang
212a5(rgyud): byed cing // srog zad gyur ni mi rung gis// ci 'tshal bka' ni myur du stsol// bsgo ba'i lung ni nod par byed// sngags pas ci 'dod de bzhin du// gal te lung ni nod byed na// de lta na ni thar/
212a6(rgyud): par 'gyur// gzhan du na ni nam yang min// shin tu mi bzad gzir bas na// khyod ni ci bzhed de bzhin du// bgyid kyis bka' lung stsal cig ces// de tshe de dag de skad smra// 'tshegs
212a7(rgyud): mar rdo rje thal bzhag nas// de nas de dag dam tshig sbyin// sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te// g.yas pa brkyang bas gnas nas su// rdo rje ral gri phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams/
212b1(rgyud): thams cad gtung bar bya// gtub pa byas pas de dag kun// de la snrubs su 'gro bar byed// snying rje ldan pa'i sems kyis su// de nas phyag rgya gtad par bya// snying rje'i sems
212b2(rgyud): kyis de dag la// ma 'jigs shig ces sba bar bya// sngags pa de yi 'dod pa bzhin// de nas de dag rang gnas 'dong // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis// thams
212b3(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag phyag rgya gsum yod de// gang ngas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bcom
212b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i rgyun gyi snying po las phyag rgya gsum thob ste/ bskal pa du mar de bstan pa tsam gyis bgegs rnams kyis nga la ma gtses kyis// sems rtse gcig
212b5(rgyud): tu bsgrims la nyon cig/ g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa g.yon pa snying khar gzhag/ g.yas pa gar dang bcas pa yis// 'tshogs mar legs par gzhag par bya//
212b6(rgyud): bgegs rnams rtag tu/ zhig pa yi// dam tshig 'di ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni bstan pa tsam gyis kyang // 'bros par 'gyur te the tsom med// phyir bzlog pa ni yang byas la// sa la log
212b7(rgyud): pabardab par bya// lag pa gnyis ni bteganas su// de tshe mkhur babud par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de tshe bgegs rnams bcom par 'gyur// rdo rje can ni nyid gyur kyang /
213a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcom 'gyur na/ mthong ba tsam gyis bgegs rnams kun// rung bar gyur pa spos ci dgos/ sngags pas gar phyogs bsdus 'jug la/
213a2(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa kun brten te// g.yon pa brkyang la legs byas la// g.yon pas thams cad dgug par bya// sa bcur gnas pa kun kyang dgug/ thams cad nas ni bkug nas su
213a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pa na// de yi mod la phye mar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje
213a4(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nga'i slob ma rnams ma gtogs pa khyod kyis su la'ang bsnyad par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can ma dang pade dag ni tshul 'di la yid mi ches shing de dag
213a5(rgyud): 'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smra bar gyur pas de dag gi rna lam du'ang bsgrag par mi bya na/ phyag rgya lta ci smos gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la slob dpon
213a6(rgyud): gyis slob ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes nas sbyin par bya'i/ gzhan du ni ma yin no// de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
213a7(rgyud): skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das gang slob dpon la brnyas par bgyid pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji la bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje sa dang
213b1(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig can ldam par 'gyur gyis desangs sunag/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pa 'od kyang 'ga' zhig brjod par byams/ dpa' bo ba rnams panyon cig mams
213b2(rgyud): sogs mi bad nga // dmyal ba gang dgangs bshad pa// de dag rnams kyi gnas su brjod/ dang ni bskal pa mtha' mas so// lta bas na rnam susaH// des nas 'ang nasam
213b3(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po slob dpon la slob mas ji ltar blta bar bya zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji lta ba bzhin du'o// de yi sems ni de lta ni// rtag tu dge ba skye bar 'gyur/
213b4(rgyud): de ni 'jig rten thams cad la// phan pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las stang stabs kyi rim par phye ba rdzogs so// /
213b5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes shin tu rgyas pa chen pos bdag nyid rgyas pa de dag gi tshig gi 'khor
213b6(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings yangs pa la dmigs nas 'jug cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du bdag byin gyis brlabs nas sangs rgyas
213b7(rgyud): 'byung ba mngon du byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi gsungs dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par
214a1(rgyud): zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis ye shes shin tu rgyas padag tu med pa'i don thugs su/
214a2(rgyud): chud nas/ de dag nyid na bzhugs bzhin du phyag brkyang ste lag na rdo rje'i spyi bor gzhag go// bzhag nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can chen po legs so legs/
214a3(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje rdzogs byed pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas byas pa gzo// sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/ dam pa gsang ba khyod kyis shod// gzungs
214a4(rgyud): sngags tshul du dgongs byos la// gang du zhugs ma thag tu ni// sdig pa thams cad med 'gyur ba// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bshad par gyis// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas
214a5(rgyud): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed de dag thams cad phyag slar bskums so// de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed ma sdig pa thams cad
214a6(rgyud): byang bar byed ma/ nad thams cad rab tu ni bar byed ma/ bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed ma phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed ma/ gzungs sngags chen po'i mchog
214a7(rgyud): smras so// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA he bud+d+ha ma ti ri/ sarba pA pa ni Sha Ni/ gardza gardza/ b+hany+dzaHny+dza/ mjamadza gam sder gam bI ra ha sa ha sa
214b1(rgyud): da ma sa/ gnas pa gnas drum pas/ nga gyu / rbaSh+Ta @rnas / gnag@#
214b2(rgyud): malas / ma 'ad nga/ pa ra rnas gzungs rdzogs mtshag 'di sasam pas 'das na med las can pa 'di 'phrul 'a
214b3(rgyud): ku 'ur rung ngo ro// rdeg/ rab tu ldeg go// lho phyogs mtho na dub phyogs dpa' 'o// byang phyogs bzod shar phyogs dma'a'o// nyi ma dang zla ba'angs la spyang ngo // rig sngags
214b4(rgyud): rnams kyang lhung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag kyang mog mog por gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de blong blong por gyur to//
214b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing gnas par gyur te/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sa 'khor de blong blong por gyur pa mthong nas de
214b6(rgyud): dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye grogs po dag khyed kyis ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po dran par gyis shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
214b7(rgyud): pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje'i gzungs 'di ni mthu chen po 'di yin na/ sgrub pa po gang la la zhig 'di 'dzin pa dang / yid la/
215a1(rgyud): byed pa dang / mam nga d+mor zungs par ga pa / das sa smras chu chubasapas dpa sma d+ham+b+ha/ smA
215a2(rgyud): ga ces smrams 'dum dpal gzungs 'di'i ma la/ sa sarbA / mdzu bgyings ma dpa gang gas legs ga
215a3(rgyud): dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas
215a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das des thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la 'di bzhin du gzhug pa'i phyir byin no// byang chub sems dpa' de/
215a5(rgyud): la byin ma thag tu de'i mod la gzungs 'di'i mthus spu'i khung bu thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams 'byung zhing zhugs te mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
215a6(rgyud): brlabs pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa gang dag gis kyang 'di ci yin zhes bstan pa mi nus so// de bzhin gsheg/
215a7(rgyud): pa'i gzugs de dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur nas gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
215b1(rgyud): chen po ro la 'od zer gyis dbang bskur nas su de nyid du bzhugs so// dargya'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs sngags chen po 'ang nyid kyi mthus so// de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gnod dung
215b2(rgyud): gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di srid ces sbas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi dbang por dbang chu
215b3(rgyud): ba yin na/ khyod kyis kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shod cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
215b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal don yod par grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gang dag
215b5(rgyud): gzungs sngags kyi tshul du gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag nyon cig/ de dag gang zhe na/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
215b6(rgyud): sar+b+bathA/ a ma ri a ma ri/ Ta ta/ b+hAny+dza/ dz+dza/ ma gyi maHs+phoT s+phoT/ matam ta/ durbAn+ta da ma ka swAH/ namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu'o b+h+yaHsarbaSh+Ta
215b7(rgyud): ni Ti kan ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta na ke/ bden de/ triT tra Ta/ hUM phaT hUM phaT/ gardza gardza/ ba ra ma ti/ ba dU ra ke swA hA/ na maHsarba te thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yAM/ sarba thA b+ha ga ba
216a1(rgyud): pradA pa mi trAm+b+ha sarbas pa ma kar dAnas pa sa ra/ AHd+hUrdza/ mtham tha/ dam dam/ Anas swAnas// sangs pa/ snangs sbyaras/ @
216a2(rgyud): b+ha te dza na tri ye swA hA/ na maHsirba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ gardza gardza/ ma tha ma the/ hA ma hA ma/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dur+b+hab+hi sa ra nir g+ho She ha na ha na/ bi d+hA na sa ya bid+hA nA sa/
216a3(rgyud): ya/ mo Ta ya ma~M Ta ya da ha da ha/ bi pu la nir+m+ma la nir dzA ti/ A ha ra A ha re/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha sa rU pa bi te mA bi lap+pa swAhA/ 'jam dpal gzungs chen po 'di ni de bzhin
216a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings dbang phyug ma zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/ byang chub kyi snying po ston par byed ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
