250b6(rgyud): thug pa// skyob pa thugs kyi rnam pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/ lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor rnams dang lha'i tshogs thams
250b7(rgyud): cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ gsang ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
251a1(rgyud): kha che'i paN+Dita tse lu dang / bod kyi lo tso ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// rdzogs so// @rgya ga rkang/
251a2(rgyud): du/ Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA tA la nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba'i rgyud/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
251a3(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sa 'og rim pa bdun gru'i rgyal po'i gnas na rin po che'i khri la bzhugs te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / rigs ldan la/
251a4(rgyud): sogs te klu rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang thabs cig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye bas
251a5(rgyud): 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang / lhas byung bas 'jig rten pa rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/
251a6(rgyud): 'od zer 'di 'gyur ba dang ltas byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa las grub pas 'bras bu'ang tshad med/
251a7(rgyud): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba las bslang du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye ste/ 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis
251b1(rgyud): brgyal ba las bslangs so// de nas 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ched du 'arjod pa/ e ma thabs cher thugs rje yis// 'jig rten thams cad brtul gyur na// thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer
251b2(rgyud): gyis// brgyal ba thams cad spangs par gyur// de nas 'jig rten pa rnams sa 'og rim pa bdun gyi klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'dus par gyur nas gsol ba btab pa/ sku gsung thugs
251b3(rgyud): kyi 'phrin las can// ston pa bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten rnams la phan gdags phyir// rdul bral chos rnams bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ badz+ra a
251b4(rgyud): b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra pA Ni hUM/ zhes gsungs pas snod dang ldan par byas so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khrugs so// shin tu yid 'khrugs nas kha g.yab cing brang brdungs te/ kye ma kyi hud
251b5(rgyud): bdag klu'i gnas dang ston pa ni 'jig rten pas phrogs pas 'jig rten pa brlag par bya'o zhes zer nas/ klu'i kha'i rlangs pas 'jig rten pa rnams la mdze'i nang btang ngo // de
251b6(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs ka'i dpal be'u las nad sel ba'i 'od zhal nas kyang badz+ra da ya zhes bya ba'i
251b7(rgyud): sngags dang bcas te byung bas me long la has btab pa bzhin du song ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis klu bran rnams bskul nas la la rtsa nas zhugs so// la la dbang po'i sgo
252a1(rgyud): nas zhugs so// la la rus pa nas zhugs pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rtsa nas zhugs pa/
252a2(rgyud): la dbugs kyis bsregs so// dbang po la zhugs pa dang / rus pa la zhugs pa sreg pa'i 'khor los bcom mo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams cher 'khrugs nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la
252a3(rgyud): snang ba re re chad nas lus la sri bas byang chub kyi sems dang ldan te rgyan du song ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis bstod pa/ 'jig rten 'di na klu yi rgyal po mthu che yang // bcom ldan pa
252a4(rgyud): spu'i brgya yi char mi phod// des na bcom ldan 'gro ba skyob pa la// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis rtag tu bstod// rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
252a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ ser sna'i dbang gis dbul gyur pa// nor rnams ji ltar bsku
252a6(rgyud): par bgyi// mdun gyi phyag na rdo rje mi// ye shes sems dpa'i phyag g.yas par// dzam+b+ha la ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid sngags kyi rgyal po zlos// snying khar 'od zer dag gis ni/
252a7(rgyud): ye shes sems dpa' bskul bar bya// ye shes sems dpas dzam+b+ha la'i// sngags ni zlos pa nyid du sgom// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas// 'od byung dzam+b+ha la bskul lo//
252b1(rgyud): nar gyi rgya mtsha gang bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba btab pa/ nyes pa shin tu phra rol// grags dang rnyed pa'i doran du // 'jig can/
252b2(rgyud): gnod byed sgrub byed pa// thog ser bzlog pa bshad du gsol// thog mar mchod rten sngon po rtsig/ rab gnas gzhung dang 'thun par bya// de yi 'og tu 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad lte bar
252b3(rgyud): bcas pa dri// rtsibs la lha srin snying po bri// kyA d+d+ha/ tsA d+ha/ ts+tsha d+ha/ shwa d+ha/ oM d+ha/ tsA d+ha/ dz+nyo d+ha/ stA d+ha/ dbus su sngags mkhan bri bar bya// de nas thod pa'i nang du gzhug
252b4(rgyud): thod pa mchod rten 'og tu mnan// snying po'i 'od kyis sngags mkhan dang // lha srin 'khor dang bcas pa dgug/ de la thun gyis brab par bya// 'byung po 'khrugs pa'i dus su ni// ston pa'i
252b5(rgyud): nga rgyal ldan pa la// mthe bong dang ni mthe'u chung la// hUM las phyag na rdo rje bskyed// mthe'u chung phyag na rdo rje yi// thugs nas phyag na rdo rje ni// zhags pa lcags kyu thogs pa spro// snying
252b6(rgyud): ni lcags kyus dgug pa dang // mgrin pa zhags pas bcing bar bya// mthe bong phyag na rdo rje yi// rdo rje las ni rdo rje spro// bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya// ba spu'i gshis na
252b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'phro// nam mkha' thams cad rdo rjer grub// yungs kar rdo rjer bskyed la bya ba// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag na rdo rjes// rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod/
253a1(rgyud): pa.e mtsho ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can rnams la phan don du// tshar gcad rjes gzung gsungs pa mtshar// dbul dang mi dgas gnas las
253a2(rgyud): thar// rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las// nor sgrub pa dang gnod pa bzlog pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje 'dzin la mchod
253a3(rgyud): cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btang pa/ klu dang gnod sbyin sa bdag gi/ mdze dang dbu chu ji ltar bzlog/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// mdo
253a4(rgyud): sdes ni las kyi rnam par smin pa mi bzlog la/ sngags kyis bzlog pa khyad par du 'phags so// de la klu zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa gti mug shas che bas chags pa dang zhe sdang yang
253a5(rgyud): ste/ gti mug gi dbang gis gnyid che ba dang / zhe sdang gi dbang gis skye ba bdun du mi gtong ba dang / chags pa'i dbang gis chags pa la gnas pa'i lus la zhugs nas mi gtong ba'o// klu
253a6(rgyud): gdol pa can gyisathong btsam gyis nang skyed do// rigs gsum ni rig pa tsam gyis nad skyed do// klu bran rnams ni steng sgo gsum nas zhugs nas lus kyi brgyad za bar byed do// byang chub
253a7(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ de rnams ji ltar 'dul bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das klu 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so//
253b1(rgyud): nA ga bi dA ra NA dzaHnA ga u ta sA da na ya dzaHsbyor ba gsum la legs gnas pas/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis 'gugs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'dul
253b2(rgyud): bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi dbugs las sngags 'di rnams phyung ngo // tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mA ti kra ma thA/ ha ra ha ranA g+ha nA ra
253b3(rgyud): pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da na ga hri da ya ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga mar+m+ma Ni Shi r+yan+d+ha nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ ngi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya ni/ 'jigs shing skrag ste brgyal bar 'gyur// snying khar yi ge hUM

253b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rtsa bzhi dgas nas zhugs gyur nas// rtsa rnams ni zhing che ba dang // steng sgo mi baM de rdul yang 'byung // rmugs dang gnyid kyi bdag nyid can//

253b7(rgyud): panar// de la chags pa mi spyad do// sa yi dbang po kun nas 'jug/ ba spu'i khu bud mar zhing 'gyur// phol dang sha bkra 'byung ba dang // rmi lam du ni byol song 'byung // rgyal
254a1(rgyud): po dang ni rtsa bzhir 'jug/ zo rangs mi dga' mngon shes sba// gnyid chung ba spu'i gshis kyang dkar// gu gul nag po bsten par bya// byang chub sems dpa' phyag/
254a2(rgyud): na rdo rjes gsol pa/ nad de 'tsho ba dang mi 'tsho ba'i rnam pa ji ltar lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ bsnyen pa mtshan ma thob pa yis// bdud rtsi lnga dang gla rtsi dang // 'bras bu
254a3(rgyud): gsum dang rma bya'i sha/ ril bu byas la sgal tshigs gzhag/ de yi bar du rma bya'i sgo// mdangs dang ldan na 'tsho bar nges// nag por gyur na mi 'tsho'o// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje
254a4(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la tshar gcad pa'i thabs du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags dang 'khrul 'khor sman dang sreg/ thabs ni rnam pa bzhi yin te/
254a5(rgyud): byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs// dbang bskur dam tshig ldan pa dang // bsnyen pa brtan par gyur pa yis// dang por sngags kyis bzlog par bya// snying kha'i sngags kyi rgyal po yis// rlung dang //

254a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg ste// zlum po khru gang kha dog dkar// kha khyer sor bzhir rdo rjes mtshan// gru gsum sor bcu kha dog gnag/ kha khyer sor gsum rdo rjes mtshan// zla dbyibs
254b1(rgyud): zla ba dmar 'jab// khru dog kha khyer de 'drar shes// ni ba 'o ma can shing gi/ gtum pa 'bigs par byed de'o// dbang yang zhi ba dag dang mtshungs// rgyun bzhag me dang rigs pa bya /
254b2(rgyud): ri las thab dang me lha bskyed// ni rgyas dbang pa bdud rtsi lnga// gtum pa dmar dang khrag dag dang / drug dang gu gul nag po dang // gzugs brnyan dag gis mchod par bya// 'jigs
254b3(rgyud): rten dbang phyug tshangs pa mchog gi sras// me lha'i rgyal po thigs dbang bskur zhing // shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad sreg/ 'jigs byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud
254b4(rgyud): gzi brjid chen po me yi lha// 'dod pa thams cad rab stsol zhing // bdag gzhan phan sogs la zhugs pa// tshangs sras mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud// mi yi thugs kar
254b5(rgyud): drag po ni// cho ga bzhin du bskyed par bya// sbyin sreg de dag 'brel ba yis// nor rnams thams cad ster bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan

254b7(rgyud): d+ha ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA ga uta sa da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI la bA sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pA rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn+d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha Na ya hUM phaT
255a1(rgyud): trA sar+b+ba ya ng+ku phaT/ ku d+hAH uHsA da nA ma hU~M phaT/ pre Ta pi shA \u0f7f bar+d+ha sha ka R+Sha ma paT/ ya/ sa pastA bi na sha kaR+Sha la hU~M phaT/ hasahas/ d+ha d+haramA r+yA
255a2(rgyud): pa mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+na bin+da sha ke rU ya hU~M phaT/ sarba shad+d+haM saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni raShA pa ya ti swAhA/ oM badz+ra a na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la d+hAr+m+ma
255a3(rgyud): kuru swAH/ nAr mad+hu paH/ pra hri~M ku ru m-i de sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis ni// lha srin thams cad brgyal bar gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ched du brjod

256b6(rgyud): dngos su 'byung // de nas mchod pa'i dam rdzas kun// bsgrub bya'o rdzas dang bsres byas la// gzugs brnyan byas la thod par gzhug/ mdo ngo gnod sbyin gzugs kyis mchod//
256b7(rgyud): oM yak+Sha mA ra ya mA ra ya/ a pra ti ha ba la pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ sarba sha trUM saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti mA ra ya tsit+ta la phaT/ des kyang grub par/
257a1(rgyud): ma gyur na// gzugs brnyan rdul la sbyin sreg bya// las skyes gzugs brnyan gong bur gzhug/ des kyang grub par mgyur na// oM yak+Sha mA ra la mA ra pa/
257a2(rgyud): nA sha ya nA sha ya/ tsit+ta la chad zad/ phyag na rdo rjes bsnun par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// nI laM ba sa nA ya phaT/ stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyug na

257a6(rgyud): phol dang / shu ba dang / skem pa dang / g.yan pa dang / dmu chu dang / gag pa'o// klu'i gnas ni sa 'og gi rim pa bdun no// klu bran ni 'dzam bu'i gling na'ang yod do// 'khor ni
257a7(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi dag gis// gtsang ma'i gos dag gyon nas ni// dkar gsum dag kyang bza' bar bya// sngags rgyal nyis 'bum bzlas byas la// dkyil 'khor tsan dan gur kum byugs// @
257b1(rgyud): 'dab brjod dri bya ste// bdag nyid lag na rdo rdu la// klu che brgyad kyis bskor ba zo// de la sogs pa bshad zin to// dkyil 'khor gyin nub phyogs su// klu mi gzugs gcig zlaraH/
257b2(rgyud): lte/ rin chen lnga'am gla rtsi 'am// mchod pa'i rdzas ni 'o ma sogs// dang po 'das pa'i mchod pa bya// spyan drang mchod dang bstod pa ni// chog bzhin du bya ba'o// klul spong bar hU~M /
257b3(rgyud): la// 'od zer rnam pa gsum dag gis// klu chen gnas nas dgug par bya// gzugs brnyan de la bstim byas la// mchod pa dag gis mchod par bya// gzugs brnyan g.yo ba 'byung bar/
257b4(rgyud): sdang ba'i lus la gzhug bya ste// dbang po brgyad nas gzhug bya ste// brgyad cha tha ma'i dus dag tu// 'o ma gla rtsi khar yis// lam ni drang por drang byas la// gong bu dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis//
257b5(rgyud): de la klu chen gzhug par bya// sgrub pa po yis gu gul sten// gzugs la phur bus gdab par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// lha yi rnam pa nyid dag la// spogs pa dag gi cho ga bzhin
257b6(rgyud): tad+ya thAM/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM/ nA ga bi dA ra NA/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+hA ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba sha trUM saM g+hA bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ tsI lAM bar d+ha ra badz+ra pa Ni rA dzA pa ya Shi/
257b7(rgyud): dz+haiM tsa~M mA ra ya phaT/ oM nA ga g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta yag+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta na phaT/ kI lA ya kI la ya/ hUM hU~M hUM badz+ra kI lA ya/ badz+rad tsA de A drA pa ya kA la bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya phaT/ nA ga bi nga?/
258a1(rgyud): 6/ nubs rgyas na / bswA sa pan+d+ha/ sngags 'dag sangs pa tsamachis khams gsus dganas pa sam na sa du
258a2(rgyud): brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das brgyal bsel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ a ba shagaspangs pas thams cad kyang dbugs 'byung zhing baN+Dal bas
258a3(rgyud): nas 'dar zhing thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'i// sngags dang ting 'dzin nus pa yis//
258a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzhal mi nus// rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las// klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas gtam rgyud bshad par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das
258a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang chen pos lha gnas rnam pa brgyad du rgyud thams cad bsdus nas ri rab kyi byang phyogs su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud gsungs so// de nas zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa'i sngag
258a6(rgyud): gsungs pas lha dang lha ma yin gyi rna bar song ngo // rig sngags 'tshang de rnams ngo mtshor nas bstod pa byas so// de nas gling gi snying por 'khor gyi snying po gnod sbyin gyi cha 'dzin pa/ byang chub
258a7(rgyud): sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byon nas mar gyi snying po dang 'dra ba dam pa'i chos rgyud thams cad bsdus so// nyid kyi las gnyis kyi bdag nyid can rgyud stong phrag brgyad cu'ang gsungs so//
258b1(rgyud): dngas 'dzag cad dug rang rgyu mas kyis bcad de gras brda rdzas sugasmras bral thams par byasas/ 'angs pa 'dus par byed pa zhes bya ba cing 'du la spyo swA kyus smra/
258b2(rgyud): 'ag ma bdud du byed so rjes gas rgyud gsungasas// rjes 'ag rgyu las/ sa kyim dus ba / de rjes dgag tung rdzogs /
258b3(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan pa d+h+r-i ba kar dang sgra bsgyur gyi la ci ba dge slong bya'i gdong pabargyad gyis bskur ba'o// rgyu ga
258b4(rgyud): skad du/ badz+ra thA ma~M trA~M rA dzA kalpa nAm/ bod skad du/ rdo rjes gsum du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'idang
258b5(rgyud): phyug po// shAka thub kyis ni rigs khro bo// phyis kyi rtog pa las byed// rtog pa'i bla ma 'di mchog bshad// lha dang sngags dang sbyor ba yis// rtog pas rtog pa 'joms pa'i lam// /
258b6(rgyud): rtag pa med pa'i rig pa yis// khro bo'i dbang phyug zhi ba brnyes// dang po phyag 'tshal de 'og tu// bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pas mdzes par byas// drag po'i gsu/
258b7(rgyud): pa blangs byas la// 'og tu dbyings kyi gnyis pas brgyan// de la zla phyed dang thig le// lnga pa'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni// drug pa'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang // bzhi pa'i bzhi pa yang de bzhin//
259a1(rgyud): / yang ni me yis bon dang // lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa ma// 'og tu me yis bon no// lnga pa'i dang po nyid dang yang // gsum pa'i rdzab lnga pa/
259a2(rgyud): la// dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa dang // de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la// gsum pa'i dang po mthar gzhag pa// 'di rnams rig sngags
259a3(rgyud): dbang byed pa// gang+gA klung bcu'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas khro bo byang chub sems// 'byung por bcas pa 'gugs mdzad do// rig sngags rnams ni lha nyid de// stong dang snying rje 'dres pa yi// lha
259a4(rgyud): 'di snying kha'i sbyor ba ru// legs par bzhag pa bsam par bya// lugs su byung dang bzlog pa yi// sngags 'di bzlas dang bri bar bya// oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT/ rig sngags
259a5(rgyud): 'bum phrag bzlas pa dang // yi ge re la 'bum phrag dang // de las lhag pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po yi bsam pa ni// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang // bskrad dang dbye rengs gsad pa
259a6(rgyud): dang // las ni gang gang 'dod pa des// snying khar sbyor ba rim bzhin sgrub// lus rtsa snying rjer ldan pa yis// rang lus lha dang bla ma la// phyag sogs bya ba sngon 'gro bas// rig pa'i
259a7(rgyud): khro bo bsgom par bya// dang por stong nyid rnam bsam so la// lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru// rang gi snying khar dbyangs yig ni// dang po las byung zla ba las// hUM yig sngon po rnam par/
259b1(rgyud): ma/ rang ga 'dus 'da'i 'ang thos nas/ semasas dris rnam pasapa te/ rdzu gyur kyang po bsgrub / rdzuya na ston par gyur/ sngon pazhin stod 'du byas la/
259b2(rgyud): mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba// rab tu dregs pas zos pa'o// ri bong 'dzin pa'i stong dur/ bde bar g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/ brgyad gnyis lon pa'i nyams tshul cad/
259b3(rgyud): drag cing khros pa'i ro dang ldan// zang 'gro brgyad pos skul brgyan// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// rang gis rdo rje bsdams pa de// bsnun pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa dang // gson
259b4(rgyud): ba bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can// na bza' sngon po'i sham thabs 'dzin// spyan mig dmar zhing mche ba gtsigs// dbu sna nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba// steng du bcings dbus cod pan
259b5(rgyud): ldan// zhal nas ha ha'i gang rgyangs ldan// khro ba'i bdag po 'jigs par byed// log 'dren la sogs 'joms mdzad pa// de 'drar bdag nyid rab bsgoms la// de nas bdag
259b6(rgyud): nyid snyoms 'jug pa// de yi snying khar nyi ma la// rang gi chos kyi yi ge las// khros pas yang yang spros mdzad cing // de dang lhan cig bsgo bar bya// sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa
259b7(rgyud): yis// de bzhin du yang dbang blang zhing // rdo rje hUM mdzad ting 'dzin gnas// gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing // 'od zer 'byung ba sna tshogs kyis// rims dang gdon dang
260a1(rgyud): dug sogs gza'// rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa dang po'o// // de nas spyan sogs skye mched la// hUM byung khro bo bsgom par bya//
260a2(rgyud): sku sogs gsum la rdo rje gsum// sgom pa 'di ni dbang byed pa'o// dang po zhi bas zhi bar bya// klu la sogs pa'i gzugs byas la// rang snying 'od kyis bkug la bstim// mchod sbyin
260a3(rgyud): bya ba snying rjes sbyin// 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang // mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang // pad chen dung skyong stobs kyi rgyu// dug rnams snying rje'i sbyor ba sa sbyangs// nag po dkar po
260a4(rgyud): sngon po dang // rang gi gnas su sbyar bar bya// yang na zhi ba'i thab khung du// klu yi sdig pa zhi bar bya// shin tu gnag pa'i rigs de la// mngar gsum chu yis gso bar bya// gang /
260a5(rgyud): zhig sdig can zhi mi 'dul// gnyis kyi sbyor ba'i rgyun gcod bya// khrag dang dug sogs rdzas dag la// rig pa bzlog pas bsgrubs nas ni// shin tu khros pa'i khro bo yis//
260a6(rgyud): dgug dang gzhug dang myos gsad dang // cho gas gdug pa dbang byas la// sreg pa la sogs la bya'o// brgyad dang bcu bzhi'i dus kyi tshe// skye rengs shar dang dmar rengs cha// nyin /
260a7(rgyud): mtshan zad pa'i dus kyi tshe// skra bkrol bcud 'dzag gcer bu ni// byol song gnas su khrag skyug go// lus dbus me 'bar bsgrub bya de// khro bo'i spu'i yi bu ga las// spros pa'i khro bo
260b1(rgyud): khros pa dang // mngag gzhug rnams kyis drang byas nas// rtog pas rtog pa bza' bar bya// sngar ni rdo rjes 'og las// gdug pa bza' bar byas tshul du// gdug pa 'dir ni bza' bar bya// mang du
260b2(rgyud): smras pas ci zhig dgos/ ma bcos pa yi sems can la// snying rje'i yid can rdo rje sems// til sogs rdzas dang sngags sbyor gyis// sdig pa ni byed sbyin sreg bya// rig pa'i blo can kun bzang
260b3(rgyud): gis// zhol bsreg bya rgyas pa'o// mi rtag gyur pa'i gdul bya la// 'dod chags yid can bde chen gyis// bdag nyid dgos pa brtan bya'i phyir// ut+pal dmar sogs kyis
260b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'o// 'dir ni ma rungs sdig pa byed// gtsor ni sbyangs phyir khro sems kyis// mngon spyod las ni rgyud kun las// bshad pa thams cad 'dir bya'o// rig sngags snying rje'i shugs/
260b5(rgyud): kyis 'gro// las ngan rgyun gcod bcos ma yin// las ngan dag pa'i rang bzhin du// khros pas dmigs par mi 'gyur te// sbyor ba rnams ni btsos mar 'gyur// byang chub bcos
260b6(rgyud): med 'bad spangs pa'o// rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gnyis pa'o// de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal po// sngar ni sprul pa bcu drug pos// rtog pa bcu
260b7(rgyud): phrag dang ba ni yang // gnyis kyis rig ma 'joms byed 'dir// sprul pa brgyad du bsdus pa dang // bdag nyid gcig pu bsgom pa'ang gsungs// nam mkha'i khams su 'byung
261a1(rgyud): bzhi bsam// ri rab lhun po'i hrI yig las/ pad+ma 'dab grangs lte ba la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// hUM las byung ba'i khro bo ni/ zhal gcig/
261a2(rgyud): phyag bzhin bza' sngo// rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu 'gengs/ sbrul dang mi sdug mgo sa brgyan cing // stag lpags smad dkris 'jigs sel ba/ khro bo rnam rgyal bsgom par bya// thug
261a3(rgyud): ka'i hUM gi sbyar ba yis// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs mtshams su// 'jig rten gsum snang rdo rje dang // 'jig rten gsum 'dul rin chen dang // 'jig rten gsum 'ching pad+ma dang // 'jig
261a4(rgyud): rten gsum 'jig las nyid dag/ g.ya sa rnams rang ming mtshan ma la// g.yon rnams gdug pa bsdigs pa'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil dang dbyug sngon dang // mi g.yo ba dang rta mgrin khro
261a5(rgyud): rje dang ni dbyug pa dang // ral gri pad+ma g.ya sa rnams so// g.yon pa gdug pa bsdigs pa'o// brgyad kyi dbus na khro bo bdag/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khrul pa skyong // dbyug pa nag sogs
261a6(rgyud): pho nya bani// sku mdog mtshan mas brgyan pa khros// lcags kyu la sogs sgor gnas pa// khro bo'i 'khor lo 'jigs sel bsgom// gtso bcas rig pa'i khro bo kun/ rgyu ma'i 'phreng
261a7(rgyud): pas do shal byas// gos sngon can la stag pags dkris// gdug pa sel ba'i lam du bsgom// de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gtso// khro bo'i mtshan nyid sngags bcas pa shad/
261b1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang
261b2(rgyud): 'tsham pa/ mig me dag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i ngabo can lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu dag po seral khar thogs pa/
261b3(rgyud): klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul 'bar bar rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/ bzhin rgyas pa smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/
261b4(rgyud): ya so sa ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ lce glog ltar 'gyur ba/ gsus po che sbrul za ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang
261b5(rgyud): ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la zhes sgrog par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag la khur ba
261b6(rgyud): thams cad rlag par byed pa// gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa
261b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho paM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dan nI lAM
262a1(rgyud): ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yaM ya sa mA ti kra ma tha mA ku lo ta sA da naM b+haM bi Sh+ya ti ta d+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha bi bud d+ha bi bud d+ha ka ma hI prAp+ta ta ra ha ra nag
262a2(rgyud): nAn/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ nA ga hri da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga da ma ni/ b+hi Shi r+yan+na nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga nA ya ni hUM hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA go ta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI
262a3(rgyud): lAM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tan+tA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta rU pa ya phaT/ ro Sha nA ya hUM phaT/ tA sa nA ya hUM phaT ku b+hAN+Da/ uta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ pre ta
262a4(rgyud): pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha a pa sma ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaTe/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nan bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/
262a5(rgyud): sarba sha hUM sa brtan bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab ste ga to ri na btang bar 'gyur ro// klu
262a6(rgyud): bzlog par 'dod na smug shad kyi lcug ma 'am bal po se'u'o lcug mas bya'o// yi dgas dang brjed byed rnams la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// rims nad med par bya ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa la
262a7(rgyud): ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// nor 'dod na zhag gcig smyung bar gnas te pog gis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston par 'gyur la/ gser gyi dong tshe bdun
262b1(rgyud): stong ster bar 'gyur ro// rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba la ni mar rnying pa 'am/
262b2(rgyud): thal ba 'am/ yungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// byis pa
262b3(rgyud): gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa mgul du brtags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sa sa bya'o// dug la ni rtswa ku shas byeb par bya'o//
262b4(rgyud): bdag srung ba la ni yid kyis sas chus bya'o// gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/ @
262b5(rgyud): bzhi 'am nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gsum pa'o// /
262b6(rgyud): rtog pa 'di dag dbang byed pa// lag na rdo rje khros pa las// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// bran g.yog rnams ni bskul bar bya// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/
262b7(rgyud): 'di ni bka' tsam nges pa spags cing // bai yig sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod// snying kha'i 'od kyis dbang bya zhing // gu gul dud pas drod byas la// ser sna chen po seng ge la zhon pa dang // /
263a1(rgyud): rmugs 'dzin dang / gangs pa bzang dang / nor bu bzang dang / ku be ra dang yang dag shes dang / 'brog gnas dang lngas rtsen dang / birtsi kuN+Da li rnams la/
263a2(rgyud): mkho ba sbyin par bya'o// 'di rnams rta la nibs pa la// 'od dang ldan zhing me long can// ras dkar gtsang ma sa gsal byas la// gsal snang kun ni bri bar bya// yang na kun kyang sbrul nag chibs/
263a3(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams// bskul ba dag par dbang byas na// mngon spyod las kun byed par 'gyur// drag po dgu dang nyi shu brgyad// sa gsum khyab pa spros nas ni//
263a4(rgyud): sngags grub stobs kyis bdag bran byed// dus tshod dus la mchod pa byed// de nas dbul bas 'jigs pa la// rmugs 'dzin sgrub pa yid 'ong ba shad// kun kyang gter rnams
263a5(rgyud): mnan pa la// rin chen 'bar bas khyim 'gengs pa// sbyor gang rdo rje chus 'grub 'gyur// pad+ma zla dang gter chen la// dzaM las byung ba'i gnod sbyin dgu// bkug la rang rang gsang sngags
263a6(rgyud): kyi sa// chu dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin dbul// 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa rnams so// oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swA hA/ oM pUr+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya sA hA/ oM
263a7(rgyud): oM ku be rA ya swA hA.oM saM pra dza~M nA ya swA hA/ oM gu h+ya d+ha nA ya swA hA/ oM piny+tsa kA ya swA hA/ oM pi tsi kun+da lA ya swA hA/ de nas yang dag spyod pa'i mchog/ lha li brtul zhugs dag
263b1(rgyud): pa ba shad// kun tu ras gtsang gos sngon byin gyis brlab zhing // bram ze'i rigs ltar dri can zas dang 'gro mgyogs sha las ring du 'dug/ smyung bar gnas shing chus bkrus dkar gsum/
263b2(rgyud): gtsang ma'i zas za zhing // ngag gi drung bsdams dang dang snying rjes yid brlan brtson par 'jug/ bsam gtan khang pa mdog ni sngo bsgyur ba po ldi badri zhim chu 'i sa byugs// dkar
263b3(rgyud): dang sngo ba'i me tog bkram la sku gdung bla ma mdun bzhag la// cho rigs btsun pa'i sgrub pa pos ni gos dkar bgos la ku sha'i stan la 'dug snying rjes khros pa'i rig sngags
263b4(rgyud): dam pa mdzes par bzlas pa bya// ru rag sha yi bgrang 'phreng brgya phyed byin gyis brlabs la lag pa g.yas pas gzung // ril bu re dang lha re sngags re bcas nas snying khar
263b5(rgyud): gzung // rnal 'byor 'di rnams spyad cing 'gro la 'jungs pa'i sems ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan la phan phyin rtog pa bshad pa yin// rdo rjes 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa
263b6(rgyud): bzhi pa'o// / dbyar kha skyes pa'i rtsa dang nags tshal las byung me mched ltar// rlung gi grogs byas bsregs nas thal ba'i lhag ma'ang ma lus bzhin/
263b7(rgyud): bskal pa dpag med skyes pa'i rtog pa'i dri ma'i rma rnams la// srung ba dang dang brtson 'grus sngags bzlas sems dag me yis sreg/ nyi ma'i snying po 'dzam gling dbus su rigs
264a1(rgyud): bzung ste// skye sa dang bud med dbang po skyon med tshul khrims can// skye ba snga ma'i lam shugs dag dang bla ma'i lung thob pa// dad dang snying rje'i sems can gtong /
264a2(rgyud): ba'i can blo des// rig pa'i khro bo bsgom dang de ni bzlas 'bad na// bstod dang mchod mnyes bran g.yog lha min gsang ba brnyas med cing // chu yi mchod sbyin 'khor lo gtor ma la brtson
264a3(rgyud): zhing // sbyin sreg rnams kyis lha dang bran g.yog mnyes byas na// ring por mi thogs sgrub pa po des rtags dang phyag rgya 'byin par 'gyur// 'dir ni mang du smras mi dgos//
264a4(rgyud): sngar ni rdo rje sa 'og tu// bshad pa'i mtshan ma ster bar 'gyur// zangs lcags bla ma'i gnang bya'o// lus sogs rig pa'i dbang gyur nas// me dang rlung sogs 'byung ba dang //
264a5(rgyud): nad dang gnod dang byad rnams dang // bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// me lce 'phreng ba'i rtog pa las// bshad pa'i 'chi ba'i sbyor byung na// ser sna 'di ni pha rol 'phang //
264a6(rgyud): smon lam lam sna la brten nas// 'di 'og byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'gro ba smin pa'i bla mar 'gyur// yang na srid pa'i bar mo dor// sngags kyi rnam shes gzi bskyed nas// /
264a7(rgyud): 'gro ban rig pa 'dzin gyur nas// de yi 'og tu sems pa'o// tha ma'ang lam la brten nas ni// rang 'dod dam pa'i lus rnyed nas// snga ma lam se la de 'og tu// dngos grub la ni
264b1(rgyud): rnam par gnas// lha dang sngags sogs rtogs pa des// rtog pa dman pa mnan pa yin// nam mkha' lta bur rtog med la// 'jig rten ngor ni rtog pas sprul// gdul bya sdang sogs//
264b2(rgyud): sems 'khrugs la// nga ni snying rjes sdang bar mdzad// khro sogs gsal du med gyur na// khro bor da ni ci phyir 'gyur// dang po rnal 'byor 'tshe ba bcom// de phyir rig sngags sbyor ba
264b3(rgyud): rnams// rgyud kun tu ni gsungs pa yin// 'tshe ba bcom nas dag pa ni// sems dag pa ni bde ba yin// gdug pa'i sbyor ba phrogs pas na// bde bar byang chub lam brten la//
264b4(rgyud): rdo rje sku nyid 'gyur med la// bdag gis rig pa'i ye shes de// lus can de yi 'bras bu'o// ji ltar shel ni 'dzam bu ka'i// me tog gis ni gzhan du snang // de bzhin rtog med rig
264b5(rgyud): pa yang // khro bo'i dbang phyug 'dir snang nas// ji ltar 'dul gyur sprul pa yis// rgyun mi 'chad par khro bor snang // snying rje med na 'bras bu nyams// 'grol phan btags gnod
264b6(rgyud): bsal na// rang sems dag pas 'bras bu 'grub// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgrib pa rnams// byang chub sems kyis ring du spang // 'dis ni 'khor ba 'jig par nges// brtan dang g.yo
264b7(rgyud): ba'i sgrib pa rnams// blo ma nyams dus na gnyen po dang // mi mthun nam mkha' ltar yangs pa// lhun gyis 'grub 'bras phye ma yin// ji srid rtog pa'i dri ma yod// de srid 'bad de rig
265a1(rgyud): pa bsgom// sems skyong snga ma rig pa yis// rgyud nyid du ni 'dod pa yin// gang la sems ni dri med pa// rtog pa'i dri mas nag por byas// de la spang ba//
265a2(rgyud): blo med pa// rtog pa'i blo can 'khor ba yin// de phyir shAkya'i rigs can rnams// sa 'og tu rgyu ba'i klu'i rtog pa la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i phyir sbyor ba rnams la gus par bya'o//
265a3(rgyud): rdo rjes gsum du rgyu ba las rtog pa lnga pa rdzogs so// / dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag khri srong lde btsan gyis bka' khrims su dpal dpe med lhun gyis
265a4(rgyud): grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra badz+ra dang ra byid lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// @rgya gar skad du Ar+ya
265a5(rgyud): nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA ni kalpa nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
265a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag ni rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa mig me mngag gi phung po
265a7(rgyud): 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ lhag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga'
265b1(rgyud): bo 'ab bas rnacha byas pa sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba zab bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa ya so sa mam chu mnan pa
265b2(rgyud): gshin rje'i cha byad can lce grog ltar 'gyur ba/ gsus po che sbrul za ba lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings
265b3(rgyud): pa a la la zhes sgrog par byed pa rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba klu thams cad rlag
265b4(rgyud): par byed pa/ gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrugs par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/ klu rnams 'ching bar byed pa la phyag
265b5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho paM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye i dan nAM lAM/
265b6(rgyud): ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha ma ku lo ta sA da naM/ b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mA ti kra ma tha ha ra ha ra nA gA nAn/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA
265b7(rgyud): ni/ b+hin+da b+hon+da nA ga marma ni/ bi shIr+yan+ta nA gA sha rI rA Ni/ ngi s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga na ya nA ni hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga bi dA rA NA ya hUM phaT/ nA g+ho ta sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT
266a1(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya hU~M phaT/ kr-itAn+da ya hUM phaT/ kr-itAn+da rU pA ya hU~M phaT/ ro Sha N+Da ma hU~M phaT/ tra sa nA ya hU~M phaT/ kuM d+hASh+Tha/ uta sA da nA pa hU~M pha/
266a2(rgyud): pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha a pa smar bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+hi ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA sha ke rA ya hU~M phaT/ sarba
266a3(rgyud): hUM saM brta bi nA shaMsha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ri badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab ste gto rin btang bar 'gyur ro// klu bzlog/
266a4(rgyud): par 'dod na spyug shad kyi lkugs ma'am bal po'i se'u'i lcug mas bya'o// yi dgas dang brjed byed rnams la skud pas bya'o// rims nad med par bya ba dang / gzhogs phyed
266a5(rgyud): na ba dang / yid ka 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// nor 'dod na zhag gcig spang bar 'jug ste pog por gyis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston la
266a6(rgyud): gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do// rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o// sgo lpags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad srungs
266a7(rgyud): la ni mar rnying pa 'am/ thal ba 'am/ yungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog
266b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// byas pa gdan gyis rten pa lan tshan snga lnga'i skud pa la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom dun 'phrog par 'dod nasas bya'o//
266b2(rgyud): drug pon rtsa rku shes byab par bya'o// bdag srung ba la ni yod kyis sas chus bya'o// gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de dag thams cadade la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsu
266b3(rgyud): mam/ bdun nam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ burtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchod rten su gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon pas
266b4(rgyud): mchod de/ sngags stong bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar
266b5(rgyud): gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi li tsa brgya brtson 'grus seng ges dpal na len dra'i sgo 'gram du bsgyur// rgya gar skad
266b6(rgyud): du.Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra tri lo ka bi na ya nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud/ dkon mchog
266b7(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi byang phyogs na lcang lo can gyi pho brang na bzhugs te/ brjod kyis mi lang
267a1(rgyud): #ba'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
267a2(rgyud): rnams la ma 'jigs shig/ ma skrag cig/ ma dngangs shig ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
267a3(rgyud): nas/ thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u la 'od zer kha dog gsum las grub pa 'od zer kha dog gsum po'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'jig rten gsum du bkye ste/ thams
267a4(rgyud): cad bkug nas slar yang 'od kyis snang ba byas nas/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da pa tsa duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra Na ya phaT/ tir+ya bi dA ra NA ya paT/ pre ta bi dA ra NA ya phaT/
267a5(rgyud): na li bi dA ra Na ya phaT/ na ra ga Na bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ de ba bi dA ra NA la phaT/ ces gsungs pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi lus gas nas sems shel sgong lta bur gnas par
267a6(rgyud): gyur to// sems yi ge gsum lta bur gnas te/ oM ni zhal gsum phyag drug ste// aHni zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// hUM ni rgyan dang bral gyur pa// rigs ni gsum du gyur/
267a7(rgyud): pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas rigs gsum du gyur pas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba// zhe sdang chen po bdag nyid can
267b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje rnyed dka' ba// bdag cag gis ni thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa thugs bskul ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// @
267b2(rgyud): pA Ni hrId yang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho ban nA ga a d+hi pa ta yai/ i dan nI lAM bar d+ha ra sha rI ra/ @R+Sha
267b3(rgyud): pA Ni hra da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ mA ku la/ uta sA da naM b+ha bi byA ti/ bstod pa 'dis bstod pas 'gyur ba bcu gnyis dang ltas bco brgyad dbyung bas/ 'jig rten gyi
267b4(rgyud): khams gzhan nas 'byung ba'i lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad skrag nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi'o zhes brjod do// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa'i bcom
267b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rang rang gi gdul bya rnams ma 'jigs shig/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje bzhugs pas 'jig rten mkhyen pa la bstod
267b6(rgyud): pa'i ltas yin gyis zhes gsungs so// rang rang gi 'khor dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis rang rang gi 'jig rten mkhyen pa la gsol pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ byang chub
267b7(rgyud): sems dpa' de lta bar 'tshal na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas rang rang gi 'khor rnams rang rang gi ston pa'i 'od la 'jus nas ri rab kyi steng na lcang lo can gyi pho zang
268a1(rgyud): gi nang du rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pabyon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de bstod pa byas nas/
268a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bstod pa yi// ngo mtshar ltas kyis 'dir mchis pas// 'jig rten du 'byung dka' ba yi// tshar gcad rjes gzung bshad du gsol// de nas bcom
268a3(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang skur ba mdzad do// a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes gsungs pas snod dang ldan par byas so// 'jig rten
268a4(rgyud): gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'
268a5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du phyag byas nas gsol ba btab pa/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ srung ba rnams
268a6(rgyud): kyi mchog gyur pa// phyag na rdo rje srung ba'i rgyud// zhe sdang gtso bos bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// zhe sdang kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso// 'bar ba drag po spyan la/
268a7(rgyud): pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// dbus su phyag na rdo rje bri// de mtha' mtshan ma nyi shu bzhi// rang dbus sarba duSh+TAM dang // sngo tshan da /
268b1(rgyud): po bco brgyad dgod// dbus mtshan lte bar ming bris la// de rnams phyag na rdo rje'i dbus// dbus ma'i phyag na rdo rje la// bstod pa'i sngags kyis bskor bar bya// rdo rje'i shuH
268b2(rgyud): bzhi la// klu 'dus sngags kyis bskor bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas
268b3(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung gis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra nA gA NAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+yain+da nA ga hri da yA
268b4(rgyud): ninib+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga mardza Ni/ bi shIr+ya tu nA ga shwa rI ra Ni/ bai s+pho Ta ya/ sngags des klu rnams skrag ste rang rang gi gnas su 'bros par chas pa las/ nA ga ya nA ni zhes gsungs pas lus mi/
268b5(rgyud): g.yo bar gyur to// de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ste rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo // phyi yi phyag na rdo rje la// lha srin sngags kyis bskor bar bya// gnyis la rigs
268b6(rgyud): kyi nag pos brgyan// rgyan dang cha lugs tshang ba la// dbus nas rim pa bzhin du bri// oM dang hUM mtha' pA ni'i sngags// 'phreng ba bsnams pa bri bar bya// oM gyis rdo rje
268b7(rgyud): lte bar mtshan// hUM gis shes rab lce la mtshan// phyi yi lcags ri dag la ni// thabs dang shes rang dag dang bri// bsgrub bya rdo rje lte bar bca'// gur kun gyis ni bri bar bya// mang po'i
269a1(rgyud): chos brgyad nas bzung ste// bris nas de nub nas bzung ba// bcu bani'i bar du bsnyen par bya// bco lnga'i nub mo sgrub pa ste// dkyil 'khor ma lugs
269a2(rgyud): ldan pa la// lha snam steng du pus btsugs la// cho ga bzhin du bskyed par bya// 'khor lo dag la gsang byas la// 'khor lo stong pa nyid du bsgom// stong pa nyid las hUM byung ste// de zhu ba las /
269a3(rgyud): rje ni/ badz+ra pA Ni sa lte bar mtshan// de las 'phro dang 'dus pa las// phyag na rdo rje'i skur bskyed la// de snying zla ba rdo rjes mtshan// rdo rje lte bar hUM mtshan las// 'od zer spros te gos sngon
269a4(rgyud): bsdu// de la mchod pa sna tshogs mchod// bstod dang bdun po byas nas kyang // 'od zer dag gis bkug byas la// rang snying rdo rje hUM la thim// de la mchod bstod sna tshogs bya//
269a5(rgyud): rdo rje dag las ye shes dam pa yis// me byung bas ni rdo rje zhu gyur nas// 'khor lo'i rnam par gyur par bsam// sku ni sku yi rnam pa ste// mtshan ma mtshan ma'i rnam par ro// sa de sdus pa
269a6(rgyud): kir ti dang // bsregs pa'i nang du 'khor lo gzhug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bstod pa/ sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// ston pa khyab bdag rdo rje
269a7(rgyud): 'dzin// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul ba yi// srung ba'i 'khor lo ngo mtshar che// 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las/ sa 'og 'dul ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// /
269b1(rgyud): de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyag na rdo rje rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab pa/ de nas/
269b2(rgyud): sngags snying kun 'dus pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ston pa dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// rig sngags gcod byed bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rig sngags gcod/
269b3(rgyud): gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// dang po bsnyen pa bya ba ste// mchod rten sngon po brtsig pa dang // ras ris la sogs bri ba ste// lce yi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// yi ge brgya pas/
269b4(rgyud): bshags pa bya// de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom// stong pa nyid las 'di gsum mtha'// yongs su gyur pas rdo rje ste// de la badz+ra pA Ni sa mtshan// lte dbus sngags
269b5(rgyud): la lnga spro bsdu// byas pas phyag na rdo rjer gyur// lha yi sku mdog rgyan la sogs// rtsa ba'i rgyud las shes par bya// bdag nyid thugs ka'i dpal be'u las// 'od zer 'phros pas bcom
269b6(rgyud): ldan bsdu// 'od zer gnyis pa'i rtse ma las// mchod pa rnam pa bcu spros te// bcom ldan tshogs la mchod pa bya// de nas yang dag bstod byas la// 'od zer gsum pas snying khar
269b7(rgyud): gzhug/ snying kha'i mtshan ma zla dkyil thim// badz+ra nyi shu gcig dbus gnas// de la sngags rgyal bskor bar bya// sngags ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// ming dang don dang
270a1(rgyud): spel ba dang // bzlas pa dag dang rnam pa bzhi// bzlas pa rnam pa bcu drug tu// rgyud 'di las ni rab tu grags// rdo rje yi ni bzlas pa dang // rin chen bad+ma/
270a2(rgyud): bzlas pa dang // las kyi bzlas pa bzhi po dag/ las bzhi po yi ni rang bzhin// rang bzhin rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang // drag po'i las dang zo chun rgyud// mgal me'i 'khor lo'i bzlas
270a3(rgyud): pa dang // mda' dang sbrul gyi bzlas pa dang // 'gog pa yi ni bzlas pa dang // sku bsrungs bka' nyan bzlas pa'o// khyab 'jug mdung dang tshangs pa'i gzhu// mar me lta bu'i
270a4(rgyud): bzlas pa'o// bzlas pa'i mtshan ma'i rang bzhin te// rtag tu lha rnams bum pa yis// dbang skur byed pa byung ba'am// yang na lo brgyad lon par byung // yang na me tog
270a5(rgyud): sngon po ste// ma byung dus kyi bsnyen pa bya// de nas bsgrub pa rtsom par bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// ni rgyas bsdus dang drag po ste// 'dir ni drag po'i gtso bo'o//
270a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyams su blang ba'o// bla ma lnga ru shes par bya// bdag nyid rgyan dang ldan pa la// shar gyi phyogs su blta byas te// cho ga gsum gyis dbyung ba'o// dpal be'u
270a7(rgyud): brdo rjer 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba la// bcom ldan cho ga bzhin du bskyed// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la// dpal be'u zhu bas ye shes so// mtha' ma skar/
270b1(rgyud): ma lta bu yi// rang bzhin dpal be'u hUM dang ni// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dkyil las// sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// de yi dbus su bsgrub bya gzhag/ hUM las bskyed pa
270b2(rgyud): phur bu ni// de yi lce las brten par bya// gu gul nag po'i spos kyis ni// de yi snga nas bdug par bya// sngags rgyal nA ga bor na sa ni// mAr dzi hri gzhug por bya// de ni rigs ngan thong bar
270b3(rgyud): gzhug/ mchod rten 'og tu mnan par bya// de steng dug gsum mgo bo ni// oM AHhUMdar dkar gcig gis pur byas la// rim pa dang por gzhug par bya// de steng rim
270b4(rgyud): pa lnga pa la// sha chen la sogs lnga po dag/ hUM trAM hrIHA a ra rog kha ru gzhug par bya// rim pa bzhi pa dag la ni// 'khor lo gzhug par bya ba ste// yaM las rlung dang raM las
270b5(rgyud): me// de ltar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// de steng nyi ma zla ba ste// 'khor lo dbus kyi lte ba la// dgra bo'i mgo bo thur bstan bri// de yi snying khar ming bri'o// 'khor lo yi ni rtsing
270b6(rgyud): brgyad de// rtsibs la sngags kyis bskor bar bya// ming las bsgrub bya hUM las ston// 'og gi las ni gnyis kyang bri// khra dang spyang ki la sogs pa'i// thod par gzugs
270b7(rgyud): brnyan bcug nas ni// yungs kar dag gis brab byas la// rang gi 'og tu mnan par bya// gu gul nag po'i spos dag gis// de yi snga nas bdug par bya// seng ldeng bur
271a1(rgyud): bu sor bzhi pa// gdab pa'i sngags kyis lce la gdab// rdo rje rgya gram dag gis ni// de yi bug pa bgag par bya// nya dang 'byung po'i nyi ma la// puphur/
271a2(rgyud): bu bskul zhing yungs kar brdeg/ de nas rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o ston pa khyad par 'phags// e ma'o thabs kyang khyad
271a3(rgyud): par 'phags// e ma'o 'khor yang khyad par 'phags// khyad par 'phags pa ngo mtshar che// 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las// sa bla 'dul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
271a4(rgyud): de nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ gsad pa las kyi 'khor
271a5(rgyud): ma 'di// sa steng 'dul bar bya ba phyir// rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas sngon pa rdo rje 'dzi// gsung na 'dis dka' stsal to// rdo rje sr-i dang
271a6(rgyud): smod pa dang // theg pa chen po spong ba ni// bsdus pa'i dngos por bsdu bar bya// de yang dbang du ma gyur na// khams gsum sems can thams cad ni// sangs rgyas su/
271a7(rgyud): ni bsams nas su// de yis gsad so mnyes pa bsgrags// zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje 'dzin// snying khe nas ni spros byas la// de yis srung dang 'jig rten lha// zhags
271b1(rgyud): bdag gis drangs nas ni// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ba sha dzaHmtshon cha dag gis bcad la sogs// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ klu li bzlas pa 'bum
271b2(rgyud): byas te// nya dang 'byung po'i nyi ma la// bdag nyid rgyan dang ldan byas la// rdzas dang sngags kyis bsrung bar bya// bzhi mdo lha khang dus nam byed// sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas byas te/
271b3(rgyud): de nas 'khor lo bri bar bya// steng 'khor 'og 'khor dug shing gis// dga' dang legs pa'i sems kyis bri// ras ma nyams la gur kum mchog/ dbus su phyag na rdo rje la/
271b4(rgyud): dpral ba snying kha lkog ma ru// yi ge gsum bkod sku gsum ste// rgyan dang cha lugs tshang bar bri// khor yug thams cad duSh+TaM bri// zhabs dang spyi bo g.yas dang g.yon//
271b5(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma dbus su ni// rgyal po bzhi yi mtshan ma bri// mtshams bzhir rdo rje gdan la hUM// khor yug la ni shes rab thabs// hUM las dam tshig sems dpa' la//
271b6(rgyud): ye shes spyan drangs mchog de zhu// 'og 'khor sbal nag yan lag lnga// snying dang drug tu ming rus gzhug/ phyogs bzhir rtsibs la mtshams bzhir thod// rtsibs dang
271b7(rgyud): thod kar ming rus te// khor yug gnyis la bstod pas bskor// sbal khar hI las 'od byung bas// sa bdag klu chen bkug ste mchod// mchod pa'i rdzas ni 'o ma sogs/
272a1(rgyud): de nas bsgral bya dgug bya ste// sku gsung thugs la legs gnas pa// ming dang rus la bstim ste gzhag/ thod pa las srin hUM las bskyed// de la
272a2(rgyud): sbyor ba legs par bya// klu la dam bdar mchod pa bya// phur pas phyogs mtshams gcad par bya// 'og ma'i phyogs su drangs na 'grub// de nas gsol ba 'debs pa rnams//
272a3(rgyud): ngo mtshar nas ched du brjod pa// rmad byung chen po chos rnams la// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la// kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar// de nas
272a4(rgyud): thog mar gyur pa'i 'khor rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa la mtho 'tshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gnod byed thams
272a5(rgyud): cad zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ oM badz+ra pA Ni hri da la gsungs pas/ gzhan nas byon pa'i ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs bskul nas
272a6(rgyud): tad+ya thAhUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ nA gota sA da nA ya phaT/ mI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya phaT/ kr-itAn+ta ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+na rU pA ya phaT
272a7(rgyud): Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa nA ya phaT/ kur+tha NA uta sA da nA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ lak+Sha a pasma ra ba nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA
272b1(rgyud): ral/ nA sha yan sha ya/ sarba bi sA bi rA sha ka ya hU~M phaT/ sarba shad+d+ha saM g+hA bin+Da sha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ nA ma spar d+hA ra badz+ra pA Ni dz+nyA pa la ti sAH/ gsungs pa tsam gyis dang po'i 'khor/
272b2(rgyud): rnams sdug par gyur te ched du brjod pa/ e ma'o ston pa byin rlabs che// e ma'o sngags kyi nus pa che// e mche ba'i nyon mongs che// 'khor rnams mnyam pa nyid du gnas/
272b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las sa steng 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gsum dang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas
272b4(rgyud): byon pa'i 'jig rten gsum po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas byang chub sems
272b5(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rje la rgyud 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di chongs shig/ lhogs shig ces gsungs so// yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
272b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kar dang / nu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// /
272b7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sap+ta ta thA ga ta dUrba pra Ni d+ha na bi she Sha bi sA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de
273a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po/ sangs
273a2(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yangs pa can du byon te/ yangs
273a3(rgyud): pa can na rol mo'i sgra can gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
273a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
273a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
273a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po blta na sdug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
273a7(rgyud): po bsam pa legs par rnam par sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs sangs
273b1(rgyud): po'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po chen po'i rtse 'dzin rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs/
273b2(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri drug stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
273b3(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas/
273b4(rgyud): te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po'i chos ston cing / chos kyi gtam gyis sems can rnams tshim par mdzadra/ yang dag
273b5(rgyud): par dga' bar mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stan las langs te
273b6(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
273b7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge sbyong dang /
274a1(rgyud): bram ze dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / khyim bdag dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa mang po dag chos nyan pa'i slad du 'dus shing mchis lags na
274a2(rgyud): de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te thos na ci nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang
274a3(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
274a4(rgyud): mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tanagod pa'i gnas rnams bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni//
274a5(rgyud): ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kyang dper na deng
274a6(rgyud): ngam sang gi ltar dgongs pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dang po byang chub kyi thugs yid la mdzad pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i sangs
274a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan par spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan chos ltar
274b1(rgyud): bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bcom ldan
274b2(rgyud): 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ka la bing ka'i sgra skad dang dbyangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes
274b3(rgyud): bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis snying rje dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sems can thams
274b4(rgyud): cad kyi don dang / sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i lha
274b5(rgyud): dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa ni yang legs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis khyod kyi spobs pa
274b6(rgyud): 'di skyes so// 'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin no zhes gsol
274b7(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
275a1(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
275a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ zham ring ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
275a3(rgyud): gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod do// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhes
275a4(rgyud): bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa/ thag grur dpag tshad brgya stong du ma yod pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ ngan song dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra
275a5(rgyud): med pa bud med kyi dngos po med pa/ tsher ma dang g.yang sa med pa/ ri dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa/ 'jam pa/ sa'i ngos reg na bde ba/ lha'i dri bsung
275a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ lha'i rin po che'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khris legs par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pa

275b3(rgyud): po de thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na des smon lam chen po brgyad rgyun ma chad par btab bo// brgyad gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam
275b4(rgyud): chen po dang ni bdag gang gi tshe ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang la la dag na ba'i nang

275b6(rgyud): gi ming yid la gnas shing / bdag gi ming lan bdun brjod pas/ de dag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rims dang sdig pa can
275b7(rgyud): gyi gdon rnams med par gyur cig/ rab tu zhi bar gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

276a7(rgyud): yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag gi mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing yongs su zad par gyur cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

277b7(rgyud): mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de'i thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ smon lam dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi gnas dang / sems can yongs su
