321b3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rlung dang char dus su ldang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur/ yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang nad med pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bar
321b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yul der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyur ro// ltas ngan pa thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//
321b5(rgyud): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
321b6(rgyud): dga' bos/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na tshe yongs su zad nas kyang mngon par skye/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyab grol
321b7(rgyud): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu yod par khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las ma thos sam/ de'i phyir sngags dang sman gyi sbyor ba rnams
322a1(rgyud): bstan to// sems can nad kyis btab pa la de nad tshabs mi ches kyang sman dang rim gro byed pa dang mi ldan nam/ yang na sman pa sman ma yin par byed pa'ang yod de//
322a2(rgyud): 'di ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang po'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gnyis pa ni/ gang dag rgyal po'i chad pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gsum pa ni/ gang
322a3(rgyud): dag ha cang bag med de bag med par gnas pa de dag la mi ma yin pa dag gis mdangs 'phrog pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzhi pa ni/ gang dag mas tshig ste 'chi bas dus byed pa'o// dus
322a4(rgyud): ma yin par 'chi ba lnga pa ni/ gang dag chus 'chi ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba drug pa ni/ gang dag seng ge dang / stag dang / wa dang / sbrul dang / gcan gzan khro ba'i
322a5(rgyud): nang du chud de 'chi ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba bdun pa ni/ gang dag ri kha nas g.yang du lhung ba'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad pa ni/ gang dag dug dang / byad dang
322a6(rgyud): ro langs kyi sbyor bas gsod pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu pa ni/ gang dag zas dang skom ma rnyed nas bkres pa dang skom pas nyen te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// mdor na
322a7(rgyud): 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba chen por bstan pa ste/ gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni grangs med dpag tu med do// de nas 'khor der gnod sbyin gyi
322b1(rgyud): sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis 'dus par gyur te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji jigs dang / gnod sbyin gyi rje dpon chen po rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyun 'dzid dang
322b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang /
322b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin dang /
322b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po de dag go/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po re re'ang g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum bdun 'bum yod
322b5(rgyud): pa ste/ de dag gis tshigs gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla nga
322b6(rgyud): rluR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la'ang ngan 'gror mchi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// des na bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas
322b7(rgyud): la skyabs su mchi'o// chos la skyabs su mchi'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o//
323a1(rgyud): bye brag tu ni grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang / gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/
323a2(rgyud): sman gyi blo bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa'i sems can de dag la bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa thams cad/
323a3(rgyud): las yongs su thar bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba phyin
323a4(rgyud): te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag gang gi phyir khyed bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dran la/ sems can thams cad la phan
323a5(rgyud): pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
323a6(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung
323a7(rgyud): bair gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' tha 'i phyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'dide bzhin gshegs pa sran gyi zla brgyana'i 'di kyi sngor gyi sngon lam gyi khyad par rgya /
323b1(rgyud): zhes bya bar zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing re ba thams cad yongs su stong /
323b2(rgyud): zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyis dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal
323b3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa
323b4(rgyud): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes
323b5(rgyud): bya theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa be ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas zhus shing
323b6(rgyud): bai sbyar te// ska gas rab cad kyis kyang bcas shing gtan la phab pa'o// rgya ka skad du/ ad+ya thAg ta n+yad+ha ma sna rnam
323b7(rgyud): b+ha na~M sa mA d+hi d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUrba'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la byas
324a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi gnas na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge
324a2(rgyud): 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi
324a3(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so// lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang me tog gi char dpag tu med pa bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun 'khor dang bcas pa'ang 'jig
324a4(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni bskor
324a5(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis
324a6(rgyud): yongs su skor bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
324a7(rgyud): dgongs su gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / nad thams cad bsal ba dang / re ba thams cad bskang du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
324b1(rgyud): gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi sngon lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs shad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gnom dur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'ja
324b2(rgyud): dpal legs so legs so// legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas shad de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la de de bzhin no zhes gsol nas bcom
324b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs dpal longs grags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
324b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang / zla ba dang / pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang dri med rin
324b5(rgyud): chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya
324b6(rgyud): mtsho'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi zlos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
324b7(rgyud): pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tsha
325a1(rgyud): lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras/
325a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma ltar rnam par snang
325a3(rgyud): byed la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba ltar rab tu bsil byed la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo//
325a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
325a5(rgyud): spobs pa brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta na mdzes
325a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
325a7(rgyud): chen po bsam pa legs par rnam par sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
325b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po sa sang po'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po'i rtse 'dzin rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa dgra bcom pa shA/
325b2(rgyud): ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i dge bsnyen chen po dpal tshangs pa dang brgya byin la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i
325b3(rgyud): dge bsnyen chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gsung dbyangs
325b4(rgyud): gcig gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pra ti ha ta b+he Sha dz+ye rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta hUM a
325b5(rgyud): g+hu me g+hu me i maM ni mi tsi/ ma ti ma ti sap+ta ta thA ga ta ke sa mA d+h+ya d+hiSh+Ti te/ a te ma te pA le pA paM sho d+ho ni sarba pa paM nAM sha ya / ma ma bud+d+ha bud+d+ho ta ta me/ u maM ku ma
325b6(rgyud): bud+d+ha k+Shi tra pa ri sho d+ha ni d+ha me ni d+ha me me ru me ru ka me ru shi kha re/ sarba a kA la mr-i t+yA ni wa ra Ne/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Ti te na rak+Shi tri me sarba de bA sa maM/ a sa me/ sa ma nA ha ra
325b7(rgyud): ran+tu ma/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA/ rag me sha me/ pra sha man+ta me/ sarba i t+yA padz+ra ba byA d+ha ya pU ra Ne su pU ra Ne/ pU ra ya ma~M/ sarba A sha ma bai nur+tha pra ti b+hA se/ sarba dA paM kA ya~M ka ri swAhA/ oM b+hi Sha
326a1(rgyud): #/ dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+re/ ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye d+h+we Sha dz+ye sa mud+ya te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa'i tshe snang ba chen po byung ste/ sa chen po'ang g.yos
326a2(rgyud): nas rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dag snang ngo // 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang spos dang bdug pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas legs so zhes bya ba
326a3(rgyud): gsol te lan bdun bskor ba byas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dag mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rgyal ba shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
326a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa des gtsang mar byas la
326a5(rgyud): phyogs gtsang mar 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas la/ sems can thams cad mchog tu snying rje bas sa ga la bab pa'i nya nas brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
326a6(rgyud): sku gzugs byas la/ tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga la smyung bar gnas pas gzungs 'di dag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'am/ stong rtsa brgyad dam/ stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur 'don cing /
326a7(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / mar me dang / 'phreng ba dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
326b1(rgyud): gsum du mchod pa byed na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sems par 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang / brgya
326b2(rgyud): byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / klu'i dge bsnyen chen po dag gis kyang yongs su skyong bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyis yang dag par srung bar 'gyur/
326b3(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad kyis mi btab par 'gyur/ ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ dus ma yon
326b4(rgyud): par 'chi ba thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/
326b5(rgyud): dgra bo thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/ ci bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan
326b6(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de'i
326b7(rgyud): phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi gzungs zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thag cing
327a1(rgyud): skyong ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
327a2(rgyud): stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de
327a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUR+Ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang
327a4(rgyud): su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba sa thi ling
327a5(rgyud): ga sar khang du skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// @dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
327a6(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM b+hai Sha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+re/ ma hA b+hai ShaH
327a7(rgyud): d+hai Sha dz+yeb+haM Sha dz+ye/ sa mung+ga te swA hA/ sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis btab pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ tri sa ma
327b1(rgyud): ya byA ha rA dza nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem/
327b2(rgyud): dpa' dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dbus dang mtha' med yon tan ri bo dpag med dang / mchod rten mtha' med mchod pa chen po'i mchog tu 'khrungs
327b3(rgyud): mchod chen 'phags pa'i 'phags pa chen po'i bdag/ dus gsum 'khrungs pa'i bde gshegs tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs
327b4(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rdo rje chen po'i snying po can/ rdo rje 'chang chen po nges par 'du ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par dgyes pas rnam par rol pa/ dbus
327b5(rgyud): dang mtha' med pa'i rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo mthon po can/ rin po che'i rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyu las gyur pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i pho brang chen po'i mchog na byang chub sems
327b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul chen po
327b7(rgyud): 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rgya chen por byed bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa 'di gsungs te/ na ma ste ya d+hi kAH
328a1(rgyud): ta thA ga tA nAM/ sar+b+ba dzA pra ti ha tra bAp+ti/ d+harma tA pA li nAM.aM a/ sam sa ma sa man+ta to// a nan+ta bAd+d+hi/ shA sa ni ha ra ha ra/ rdza ra s+phA ra Na / khi ga ta rA ga/
328a2(rgyud): bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma be laha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya/ ga ga na ma hA ba rA Na lak+Sha Ne/ dzA la dzA la na/ sA ga re swA hA/ de la rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni
328a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa/ sngags kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'dis
328a4(rgyud): las gang zhig byed par 'gyur ba de ni bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan par mi spyod kyi/ gzhan du mdor bsdus nas gsungs pa yin no// 'dis skyes bu dam pa de ni
328a5(rgyud): sgo mtha' yas pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i
328a6(rgyud): sgo sna tshogs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sems can 'dul ba'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba/ las thams cad rjes su dran pa'i
328a7(rgyud): cho ga yang dag par skyong ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur zhing / sems can gyi khams dang mos pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs sna tshogs pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro//
328b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / stobs sna tshogs mngon par sgrub par byed par sgo sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i mos pas snying po 'dra/
328b2(rgyud): bzlas na gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus na sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
328b3(rgyud): gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yang 'byin par 'gyur ro// gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa'i char yang mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro// sems can gyi khams
328b4(rgyud): cad du yi dgas rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba'ang mngon par rab tu 'bab par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba rnams kyi grang ba la dro ba'ang yang dag par skyed par byed do//
328b5(rgyud): dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar byed do// sems can mos pa'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i yul can gyi sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar
328b6(rgyud): do// byin gyis rlob par byed/ yongs su 'gegs par byed/ yongs su smin par byed/ rnam par 'dul bar byed/ nges par sbyong bar byed/ rab tu sbyong bar byed/ rnam pa
328b7(rgyud): 'phel bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ so sor 'god par byed/ rnam par grol bar byed/ byang chub kyi theg pa la lhag par 'jog par byed/ myur du lhag par 'dzeg pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i man
329a1(rgyud): ngag kyang ston par byed/ mdor na mthar gyis byang chub la gzhol zhing so sor 'god par byed/ dge ba sgrub pa la gnas pa skyed par byed/ sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs/
329a2(rgyud): pa zad par byed/ rnam par 'joms par byed/ rnam par sel bar byed/ 'dren par byed ka 'joms par byed mdor na sems can gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
329a3(rgyud): mdzad pa'ang byed par 'gyur ro// rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis 'dir
329a4(rgyud): yang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi don yongs su ma nyams pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sngags 'dzin pas dang por re zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
329a5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo byas so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnyed pa 'di nyid la dag nyid dad par bya'o// sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu 'am
329a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mos snga dro dang po la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/ bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba chos kyi
329a7(rgyud): dbyings su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag dbul bar bgyi'o// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de rnams kyis gang
329b1(rgyud): bdag la rnam pa thams cad dang dus thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa dang yongs su bzung bar gyur cig/ bdag la grub pa dang mchog stsol cig/ de nas sdig pa so sor bshags par
329b2(rgyud): bya ste 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug las skyes pa'i sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thu
329b3(rgyud): bskyed pa gang gis bshags pa mdzad pa'i sems bskyed pa des bshags par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa ltar/ des kyang ji tsam du bsha
329b4(rgyud): bar rus pa de tsam du bshags par bya'o// de nas bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/ gang dus gsum du shegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 1
329b5(rgyud): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa de
329b6(rgyud): ngag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba bla na med pas rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen pa ltar/ des kyang ji ltar rjes su yi rang bar nus pa
329b7(rgyud): de ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa'i bya ba bya ste/ sems can gyi khams na gang nga'i ba med cing yongs su gzung ba med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga de thams cad sangs rgyas
330a1(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchod pa'i 'phrin las kyis dbul bar bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi
330a2(rgyud): kyi stobs dang / bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang / rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mchog
330a3(rgyud): tu rgya che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog tu rgya chen po gong ma las bla mar mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rab tu 'bab par 'gyur ba ra ba sams pa
330a4(rgyud): 'am brjod la/ mchod pa chen po mngon par sgrub par byed pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM sar+b+ba thA/ ung+ga te s+pha ra na
330a5(rgyud): hi maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ji ltar mngon par bsngos pa ltar de bzhin du dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa de dag
330a6(rgyud): kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mkhyen to// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la yon tan dang / bsngags
330a7(rgyud): pa dang / grags pa sna tshogs kyi klu'i sprin rgya mtsho rab 'byams tshig tu brjod pa 'am bsams la/ 'di lta bu'i bstod pa dpe med pa nges par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyar so//
330b1(rgyud): 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ sar+b+ba tra saM ku su mi ta a b+hi dzA rA shi ni na mo stu te swA hA/ de nas de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'a
330b2(rgyud): la yon tan bsngags pa brjod pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur yang dad par bya'o// de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi sprul
330b3(rgyud): pa'i sprin sems can thams cad la migs pa las byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba thams cad myur du stsol cig
330b4(rgyud): pa 'am/ yang na sems can thams cad kyi zag pa med pa'i dge ba 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yang dag par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de dag gis tho ba
330b5(rgyud): par gyur cig ces de lta bu la sogs pa sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsams pa yid la byed pa'am ngag tu brjod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin mngon
330b6(rgyud): par sgrub pa'i rgyu dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po
330b7(rgyud): chen po 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe nAM/ na mo stu te ma hA badz+ra sarba satwa hi kaM ka ra/ tiSh+Tha sarba tra/ sar+b+be shAM d+har+m+ma NAM/ a d+hiSh+Tha ya~M swA hA/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di
331a1(rgyud): brjod pa tsam nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs kyis de dag gi sprul pa'i sprin rgya che ba mos pas mngon pa/
331a2(rgyud): bsgrubs nas/ mdor na sems can gyi khams su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzad pa'ang byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyis de dag
331a3(rgyud): la yang dag par dad par bya'o// de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' kho nas mkhyen to// de nas de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
331a4(rgyud): tshogs dang / rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa la
331a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa dang / bdag la grub pa'i mchog stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o// de nas sangs
331a6(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / dmigs pa dang / bzlas pa dang / nan tan du bgyid pa na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
331a7(rgyud): cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi dngos grub la sogs pa grub thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / dmigs pa dag la goms pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa'i snying po 'di
331b1(rgyud): ji srid skyong bar ma gyur pa de srid bzlas pa bzla bar bya'o// de'i 'od tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pas chos
331b2(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi don bla na med pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po'i sku yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
331b3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas ldang bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa rig pa rgya chen po'i tshul
331b4(rgyud): gyis mdo sde rnams mngon par mchod cing klog pa 'am/ tha na phyag byas nas zas bza' bar bya ste/ dang po zas la sngags 'dis lan brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas
331b5(rgyud): kham gyi dang po lha nyid la dbul zhing / de'i 'og tu zas bza' bar bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ oM ba l-i da te te dzo mA li ni swA hA/ kha zas
331b6(rgyud): kyis dub pa spangs nas kyang snga dro'i bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad phyi dro'i yang bya ba yin no// nyal na'ang yan lag thams cad kyi sa dang por sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
331b7(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas bstod de mal stan la 'dug cing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / bla na med pa'i
332a1(rgyud): dngos grub kyi mchog bdag la stsol cig/ rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba'ang gdab par bya'o// mtshan gyi da
332a2(rgyud): dang tha ma la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas dam pa'i chos 'don pa la sogs pa bya'o// sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des de bzhin du nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas dang byang chub
332a3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la dang por phyag bya ba dang / nyin re zhing bdag 'bul ba dang / de bzhin du sdig pa so sor bar shags pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon dang / da ltar bzhugs
332a4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba dang / sems can thams cad la rang gi bsod nams bstab pa dang
332a5(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam la phyag byas nas bcung ba dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa dang / tha na mchod pa byas nas dad pas snying po 'di bzla bar bya ba yin te/ ro 'am
332a6(rgyud): khang ngam khyim mam/ brang khang la sogs pa'i gnas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing bzlas pas/ sems can thams cad yongs
332a7(rgyud): su srung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis stobs bcu mkhyen pa'i sa don du gnyer zhing mngon par 'dod pas 'bum bzla bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub
332b1(rgyud): sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur zhing de'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs la sogs pa 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bzhugs pa'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ni byang
332b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa de dag gi bzlas pas cho ga yin no// gal te rig pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces yid la byed na/ bzlas pa
332b3(rgyud): 'bum yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum mamabacu bzhi'i nyin mtshan la gso sbyong byas la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas me tog gi gcal
332b4(rgyud): bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor la mchod rten nam/ lugs sku'am dam pa'i chos kyi glegs pa ma mdun du bzhag la ku sha'i khres po 'am/ gcal du bkram pa la 'dug pa
332b5(rgyud): 'am/ lo ma la nye bar 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchog slong bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba dang /
332b6(rgyud): dmigs pa dang / bzlas pa sa lcags kyi 'khor lo lag pa la thogs la/ ji srid du 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing sa chen po 'gul bar
332b7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing de dag gis kyang dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs su bsod nams
333a1(rgyud): ji lta ba dang / rang gi skal ba ji lta ba'i gnas rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa'ang 'thob par
333a2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ de la lus nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro// tha bas mkhas pa nyid kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyad kyang gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'khor lo
333a3(rgyud): rim pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rdo rje dang / mdung dang ral gri dang / rtse gcig pa dang / gtun shing dang / dbyig pa dang / sta re dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / gri gug dang / chu gri dang / lcags
333a4(rgyud): kyu la'ang ba sgrub par bya'o// thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing sems can yongs su srung ba'i blo can lus dang srog la ltos pa med pa thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba'i yid byed
333a5(rgyud): pas lcags dang / gser dngul dang / lcags gsum dang / tsan dan dang / rdo dang / tha na shing dang sa las byas pa'am/ ta la'i lo ma'i rang bzhin can las byas pa la sngar smos
333a6(rgyud): pa'i tsho gas gcig pu dben par 'dug ste 'bum bzlas pas bsgrubs na gong ma bzhin rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sdong ros sam/ lig bu mig gam/ ba bla 'am/ gi'u wang
333a7(rgyud): la sogs pa lo ma'i bar ram/ gos kyi bar ram/ lcags kyi kha sbyar du bcug la bsgrub par bya ba 'am/ gos sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig
333b1(rgyud): gi 'phreng ba la sogs pa rgyan rnams sam/ pad+ma 'am/ ut+pal la sogs pa me tog gi khyad par ram/ ska rags sam/ lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ 'khar gsil la
333b2(rgyud): sogs pa'i yo byad lag par chud pa 'am/ lo ma 'am/ gos sam/ zhags pa la bsgrubs na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ji snyed kyi grogs 'dod pa de snyed
333b3(rgyud): kyi grogs dang lhan cig 'phur zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa'i snying po 'di'ang bsod nams dang ldan pa'am/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pas kyang rung
333b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thabs dang ldan pa 'am/ thabs dang mi ldan pas kyang 'grub
333b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// mkhas kyang rung / mi mkhas kyang rung / nges par don yod par 'gyur ro// gzhan du dad pa med pa dang / byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams kyis ma yin no//
333b6(rgyud): bris sku med kyang rung / mchod kyang rung / mchod pa med kyang rung / khrus la sogs pa med kyang rung / phyi'i gtsang sbra spyod pa la sogs pa med kyang rung / 1sha dang sha dag la sosra/
333b7(rgyud): pam spangs kyang rung 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs pa gogs pa'i sems kyis 'grub bo// gal te bris sku la sgrub pa byed par
334a1(rgyud): #/ 'dod na/ thang ka la bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ri bo la rin po che'i pad+ma'i stengs na bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon lon/
334a2(rgyud): su 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pus mos btsugs nas pad+ma la bzhugs pa rdo rje dang bcas par thal mo sbyar ba ut+pa la'i lo ma'i mdog gam/ pr-i yang ku lta bu sngo bsangs sa ma ka gser gyi mdo
334a3(rgyud): can bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang cod pan can/ gos ser po gyon pa/ lag pa
334a4(rgyud): g.yon gyis lcags kyu yongs su 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'bar ba'i snying po can khros shing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba// gzhon nu zur bud kyis brgyan pa/ ming mtha' med ces
334a5(rgyud): bya ba'i tshogs a sho ka dmar po'i mdog can/ lag pa na gri gug dang zhags pa thogs pa bri bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa de'i 'og tu gzhon nu ma g.yon du zur bud gcig pa/ nag pa
334a6(rgyud): bsangs rol par gyur pas 'khor la dga' ba dang bcas pas lta ba/ gos sngon po gyon pa/ lag na me tog gi 'phreng ba thogs pa/ mtha' med ma zhes bya ba dran mo bar bya'o// 'dir
334a7(rgyud): yang bris sku la gzhan du'ang las de dag nyid dang / sgrub pa de dag nyid bya ba dang / rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba 'am yid la 'dod pa'i cho ga sbyar bar bya'o// dur khrod du
334b1(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'ongs nas lag pa nas bzung ste lcang lo can du 'dren par byed do// des rdo rje rigs kyi gzhon nur gyur pa thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa dngos po
334b2(rgyud): ral gri la sogs pa la bsnyen pa byas pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rgya mtshar zhugs nas 'bum bzlas makru'i rgyal po rgya mtsha'i gnas su phyin par 'gyurab zhing / sru
334b3(rgyud): po rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus rab tu thob par 'gyur// yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'am/ rdo rje 'am/ ral gri'am/ 'khor lo'am/ rin po che la/
334b4(rgyud): sogs pa de rnams kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang por 'gro ba dang 'ong nus par 'gyur ro// klu'i rigs thams cad blo mthun par 'gyur ro// char chen po
334b5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pa mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtshe'u gang du 'bum bzlas na klu'i gnas der rab tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing der gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang gar
334b6(rgyud): zhugs shing 'bum bzlas la 'bum yongs su rdzogs nas de nyid du mchod rten brtsigs la sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang / yungs kar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad
334b7(rgyud): skrag pas lhags par 'gyur zhing gang smras pa de byed par 'gyur ro// dur khrod du yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin gong ma bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// ri'i lha la mar khu dang tsan dan gyi
335a1(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis sam gnags kyi gnas su rig pa 'dzin pa la sbrang d+hi dang pi pi ling gi sbyin sreg byas na thams cad 'dus par 'gyur zhing / dus thams cad du/
335a2(rgyud): su dren pas bka' lung sgrub par byed do// shing grib mas shing gzhan la ma phog pa ni shing gcig go/ shing gcig gi drung du rjes su dran pas mchod rten byas shing 'bum bzlas la/ mdun
335a3(rgyud): du a shwad tha las byas pa'i rtse gsum pa byas la nyin mtshan smyung bar 'dug ste/ nyal dris bskus shing ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ ji srid du'ang 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du
335a4(rgyud): mtshan rangs pa'i bsgrub pa byas na/ gdul dka' ba 'dul bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de gling bzhi pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro// sku gdung dang bcas/
335a5(rgyud): pa'i mchod rten la bkres pa 'bum byas la nyal 'khor lo'i phyag mtshan dam/ rdo rje'i phyag mtshan nam/ rgyal mtshan blangs nas ji srid 'phur ba de srid bzlas na/ de kun tu 'gro ba'i/
335a6(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// chu bor zhugs te bzlas pa'abum byas nas sa la byas pa'i mchod rten gyi rtsa \u0f7fla sogs pa'i nyin dag la ji snyed bshad pa'i gnas su cho ga snga ma
335a7(rgyud): bzhin lag pas nor bu blangs te/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid bzlas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yang de nyid lag pas blangs te bzlas
335b1(rgyud): pas yang bzhin gyi nor bur 'gyur ro// zangs ma'i bum pa la cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrub pa byas na bum pa gang bar 'gyur ro// slong mos 'tsho zhing lcags kyi rdo rje lag par blangs te
335b2(rgyud): ji srid 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi smra bar bya ba ston par byed pa de srid bzlas pas chos gang nyan par 'dod pa de mngon par ston par 'gyur ro// do'i steng du bsgrub
335b3(rgyud): na 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bar gyur pas lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags kyu dang / glegs
335b4(rgyud): bam lag par blangs te bsgrubs pas rdo rje'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'am gzhan nu ma legs
335b5(rgyud): par khrus byas te rgyan gyis brgyan pa la sngon du bsnyen pa byas la tsa 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ nyon mtshan lhung bar mchod rten nam/ lugs sku 'am/ glegs bam mam/ bris sku /
335b6(rgyud): gzhan dag gi mdun du ku sha'i gcal bkram pa la 'dug nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gsol ba btab la/ de nas tsan den
335b7(rgyud): nam/ ga pur ram/ gu gul lam du ru ka sa du ba med pa'i me mdag la sbyin sreg bya'o// de dag med na skyil mo krung gi sa 'dug ste lag pas de dag bzung la/ ji srid gzhon nu dang
336a1(rgyud): gzhon nu ma 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pas rab tu 'bar zhing 'phur bar 'gyur ro// lag pas blangs pa de dag dang bcas par rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
336a2(rgyud): bud med legs par khrus byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa la ji srid skyes par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dur khrod bris pa 'am/ shing ngam/ sa las byas pa'i seng ge la
336a3(rgyud): ji srid 'gro bar gyur pa de srid bzlas pas de la zhon zhing gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyin re rtag tu bzlas na gang du 'gro ba'i sa phyogs der bsrung ba byas par
336a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gal te nyin mtshan du bsgrub pa byed na ji srid du zhag lnga 'am/ drug gam/ brgyad dam/ lhag ma'i zla ba phyed kyi nang du sar 'phags par 'gyur zhing lha rnams las kyang
336a5(rgyud): rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de la zhon na gang du 'dod pa der 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rta 'am/ glang po che 'am/ khyu mchog gam/ ma he 'am/ ra skyes sam/ lug
336a6(rgyud): gam/ ri dgas la bzlas na de dag thams cad nyid gang du ji srid 'dod pa de srid du bzlas par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// me tog gis rab tu gtor ba'i dkyil
336a7(rgyud): 'khor la dur khrod kyi shing la me sbar la mar dang yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas na zla ba phyed kyi nang du nges par mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod du ji lta ba bzhin du ris
336b1(rgyud): sogs pa la'ang gcig tu dben par 'jug ste sgrub pa 'am/ ngang pa la sogs pa bya la sgrub pa 'am/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis shing khri 'am/ mchil lham la sogs pa la'ang yang la 'dod/
336b2(rgyud): pas cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// shing mya ngan med kyi yal ga la 'jus nas ji srid nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang mi sdang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de bzhin du
336b3(rgyud): shing a shwad tha dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / nA ga pus pa'i shing dang / shing til dkar dang / a mra dang / dur khrod kyi shing la 'dzegs te/ ji srid mi snang bar 'gro ba de srid du bzlas
336b4(rgyud): par bya'o// de ltar mi snang bar gyur pa sa la stong 'tsho bar yang 'gyur zhing khru gang tsam gyis sa la ma reg par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms kyi 'tshe bas dur khrod du ji srid
336b5(rgyud): du mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dur khrod du zhag lnga 'dug ste bzlas pa byas nas phyis de nyid du sa'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten byas nas/ der me tog gi dkyil 'khor
336b6(rgyud): byas te thal ba lag pa kha sbyar du bcug ste/ ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas pa byas nas/ des mdzub rI gsum byas pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sha ma ta la'i rtsa
336b7(rgyud): ba skam po phye mar byas te/ dur khrod du me tog gis mngon par gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor byas la lag pa kha sbyar ram kham phor kha sbyar du bcug ste/ ji srid du
337a1(rgyud): ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas la des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'gro na bus pa dang a ti ba le dang / in+da ra ba ru ni rnam
337a2(rgyud): kyi rtsa ba 'am/ shu dag gam/ a pa ra tsi ta 'am/ a pa ra ta ni 'am/ pad+ma shu ka 'am/ daN+Dod pa la 'am/ ut+pa la'i me tog gam/ mi'i sha 'am/ rma bya'i sha'am/
337a3(rgyud): tsha ba gsum mam/ ra dza pa ta 'am/ gzhan dag phye mar byas te/ kham por kha sbyar ram lag pa kha sbyar du bcug ste/ ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas pa des mig la rkus
337a4(rgyud): na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod du sbrang rtsi la lani stong mngon par bsngags te mig la bskus na ma mthong ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dgon par mchod rten gyi logs
337a5(rgyud): la shing rta bris la/ ji srid zla ba phyed kyi nang du 'gul bar gyur pa de srid nyin mtshan bzlas la de la zhon na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ba bla blangs te dben pa'i mchod rten nam//
337a6(rgyud): dgon pa 'am/ ri la sogs pa la ji srid dngos grub gsum grub par 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de bzhin du gi'u wang dang lig bu mig la sogs pa la bsgrub par
337a7(rgyud): bya'o// dge slong gis rtag tu chos gos dang / lhung bzed dang / 'khar gsol la sogs pa blangs la bzlas pa bya zhing 'jog pa na bsrung ba byas te gzhag par bya'o//
337b1(rgyud): de lta bu la sogs pa'i las su bya ba byed pa na yid la 'dod pa'i cho gas sgrub pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i cho gas sgrub na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
337b2(rgyud): 'das kyi snying 'di 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro// thogs pa med pa don yod pa'i yid la 'dod pa'i cho gas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o// byang
337b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di ltar bdag pos khas blangs nas phyag 'tshal ba dang / dmigs pa dang / bzlas pas sangs rgyas
337b4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa rjes su dran zhing bzlas pa goms par bya'o// gal te skyil krung ma bshig par mtshan mo gcig pur ri la sogs pa dri zhim pa dben pa
337b5(rgyud): dben par 'dug ste bzlas pa byed na/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe bsnyen pa ma byas par yang rig pa 'dzin par nges par mtshan gcig gis 'grub bo// tsog pur 'dug nas
337b6(rgyud): byas na gdon mi za bar zla ba phyed kyi nang du lus yongs su 'grub par byed do// dkyil 'khor me tog la sogs pas mngon par gtor bar byas la/ mchod rten la mngon du phyogs
337b7(rgyud): pa'am lugs sku la mngon par phyogs pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag dbul zhing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na dam pa'i chos spong ba dang
338a1(rgyud): 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams spong bar byed do// chu bo'i ngogs su mchod rten byas la chu bo de nyid du rkeng pa nub tsam du zhugs te bzlas nan/
338a2(rgyud): bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa zad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mchod rten la skor ba byed cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na sdig pa las grol bar 'gyur ro// dben par mig btsums te
338a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs nas/ ji srid mig btsums pa de kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas
338a4(rgyud): pa byas na sdig po'i las kyi sgrib pa las rnam par 'grol bar 'gyur ro// mi smra bar stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro//
338a5(rgyud): 'dis dam tshig thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'tshe ba la mer dang yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// nad pa rnams kyi don du ni mar dang sbrang rtsis sbyin sreg bya'o//
338a6(rgyud): khros pa rnams kyi don du sbrang rtsi'o// rgyal po 'dren par byed pa la ni yungs kar til mar la btags pas sbyin sreg bya'o// g.yul 'gyed pa la ni 'od ma'i tsher ma 'am
338a7(rgyud): 'chi ba la ma da na'i tsher ma 'am/ arka'i me tog gam/ du mu ra ga'i me tog yungs kar gyi mar la sbags nas sbyin sreg byas na 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed do// mu tsu kun d+ha'i
338b1(rgyud): phur bum mo'i dkyil 'khor du smras na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang sngags phur bus btab par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad bris te/ lcags
338b2(rgyud): kyi ngur bus btab na rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang / ma dad pa dang / gnod pa byed pa phur bus btab par 'gyur ro// a shau kA'i dur bus lam po che'i bzhi mdor
338b3(rgyud): brkos na gdon chen po rengs par byed par 'gyur ro// nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa'i rims thams cad la skud pa 'am bdug spos dri zhim po rnams kyis bdugs na sel bar
338b4(rgyud): byed cing lhas bstan nas smra bar byed do// de bzhin du sbyin sreg gang yin pa des kyang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa med par byed do// zla ba gzas zin pa na zangs ma
338b5(rgyud): 'am/ lcags sam/ ge ser ram/ dngul gyi snod du bcug pa'i mar la ji srid dngos grub gsum thob par gyur pa de srid du bzla sa la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin pa dang rig pa
338b6(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyi ma gzas zin pa na ba bla shing mya ngan med kyi lo ma la bzhag ste/ dgon pa'i mchod rten nam ri'i mchod rten gyi rtsar dkyil 'khor me tog gtor ba byas
338b7(rgyud): shing ji srid grub pa gsum thob par gyur pa de srid du bzlas na 'bar bar gyur nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ba bra la ji lta ba de bzhin du lig bu mig dang ldong ros la sogs pa 'dra
339a1(rgyud): pa 'am nyi ma gzas zin pa na bsgrub par bya'o// gang zhig sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba 'am/ dga' bar 'dod/
339a2(rgyud): pa 'am/ sems can rnams dang skye bo sdug bsngal ba las yongs su srung bar byed 'dod pa'am/ bdag nyid mthong ba'i chos nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la nges par sbyor
339a3(rgyud): bar 'dod pa'am/ gsal por snang ba la gzhan dag yang dag par sbyor 'dod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las legs so zhes bya ba'i rnam pa rab tu
339a4(rgyud): bsgrags pa myur du rnyed par 'dod pa 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la skye ba rnyed par 'dod pas sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgra byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bya'o//
339a5(rgyud): thabs la mkhas pa 'das kyang yongs su zin par bya ste/ smon lam rgya chen po bya ba dang / sdig pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang / dus gsum du byung ba'i bsod nams dang ye
339a6(rgyud): shes kyi tshogs 'jig rten las 'das pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'ang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyu nyid du rab tu sbyor bar gyur cig
339a7(rgyud): ces de ltar bsngo'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing // sems can gyi don byung bar gyur cig ces dang po'i tshig brjod pa 'am/ rjes
339b1(rgyud): su bsams pa'am/ dmigs nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyi
339b2(rgyud): brlab cing / sems can gyi don 'di 'byung bar gyur cig ces dang po tshig tu brjod pa 'am rnam par bsams te bzlas pa bya'o// dben pa'i sa phyogs su 'phags pa sdong po bkar
339b3(rgyud): pa la sogs pa shin tu rgya chen po'i mdo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu la rab tu 'jug pa klog pa nyid dang / sems pa nyid dang / mchod pa nyid tshes gcig nas
339b4(rgyud): brtsams te zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o// de nas nyal mchod pa byas te mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon zhing mgo la phyag gis
339b5(rgyud): byugs te 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so zhes gsung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa mi brjed pa'i gzungs rnyed par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i
339b6(rgyud): spyod pa la rjes su zhugs nas mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro// ji ltar sems can rnams rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur cig ces rnam par bsams la bzlas par bya'o//
339b7(rgyud): de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi nang rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig ces de ltar bzlas par bya'o// grang
340a1(rgyud): ba'i dmyal ba rnams la dro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / tsha ba'i dmyal ba rnams la grang ba nyid byung bar gyur cig ces bzlas par bya'o// dud 'gro gcig la
340a2(rgyud): gcig za ba rnams med par gyur cig ces bzlas par bya'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad du sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba thams cad med par gyur cig/ bde ba dang yid de/
340a3(rgyud): ba thams cad 'byung bar gyur cig/ yi dgas rnams la bza' ba dang btung ba 'byung bar gyur cig/ de ltar zang zing med pa'i sems can thams cad la longs spyod pa 'byung ba
340a4(rgyud): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba rab tu 'phel ba'i shugs 'byung bar gyur cig/ bde ba dang yid bde ba de dag rnams la 'byung bar gyur cig/ dad pa dang / dga'
340a5(rgyud): ba dang / rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i shugs 'byung bar gyur cig/ bsod nam sa dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs
340a6(rgyud): su rdzogs par gyur cig/ stobs bcu mkhyen pa'i sa la sems can so sor gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang sems can la phan pa'i rgyur dmigs
340a7(rgyud): te sngags bzla bar bya'o// mdor na 'khor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs
340b1(rgyud): par gyur cig ces sngags bzla bar bya'o// de bzhin du bzlas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang smon la gyi stobs dang bsod nams ye shes kyi
340b2(rgyud): stobs kyis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams su sems can gyi don gyi khyad par chung ngu dang 'bring dang / chen po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag kyang de
340b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par 'gyur te/ mos pa rgya che ba dang dad pas byang chub mngon par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu de la'ang dad par bya'o// de la 'di'i dpe bstan pa ni/ 'di
340b4(rgyud): lta ste/ yang 'dod pa'i khams na dbang phyug ces bya ba yod de/ 'dod pa skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dod pas brgyal bar byed cing / 'dod//
340b5(rgyud): pa'i longs spyod yongs su longs spyod pa'adi yang dag par ston par byed do// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa mang po dang / rin po che dang / nor bu yod pa'i sa phyogs dang / yo byad
340b6(rgyud): dang / longs spyod nye bar stobs par byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba yod do// des yid ltar mgyogs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pas stong gsum gyi
340b7(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi las su bya ba byed cing / yo byad dang longs spyod mngon par sprul nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la'ang nye bar ston par byed do// 'di
341a1(rgyud): yang rig pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gzhal yas khang dang / skyed mos tshal dang / dri dang / me tog dang /
341a2(rgyud): phye ma dang / 'breng ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul nas yongs su longs spyod par byed cing gzhan dag la ster bar byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang mig 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mig
341a3(rgyud): 'phrul mkhan zhes bya bas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mig 'phrul ston par byed do// 'di lta ste/ lha ma yin rnams sngags kyi sgyu ma byed par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ yang sman pas
341a4(rgyud): sngags kyis sems can mang po rnams kyi rims sel bar byed cing / yi dgas dang / dug dang / nang rnams sel bar byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang sngags kyis me'i dro ba med par
341a5(rgyud): byed cing grang ba'ang dro bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste / mngon par gnod par byed pas rims kyis 'dzin par byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang ma mo'i rtog pas sems can mang po rnams la
341a6(rgyud): gsod pa dang rnam par 'tshe bar byed do// gzhan yang sdig pa rnams la sdig pa'i sngags kyis sdig pa la sbyor bar yang byed do// 'di lta ste/ yang gnod sbyin gyi sems rnam par
341a7(rgyud): g.yo bar byed pa'i sngags kyis sems dga' ba dang / yid bde ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro// de lta bu la sogs pa nges pa ston pa ni sngags
341b1(rgyud): kyi stobs yin par blta bar bya'o// gsang sngags de'i stobs ni gsang sngags nyid las 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ sems can la 'jug pa'ang ma yin/ sbyor ba byas pa'ang mi dmig/
341b2(rgyud): mod kyi/ sngon gyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga las gsang sngags kyi stobs rab tu shes par bya'o// byin gyis rlabs kyi chos nyid las byung ba las 'das pa'ang ma yin/ chos thams cad kyi
341b3(rgyud): chos nyid 'di'ang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'ang ma yin/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ 'gro bar byed pa'ang ma yinabyed po'ang ma yin/ byed pa'ang ma yin bden par gyur pa mi bsla
341b4(rgyud): ba yin te/ de bas na dad pas sngags 'dis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o// tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug
341b5(rgyud): par 'dod pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa dang / yon tan rin po che so sor thob par 'dod pas bsgrub par bya'o// sems
341b6(rgyud): can gyi don gyi phyir mngon par brjod pa'i sbyor ba 'dis bsgrubs na myur ba kho nar ji ltar 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sems can
341b7(rgyud): rnams la phan pa'i rgyur gyur pa ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi go 'phang gang yin pa rnam par bsams la bzlas pa 'bum byas na/ nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i
342a1(rgyud): zhal mthong zhing mgo la byugs te/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang myur du stsol bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// yid kyis las su bya ba ci 'dod pa la
342a2(rgyud): sbyor ba'ang rung // rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan nam sngags 'di la rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs sbyar bar bya'o// dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po las gsungs pa'i cho ga
342a3(rgyud): laMs de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u rdzogs so// // yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la
342a4(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku'i yan lag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal
342a5(rgyud): po byung bar gyur to// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM A ma la bi krAn+ta te dzI ni a ra dze sA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni chos kyi spyod yul mtha' dang dbus med pa'i de bzhin
342a6(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi rig pa mchog thogs pa med pa/ don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags chen po rtog pa'i sbyor ba rab 'byams yangs pamatha' med pa/ sngags kyi sgor
342a7(rgyud): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dis las rnams gang bag med pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin
342b1(rgyud): gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs par spro bar 'gyur ro// mdor bstan na bzlas pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi spyod
342b2(rgyud): pa rjes su thob nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku sems can gyi khams thams cad la yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// mas
342b3(rgyud): pa sna tshogs pa rnams la 'tsham par 'khor ba las bzlog pa'i phyir sgyu ma mkhan bzhin du thams cad du song ba thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags chen po 'dis
342b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs las byung ba mtha' dang dbus med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i
342b5(rgyud): stobs dang / dge bas rgyas par byas pa'i sems kyi 'jug pas byin gyis brlabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung gi 'khor lo dang / gzhan dag kyang sems
342b6(rgyud): can gyi khams rnams las 'byung zhing thos par gyur cig ces sems can thams cad bsgrub par dmigs nas sngags bzlas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis
342b7(rgyud): brlabs kyi stobs kyi shugs la dad par bya'o// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas tha na gzung ba tsam la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// rtog pa 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan
343a1(rgyud): 'das kyis don yod pa thogs pa med pa smon lam gyi stobs dang / byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs kyis dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// de nas
343a2(rgyud): 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa 'thob pa'i thabs phyogs tsam brjod par bya'o// 'dir dang ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas re zhig sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
343a3(rgyud): thams cad la snga ma bzhin du bdag gi lus dbul bar bya'o// de nas dus thams cad pa'i sdig pa bshags te/ lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang nye
343a4(rgyud): ba'i nyon mongs pa las byung ba rnams nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par bya'o// de nas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub
343a5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/ sems can thams cad skyob cing phan par mdzad pa la rjes su yi
343a6(rgyud): rang ngo // dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa nyid la'ang rjes su yi rang ngo //
343a7(rgyud): de nas 'di ltar yang bsams par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig cig gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang tshad med do zhes rjes su yi rang nas sems can
343b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyir yongs su bsngon mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na/ gang yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas/
343b2(rgyud): pa mtha' mi mthong ba tshad med pa khong du chud par byas nas rjes su yi rang ba lta ci smos/ yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa gang yin pa des rjes su yi rang
343b3(rgyud): ngo zhes brjod do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang dag par byung ba bdag gi med pa/ rjes su ma bzung ba thang las skyes pa rin
343b4(rgyud): po che'i ri la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa'i don du bsngo bar bya'o// de nas bdag gis bsod nams kyi stobs kyis de bzhin
343b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i dam pa rgya chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi
343b6(rgyud): rlabs dang / bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces nges par bsams la 'di skad lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/
343b7(rgyud): sarba thA ud ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM sa man+ta ta swA hA/ de'i rjes la gzhan ma yin par de bzhin du mchod pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur
344a1(rgyud): ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho
344a2(rgyud): rnams bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / bsod nams kyi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams la/ sngags
344a3(rgyud): 'di lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sarba tA saM ku su mi tA a b+hi d+hA rA shI ni na mo stu te swAhA/ de nas bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya
344a4(rgyud): mtsho rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis thams cad du sdug
344a5(rgyud): bsngal bar gyur pa bdag la byin gyis brlabs tu gsol/ bdag la dngos grub dang mchog stsal du gsol zhes tshig tu brjod par bya'o// de nas sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i
344a6(rgyud): rtsa ba'i tshogs zag pa med pa rnal 'byor las yang dag par byung ba rab tu thob par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do// de bzhin du mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can thams cad la phan
344a7(rgyud): pa dang bde ba sbyin par yid la byas nas/ de lta bu'i sprul pa'i sprin mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor bas bstan pa'i / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i sngags lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod
344b1(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing dmigs la bzlas pa goms par byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
344b2(rgyud): kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub grub par gyur pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad grub par gyur pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba la dmigs pa'i sems kyis
344b3(rgyud): goms par byas shing bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid skyo bar ma gyur kyis bar du'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas bla na med pa'i seng ge'i
344b4(rgyud): sgra sgrogs pa dang / bla na med pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po ye shes kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa la mngon par mos pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang
344b5(rgyud): chub sems dpal thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas langs nas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa yangs shing rgya che ba'i mdo sde klog pa'am gzhan yang rung / ji ltar bsams/
344b6(rgyud): pa bzhin du dro dus kyi bar du gnas par bya'o// de nas glegs bam la sogs pa mchod pa 'am/ tha na mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba byas nas zas bza' bar bya'o// za ba'i tshel
344b7(rgyud): zas la sngags 'dis lan brgyad mngon par bsngags la dang po'i chang bu lha bshos su phul la bza' bar bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/
345a1(rgyud): oM ba lin+na te te dzo mA li ni swA hA/ zas kyis dub pa bcung zhig ngal ba sos la phyi dro'i dus su'ang cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o// nyal ba'i tshe dang por sangs rgyas
345a2(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal nas/ bdag nyid phul la phyi nas mal du ji ltar 'dod par gnyid log la nem gyi cha stod dang cha smad
345a3(rgyud): la mau nyal bar bya'o// de la cho ga ni 'di yin no// tshes gcig nas brtsams nas nyin re zhing zla ba gcig rdzogs kyi bar du 'di bzhin du bya ba yin no// gal te cho ga 'ga' zhig ma byas
345a4(rgyud): sam/ bya ba gzhan gyis brel bas nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum la sogs par las las nyams na'ang des brtson 'grus dor bar mi bya ste/ zla ba de nyid kyil
345a5(rgyud): nyin mtshan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'am/ mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / dam pa'i chos glegs bam mam/ gzhan gyi mdun du'ang rung / mchod pa ci 'byor/
345a6(rgyud): pa byas nas ku sha bkram pa la 'dug ste bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / mdung dang / kha T+wAM ga'ang rung / lcags las byas pa 'am/ sa
345a7(rgyud): las byas pa'ang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u nas gsungs pa'i mtshon cha rnams las gang 'dod pa zhig lag tu blangs nas bsgrub pa byas na/ des nam byed dam nyi ma
345b1(rgyud): 'char kar nges par 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nyid rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ skad cig de la rig 'dzin gyi rigs kun nye bar 'dus nas de la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de nas bzung
345b2(rgyud): nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du nam mkha' la rgyu zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rjes su 'jug cing mchod pa chen po byed pa'i byang chub
345b3(rgyud): sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs nas bde ba dang ldan bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin thams cad kyis mchod cing / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i
345b4(rgyud): rig sngags 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// mtha' yas pa'i bud med kyi 'khor la sogs pa la yongs su longs spyod kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing / lus de nyid mi 'dor bar
345b5(rgyud): bde bar rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// thabs 'di nyid kyis mthar gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku'i bar du'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo la
345b6(rgyud): sogs pa mtshon cha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du ldong ros dang / mig sman dang / ba bla dang / gi'u wang dang / gos dang / ku sha dang / nor bu dang / rma bya'i sgro dang / snod dang / mchil lham
345b7(rgyud): dang / gdugs dang / rnga yab dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / ta la'i lo ma las ral gri dang / chu gri dang / gri dang / kha T+wAM ga la sogs pa'i rdzas su byas pa'am/
346a1(rgyud): lhag mas kyang bsgrub par bya'o// yid la gang 'dod pa'am// rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan la'ang sbyar ba'am
346a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i cho ga 'am/ yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas kyang bsgrub pa byas/
346a3(rgyud): na de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thad nas dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga'o// ji skad bstan pa'i phyogs gcig tu
346a4(rgyud): mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/ gang yang rung ba'i mdun du me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la/ ci 'byor pa'i dri dang /
346a5(rgyud): me tog dang / 'phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas kyang rung / ma byas kyang rung / ku sha'i chang bu la nye bar 'dug nas lag pa'am gzhan du'ang rung / ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas
346a6(rgyud): bzung nas/ lo ma'i bar ram/ gos kyi bar du 'am/ lcags dang / dngul dang / gser gyi snod du bzhag la ji srid 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ de bzhin du bsod
346a7(rgyud): nams ji lta ba bzhin rig pa 'dzin par gyur ro// gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i cho ga yin no// cho ga 'di
346b1(rgyud): nyid kyis dben zhing stong pa'i ri dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / tshal nyams dga' ba 'am/ shing gcig gam/ gtsug lag gi gnas sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod
346b2(rgyud): rten gyi rtsa ba 'am/ sku gzugs bzhugs pa 'am/ gzhan yang gtsug lag khang gi brang khang la sogs pa dben par bsgrub par bya ste/ 'du 'dzin dang bral ba 'am/ sangs rgyas
346b3(rgyud): rjes su dran pa la goms par byas pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ ser sna med pas som nyi dang bral
346b4(rgyud): ba'i sems kyis lus dang srog la'ang bltos pa med par bya'o// gzhan yang thams cad kyi thun mong gi cho ga ni ri dang / chu 'gram dang / 'bab chu'i ngos la sogs pa'i gnas
346b5(rgyud): dben zhing stong pa rnams su dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dang gnyis su gnas la/ dus gsum du sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su
346b6(rgyud): yi rang ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar gsol ba 'debs pas ji srid mtshan ma byung bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// yar ngo'i nyal tshe
346b7(rgyud): ga snga ma bzhin du nyin zhag gcig smyung bar gnas nas ji skad bstan pa'i rdzas rnams las gang yang rung ba blangs la/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na de nyid kyis rig
347a1(rgyud): pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rig pa mchog don yod pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa/ thogs pa med pa/ yid la re ba'i phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par
347a2(rgyud): byed pa ste/ ji ltar rab tu sbyor ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis grub pa bklags pas 'grub pa yin pas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad byed pa yin
347a3(rgyud): no// don yod pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du sbyar ba 'am/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o// yang na ras ris sgrub par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo
347a4(rgyud): krung gis bzhugs pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje kun nas 'bar bas bskor ba/ bcom ldan 'das cod pan las byung ba'i 'od
347a5(rgyud): zer gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su rig pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal mo gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang bcas pa/ gos
347a6(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba 'od kyi 'phreng bas brgyan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'og tu mtha' med ces bya
347a7(rgyud): ba'i 'khor ral gri dang zhags pa lag na thogs pa/ mdog sngo ba sangs khros shing 'khrugs pa/ gos dmar ser zung bgos pa/ khro gnyer bsdus pa bgegs thams
347b1(rgyud): cad tshar gcod pa/ mngag gzhug pa rin po che'i brag la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar ba/ rin po che'i brag gi pad+ma'i sdong po la
347b2(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ me tog gi 'khri shing gis kun nas bskor ba bri bar bya'o// de lta bu'i ras ris kyi mdun du cho ga 'dis ji ltar 'dod par ram/ rtog pa gzhan gi cho ga dang
347b3(rgyud): sbyar bar bya'o// rig pa mchog gi ras ris gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa pad+ma dmar po la rab tu bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu mngag gzhug pa
347b4(rgyud): mtha' med lag pa na ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa de dang 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// ras ris 'dir yang las de dag kun bya'o// cho ga gzhan yang ri la sogs pa stong zhing dben
347b5(rgyud): pa'i phyogs gcig tu skyil mo krung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs nas/ mtshan thog thag skyil mo krung ma zhig par bzlas pa
347b6(rgyud): byas na sngo du bsnyen pa ma byas kyang tho rangs sam nam phyed na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// mthu mtshungs pa med pa dang ldan pas phyir mi ldog pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas mchod par
347b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i cho ga 'di gang gang gi lag tu thob pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i
348a1(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha dang klu la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhan yang /
348a2(rgyud): yid la gang 'dod pa rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho ga gang yin pa'i dam pa nyis 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs/
348a3(rgyud): pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor la rdo rje zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
348a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi yul la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rdo rje shugs kyi yi ge
348a5(rgyud): bya ba byung bar gyur ro// de las ni rig pa'i mchog rdo rje'i tshig 'di byung bar gyur to// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ oM bi ra dzI bi ra dzI ma hA bi ra dzI sA ta swa ta/ sAr te sA ra te/
348a6(rgyud): tA yi trA yi bi d+ha ma hA tI saM b+hany+dza ni/ tarma ti sid+d+ha a gre traM swA hA/ 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di la'ang rig pa'i mchog dang po mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rtog/
348a7(rgyud): pa'i cho gar dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtog pa'i cho gnyis 'gyur du sbyor ba gang yin pa'ang nyis 'gyur du 'jug go// 'di'i ras ris kyi khyad par ni rin po che'i
348b1(rgyud): brag las skyes pa'i rin po che'i pad+ma chen po la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa phyag gis mchog stsol ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su rig pa'i mchog phya
348b2(rgyud): 'khor lo bsdams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khor lo rdo rje nas bya ba
348b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin phyag na 'khor lo bsdams pa/ cung zad sngo bsangs rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis kun nas bskor ba'o// de'i
348b4(rgyud): logs su sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri'o// lha mo'i 'og tu ni mtha' med ces bya ba 'khor de nyid gegs tshar bcod pa ral gri dang zhags pa lag na thogs pa bri bar bya'o//
348b5(rgyud): ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo gcig pu gnas pa phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// de'i 'og tu ni de bzhin du mtha' med lag na ral gri dang zhags pa thegs pa/ khro bo gzhon
348b6(rgyud): nu'i gzugs can khro gnyer g.yo ba dang bcas pa'o// 'dir yang cho ga ni snga ma nyid kyis bya'o// ji ltar yid la 'dod pas sam/ rtog pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang bya'o//
348b7(rgyud): 'dir khyad par ni 'di yar ro// dkrugs pa tsam gyis dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// 'kho rdo rje nas
349a1(rgyud): bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so// / de nas bdud rtsi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tham/
349a2(rgyud): cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs kyis dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las rol pa'i yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i bden pa'i
349a3(rgyud): tshig gi 'khor lo rdo rje'i sgra mngon par byung bar gyur ro// de la bdud rtsi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa mchog 'di thos par gyur to// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a mr-i ta a
349a4(rgyud): mr-i ta shi khi shi khi/ bi ma la bi ma la/ bI rA dzI nI bI rA dzI nI/ ha ra ha ra/ bi dAm+ma hA sa ma ya/ badz+ra a gre swA hA/ bdud rtsi rdo rje 'di'i cho ga'ang sngar bstan pa'i rig pa'i
349a5(rgyud): mchog gsum gyi de nyid kyi yin no// 'dir 'di'i ras ris kyi khyad par ni bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ri'i steng na rin po che'i pad+ma chen po la nye bar bzhugs pa / phyag gis
349a6(rgyud): mchog stsol ba de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su lha mo pri yang ku ltar sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
349a7(rgyud): rgyal mtshan bsnams pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su bdud rtsi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma la nye bar
349b1(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ phyogs gnyis su rin po che'i ba dan gnyis 'phyar ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis kun nas bskor ba bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po sngam bzhin du bla'o//
349b2(rgyud): lha mo'i 'og tu mngag gzhug pa mtha' yas ral gri dang zhags pa lag na thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i cha byad can log 'dren tshar gcod pa bri bar bya'o// ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo yid bzhin
349b3(rgyud): gyi nor bu phyag na bsdams pa de bzhin du bris la 'khor mtha' yas kyang snga ma lta bu'o// de bzhin du the tsom dang bral bas rtog pa 'di la sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
349b4(rgyud): po'i rtog pa'i cho ga'ang 'dir nyis 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o// bdud rtsi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so// // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
349b5(rgyud): dpa' bo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gsum mnyam pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas des dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
349b6(rgyud): gsungs pa'i rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a ha ha ha/ bI b+h+r-i/ b+h+ra ma Ni/ tri ba li ni swA hA/ rdo rje gsu/
349b7(rgyud): gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa mchog gi snying po 'dis ni gang de dag tu mngon par ma bsgrubs par 'gyur te/ 'di'i cho ga ni de dag nyid yin no// ras ris kyi khyad par ni rig
350a1(rgyud): pa'i mchog gi gnas su gzhon nu ma bri bar bya sa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyad pa/ lung lo can/ pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la/
350a2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar bar byas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su rdo rje 'dzin gyi gnas su de bzhin du dpa' bo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi mdog can
350a3(rgyud): skyil mo krung gis pad+ma'i steng du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhags pa de bzhin du 'od kyi 'phreng bas bskor ba bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'o// lha mo'i 'og tu ni de
350a4(rgyud): bzhin du mtha' med do// ras ris gnyis pa ni de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa lha mo lcang lo can g.yog dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// ras ris 'di la'ang de bzhin
350a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtog pa dang sbyar nas de bzhin du las thams cad nyis 'gyur du bya'o// rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so//
350a6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba stobs chen po'i spyod yul gyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms
350a7(rgyud): par zhugs nas rig pa mchog ces bya ba'i yi ge brgyad po don yod mi 'phrogs pa chos thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs la ltos pa med pa 'di gsungs so//
350b1(rgyud): na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ a sa ha na mA sa ma hU~M/ 'di ni rig pa chen po'i mchog rgyal po'i rtse mo bla na med pa ste/ 'dis dngos grub gang ci'ang rung ba'i grub pa med de
350b2(rgyud): kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ni ma yin no// sngar bstan pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i sum 'gyur du bya ba nyid
350b3(rgyud): do// ras ris ni pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
350b4(rgyud): la mnyam par bzhag pa pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su gzhon nu ma lcang lo can rgyan thams cad kyi sa brgyan pa pad+ma'i steng
350b5(rgyud): na skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i bskor ba mnyam par gzhag pa bri bar bya'o// rig pa mchog gi 'og tu mtha' med ces bya ba lag na rdo rje thogs
350b6(rgyud): pa/ sngo ba sangs khros pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas bskor ba khro gnyer bsdus pa/ mngag gzhug pa bgegs tshar gcod la bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i
350b7(rgyud): 'og tu sgrub pa po'o// ras ris gnyis pa ni gzhon nu ma de lta bu nyid 'og tu mtha' med dang bcas pa'o// 'dir yang yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho ga 'am / rtog pa gzhan gyi
351a1(rgyud): tshogs snga ma bzhin du las rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// mi brjed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so// de ras dang
351a2(rgyud): tshig rdo rje 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i chang gis sngags gsungs pa/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha badz+rI satwA nA~M/ hU~M sa sam tsiN+Da ma hA badz+ra bi Sha oM d+ha ra/ anan+ta bi kAn+ta/ dzAmA hUM
351a3(rgyud): 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ s+thir bstar pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga rnams myur bar bya'o// dam tshig mchog ces bye ba'i rig pa'i mchag rdzogs so// rdo rdzogs ma
351a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzid de bzhin du ting ngange 'dzin la snyoms pa du zhugs naso// rdo rje'i rigs gzhon su ma mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog de// sungs so// namaHsar+b+ba bAH
351a5(rgyud): badz+rI sitwA nA~M/ a tsa las mabair/ ga ye ts+tsha mahA badz+ra ga te dze/ tri tri a sa ma sahA/ bo d+hi ud+hame/ \u0f7fsid+d+hi sad+d+hi/ ba ra oM gaN+Di ba rA ga/ he s+phar/ dz+wa lan /
351a6(rgyud): rdo rje rigs mdzes zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yon no// / byang chub sems dpa'i kun nas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas reg
351a7(rgyud): pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ a badz+ra ma hA badz+ra/ mardza ba la sa ra bI rA dzA te/ sems so// khu ru lu ru/ bi Sha ma d+ha ri d+ha ra/ swa s+pho re/ b+ha re swAhA
351b1(rgyud): dpa' bo mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no// / byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhugs ras rig par
351b2(rgyud): mchog 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ A sa man+ta ba dz+ri/ a tsa la ba ra aM/ bi la si nI/ kha le ba raM/ ut+ta ma/ hA saM naM ha rA te/ g+he r+Na pa Na
351b3(rgyud): mi g.yo ba mchog gi lus zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no// / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stoms par zhugs
351b4(rgyud): nas sngags 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA/ amr-i te a mr-i te/ shau khi ne shi khi ne/ sa ma tI sa ma te/ a sa me a sa me/ ga ga re ga ga ne taiSh+Tha
351b5(rgyud): tiSh+Tha / a sa he hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ bdud rtsi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no// / shin tu rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
351b6(rgyud): par zhugs nas mdzes pa mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba dud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ A ti A tau/ ba ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ sa ma liSh+Ti ni
351b7(rgyud): ti ri ti ri/ hA sa hA sa/ A rI Ni ban+d+ha ya/ ma hA b+ho gi ni/ ta hA ta ma hA brdze gu Nod ga te badz+ra le swA hA/ kun tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//
352a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yi ge brgyad/
352a2(rgyud): pa 'di gsungs so// na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ a nan+ta satwa maM ga hUM/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo'i stobs zhes bya ba stobs thams cad kyi rgyal po'i rtse mo'i stobs
352a3(rgyud): kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so// nam
352a4(rgyud): sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a sa ma ma hA/ ba ra da ya gi ti ti ti ti/ a nU a mU khaM khaM NA a sa ma gu NA/ a kA ra ti ti ti ti/ a gra bA lo a d+ha ye taM swA hAbyang chub sems dpa'
