411a2(rgyud): de nas thabs dang mi ldan pa'i cho ga'ang ji skad gsungs pa bzhin nus pa ji lta ba bzhin bsgrub par bya'i/ bdag gi nus pa ma yin no zhes sgyid lug par mi bya ste/ las ji lta ba
411a3(rgyud): 'bras bu'ang de lta bu'o zhes bya bas dngos grub kyi 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bsams lo/ ri la sogs pa'i gnas rab tu dben pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang la sog
411a4(rgyud): pa'i khang pa stong pa 'am/ bla gab med par 'du 'dzi rnam par spangs la sems can la gnod pa med pas cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o// khrus la sogs pa med kyang rung ras ris
411a5(rgyud): med kyang rung / tshul khrims 'chal pa yin yang rung / dman pa yin yang rung / bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ gang yang mang du sgrub pa la goms par bya'o// mun pa
411a6(rgyud): chen po nas snang bar 'jug par 'dod pa dang 'khor bar ltung ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la bskyon par 'dod pa dang / gang yang mang du 'du 'bad pa so log par ltung
411a7(rgyud): ba rnams rab tu bzung zhing snang bar byed pa rab tu thob par 'dod pas cho ga bzhin nyin re zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du byas la/ mthar yar ngo'i bco lnga la ji ltar mngon par 'byor pa'i
411b1(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / ras ris dang / dam pa'i chos glegs bam mam/ gang yang rung ba'i mdun du me tog sil mas bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor
411b2(rgyud): byas la lo ma bting ba la 'dug ste/ srung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa snga ma bzhin bsams la lan gsum gyi bar du sngags brjod par bya'o// de nas lcags kyi 'khor lo 'am
411b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'am ka ral gri 'am/ mdung ngam/ lcags kyu 'am chu gri zla phyed kyi bar du ba lang gi lci ba'i nang du bcug nas bton la/ lag tu bzung nas srod dang po nas brtsams
411b4(rgyud): nas mtshan rangs par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas bsgrub par bya'o// yang na rdo rje las byas pa ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bcug pas so// yang na dngu/
411b5(rgyud): dang zangs dang / gser las byas pa zla ba phyed du chu'i nang du bcug pa'am/ mi dman po'i 'o mo'i bum par bcug pa 'am/ bsregs pa 'am/ ldeng ros dang / ba bla dang
411b6(rgyud): gi'u wang ngam/ rang bzhin gyis gnas pa lo ma 'am/ gos kyi bar du lag tu bzung la bsgrub par bya'o// yang na nor bu 'am/ yang na 'phreng ba 'am/ yang na lhung bzed
411b7(rgyud): bkrus pa 'am/ gos sam/ gnas sam/ gdugs sam/ ri mo lag tu bzung bas sam/ ta lo'i lo ma las byas pa'i ral gri la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa ba sgrub pa'i
412a1(rgyud): rdzas rnams dang / mtshan rangs par bsgrubs na nam phyed dam nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'bar bar gyur nas/ gal te grub na ngo mtshar chen po glo bur du 'byung
412a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la me tog gi char 'bab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo ba dang // snang ba chen po glo bur du 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang ngo mtshar chen po rnam pa
412a3(rgyud): sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs thams cad nye bar 'dus nas de la bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du sngags kyi mthu khyad par can gyis dbang bskur bar
412a4(rgyud): byed/ yongs su 'dzin par byed do// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig 'dzin gyi sde dpon tshogs na spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di rang gi skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur zhing
412a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'dzin gyi sde pa'i rgyal po nyid sdug bsngal med par 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de nyid du sa la bzhugs nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi gtso bo chen po zhes bya ba'i
412a6(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba rab 'byams mtha' yas pa'i 'phags pa'i chos kyi spyod yul 'phrogs pa med par song ba/ rnam par rol pa mtha' yas pas mdzes pa/ de bzhin
412a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rig pa 'dzin par byung nas yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba thob pas sreg pa'i bskal pa'i dus su'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / bla na
412b1(rgyud): mang bang bde ba'i bdud rtsi las kyang mi nyams la/ 'dod pa'i yon tan sna yongs spong ba las mnyams shing / bud med mang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bar yang 'gyur ro//
412b2(rgyud): shes rab dang thab seMs so 'thob cing stobs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sems cad la gnod par yang mi byed do// 'jig rten gyi rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang de'i bde ba'i
412b3(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i longs spyod mang po la ltos na zad pa dang dman pa lta bu yin pas/ 'jig rten pa'i rig 'dzin de dag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing snying rje bar sems par 'gyur ro// 'dir
412b4(rgyud): shugs kyis 'gro ba la ltos na lha'i 'jig rten pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang rkang gis 'gro ba lta bur sems so// gang 'jig rten pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang rkang gis
412b5(rgyud): 'gro ba lta bur sems so// gang 'jig rten pa'i rig 'dzir grub pa de dang 'di'i khyad par yang rtswa dang ri rab kyi khyad par lta bur 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i thabs dang ldan pa'i
412b6(rgyud): cho ga'o// thabs dang mi ldan pas ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba rab 'byams kyi cho ga'o// sngar gyi rtog
412b7(rgyud): pa'i cho ga thams cad kyis bsgrub par bya zhing / sngar gyi rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad kyis sbyar bar bya'o// mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa'i thabs ni rnam pa gnyis te/ rab tu dben par
413a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pas dmigs pa rtag tu zlos pa dang / lha mnyes par byed pas mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa ste/ cho ga'i//
413a2(rgyud): thabs de dag gis rtag tu goms par byas nas mngon par shes pa lnga nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// las rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams thob par 'gyur te/ lus
413a3(rgyud): yang ba dang sems yang ba nyid la goms par byed cing zlos pa dang / dben par 'dug nas bzlas pa la goms par byed pa'o// mi snang ba'i cho ga ni gsum ste/ nyin gcig tu sgrub pa'am/
413a4(rgyud): nyin ma chen gcig sbyor bas sgrub pa dang / dur khrod du sa la byas pa'i mchod rten byas pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas pa la me tog sil mas bkram po la 'dug nas pa bla 'am
413a5(rgyud): gi'u wang ngam/ a shwa tha'i lo ma 'am/ byang chub kyi shing gzhan yang rung / mya ngan med pa la sogs pa bkra shis kyi shing gi lo ma la bzhag nas sgrub pa pos tho rangs kyi dus nas
413a6(rgyud): srod kyi bar du nyin rangs bsgrub par bya'o// de las du ba byung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyi ma de la ma grub na nyi ma gsum gyi bar du bsgrub par bya'o// de lta na'ang ma grub na
413a7(rgyud): ma bzhi pa la nyi ma rangs par dur khrod du 'chag cing bsgrub pa byas na nges par 'grub par 'gyur te/ mi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur la/ ri rab kyi ngos
413b1(rgyud): kyi bar du 'gro bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// mngan de nyid du mchod rten gyi mdun du ches bcu gsum gyi nyi ma nub nas nyi ma shar gyi bar du mchod pa byas nas shing lo la 'jug ste/ badz+ra
413b2(rgyud): 'am gi'u wang lo ma'i bar du bzhag nas nyi ma nub pa'i dus brtsams te/ mtshan rangs pa bzlas nas du ba byung bas tshud gsum byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yang na dur khrod
413b3(rgyud): de nyid du khrag gis thig ler byas nas lag tu ral gri thogs nas 'dug la mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na nyi ma shar ba'i dus su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ro la rkang pas
413b4(rgyud): mnan nas lag par ral gri thogs te ji srid mi snang bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// lag tu ral gri bzung nas nyi ma gang yang rung ba la ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la khrag gis
413b5(rgyud): bsangs pa'i yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg mtshan rangs pa byas na tho rangs mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mdor na rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga gang yang rung ba de dag dur khrod du bya zhing sbyar ro//
413b6(rgyud): yang na nyi ma rangs pa ri la sogs pa dang / khyim stong dang / lha'i khang pa dang / shing gcig dang / dgon pa'i mchod rten dang / mtshan ma gcig pa dang / dur khrod la
413b7(rgyud): sogs pa'i gnas su me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pa la/ shing rta dang / lha'i bzhon pa dang / seng ge dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / glang dang /
414a1(rgyud): ri dgas dang / ra dang lug dang / khyim bya'ang rung bris pa'i mdun du mtshan rangs pa mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mi'i rus pa phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas/
414a2(rgyud): nanam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar 'phar bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang du 'dod par 'gro zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro// 'dod na yang slar 'ong bar 'gyur zhing yang 'gro bar yang 'gyur/
414a3(rgyud): ro// de la sbyor ba 'dis ril bu bsgrub par bya ste/ a ti ba la'i rtsa ba dang / tri bar+Na'i rtsa ba la go da ba ri zhes bya ba dang / ma hA be ga'i rtsa ba la yang tre la bar+Ne zhes kyang bya ba dang /
414a4(rgyud): shing chen gyi rtsa ba dang / shun pa dang / 'di dag cha mnyam par phye ma zhib mor byas nas rang gi khrag dang ril bu gsum byas nas zangs kyis dkri bar bya'o// ril bu gzhan
414a5(rgyud): yang mya ngan med kyi me tog dang / ma du lung ga'i rtsa ba dang / ta ra bi ra rta'i rtsa ba dang / zar ma'i shun pa rnams cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mor byas la/ rang gi khrag dang
414a6(rgyud): ril bu sran ma tsam gsum byas te zangs kyis dkri bar bya'o// ril bu gzhan yang til gyi rtsa ba dang / tra pu sha'i sa bon dang / ma la ta'i rtsa ba dang / ta ma la'i lo ma rnams cha mnya
414a7(rgyud): pa gcig tu byas pa'i phye ma zhib mo dang rang gi khrag gis ril bu gsum byas la zangs kyis dkri bar bya'o// ril bu gzhan yang yungs kar dang / til dang / bong ba dang / a ru
414b1(rgyud): ra'i shun pa 'di rnams cha mnyam pa'i phye ma zhing mo sbrang rtsi dang rang gi khrag gis sbrus nas ril bu gsum byas la zangs kyis dkri bar bya'o// ril bu gzhan yang a rur dang
414b2(rgyud): b+hi ba'i 'bras bu'i rkang pa dang / nag ge sar dang / spang ma dang / dzA ti'i me tog rnams cha mnyam pa'i bye ma zhib mor byas la rang gi khrag dang til mar bsres pa dang / ril du
414b3(rgyud): gsum byas la zangs kyis gtum par bya'o// de nas ril bu de dag sgrub pa'i thabs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sngags gang yang rung ba stong phrag gcig bzlas pa byas la dur
414b4(rgyud): khrod du dkyil 'khor byas nas/ dbus su mchod rten nam dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bzhag nas tshes bcu gsum gyi nyin mtshan rangs pa lo 'dab bting ba la myur bar 'dug la/
414b5(rgyud): lag pa gams par ral gri thogs nas g.yon du ril bu gang yang rung ba bzung la srid nas brtsams nas ji srid du ba 'byung ba dang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur gyi bar du bsgrub par byas na/
414b6(rgyud): de nas ril bu gcig khar bcug na nyi ma'i 'od lta bur 'gyur ro// khru gang tsam gyi sa la ma reg par 'gyur ro// gal te de'i nub mo ma grub na slar yang dur khrod du srod nas brtsams
414b7(rgyud): nas ji srid ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du 'chag cing bzlas pa bya'o// yang na dbang phyug chen po grub pa'i khang par mtshan ma'i steng du bzhag nas kha byang du bltas te 'dug pa
415a1(rgyud): lag tu ral gri thogs te/ slod dus nas brtsams nas nyi ma shar gyi bar de bzhin du bar bcug nas bsgrubs na nyi ma'i mdog tu 'gyur ro// yang na
415a2(rgyud): dgon pa'i mchod rten nam/ yang na byang chub kyi shing bdun po gang yang rung ba'i rtsar nye bar 'dug la ril bu gang yang rung ba gsum lag tu bzung nas snga ma bzhin du bya'o// yang
415a3(rgyud): na dben par 'phag pa phyag na rdo rje'i phyag tu bzhag nas mchod pa byas la bsgrub par bya'o// yang na ji skad bstan pa'i gnas su zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i che ba sgrub par
415a4(rgyud): bya ste snga ma bzhin no// de nas mig sman 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spang me dang / mthing shun dang / zangs phye ma rnams cha mnyam par byas la rang gi khrag dang sbrang rtsis
415a5(rgyud): ril bu byas nas kham phor ma bsregs pa kha sbyar du bzhag la/ dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su de bzhin du lag tu ral gri thogs tAM ril bu bzhin du bsgrub par
415a6(rgyud): bya'o// de bzhin du ba bla byang chub kyi shing gi lo ma'i bar du bzhag nas lag tu ral gri gzung nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub bo// dgon pa'i mchod rten nam byang chub kyi shing gang
415a7(rgyud): yang rung ba'i rtsa ba dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag tu bzhag nas tshes bcu gsum gyi nyin zhag sbyang bar 'dug nas bsgrub pa 'am/ zla ba nyi
415b1(rgyud): ma gzas zin pa'i tshe srong nas brtsams nas bsgrub par bya'o// grub na thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gal te de'i nub mo ma grub na de bzhin du de nyid du 'chag cing nyim 'char/
415b2(rgyud): ka nas brtsams nas srod kyi bar du bsgrub par bya'o// grub par gyur na bar gyi bskal par gnas shing gser gyi mdog can 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// ba bla la ji lta
415b3(rgyud): bzhin du gi'u wang dang ldong ros la sogs pa la'ang brtson 'grus dang ldan pas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// bud med kyi mtshan ma gzhan du gyur pa dang / sngon gyi rten
415b4(rgyud): gzhan du gyur pa gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma'i sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sngags gang yang rung ba bzung la ri gseb tu zhugs te 'bum bzlas la/ de nas gzhon nu ma
415b5(rgyud): legs par khrus byas te rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbul bar bya zhing tshegs bsags pa dang / byang chub kyi
415b6(rgyud): sems yongs su bzung ba byas la snga ma bzhin du mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / ras ris dang / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du ji ltar nus pas mchod pa
415b7(rgyud): byas la 'khor lo 'am/ ral gri'am/ rdo rje 'am/ lcags kyu'am/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs ba ma lag pa la bcings nas sam/ rdzas de dag las gang yang rung ba
416a1(rgyud): nyid dam/ med par yang gzhon du dkyil 'khor du bcug cing shing dang po la me sbar la/ shing dang cha byed dang bcas pa'i rang gi khrag gis bsgos pa
416a2(rgyud): ma nub nas brtsams nas 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du de lag pa nas bzung nas bsgrubs na/ de dang bcas par thogs pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dur khrod du lcags kyi
416a3(rgyud): rdo rje lag tu bzung nas slong mo la spyod cing ji srid bdag nyid gnod sbyin du gyur kyi bar du bzlas na/ bdag nyid lcang lo can du zhugs par mthong bar 'gyur ro// der 'phags
416a4(rgyud): pa phyag na rdo rje'i rigs su rang gi gnas thob par 'gyur ro// byon nas sdig pa chen po byas pa'ang lag pa nas bzung nas nges par lcang lo can du 'khrid par byed do// nyal ba'i
416a5(rgyud): tshe rdo rje de bsrung ba byas la sngas su gzhug par bya'o// zas za ba'i tshe'ang de lag tu bzung nas bza' bar bya'o// tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i rdo rje lag tu thogs nas cag
416a6(rgyud): tu bsod snyoms la spyod pas ri la 'dzegs nas bzlas pa byas na/ zla ba lnga'i nang du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du gnas rab tu thob par
416a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ri la slong mo spyod cing ral grim bor bar rtag tu bzlas pa byas la zas za na bzung nas bzla'o// nyal ba na'ang bsrung ba byas te shugs su bcug ste sngas su bzhag
416b1(rgyud): na zla ba gsum gyi nang du rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo la'ang cho ga 'di nyid yin no// lcags sems las lcags kyu byas la dur khrod du me tog sil ma bkram pa'i
416b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dur khrod kyi shing las me sbar la lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu thogs nas kyi tshe'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ dur zod na gnyug mar gnas
416b3(rgyud): pa rnams 'ong gi bar du bya'o// 'ongs nas bdag gis bgyi ba ci mchis bka' stsol cig ces zer na de bka' bzhin gyis shig ces brjod do// de nas bzung nas dran pa tsam gyis
416b4(rgyud): bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shing chen po'i rtsa bar de bzung nas slong mo spyod bzhin du bzlas pa byas na/ gnod sbyin 'ongs nas ci zhig bgyi zhes smra zhing
416b5(rgyud): gang don du gnyer ba'i don de sgrub par byed do// mya ngan med kyi shing gi rtsa bar slong mo spyod pas lcags kyu de nyid bzung nas bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas ji ltar mngon par/
416b6(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// ri la 'dzegs nas lcags kyu de bzung nas bzlas pa byed cing / rig pa 'dzin pa grub par byed pa rdzas gang 'dod pas de bzhin du
416b7(rgyud): byas na de dag gi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu de dang klu'i gnas kyi steng du bzlas pa byas na/ de'i rjes la klu steng du langs nas gang smras pa de byed do// lcags kyu la
417a1(rgyud): ji lta ba de bzhin du lcags las byas pa'i ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje'i sbyor bas kyang sbyar bar bya'o// don yod pa 'dis 'dir ni nim pa l+la/
417a2(rgyud): byas pa'i rdo rje lag tu thogs nas p+lag sha'i shing gi rtsa bar slong mo spyod cing bzlas na/ lha rnams 'ongs nas yid la gang 'dod pa'i don rjes su sgrub par byed cing zla ba gcig gi
417a3(rgyud): nang du 'ongs par 'gyur ro// thams cad 'ong bar ma gyur par de bzhin du sbyin sreg bya ste/ gang ma'i yam shing gis me sbar la mar dang ske ches sbyin sreg byas na/ nges par rim gyis
417a4(rgyud): zin par brnyes shing brdungs la chang bur bcangs pa'i lus kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi thun mong gi sbyin sreg yin no// 'dir sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'di yin te/ rdzas
417a5(rgyud): kyi ched du ni shing chen dang / ma du ka dang / a mra la sogs pas so// de bzhin du 'bras bu bcas pa'i tsher ma can gyi shing gyi yam shing gis kyang sbyin sreg bya'o// zho
417a6(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sha la'i zan gyi chang bu 'am/ sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / 'bras dang / sbrang dang / mar la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o// byang chub kyi shing drung ngu
417a7(rgyud): mchod rten dang / ras ris dang / sku gzugs kyi mdun du dbang du bya ba'i sprin sreg gi cho ga ni pri yang ku'i sreg rdzas la sogs pa 'am/ me tog dri zhim po'i shing la sogs pa'i yam
417b1(rgyud): shing gis kyang der sbyin sreg bya'o// a ti mug ti'i sreg rdzas ni zho la bsnyegs pas so// pri yang ku'i sreg rdzas ni zho dang mar la bsnyegs pas so// tshwa dang til gyi chang
417b2(rgyud): bu 'am/ tshwa dang mar gyi chang bu 'am/ tshwa dang khrag gi chang bus kyang bya ste/ gal te dbang du ma gyur na de dag gis sbyin sreg bya'o// ma du ri ka dang til ba sres pa'i sbyin sreg
417b3(rgyud): gos ni dga' ba chen por byed pa'o// so ba dang mar bsres pa dang / tsha ba'i mar dang spags pa'i po so 'tsha'i tsher mas ni sha za la sogs pa gdug pa rnams la'o// klu'i 'o
417b4(rgyud): ma dang ske tshes ni gnod sbyin dgug pa la'o// 'bras bu bsregs pas kyang rung ngo // skyed mos tshal la sogs pa gnas dben zhing nyams dga' bar me tog gi sreg rdzas kyis
417b5(rgyud): 'on kyang klung gi rgyun la dbul bar bya'o// de la don 'dod pas ni chu klung gi nang du 'dug la ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / ka ra wI ra dang
417b6(rgyud): a sho ka dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / tsam pa ka la sogs pa'i me tog gsum nas brtsams nas ji tsam 'byor pa krung gi chu'i nang du 'dug nas nyi ma gsum yan chad ji tsam 'dod
417b7(rgyud): par rang gi 'byor pa dang mthun par ram/ brtson 'grus dang rjes su mthun par 'bras bu don yod par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang / ras ris dang /
418a1(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam la sogs pa 'am/ gzhan yang rung rdzas kyi don du me tog la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// dbang du bya ba'i phyir ni mad yan//
418a2(rgyud): ka dA dza ti dang / ma li ka dang / pri yang ku la sogs pa'i chu'i nang du 'dug nas brgya yan chad nyi ma lnga yan chad bya zhing dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du mchod rten dang / sku gzugs dang /
418a3(rgyud): ras ris dang / glegs bam yang rung / phul na rgyal po la sogs pa nges par dbang du 'gyur ro// nad kyi don du bya ba'i sbyin srog ni/ 'di lta ste/ sman gyi shing gi yam shing
418a4(rgyud): dang / skyu ru ra la sogs pa dang / 'bras bu kha bo dang / nim pa la sogs pa bla gab med pa'i gnas su mchod rten la sogs pa la chu'i me tog dang / lo ma dang / dgon pa'i
418a5(rgyud): me tog dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du mchod rten la sogs pa la nyin bdun yan chad ji tsam nus pa byas na/ nges par nad med pa dang dbang du bya ba dang bcas pa byed par 'gyur
418a6(rgyud): ro// gdon la ni til mar dang rang skyur la bstegs pa'i rgyal po'i yungs kar sbyin sreg gis so// 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srin po la sogs pa la thal ba la
418a7(rgyud): sogs pas bros pas 'gyur zhing / brdeg pa dang / gcad pa dang / bcing ba'ang med do// bdag srung ba la ni lan gsum brjod pas so// gzhan srung ba la ni lan lnga byas
418b1(rgyud): pas 'dug par 'gyur ro// gang dag la mdud pa bcings pa dang / chu dang / yungs kar dang / sa dang / tshon dang / phyag rgyas sam/ yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kyang 'chi
418b2(rgyud): bar byed do// thal mo brdabs pa 'am/ mdud pa bcings pas sam/ 'dod pas kyang dbang du byed cing 'gugs so// phur bu dang / sngags mdud dang / chus kyang
418b3(rgyud): thams cad byed do// mdor na yid la bsams nas bzlas pa byas na thams cad don yod par byed do// rang bzhin du gnas pa la 'bebs par byed na/ tsan dan dang a ka ru'i
418b4(rgyud): bdug spos la sogs pas dkyil 'khor me tog sil ma bkram pa byas pa la'o// gdon gyis zin pa la 'bebs par byed na/ u sha ri dang mar gyi bdug spos kyis so// bdug
418b5(rgyud): spos thams cad kyang mar dang bcas par bya'o// dpal pi s+tha ka la sogs pa la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// mar dang bcas pas nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa'i rims zhi bar byed do//
418b6(rgyud): til mar dang bsres pa'i kun tu ru ka la sogs pa'i bdug spos thams cad kyis so// lcags las byas pa'i phur bus gdug pa can srin po dang lha ma yin la sogs pa phur bus/
418b7(rgyud): 'debs so// gnod sbyin la ni 'o ma can gyi phur bus so// klu la ni nim pa'i shing las byas pas so// rig pa 'dzin pa la ni shI khaN+Da las byas pas so// lha la can
419a1(rgyud): dan dmar po las byas pa'i phur bus sam/ ji ltar 'dod pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bzlas la gzugs brnyan gyi gnas gang yin pa der gdab
419a2(rgyud): par bya'o// btab nas khros pas gnas do nyid du mtshan ma cung zhig byung bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas pa bya zhing / sred pa med pa'i drag tu khros pas pha rol kun phur bu sa gdab bo//
419a3(rgyud): bstan pa la sdang ba'i sems can dang / sems can rnams la sdang ba'ang phur bus gdab bo// dpal phur bus rgyal po gdug pa can gyi dpung phur bus gdab par 'gyur ro//
419a4(rgyud): rgyal po phur bus gdab pa la ni tsam pa'i shing las byas pas rgyal po phur bus gdab par 'gyur ro// mi'i rus pa'i phur bus ni bgegs phur bus gdab bo// rus pa las
419a5(rgyud): byas pa dang / lcags las byas pa dang / seng ldeng las byas pa dang / 'ong ma las byas pas gdug pa'i phur bus thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// tha na stong
419a6(rgyud): par gdab pa ltar byas pas kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi phur bus btab par 'gyur ro// bcing ba la ni rtswa'i 'dab ma la lan gsum brjod pas kyang brgya byin yang 'ching bar byed
419a7(rgyud): do// bcad pas grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te rab tu sbyar na tshangs pa la sogs pa rang nyid kyang lag na rdo rje stobs po ches bcings par bsams na bcings par 'gyur//
419b1(rgyud): ro// grol bar gyur cig ces bsams na grol bar 'gyur ro// de lta na'ang 'dir sems la dbang ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur zhing dam tshig la dbang bar yang 'gyur ro//
419b2(rgyud): de la 'dir thogs pa med pa don yod pa'i 'ching ba'i sbyor ba ni yungs kar dang 'bras btags pa la tig ta dang che ba sres la/ lcags sgrogs gam/ rdo rje 'am/ mdung ngam/
419b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ram/ rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas nas dur khrod du sbyin sreg byas na 'ching ba chen pos bcing bar 'gyur ro// yang na nim pa'i lo ma dang ni bi na ldan
419b4(rgyud): cig btags nas sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin du 'ching ngo // mon sran gle'u dang / ske tshe dang / skyu ru ra dang lhan cig btags nas phyag rgya byas la dur khrod du sbyin sreg
419b5(rgyud): byas na 'ching bar 'gyur ro// mngon spyod ni 'di ltar 'byung ste/ dur khrod kyi shing ti ga ta dang bcas pa dang / tshwa dang bcas pa'i yam shing gis dur khrod dang / khang pa stong
419b6(rgyud): pa dang / skyed mos tshal rnying pa dang / sa smen gyi phyogs su khros pas nim pa las rdo rje'i rnam pa lta bur byas la/ de nas rus pa'i phye ma rang gi khrag dang bsgres pas sbyin
419b7(rgyud): sreg byas na nyi ma dgus nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// yang na sha chen po mar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg bya'o// yang na nya'i zhag dang bsgo ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// yang na ti
420a1(rgyud): mar las bstegs pa'i ba lang gi shas so// yang na ke shel li thal ba dang / rta'i khrag dang / ske tshes so// yang na khwa'i sgro la sogs pa til mar
420a2(rgyud): la bstegs pa'i sgro thams cad kyis so// yang na rang gi khrag dang bsres pa'i thal bas so// yang na arka'i 'bras bu mar la bstegs pas so// yang na dug dang khrag gis
420a3(rgyud): so// yang na tshwa dang khrag gis so// yang na yungs kar dang khrag gis so// yang na ba lang gi sha dang / tshwa dang / khrag gis bsgos pa'i sbyin sreg khro ba dang bcas pas
420a4(rgyud): nyi ma dgus byas pas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// yang na dur khrod du zangs las byas pa'am/ lcags las byas pa'i snod til mar gyis bkang nas bsgos pa la sngar gyi
420a5(rgyud): rdzas de dag nyid dang / rang sbyar la bstegs pa 'am/ mar dang / til mar dang / 'gyur byed las bstegs pa btso bar bya zhing gang sngar gyi chos pa rnams bsal la
420a6(rgyud): gzhan btso bar bya ste/ brgya yan chad ji tsham 'dod pa sbyin sreg bya'o// khwa'i sgo dang thal ba bcos pa khrag dang bstegs pas sreg blugs bya'o// shin tu drag po'i sbyin sreg gi
420a7(rgyud): cho ga'o// mar gyi sreg blugs kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro// khrus byas pas sam skud pa bcings pas kyang ngo // gdug pa tshar bcad pa'i las 'di dag gis nges par
420b1(rgyud): gdug pa can 'ching ba 'gyur ro// gang yang klu gdug pa can zhi bar bya ba'i phyir klu'i gnas kyi rtsa bar de ltar byas na de nyid du zhugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gang lha gdug
420b2(rgyud): pa can bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa 'am/ sems can mang po la gnod pa byed pa 'am/ rig 'dzin gdug pa can rdzas 'phrog par byed pa'am/ gang yang gnod sbyin/
420b3(rgyud): gdug pa can nam/ gang yang srin po gdug pa can nam/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i skyes bu 'am/ khams kyi rgyal po 'am/ phan pa ma/
420b4(rgyud): yin pa byed pa de rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khro bo dang bcas pas mngon spyod bya zhing / bstan pa la phan par bya ba'i don dang / sems can mang po'i don mthong na don yod par
420b5(rgyud): grub pa 'dis sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bstan pa'i sngags rnams kyis ni mngon spyod kyi las mi bya'o// don chung ngu la'ang mi bya'o// mi ngas la ni zho dang /
420b6(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar lo stegs pa'i sha chen dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nim pa'i shing btsos pa'i sbyin sreg bya ba'am/ de bzhin du bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas phur bus
420b7(rgyud): gzugs brnyan la gdab cing zhag bdun du gnas kyi zas bza' ste/ dbang phyug chen po'i g.yas phyogs su steng nas phur bus gdab cing brgya bzlas par bya'o// yang na
421a1(rgyud): lam gyi bzhi mdor lcags kyi rdo rje bzung nas bzlas pa byas na mi ngas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// char mi 'babs pa la ni klung gi rgyun 'babs pa la me tog
421a2(rgyud): gis byas na char 'bebs par byed do// drag po'i las rdzogs so// // dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa'i tshul
421a3(rgyud): 'di la ni khrus ma byas kyang skyon yod par mi 'gyur ro// sha za ba'ang dgag pa med do// la phug dang la du la sogs pa la spyod kyang skyon med do// lhag ma la'ang skyon med do//
421a4(rgyud): 'on kyang gang zhig dngang dang ldan pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la jo bo bzhin du gus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan/
421a5(rgyud): pa la ched cher byed pa/ 'du 'dzi spong ba la dga' ba de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dir log 'dren nye bar 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ro// 'di la bgegs 'byung bar yang
421a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// 'di 'dab pa chung ngus don yod par 'grub pa'o// 'di ni las thogs pa med pa'o// rtog pa 'di ni chags pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrubs
421a7(rgyud): pas sgrung pa'i thabs kyis 'dir rjes su 'jug par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi mas thams cad du ma zang byung ba'i sgrub pa thabs dang ma dpa 'a'ajigams par ya bya'o/
421b1(rgyud): sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di la som nyi med pas sgrub pa'i thabs la sbyar bar bya'o// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis 'jig rten//
421b2(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad du spro bar byed pa 'di'i sbyor ba la goms par bya'o// 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rten la gsol ba gdab pa dang / mkhyen
421b3(rgyud): par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dgos pa sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bka'
421b4(rgyud): bzhin bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thad nas legs so zhes bya ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa so sor thob par bya ba'i phyir sngags bsgrub par bya'o//
421b5(rgyud): myur du rten gnas gyur nas bde ba'i bdud rtsi rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir gang yang chags pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i sngags kyis bsgrub par bya'o//
421b6(rgyud): 'dir brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsang sngags bzlas sam sems can gyi khams rnams kyi don du sngags bzlas na
421b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rgya chen pos mchod pa chen po'i sprin sems can gyi khams rnams la bde ba yang dag par skyed pas mngon par mchod pas
422a1(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur ro// skad cig skad cig la khyad par du 'gro ba dang / gong nas gong du 'gro ba so sor thob par 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus na/
422a2(rgyud): sngags bzlas pa byas pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang 'gyur ro// 'di la gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs
422a3(rgyud): nas spyod pa dad pa can bag yod pas som nyi med par bya'o// brtson 'grus dang bcas pa'i snying rjes smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pas 'di la gus par byas nas gtsang sbras gsang
422a4(rgyud): sngags gi spyod pa 'di nyid dang / bslab pa 'di nyid la dmigs pa yongs su ma btang bas dben pa'i gnas su 'du 'dzi dang bral bar byas la sems bskyed pa thams cad du tshad med
422a5(rgyud): pab la goms par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu dad pas dmigs par rjes su 'gro ba dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi
422a6(rgyud): las dang rab tu ldan pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad yang dag par rtsom pa ste/ sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa la zhugs pas chos de dag la spyod par bya'o// /
422a7(rgyud): de la 'di dag ni rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir bar du gcod par 'gyur ba yin te/ le lo dang 'dod pa med pa dang / mngon par mo sbyor ba dang / 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /
422b1(rgyud): phan pa ma yin pa la zhugs pa dang / yid gnyis dang / bdag gi bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa yin pa dang / dman par gyur pa yin pas 'di
422b2(rgyud): 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer nas yongs su spong ba dang / kun tu 'tshe ba'i dri ma dang / mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la ngag gi don gzhan gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad
422b3(rgyud): med pa la sbyor ba'i 'dod pa med pa dang / gsang sngags la brtag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags kyi bstan bcos la mngon par dga' ba dang / bdag nyid la nga rgyal
422b4(rgyud): byed pa dang / gzhan la mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / mngon par mi brtson pa spong bar mi byed/ yo byad mang po nye bar sdud pa dang / lus dang srog la chags pa dang / de dag
422b5(rgyud): la sogs pa gzhan yang bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams rtogs par bya'o// 'di la ser sna'ang mi bya'o// gzhan dag sngags kyi spyod pa la gzhug par bya'o// bslab par bya/
422b6(rgyud): yang dag par gzung bar bya ste/ de ltar byed na bstan pa'i don byas pa'ang yin no// dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'ang yin no// gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'dzud par 'gyur
422b7(rgyud): bskul bar yang 'gyur ro// des ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam pa'i chos bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// bklags pa dang bcangs
423a1(rgyud): par yang 'gyur ro// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad bzung bas thams cad du mnyam pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sdang mig bltas pa tsam rgyas
423a2(rgyud): ltung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gis log 'dren la sogs pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi cho ga ni nam mkha'i spyan gyi gnas su ni rdo rje'i mchog ces bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo'i mchog
423a3(rgyud): bya ste/ kun nas 'bar ba gnag cing ldang ba/ rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje lag na thogs pa'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o// ras ris
423a4(rgyud): gzhan yang cung zhig sngo ba/ gzhon nu khros pa rdo rje 'bar ba gsor ba'o// khro ba dang bcas pa/ 'gying ba/ 'gying bag gis ri mo rnams cung zhig la zhing 'dra ba bri bar bya'o//
423a5(rgyud): 'phags pa rdo rje lcags kyus sngags smras pa/ nam s+t+rai yang d+hi kAnA~M/ ta thA ga tA nA~M/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la aM gi mya A kaR+Sha ya swAhA/ 'dis ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / thogs pa
423a6(rgyud): med pa don yod par grub pa 'dis bde sogs bkug nas yongasu spyod pa'ang ston par byed do// sngar bstan pa'i cho gas rings par byed do// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang mnyam pa
423a7(rgyud): med par 'gyur ro// lha la sogs pa'i rigs 'gugs par byed do// g.yo bar byed/ phur bus 'debs par byed do// de nas ras ris kyi cho ga ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.ya
423b1(rgyud): logs su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag na rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa'o// g.yon logs su ni lha mo dang po dang bcas pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can rdo rje gzhon nu ma cung zhig sngo bsangs
423b2(rgyud): so// rdo rje 'dzin gyi 'og tu ni sgrub pa po lha mo la mngon du phyogs pa'o// lha mo'i 'og tu ni gzhon nu ma bri bar bya'o// ras ris gnyis pa ni zhon nu ma cung zhig sngo bsangs lag na
423b3(rgyud): ral gri thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i lus can zhes bya ba rdo rje gzhon nu ma bri bar bya'o// de nas yang 'phags pa rdo rje sdes sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai yang d+h+ri kAn+na/ ta thA ga tA nA~M/
423b4(rgyud): oM s+yo mya ba ra ba dzA ya na ma swA hA/ de bzhin du 'phags pa lag bzang gis sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nA~M/ oM badz+ra gar+b+ha phaT bi ri Ni swA hA/ 'phags
423b5(rgyud): pa mthor 'phags kyis sngags smras pa/ nam s+t+rai lad d+h+wi kAn+t+ra/ ta thA ga tA n+tu/ badz+ra ba la me swAhA/ log 'dren la sogs pa 'ching bar byed do// 'phags pa rdo rje lcags sgrog
423b6(rgyud): gis sngags smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai yang d+h+wi kAnA~M/ ta thA ga tA nA~M/ oM an la saM b+ha be swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags
423b7(rgyud): smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM sar+b+ba sa ud+d+ha mA ban+d+ha badz+re shi kha re/ ka ma lA ka ma lA/ ma pa lA a d+hiSh+Tha na badz+ra dadz+dza/ shi khi shi khi/ na mo a ma lA nA/ sA rA sA rA
424a1(rgyud): dz+wa la dz+wa la bi ma le swAt+ma/ shin tu gnod mdzes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags spras pa/ na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA nA~M/ d+hu ba re d+hu ba ra/
424a2(rgyud): dz+wA la dz+wa la/ badz+ra sA ga ra swA hUM/ rnam par sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags sbas pa/ na mas+t+rai yad d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM tsar ba na tsar ban har ha ra bi ka ma dwe hA/
424a3(rgyud): sI ra uM sA ra u sA ra u go ba go pa/ bA pAShA ra tA ra/ kha hi kru ra badz+ra Ni swAhA/ mnyam pa rdo rje zhes bye ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/ na mar+g+haM yad d+h+wi kAnAM ta thA ga d+hA
424a4(rgyud): nAMkA ru Na kA ru ta/ sa ra sa ra/ bi d+ha ma na/ hr-i da ya/ satwA bi d+ha uta ta ma dz+wa lan tAM sA hA/ 'phags pa rdo rje zug rngus sngags smras pa/ na mas+t+ri yad d+hi kA nI/ tA thA ge tA nAM/
424a5(rgyud): oM kro d+ha dz+wa la u ta hA si ni swA hA/ mtha' yas rdo rjes sngags smras pa/ na maHanan+t+ra nA~M/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM a sa mA ga ga ne swAhA/ na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+ho satwA nA~M/ as
424a6(rgyud): sar+b+ba g+huNa.ud+d+ha \u0f7fbang+ge/ ga ga mA sa rbarbak+sha rti/ dz+wa la ta dz+wa la tA/ sam tA s+yam+b+ha/ b+h+rUM b+h+r-iHd+hA da mo/ kha lA ba raH9/ sbubar+b+hu bas+thAH/ de bzhin/
424a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i snying pa'o// na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kAn+da/ ta thA ga tAnAM/ ma hA ba ri tsi tA/ a gra shi kha re swA hA/ na ma sI yad d+hi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA nA~M/ oM b+h+ya d+ha kaM b+hu dz+nyA ba lA ni sAhA/
424b1(rgyud): gtsug tor dang rma bya chen mo'i yin no// na ma s+t+rai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM a na ma la saM b+hAn+na tA ri Ni / oM ba ra saM ban d+hu swAhA/ rdo rje me dang rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i ste/ nye bar 'tsha
424b2(rgyud): ba yang dag par zlog par byed do// oM badz+ra ba la an+d+ra sha tri sho sar+tha drA be gi ni hAn+tun tAM/ oM i si dr-i she swA hA/ dpe med rdo rje'i rigs dang mi g.yo ba nyid kyi yin no// oM a sam
424b3(rgyud): sam a nan+ta a nan+tu ya swA hA/ rdo rje 'dod pa mA'i'o// na mas+t+rai yadA d+hI kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ ta thA ga tA ma hA be ga sAM b+ha be saM b+ha be/ na mo stu te saM g+ha ni la san ti sa ra b+hu re
424b4(rgyud): swAhA/ rdo rje stob sangs rtse mo zhes bya ba'o// oM shi khi shi khi swAhA/ shi khaM ra swA hA/ spyi gtsug rnam gsum gyi'o// oM hUM ban+d+ha badz+rA maN+Da le swAhA/ oM d+ha ri d+ha ri/ d+hA re d+ha ra/
424b5(rgyud): d+ha ri na du ye na mo a pra ti ha ta uSh+NI ShA ya swA hA/ d+ha ri d+ha ri/ d+ha na ti ye swA hA/ gtsug tor so so so so la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba
424b6(rgyud): dang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad du so sor brjod par bya'o// na ma s+t+rai yad d+hi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA nA/
424b7(rgyud): oM hu lu hu lu/ tsiN+Da la sar+b+ba de banA ga ya k+Sha na A kaR+Sha ya sA hA/ na ma s+t+rai yad d+h+wi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ hUM s+phA Ta ya ma ru d+hi ra/ oM ga/ hUM tsaN+Da lA me d+hi pa ta ye hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra
425a1(rgyud): sa ma d+ha na tA ra ga tA/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA a d+hiSh+Tha tA ya/ a le hi mAM dzA le hUM ha na ha na/ TA ta a kar shA de ba a ti nAM/ tA ra sa ru d+hi ra aHger ma hA tseN+Da
425a2(rgyud): tsa la oM d+ha sha dur d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la na ma swa sti swA hA/ rdo rje 'bigs pa'o// oM b+hu ra dzA la a gra ye swA hA/ rdo rje gzi brjid kyi'o// na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM a la
425a3(rgyud): kan ti ti dzi ni swA hA/ sngags thams cad la 'di bzhin du re re zhing phyag 'tshal ba brjod par bya'o// sngags 'di dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis
425a4(rgyud): brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
425a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas rig pa'i rgyal po mchog byang chub sems dpa' sngags kyi sgor spyod pa nyid kyis nges par don yod par grub par rig 'dzin rim par
425a6(rgyud): phye ba smras pa/ na mas+t+rai yad d+hI kA nA/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ taM taM taM/ na ma stai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAn/ hiM haM haM/ na mastAM yad d+hI kA nAM/ ta grA ga tA nAM/ baM baM / na ma s+t+rai ya
425a7(rgyud): d+h+r-i gAn+da ta thA ga tA nAM/ dang pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams goyo bar byed do// gnyis pas ni gzugs rnams so// gsum pas ni 'ching bar byed do//
425b1(rgyud): bzhi pas ni thar pa dang gzi brjid sgrub par byed do// lnga pas ni gcod par byed do// drug pas ni rengs par byed do// 'di dag ni phyag 'tshal ba re re'o// nam s+t+rai yad d+hi kAnAM/ ta thA ga
425b2(rgyud): tAn+na sa ma be ka be/ a la AHg+h+nA nA~M/ uHra/ ga gan sam su s+sat+ma/ b+h+r-i kar shA ba na to khe lAn+na ta shAn+ta rA gA na shi gan tu/ a nan+taSh+Tha/ sA ra sA ra/ kenI la ka mA
425b3(rgyud): bar sha ra Na/ na mo stu/ sar+b+ba tra sha ra NA/ b+h+ra ma b+hU ma swAhA/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM a nan+te ya swA hA/ rdo rje gdan gyi'o// na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kAn+na/ ta thA ga tA nAn/ sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra/
425b4(rgyud): badz+ra ni le ni la/ g+hi hUM s+phu Ta hUM/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// de nas rdo rje gzi rjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/
425b5(rgyud): mgrin gcig tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i chos rdo rje 'di smras so// na mas+t+rai yad d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ a ma lA be ga sam b+hA ba a d+hi ShA na/ badz+ra pa
425b6(rgyud): be ga sa man+ta ga mi b+h+ra maM b+h+ra maM/ bi d+ha ra Na bi d+ha ra Na/ na mostu ta dz+wa lA na lA bi ma la le tsa na/ sar+b+ba tra pra se ra Na ba ra pra ba la dzu ba ra sha ra Na hUM swA hA/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
425b7(rgyud): bstan bsrung bar byed pa rdo rje rgyal po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi cho gas rdo rje bsgrubs na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bklags pa tsam gyis lag pa'i rdo rje mi snang bar 'gyur/
426a1(rgyud): ro// ri la 'dug nas sngar bstan pa'i cho gas ji srid mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas zla ba nya la skyil mo krung bcas nas mtshan rangs pa bzlas/
426a2(rgyud): pa byas na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing // 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur ro// gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad nam mkha'i spyan
426a3(rgyud): gyi cho gas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btab cing zhus pa ste/ rig pa mchog gi rgyal po 'di ni mthu mtshungs pa med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
426a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa sgrub pa nges pa med pa'o// sngags dang / phyag rgya dang
426a5(rgyud): spyod pa thams cad kyi snying po bsdus pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'di lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yang dag/
426a6(rgyud): par ston par byed pa mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la rmad du byung ba'i mthu mthong bar 'dod pas sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bzung nas bsgrub par bya'o// 'di la
426a7(rgyud): ras ris med kyang rung / ma bsgrubs kyang rung / mchod pa med kyang rung / khrus med kyang rung / sha la sogs pa ma spangs kyang rung ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye
426b1(rgyud): ba'i sgrub pa 'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu dad pa bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su bzung ba de'i nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dir
426b2(rgyud): 'di'i dam tshig ni 'di yin te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mchod rten gyi drung du skyil
426b3(rgyud): mo krung bcas pas 'dug la/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bya'o//
426b4(rgyud): yan lag thams cad sa la phab la 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag yongs su gzung du gsol
426b5(rgyud): bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes bya ba'i ngag kyang brjod par bya'o// de nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ga ga
426b6(rgyud): neg ga ne/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin pa'i dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur ro// dam tshig 'di dag gang yang rung ba ma nyams par bya'o// cho ga
426b7(rgyud): 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / cho ga 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba ste/ sems can du/
427a1(rgyud): bar byed pa la gnod par byed pa dang // skyon thogs par 'gyur ba'i las byed pa dang / bstan pa la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa dang dam pa'i chos spong
427a2(rgyud): bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba la mngon spyod kyi las byed pa dang / mi smra ba'i sbyor bas phyag rgya sbyor bar byed pa dang gzhan bsod nams ma
427a3(rgyud): yin pa la sbyar bar mi bya bar gsol ba gdab par bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir 'di dag dam tshig yang dag par srungs par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
427a4(rgyud): cad kyi byin gyi rlabs stobs dang / sngags kyi sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgor 'jug pa don yod par grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las 'dren par byed
427a5(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btab pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa'i snying por 'gyur ba'o// dad pa can brtson 'grus dang ldan pas nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di
427a6(rgyud): nyid la khyad par thob par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku thob par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku nges par sgrub par 'dod pa sa dben zhing stong pa'i gnas
427a7(rgyud): su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba byas nas sngags gang yang rung ba bzlas pa bya'o// dben par dam pa'i chos gdon pa dang sems
427b1(rgyud): pa'ang rung / nus pa ji lta ba bzhin phyag 'tshal ba'ang byas la/ mchod rten nas su gzugs kyi mdun du ri dang / chu klung dang / mtsho dang / gling dang / kun+d+ha dga' ra ba dang /
427b2(rgyud): nye ba'i tshal la sogs pa rnams su'am/ gtsug lag khang gi gnas dang sku gdung dang bcas pa'i sa 'am/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ tha na gtsug lag khang gi zang khang du'ang rung /
427b3(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du 'am/ sangs rgyas la dmigs pas 'du 'dzi spangs la snyom las dang bral bas dam pa'i chos la bla mar byed pas bsgrub pa byas na mtshan
427b4(rgyud): gcig gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bco lnga pa la skyil mo krung ma ba shig par mngon par bsngags shing legs so zhes bya ba'ang gsol bar mdzad do// kha cig gis ni
427b5(rgyud): mthong ba'ang gsol bar mdzad do// kha cig gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa 'phel brla cing 'bebs par yang byed do// byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob
427b6(rgyud): pa mdzad par 'gyur/ tshad med pa'i yon tan nyid la'ang rab tu 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mtha' yas shing mthong
427b7(rgyud): ba med pa'i chos rnams kyis yon tan rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// mthu chen po'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar 'di ni de'i 'jig rten gyi chos kyi tha ma yin
428a1(rgyud): no zhes bya'o// de ltar na'ang sngags kyi spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med par rab 'byam rgya che ba de bzhin gshegs pa dngag tu med cing tshad med pas/
428a2(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po chog pa med pa dam tshig chen po gsum gyi rdo rje zhes bya ba / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gsum rdo rje'i sgo nyid kyi snying po
428a3(rgyud): bsdus pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya bgasang ba po'i bdag po'i gang yin pas rdo rje 'chang las gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par bzung ba nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub
428a4(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkor gyi snying po 'di sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyir dang bstan pa srung ba'i phyir te/ 'di gnyis ni sngags dang
428a5(rgyud): phyag rgya la spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor bu chen po'i rgya mtsho'i mchod pa'i mchog
428a6(rgyud): bka' bzhin byed pa zhes gsungs so// sngags dang phyag rgya spyod pa zhes kyang gsungs so// g.yo ba med pa'i nor bu zhes kyang gsungs so// yon tan mtha' yas pa
428a7(rgyud): zhes kyang gsungs so// dam tshig srung ba po zhes kyang gsungs so// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i smon lam 'dzin pa po zhes kyang gsungs so// bstan pa srung ba po zhes
428b1(rgyud): kyang gsungs so// stobs chen po zhes kyang gsungs so// don yod 'di la sam te dang bral bas bsam rgyas mi khyab pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la dad pas nan tan du bya'o//
428b2(rgyud): 'dir de lta bu'i bstod pa rmang du byung ba gang bdag gis sngon dbyangs su blangs pa de dbyangs su brjod pas de dang mthun pa'i dngos grub rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// na mas+t+rai yang
428b3(rgyud): sa sad+d+ha/ oMs sa samaSh+Ta / rmAHkA rdzu na gadzA ga du 'dzurad+d+ha/ masas/ sarba kuD+ga no// sem/
428b4(rgyud): si ma par a gra/ d+ha mo rtag gnas mo pa mag ta/ na b+hiHtagun laM sha re Na tu kA ti ko byaM/ shaM me kaM sad+ha sar+b+ba d+hA tu ba ra siSh+kaM d+ha lib+hU shi ga to// u pa me Sh+Ta.a sa
428b5(rgyud): man+ta/ sid+d+hi shu sa ta tA/ a ma la/ kA ru Na be ga to/ uta thi ta pra ni d+ha nA/ sid+d+hi ra ni d+har+m+ma tA/ dza ga to an+ma sA d+he na pa ra/ a sa man tI nI/ sha ta tA bi ro tsi ta ma?H
428b6(rgyud): k+Shi pa At+man+taM/ na ni rau dzA traM kA nur+N+Na/ tsA ra ka a tsA la prA dze te tri lo ko/ d+ha ra sid+d+ha d+ha yi kaM/ a mI ta a mI te Sh+Ta su sa ma pA tI tAM/ ga ti shwa bi kA a ho su d+ham+ba tA tri sa ma /
428b7(rgyud): a gra/ sid+d+hi bar d+han te/ maM bar d+ha na ShA a gra ti ti titi/ swad+ha sa ka lA trai li ki bar d+ha a gra/ sA d+ha nAnA a ra thA/ sde yad d+h+wi kA tI kA/ Ar+tha briShA/ na moHsa man+ta badz+rAN+Da
429a1(rgyud): a moH/ aH// yes ma/ anaHka/ rba du/ \u0f7f/ d+hAn/ TAtas/ snangs nadas
429a2(rgyud): Ta ya/ shatA tA tsam/ a nu ban+d+ha a dzAM ka ru/ a sa ha tan arba/ ka DA kaT+Ta// a ti bA lA/ a ti bA lA/ oM ho ma hA gu Na bi Sha r+d+ha/ narngan r+the/ A be sha u pa~M sha/ a tsal
429a3(rgyud): \u0f7fsar+b+ba tra a nuta tA rA e ka tsat+tA rba tA Te/ sam+ba dam+bA/ phaT phaT swAhA/ khol po mi g.yo ba'i snying po'o// dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyang de mas thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so//
429a4(rgyud): dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gr-iSh+Na baN+Di
429a5(rgyud): da mtsha drug slong dus rnams rgyal bas 'i nus gtan la da rgyag ga
429a6(rgyud): maNi bi bu la'i mAn bi shA supra tiSh+NI ta gu rgyan par mar gyi s+yan ka we rA dza nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med 'ang shin tu ga gas pa gsang ba
429a7(rgyud): dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho gzhi ba ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs// bam pa dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
429b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par mdzad/ spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang
429b2(rgyud): gcer bu pa thams cad dang / mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyang btul nas pham par mjed de/ 'khor ba'i skyon 'khor ba'i chu bo'i pha rol tu gshegs so// gang gi tshe bdud
429b3(rgyud): kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g.yog bdud kyi sde phrag dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling bkang ba de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sa rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs
429b4(rgyud): nas/ sems can de dag gis 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra'ang mthos shing / mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogs su bab par gyur to// rgyal
429b5(rgyud): ba'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i dbus de'i sa de'ang rdol nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa/ rtsa ba ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ sdong du ni bai DUR+Ya/ snying po ni
429b6(rgyud): 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ ze ba ni rdo'i snying po/ srid ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug pa 'od dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ pad+ma de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar
429b7(rgyud): byas so// de nas pad+ma de las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i gzugs kyis bskul ba'i sgra 'di byung ngo // phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags
430a1(rgyud): pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ma Ni badz+ra hrid ma badz+ra mA ra sai n+ye birba ba na/ ha na ha na/ badz+ra gar+b+he trA sa ya trA sa ya/ sar+b+ba mA ra ba ban ni ts+tsha dz+dza
430a2(rgyud): saM d+ha ra saM d+ha ra/ bud+d+ha mai tri sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ badz+re kalpa a d+hiSh+Ti te swA hA/ pad+ma de las yang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grags te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
430a3(rgyud): gyi khams 'di smras bkang nas shAkya thub pasrid pa'i dgon pa las ni brgal/ bdud ni bcom/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul ni spangs/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs ni dral
430a4(rgyud): chos kyi sgron ma chen po ni sbar te/ gang gi phyir gzungs 'di'i mthus sa rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas bdud 'di bcom pa legs so legs so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag
430a5(rgyud): po lag na rdo rje spu zing zhes byed cing lus 'dar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
430a6(rgyud): 'das ci'i slad du rig sngags chen mo 'di 'dus pa dang po la 'dzam bu'i gling du byung lags/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di 'jig rten du sngon byung bar ma thos lags
430a7(rgyud): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba po'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa
430b1(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa 'di'ang me tog sna
430b2(rgyud): tshogs su gyur te 'bab bo// gzungs 'di'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nas srog chags bye ba btul to// 'di'i mthus sum mdo'i dbus su pad+ma 'di byung bar gyur to//
430b3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di med par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus/ bdud bye ba pham par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skams par ma yin te/ chos kyi sngon ma
430b4(rgyud): sbar bar mi nus so// lag na rdo rje ngas dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma spyad na/ ji srid gzungs 'di mnyan pa dang mngon par brtson pas brtson 'grus ma byas
430b5(rgyud): kyi bar du ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob par mi nus kyi/ phyis ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon no// lag na rdo rje 'di ni sangs
430b6(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa yin no// lag ni rdo rje 'di'i ming bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs/
430b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mtshan bzung bar 'gyur ro// brjod cing bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / zhabs la phyag byas
431a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes me tog sna tshogs dang / dri dang / bdug pa/
431a2(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
431a3(rgyud): te// bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na yon tan gyi khyad par ci 'dra ba dag gda' bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag
431a4(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi gzhi 'di dag la sa gzhan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyi tshogs bsags par mi bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
431a5(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje sems can de dag ni snyoms las can/ brtson 'grus dman pa gti mug gis rmongs
431a6(rgyud): pa/ 'dod pa'i dregs pas rmongs pa/ yid ches par dka' ba par mi 'dzin pa mar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi
431a7(rgyud): gtso bo la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ste/ des ni gzungs 'di lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhing bsod nams chung ba/ skal ba chung ba/ blo zhan pa rnams kyis kyang nyan par mi 'gyur/ 'chad
431b1(rgyud): par mi 'gyur zhing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di la dad pa skyed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
431b2(rgyud): kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi rje dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nga ni 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad bA gar+b+ha'i klung
431b3(rgyud): gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad
431b4(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'i ra ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba nyams dga' ba lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba skyes pa dang bud med dang
431b5(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo dang / skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nyid snang zhing nor bu dang gser 'bar ba'i mgo rgyan sna tshogs kyis mgo brgyan pa
431b6(rgyud): lha'i gzugs can mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/ bshes gnyen thams cad dang ldan pa/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pa snang bar yod par 'gro'o// 'ji
431b7(rgyud): rten gyi khams de na rgyal po nor bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ blon po bye ba phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing / btsun mo dam pa gsal byed ma zhes bya ba
432a1(rgyud): bud med nyi khri'i 'khor can lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi lus la 'gran pa zhig yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na'ang me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing
432a2(rgyud): dang / drang chu'i shing dang / dri'i shing gang yin pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no// chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po ches
432a3(rgyud): bdun gyi rang zhin yin no// thang las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rang bzhin min no// mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad
432a4(rgyud): khri thub ste/ thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa yin no// rgyal po de'ang chos dang 'thun pas
432a5(rgyud): rgyal srid skyong bar byed kyi/ chos dang mi mthun pas ni ma yin te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa can yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams de na'ang de bzhin gshegs
432a6(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing
432a7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gser gyi kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe bzang
432b1(rgyud): po brgyad cu mnga' ba/ 'od 'dor gang gis kun nas bskor ba/ 'od rin po che sna bdun ltar shin tu dpa' ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
432b2(rgyud): gser gyi kha dog gi lus 'od 'phro ba/ mtshan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma'i gdan la 'khod pa ste/ thams cad kyang spobs pa mi zad pa sgrib pa med/
432b3(rgyud): pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pas 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba zhes bya
432b4(rgyud): ba'i gzungs sems shing gzungs de nyid kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par 'di byung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang gzungs 'di sems can thams cad la
432b5(rgyud): rab tu ston to// sems can de rnams kyang gzungs 'di'i mthus bde ba nyams su myong ba ste/ sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
432b6(rgyud): dang / rgashin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams las yongs su thar par gyur to// ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyang bcad par gyur to// mtha ris kyi sgo rnams
432b7(rgyud): phye'o// bde 'gro'i sgo thams cad kyang phye ste/ 'jig rten gi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par
433a1(rgyud): #zhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ chu dang 'o ma gcig tu gyur pa bzhin no//
433a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba 'di sgrub pa na smon lam 'di
433a3(rgyud): skad ces/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
433a4(rgyud): ldog par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// gang dag gzungs 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / 'don pa dang
433a5(rgyud): sems pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / chung ngu na ming nyan par byed dam/ lag pas reg gam lus la 'chang ngam/ mig gis mthong ba tsam mam/ glegs bam la bris
433a6(rgyud): pa 'am/ ras la bris pa 'am/ rtsig pa la bris pa mthong na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa 'am/ 'phags
433a7(rgyud): pa la skur pa btab pa 'am/ shan pa 'am gdol pa 'am/ rngon pa 'am bya ba'am long ba 'am 'on pa 'am sha bkra can nam/ bkren pa 'am/ zhar ba 'am/
433b1(rgyud): drur po 'angs spyad pa'ang/ sngon rgya las kyis 'phangs pa'i slob pa can nas rung bar gyur pa ma nges pa 'am/ bdud kyi zhags pas bgyis pa 'gyu ba ngar par gyur /
433b2(rgyud): ba 'am/ log 'dzin gyis zin pa 'am/ rgyu skar dang / gza' gnod par byas pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
433b3(rgyud): mi ldog par 'gyur ro// chung ngu na dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa ri dgas dang / bya dang / sbrang bu mchu ring dang / sha sdang dang byi ba dang / grog sbur rnams dang / gzhan
433b4(rgyud): yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal nas skyes pa 'am/ drod ga sher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa la sogs te de dag thams
433b5(rgyud): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
433b6(rgyud): tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor de dag thams cad dga' zhing ba spu'i khung bu rnams g.yos par gyur to// lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang ku mu da dang /
433b7(rgyud): pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu bababo// lha'i sil snyen rnams kyang sgra 'byin no// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams
434a1(rgyud): cad kyi rang rang gi lus las kyang 'od zer byung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma bkra ba/
434a2(rgyud): bltan sdug pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba nyams dga' ba/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'od 'bar ba/ grwa bzhin nor bu rin
434a3(rgyud): po che chen po bzhi nyi ma ltar 'od 'bar ba// nor bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi dra ba du ma sbyangs pa/ dril bu mang pos mdzes par byas pa/ dar gyi ba dan mang pos kun nas brgyan
434a4(rgyud): pa/ me tog sna tshogs du ma'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa zhig byung ngo // sa 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul ldeg la sgra 'byin cing mthong ba dang dma' bar gyur
434a5(rgyud): to// lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams cad bskul to// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang bskul to// rig sngags 'chang gi
434a6(rgyud): gnas thams cad kyang bskul te/ lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / bar chad byed pa'i log 'dzin thams cad sngangs skrag
434a7(rgyud): ste cho nges 'debs shing phyogs bcur byer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod spu nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun/
434b1(rgyud): nas snang bar byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams bskul nas slar dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas
434b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom
434b3(rgyud): ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das khyod de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de gzigs pa dang / phyag bgyi ba
434b4(rgyud): dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing bzhud pa'i dus la babagyis/ bzhud la nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de'ang /
434b5(rgyud): rgyas par gson cig/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs de ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags so// gzungs de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs
434b6(rgyud): pa lags te/ gang la la zhig nyan tam/ chung ngu na ming ngam/ lag pas reg na'ang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngo
434b7(rgyud): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
435a1(rgyud): rnams kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas/ yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bkye ste ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de la
435a2(rgyud): bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byung ba ni 'di yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi ga dan las
435a3(rgyud): bzhengs pa dang / khang pa brtsegs ma de'i dbus su rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri byung nas/ khri de'i steng du rin po che'i pad+ma bkra ba blta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/ sdong bu ni
435a4(rgyud): gser/ pad+ma'i snying po ni mu tig dmar po can zhig byung ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu sa chen po 'di che thang du g.yos
435a5(rgyud): par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu chen po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor thams cad dbugs phyung nas steng gi nam
435a6(rgyud): mkha'i dkyil du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khod de 'khor mang po dang / 'khod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang rnam par sprul pa
435a7(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'khor dang / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
435b1(rgyud): chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa mang po dang / rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang po'i 'khor dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu brgya byin dang / tshangs pa/
435b2(rgyud): dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang gshegs so// de dag thams cad shar phyogs logs su dong ba dang tshad med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang
435b3(rgyud): mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das nas/ nor bu sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
435b4(rgyud): mthus skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to// 'jig rten gyi khams der byon ma thag tu nam mkha' las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
435b5(rgyud): gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma do'i drung du gshegs so// der gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa mi mnga' 'am ga bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba
435b6(rgyud): la reg par gnas sam zhes gsungs nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa zhig byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na 'khor dang bcas pa
435b7(rgyud): bzhugs pa dang / des phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ zab cing zab pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de
436a1(rgyud): yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ khang pa brtsegs ma de nyid du bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod
436a2(rgyud): kyis chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor lags sam/ khyod kyis bdud dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom lags sam khyod kyis chos kyi sgron mo sngar lags sam/ chos kyi
436a3(rgyud): rgyal mtshan bsgrengs lags sam/ chos kyi rnga brdungs lags sam/ chos kyi dung rab tu bu sa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung ba
436a4(rgyud): bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen par bgyis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis deng 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo chos kyi gter lan gnyis su bskor ba mdzod cig/
436a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu gsangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/
436a6(rgyud): rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ zur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ che mchem/ rab tu chemachem/ kun tu
436a7(rgyud): rab tu chem chem ste/ me tog gi char chen po'ang rab tu bab/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'ang snang / sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin/ steng gi nam mkha'i bar
436b1(rgyud): sdang gi lha'i bu rnams kyang lha'i sil snyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba yan lag lnga pa dag dkrol bar byed/ klu chen po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu
436b2(rgyud): 'bebs par byed/ dri'i phye ma sna tshogs dang tsan dan gyi chu sna tshogs kyi char yang 'bebs par byed gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan dang / lbab lhub sna tshogs kyi char yang
436b3(rgyud): rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i mu tig dmar po dang / sdug dang / nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par snang byed dang / nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / chu shel dang /
436b4(rgyud): me shel dang / dpal gyi snying po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed// lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen
436b5(rgyud): po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i 'dzem bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i me tog dang / lha'i dngul las byung ba'i me tog gi char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i me tog
436b6(rgyud): gi 'phreng ba'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang a la la zhes snga snyan pa 'byin cing dbyangs kyang rjes su sgrog par byed/
436b7(rgyud): legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin par byed/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po chos
437a1(rgyud): kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzam bu'i gling du gzhag pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i rgyal po'i
437a2(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu sbyor bar bgyis pa legs so legs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang
437a3(rgyud): po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer sna tshogs bkye ste/ 'od zer de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
437a4(rgyud): thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bskul cing snang bar mdzad de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang snang bar mdzad lha'i gnas
437a5(rgyud): thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi rigs rnams su'ang bskul
437a6(rgyud): zhing snang bar mdzad de slar log nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas slar yang gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs so// de
437a7(rgyud): nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa
437b1(rgyud): mdzad nas/ tshad med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis
437b2(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma dag sprul nas khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri dag byung ba de lasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
437b3(rgyud): de dag thams cad rang rang gi 'khor dang khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang
437b4(rgyud): mas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos legs par mchod nas/ rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so//
437b5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
437b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po'ang rab tu gdang/
437b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
438a1(rgyud): mi dang mi ma lags pa'i 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyang rab tu gda'/ rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs 'dus pa chen po'ang lhags nas/ 'di lta ste/
438a2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyang lhags bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'ang gda' lags pas bcom ldan 'das
438a3(rgyud): nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gnal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so// tshod ni 'di lags so zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol
438a4(rgyud): btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma sa
438a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu song la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
438a6(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la gsol ba thob cig dang / des khyod la rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin /
438a7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'dug nas//
438b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu
438b2(rgyud): rab tu gnas pa gsang ba 'di sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsol
438b3(rgyud): ba btab par thugs su chud nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po song la 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus kyi sa phyogs su
438b4(rgyud): rdo rjes sa la snun cig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ 'khor gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba
438b5(rgyud): der song nas sa phyogs de la rdo rjes snun te/ sa la bsnun ma thag tu de nas gru bzhir gnas so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab
438b6(rgyud): tu g.yos so// g.yos ma thag tu sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma gru bzhi pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa sgo bzhi btod pa / mnyam pa nyams dga'
438b7(rgyud): ba shin tu rnam par phye bachas mdzes par byas pa/ bkra ba blta na sdug pa 'od 'bar ba them skas bzhi dang ldan pa 'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod pa rgyar
439a1(rgyud): dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo // khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus der yang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang / rin po che dang /
439a2(rgyud): mu tig gi dra ba du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ dz+wal du dum 'phyang du bcug pa/ dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas
439a3(rgyud): pa/ me tog gi chun po du mas mngon par brgyan pa zhig byung ngo // mchod rten de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de

439a5(rgyud): byedame tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / phyag 'tshal

439a7(rgyud): 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar skyes te ya mtshan du gyur/ spro bar gyur nas khang pa brtsegs ma dang mchod rten 'di ci'i phyir byung bar gyur ces/ tsa co dang gzha'i sgra mthon por 'byin cing /
439b1(rgyud): mchod rten dang khang pa brtsegs ma de la skor ba byed// mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / ji dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang

439b3(rgyud): de nas khang pa brtsegs ma de las snga byung ba/ kye 'khor mang po dag par snang la ci snang ltos shig ltos shig/ de nas ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis bar
439b4(rgyud): snang la bltas te/ bltas ma thag tu bai DUR+Ya dang nor bu rin po che chen po las byung ba'i sprin gyi phung po chen po zhig byung ngo // de nas sprin gyi phung po'i steng du nor bu chen po rgyas
